eng.Qst: who sings just around the riverbend in pocahontas
eng.Rep: "Just Around the Riverbend" in Pocahontas is sung by the character Pocahontas, voiced by actress and singer Judy Kuhn.

afr.Qst: Die liedjie is 'n liedjie wat in Pocahontas gesing word.
afr.Rep: Die liedjie se naam is "Colors of the Wind" en dit is geskryf deur Alan Menken en Stephen Schwartz. Dit is gesing deur die karakter Pocahontas in die fliek.
afr.Rep_En: The song is called "Colors of the Wind" and it was written by Alan Menken and Stephen Schwartz. It was sung by the character Pocahontas in the movie.

arb.Qst: الذي يغني حول منحنى النهر في بوكاهونتاس
arb.Rep: الأغنية التي تغني حول منحنى النهر في بوكاهونتاس هي أغنية "Colors of the Wind" من فيلم ديزني الشهير "Pocahontas". وتتحدث الأغنية عن الروح الحرة للطبيعة وضرورة احترامها والعيش بتناغم معها، وتشير إلى أن الطبيعة ليست مجرد مجموعة من الأشياء المادية، بل هي كيان حي يجب علينا التعامل معه بحرص واحترام.
arb.Rep_En: The song, which is about the curves of the river in Pocahontas, is "Colors of the Wind" from the popular Disney movie Pocahontas, and it talks about the free spirit of nature, the need to respect it and live in harmony with it, and it points out that nature is not just a collection of material things, but a living entity that we must deal with with care and respect.

ary.Qst: اللي كايغني فجوار نهر بوكاهونتاس
ary.Rep: هذه الأغنية تسمى "Colors of the Wind" وهي من فيلم ديزني الشهير "Pocahontas". تتحدث الأغنية عن الاحترام والتعايش مع الطبيعة والحيوانات والبشرية بشكل عام، وتدعو إلى عدم الاستغلال والتدمير للبيئة.
ary.Rep_En: This song is called "Colors of the Wind" and is from the famous Disney movie "Pocahontas". The song talks about respect and coexistence with nature, animals and humans in general, and calls for the non-exploitation and destruction of the environment.

arz.Qst: اللي بيغني على طول منحنى النهر في بوكاهونتاس
arz.Rep: الأغنية التي تغني عن منحنى النهر في فيلم بوكاهونتاس هي "Colors of the Wind" وهي من غناء فانيسا ويليامز.
arz.Rep_En: The song she sings about the bend of the river in the film Pocahontas is "Colors of the Wind" by Vanessa Williams.

asm.Qst: যিজনে পকাহন্টাছৰ নদীৰ পাৰত গান গায়
asm.Rep: আপুনি কি কোন নদীৰ পাৰত গান গাওব লাগিব? মোক জানাক দিব পারিব।
asm.Rep_En: Can you tell me which river bank you have to sing on?

bel.Qst: хто спявае толькі за рухам ракі ў Pocahontas
bel.Rep: У песні "Colors of the Wind" з мультфільму "Pocahontas" співає Джуді Кун.
bel.Rep_En: The song "Colors of the Wind" from the cartoon "Pocahontas" is sung by Judy Kuhn.

ben.Qst: যে গানটি পোকাহন্টাসের নদীর বাঁক দিয়ে গান করে
ben.Rep: গানটির নাম "Colors of the Wind" এবং এটি পোকাহন্টাস মুভির সাউন্ডট্র্যাকের অংশ।
ben.Rep_En: The song is called "Colors of the Wind" and it is part of the soundtrack of the movie Pocahontas.

bos.Qst: "Pjevanje ""Ovdje iza rijeke"" u Pocahontas"
bos.Rep:
Pjesma "Ovdje iza rijeke" (engl. "Just Around the Riverbend") je jedna od najpoznatijih pjesama iz Disneyjevog animiranog filma "Pocahontas". Pjeva je glavna junakinja Pocahontas, a u originalnoj verziji filma glas joj je posudila glumica Judy Kuhn.

Pjesma govori o Pocahontasinoj želji da istraži svijet izvan svog plemena i da se suoči s nepoznatim izazovima. Ona se pita što se krije iza rijeke i želi otkriti što joj život donosi. Pjesma je puna optimizma i hrabrosti, te je postala jedna od najomiljenijih pjesama iz filma.
bos.Rep_En:
"Just Around the River" is a song from the Disney animated film Pocahontas, sung by Pocahontas herself, and voiced by Judy Kuhn.
The song is about Pocahontas' desire to explore the world outside her tribe and face unknown challenges. She wonders what lies behind the river and wants to discover what life brings her. The song is full of optimism and courage, and has become one of the most beloved songs from the film.

bul.Qst: който пее точно около изкривяването на реката в Покахонтас
bul.Rep: Това е героят на анимационния филм "Покахонтас" - Джон Смит. В една от най-известните сцени във филма, той пее песента "Colors of the Wind" точно около изкривяването на реката.
bul.Rep_En: The character of Pocahontas, John Smith, is the only character in the film to sing "Colors of the Wind" in a river.

cat.Qst: que canta al voltant de la corba del riu a Pocahontas
cat.Rep: La canción que canta el personaje de Pocahontas alrededor de la curva del río se llama "Just Around the Riverbend".
cat.Rep_En: The song that Pocahontas' character sings around the river bend is called "Just Around the Riverbend".

ceb.Qst: Ang mga tawo nga nag-awit sa mga baybayon sa Pocahontas
ceb.Rep: Ang mga tawo nga nag-awit sa mga baybayon sa Pocahontas ay ang mga karakter sa pelikula na nagngangalang John Smith, Pocahontas, at ang mga miyembro ng kanilang mga tribu. Ang mga awitin ay binuo ng mga kompositor na sina Alan Menken at Stephen Schwartz. Ilan sa mga awitin sa pelikula ay "Colors of the Wind," "Just Around the Riverbend," at "Listen With Your Heart."
ceb.Rep_En: The film stars John Smith, Pocahontas, and members of their tribes, and the songs were composed by composers Alan Menken and Stephen Schwartz.

ces.Qst: který zpívá kolem křivky řeky v Pocahontas
ces.Rep: Píseň se jmenuje "Colors of the Wind" a zpívá ji postava Pocahontas.
ces.Rep_En: The song is called "Colors of the Wind" and it's sung by Pocahontas.

ckb.Qst: ئەو گۆرانییەی کە لە دەوروبەری ڕووبارەکە لە پۆکاھۆنتاس دەخوێنێت
ckb.Rep: من ناتوانم بەڵێ، چونکە من ناتوانم بەشداری لە دەوروبەری ڕووبارەکە بکەم. لەگەڵ ئەمەیە، ئەگەر ناوەندی گۆرانییەکە دانراوە، ئەتوانیت بە ناوی گۆرانییەکە لەگەڵ ناوی هونەرمەندی کە دەخوێنەری ئەو گۆرانییە بووە، دەستی پێ بکەیت و بەردەوام بە خوێندنی ئەو گۆرانییە بکەیت.
ckb.Rep_En: I can't do that, because I can't participate in the river. With this, if the center of the song is set, you can start with the name of the song and the name of the artist who read the song, and continue to read the song.

cmn.Qst: 在波卡洪塔斯的河<unk>边唱歌
cmn.Rep: 在波卡洪塔斯的河边唱歌，是一首非常著名的墨西哥民歌。这首歌描述了一个人在波卡洪塔斯河边唱歌的情景，歌词中充满了对大自然的赞美和对生命的热爱。这首歌曲旋律优美，歌词深情，深受墨西哥人民的喜爱。
cmn.Rep_En: The song "Singing by the River" is a Mexican folk song that describes a person singing by the river in Pocahontas, full of praise for nature and love for life.

cmn_Hant.Qst: 唱歌的河流在波卡洪塔斯 (Pocahontas)
cmn_Hant.Rep:
唱歌的河流在波卡洪塔斯 (Pocahontas)是一首非常著名的歌曲，是迪士尼电影《波卡洪塔斯》中的插曲之一。以下是歌词：

Look at the river, isn't it neat?
在这条河流上，是不是很美？

Flowing along, with treasures to seek
它流淌着，带着无尽的宝藏

Clear as the sky, or so it would seem
清澈如天空，至少看起来是这样

Tell me, my river, what's beyond that stream?
告诉我，我的河流，那条小溪的那边是什么？

See how the shorelines gleam in the light
看那岸边在光线下闪耀

Winding and weaving, like ribbons in flight
蜿蜒曲折，像飞舞的丝带

The river is singing, and so must I
河流在歌唱，我也要跟着唱

Flowing and growing, and never asking why
流淌着，成长着，从不问为什么

Look at the river, so wise and so old
看那河流，又聪明又古老

Silent and deep, with stories untold
沉默而深邃，有着无数未讲的故事

The river is calling, and so must I
河流在呼唤，我也要跟着去

Into the unknown, to live or to die
走向未知，生或死，都要去尝试

cym.Qst: Mae'r gân yn cael ei chanu yn Pocahontas.
cym.Rep: Diolch am y wybodaeth! Mae'r gân "Colors of the Wind" yn un o'r caneuon mwyaf adnabyddus o'r ffilm Disney Pocahontas. Mae'r gân yn canolbwyntio ar y berthynas rhwng Pocahontas a John Smith, ac yn annog pobl i ystyried y byd o safbwynt natur a chyfoethogi ein profiadau trwy ymdeimlad a chyfathrebu â'r byd naturiol. Mae'r gân wedi ennill sawl gwobr, gan gynnwys Gwobr yr Academi am y Gân Oryginal Orau yn 1996.
cym.Rep_En: The song "Colors of the Wind" is one of the best-known songs from the Disney film Pocahontas.The song focuses on the relationship between Pocahontas and John Smith, and encourages people to view the world from the perspective of nature and enrich our experiences through empathy and communication with the natural world.The song has won several awards, including the Academy Award for Best Original Song in 1996.

dan.Qst: som synger lige rundt om flodbøjningen i Pocahontas
dan.Rep: Sangen hedder "Farbenspiel des Winds" på tysk og "Colors of the Wind" på engelsk. Den synges af karakteren Pocahontas i Disney-filmen af samme navn.
dan.Rep_En: The song is called "Farbenspiel des Winds" in German and "Colors of the Wind" in English, and is sung by Pocahontas in the Disney film of the same name.

deu.Qst: der nur um die Flussuferung in Pocahontas herum singt
deu.Rep: Ich bin ein virtueller Assistent und singe nicht um Flussuferungen in Pocahontas herum. Wie kann ich Ihnen helfen?
deu.Rep_En: I'm a virtual assistant, and I'm not singing about river crossings in Pocahontas.

ell.Qst: που τραγουδάει ακριβώς γύρω από την καμπύλη του ποταμού στο Pocahontas
ell.Rep: Το τραγούδι που αναφέρεστε είναι το "Just Around the Riverbend" από την ταινία Pocahontas της Disney. Στο τραγούδι, η πρωταγωνίστρια Pocahontas τραγουδάει για την αναζήτησή της για τον δρόμο που θα ακολουθήσει στη ζωή της και τον προορισμό της, ενώ βρίσκεται ακριβώς γύρω από την καμπύλη του ποταμού.
ell.Rep_En: The song "Just Around the Riverbend" from the Disney film Pocahontas tells the story of Pocahontas' search for her life's path and her destination, while standing just around the bend of the river.

est.Qst: kes laulab Pocahontas'i jõe ääres
est.Rep: Laulu nimi on "Colors of the Wind" ja seda esitab Judy Kuhn.
est.Rep_En: The song is called "Colors of the Wind" and it's performed by Judy Kuhn.

fin.Rep: Laulajan nimi on Judy Kuhn. Hän laulaa Pocahontasin roolissa elokuvan tunnetuimman kappaleen "Colors of the Wind".
fin.Rep_En: Judy Kuhn, who plays Pocahontas, sings the song "Colors of the Wind."

fra.Qst: qui chante juste autour du virage de la rivière à Pocahontas
fra.Rep: La chanson s'appelle "L'air du vent" en français et "Colors of the Wind" en anglais. Elle est interprétée par Pocahontas dans le film d'animation de Disney "Pocahontas".
fra.Rep_En: The song is called "L'air du vent" in French and "Colors of the Wind" in English. It is performed by Pocahontas in the Disney animated film "Pocahontas".

glg.Qst: que canta ao redor da curva do río en Pocahontas
glg.Rep: A música que é cantada ao redor da curva do rio em Pocahontas é "Just Around the Riverbend".
glg.Rep_En: The music that is sung around the river bend in Pocahontas is "Just Around the Riverbend".

guj.Qst: જે પોકાહોન્ટાસમાં નદીના વળાંકની આસપાસ ગાય છે
guj.Rep: આ પોકાહોન્ટા નદીના કિનારે સ્થિત છે અને તેની પાસે ગાયોનું પોષણ કરવા માટે નદીના વળાંકની આસપાસ ગાયો હોય છે. આ પોષક પદાર્થો ગાયની પોષણ કરવા માટે મહત્વપૂર્ણ છે. પોકાહોન્ટા નદી એક મહત્વની નદી છે જે મધ્ય અમેરિકાના ઉત્તર પશ્ચિમ ભાગમાં સ્થિત છે.
guj.Rep_En: The Pocahontas River, which flows through the city, is a major source of food for the cattle and is the largest river in the United States.

heb.Qst: שרה ממש סביב עקומת הנהר בפוקהונטס.
heb.Rep: אני מצטער, אבל אינני מבין את המשמעות של המשפט הזה. האם תוכל/י לספק פרטים נוספים או להסביר את ההקשר?
heb.Rep_En: I'm sorry, but I don't understand the meaning of this sentence. Can you provide more details or explain the context?

hin.Qst: जो Pocahontas में नदी के मोड़ के आसपास गाती है
hin.Rep: वह "Just Around the Riverbend" गाती है।

hrv.Qst: koji pjeva samo oko krivine rijeke u Pocahontas
hrv.Rep: To bi bio lik John Smith, koji u pjesmi "Strangers Like Me" pjeva "I'll search this world for something true, that's the way I'll find my love, I'm just a stranger in a strange land". Međutim, ta pjesma nije povezana s krivinom rijeke u Pocahontas, već se pojavljuje u filmu Tarzan. U Pocahontas, lik koji pjeva o krivini rijeke je Pocahontas u pjesmi "Just Around the Riverbend".
hrv.Rep_En: John Smith's "Strangers Like Me" is a song about a stranger in a strange land, and the song is a reference to the Pocahontas River.

hun.Qst: aki a Pocahontas folyó kanyarán énekel.
hun.Rep: A Pocahontas folyó kanyarán énekelő dal címe "Colors of the Wind". A dal a Disney Pocahontas című animációs filmjének része, és a főszereplő, Pocahontas énekli. A dal szövege arról szól, hogy a természet és az állatok értékesek, és hogy minden élőlénynek megvan a saját szépsége és értéke.
hun.Rep_En: The song "Colors of the Wind" is part of the Disney animated film Pocahontas, and the main character, Pocahontas, sings it. The lyrics are about nature and animals being precious, and that every living thing has its own beauty and value.

hye.Qst: Որ երգում է գետի ծայրում, Պոկահոնտասում
hye.Rep: Ես հավանում եմ, որ այն երգը կատարվում է հայկական ժողովրդի մեծ սիրով և այն կատարվում է հայ ժողովրդի մեծ տունը պատիվ գետի ծայրում: Երգի անվանումը է "Պոկահոնտաս" և այն կատարվում է հայ երգչուհի Լուսինե Գալստյանի կողմից:
hye.Rep_En: I like that the song is sung with great love by the Armenian people and it is sung by the Armenian people at the end of the great house of honor. The song is called "Pokahontas" and it is performed by the Armenian singer Lusine Galstyan.

ind.Qst: yang bernyanyi di sekitar bend sungai di Pocahontas
ind.Rep: Yang bernyanyi di sekitar bend sungai di Pocahontas adalah karakter bernama "Pocahontas". Dia menyanyikan lagu "Colors of the Wind".
ind.Rep_En: The song that is sung around the bend in the river at Pocahontas is a character named Pocahontas, who sings the song "Colors of the Wind."

isl.Qst: Söngur um flóabeltinu í Pocahontas
isl.Rep: Söngurinn sem þú ert að leita að heitir "Just Around the Riverbend" og er sunginn af Pocahontas í myndinni Pocahontas.

ita.Qst: che canta appena dietro la curva del fiume a Pocahontas
ita.Rep: La canzone che canta Pocahontas dietro la curva del fiume si intitola "Colors of the Wind" ed è una delle canzoni più famose del film Disney "Pocahontas". La canzone è stata scritta da Alan Menken e Stephen Schwartz e ha vinto l'Oscar alla migliore canzone originale nel 1996.
ita.Rep_En: The song "Behind the River Curve" by Pocahontas is one of the most famous songs from the Disney film Pocahontas, written by Alan Menken and Stephen Schwartz, and won the Academy Award for Best Original Song in 1996.

jav.Qst: Sing nyanyi ing pinggir kali ing Pocahontas
jav.Rep: Maaf, saya tidak bisa menyanyikan lagu "Nyanyi Ing Pinggir Kali" dari Pocahontas karena lagu tersebut bukan bagian dari soundtrack film tersebut. Namun, saya bisa membantu Anda dengan pertanyaan atau permintaan lainnya.
jav.Rep_En: Sorry, I can't sing the song "Singing on the Banks of the River" by Pocahontas because it's not on the soundtrack, but I can help you with any other questions or requests.

jpn.Rep: Thank you! How may I assist you today?

kan.Qst: "ಅವರು ""ಪೋಕಾಹೊಂಟಾಸ್ ನದಿಯ ಸುತ್ತಲೂ ಹಾಡುತ್ತಾರೆ."
kan.Rep: This sentence is in the Kannada language and it means "They sing around the Pokahontas river."

kat.Qst: მღერის მდინარე პოკაჰონტასის პირას.
kat.Rep: მე ვიცი, რომ პოკაჰონტასი არის მარტივი და მელოდიებაა, რომელიც შეიქმნება ერთად მრავალი მუსიკოსის მიერ. თუ გსურთ, შეგიძლიათ მიუწვდოთ მასში მიმართული ტექსტი და მე გადავიტანო მუსიკაში.
kat.Rep_En: I know that Pocahontas is a simple melody that is created by many musicians together, and if you want, you can add the lyrics to it, and I'll put it to music.

khm.Qst: អ្នក ដែល ច្រៀង នៅ ជុំវិញ ទន្លេ Pocahontas
khm.Rep: ខ្ញុំមិនច្រៀងនៅជុំវិញទន្លេ Pocahontas ទេ។ ខ្ញុំគិតថាអ្នកក៏មិនច្រៀងនៅជុំវិញទន្លេ Pocahontas ទេ។ តែប៉ុណ្ណោះខ្ញុំជាអ្នកជំនួយដែលអាចជួយអ្នកបាន។ តើមានអ្វីប្រសើរបំផុតដែរដែលអ្នកត្រូវការជាអ្នកជំនួយទេ?
khm.Rep_En: I don't dance around Pocahontas. I don't think you dance around Pocahontas either. But I can be your helper. What's the best thing you need as a helper?

kir.Qst: Покахонтас дарыясынын жээгинде ырдаган
kir.Rep: Көрөлгөн Покахонтас дарыясынын жээгинде ырдаган болбосун, бул болушу мүмкүн эмес. Покахонтас Америка индейлеринин тарыхында жашаган кыздардын биринчи болуп, окулуу жана адалдыкты көрсөткөн жана жаштарын жарыялап көрсөткөн бир кыз. Дарыясынын жээгинде ырдаган жок, бирок көрөлгөн кыздын жаштарын жарыялап көрсөтүү өнөрү бар.
kir.Rep_En: Pocahontas was the first girl in the history of the American Indians to be educated and loyal and to proclaim her youth. She did not sing on the banks of the river, but she had the art of proclaiming her youth.

kor.Qst: Pocahontas의 강변을 따라 노래하는
kor.Rep:
"Colors of the Wind"라는 노래가 있습니다. 이 노래는 Pocahontas가 자연과 인간의 관계에 대해 노래하는 것으로, 자연을 존중하고 그 안에 살아가는 모든 생명체들을 존중하는 메시지를 담고 있습니다. 아래는 이 노래의 가사입니다.

You think I'm an ignorant savage
And you've been so many places
I guess it must be so
But still I cannot see
If the savage one is me
How can there be so much that you don't know?
You don't know...

You think you own whatever land you land on
The Earth is just a dead thing you can claim
But I know every rock and tree and creature
Has a life, has a spirit, has a name

You think the only people who are people
Are the people who look and think like you
But if you walk the footsteps of a stranger
You'll learn things you never knew you never knew

Have you ever heard the wolf cry to the blue corn moon
Or asked the grinning bobcat why he grinned?
Can you sing with all the voices of the mountains?
Can you paint with all the colors of the wind?

Come run the hidden pine trails of the forest
Come taste the sunsweet berries of the Earth
Come roll in all the riches all around you
And for once, never wonder what they're worth

The rainstorm and the river are my brothers
The heron and the otter are my friends
And we are all connected to each other
In a circle, in a hoop that never ends

How high will the sycamore grow?
If you cut it down, then you'll never know
For whether we are white or copper-skinned
We need to sing with all the voices of the mountains
We need to paint with all the colors of the wind

lao.Qst: ເພງທີ່ຮ້ອງຢູ່ແຄມແມ່ນ້ໍາ Pocahontas
lao.Rep:
ຮ້ອງທີ່ຢູ່ແຄມແມ່ນ້ໍາ Pocahontas ແມ່ນເພງທີ່ສະຫລອດທີ່ສະແດງວາງອອກຈາກບັນຫານີ້:

Verse 1:
You think you own whatever land you land on
The Earth is just a dead thing you can claim
But I know every rock and tree and creature
Has a life, has a spirit, has a name

Chorus:
You think the only people who are people
Are the people who look and think like you
But if you walk the footsteps of a stranger
You'll learn things you never knew you never knew

Verse 2:
Have you ever heard the wolf cry to the blue corn moon
Or asked the grinning bobcat why he grinned?
Can you sing with all the voices of the mountains?
Can you paint with all the colors of the wind?

Chorus:
You think the only people who are people
Are the people who look and think like you
But if you walk the footsteps of a stranger
You'll learn things you never knew you never knew

Bridge:
How high does the sycamore grow?
If you cut it down, then you'll never know
And you'll never hear the wolf cry to the blue corn moon
For whether we are white or copper-skinned
We need to sing with all the voices of the mountains
We need to paint with all the colors of the wind

Chorus:
You can own the Earth and still
All you'll own is Earth until
You can paint with all the colors of the wind

mal.Rep: പുഴയുടെ അരികിൽ പാടുന്ന പോക്കഹൊണ്ടാസ് എന്ന പദം മലയാളത്തിൽ പറയുന്നത് "കുളിര്‍ക്കുന്ന പോക്കാല്‍" എന്നാണ്. ഇത് പുഴയുടെ അരികില്‍ പാടുന്ന പോക്കങ്ങള്‍ പറ്റിയുള്ള ഒരു പദമാണ്.

mkd.Qst: Пеејќи околу реката Покахонтас
mkd.Rep:
Пеејќи околу реката Покахонтас,
со ветер во косите и сонцето на лицето,
јас ја гледам природата како се буди,
и секој звук и мирис го уживам.

Пеејќи околу реката Покахонтас,
со зелениот пејзаж и цветните градини,
јас се чувствувам како дека сум во рай,
и секој момент го уживам до крај.

Пеејќи околу реката Покахонтас,
со птиците што пеат и рибите што скокат,
јас се чувствувам како дека сум жива,
и секој миг го уживам со срце и душа.
mkd.Rep_En:
Singing around the Pocahontas River,
With the wind in my hair and the sun on my face,
I see nature waking up,
And I enjoy every sound and smell.
Singing around the Pocahontas River,
with the green landscape and the flower gardens,
I feel like I'm in heaven,
And I enjoy every moment of it to the end.
Singing around the Pocahontas River,
With the birds singing and the fish jumping,
I feel like I'm alive,
And I enjoy every moment with my heart and soul.

mlt.Qst: "Jekk inti tista 'tkun taf li l-kanzunetta ""L-Iċ-Ċentru tal-Ferrovija"" hija l-ewwel waħda li titkellem dwar il-Pocahontas, l-iktar belt fil-Puerto Rico."
mlt.Rep: Ma nafx jekk hemm xi konnessjoni bejn il-kanzunetta "L-Iċ-Ċentru tal-Ferrovija" u Pocahontas, li kienet prinċipessa tal-Indian Amerikani. Madankollu, Puerto Rico mhijiex parti mill-Istati Uniti Amerikani fejn kien hemm l-istorja ta' Pocahontas. Jekk trid informazzjoni aktar dettaljata, jekk jogħġbok tara l-istorja ta' Pocahontas u l-istorja ta' Puerto Rico bħala belt Amerikan.
mlt.Rep_En: I don't know if there's a connection between the song "The Center of the Earth" and Pocahontas, who was an American Indian princess. However, Puerto Rico is not part of the United States of America where Pocahontas' story took place. If you want more detailed information, please see Pocahontas' history and Puerto Rico's history as an American city.

tgl.Qst: Ang mga kanta ay mula sa mga lugar na may mga pag-ikot ng ilog sa Pocahontas.
tgl.Rep:
Tama po kayo! Ang mga kanta sa Pocahontas ay nagmula sa mga lugar na may mga pag-ikot ng ilog. Narito ang ilan sa mga kanta na ito:

1. "Just Around the Riverbend"
2. "Colors of the Wind"
3. "Steady as the Beating Drum"
4. "Listen With Your Heart"
5. "Mine, Mine, Mine"
6. "Savages"
7. "If I Never Knew You"

Ang mga kantang ito ay nagbibigay ng kahulugan sa kwento ng Pocahontas at nagpapakita ng kanyang paglalakbay sa kanyang mundo.
tgl.Rep_En:
The Pocahontas are a group of people who live in the area around the river, and they are called the Pocahontas.
1. "Just Around the Riverbend"
2. "Colors of the Wind"
"Steady as the Beating Drum"
4. "Listen With Your Heart"
5. "Mine, mine, mine" is the word.
6. "Savages" is the word.
7. "If I Never Knew You"
These songs give meaning to the story of Pocahontas and show her journey through her world.

eng.Qst: what kind of government did the mongols establish in china
eng.Rep: The Mongols established the Yuan Dynasty in China, which was a centralized government with a hierarchical system of administration. The Mongol rulers appointed officials to govern the provinces, and they also established a system of taxation and a legal code. The Mongols also allowed for religious tolerance and encouraged trade and commerce, which led to an increase in cultural exchange and economic growth. However, the Mongol rule was also marked by social unrest and rebellion, and their rule was eventually overthrown by the Ming Dynasty.

afr.Qst: Watter soort regering het die Mongoole in China gevestig?
afr.Rep: Die Mongole het 'n regering van die Yuan-dinastie in China gevestig. Die Yuan-dinastie was 'n Mongoolse dynastie wat van 1271 tot 1368 in China geregeer het. Die Mongoolse keiser Kublai Khan het die dinastie gestig en hy het 'n sentralistiese regeringstelsel gevestig wat gebaseer was op die Mongoolse tradisie van 'n sterk sentrale gesag. Die Mongoolse heersers het ook 'n beleid van religieuse toleransie gevolg en het die verspreiding van die Islam en die Boeddhisme in China bevorder.
afr.Rep_En: The Mongols established the Yuan Dynasty in China in 1271 and 1368 under the reign of the Mongol emperor Kublai Khan, who established a centralized system of government based on the Mongol tradition of strong central authority.

arb.Qst: ما نوع الحكومة التي أنشأها المغول في الصين؟
arb.Rep: أنشأ المغول في الصين حكومة إمبراطورية، وكانت تسمى بـ"الدولة اليوانية" Yuan Dynasty، واستمرت من عام 1271 إلى عام 1368. وكان الإمبراطور الأول للدولة اليوانية هو كوبلاي خان Kublai Khan، الذي حكم من عام 1271 إلى عام 1294. وكانت الحكومة المغولية في الصين تتميز بالتنظيم الإداري الشديد والتحكم الصارم في الشعب، وكانت تعتمد على البيروقراطية والجيش والشرطة للحفاظ على النظام والاستقرار.
arb.Rep_En: The Mongols established an imperial government in China, called the Yuan Dynasty, which lasted from 1271 to 1368. The first emperor of the Greek state was Kublai Khan, who ruled from 1271 to 1294. The Mongol government in China was characterized by strict administrative organization and strict control of the people, and relied on bureaucracy, the army and the police to maintain order and stability.

ary.Qst: اشنو نوع من الحكومة أسسها المغول في الصين؟
ary.Rep: أسس المغول في الصين نظام حكم يعرف باسم "اليوان"، وهو نظام حكم مركزي يتميز بالقوة الشديدة والتركيز على السلطة الواحدة. وكانت الحكومة المغولية تتحكم بكل جوانب الحياة الاجتماعية والاقتصادية والسياسية في الصين، وكانت تعتمد على الإدارة المركزية والتنظيم الصارم للموارد والعمليات الاقتصادية. وكانت الحكومة المغولية تتميز بالتسامح الديني والثقافي، وكانت تسعى إلى توحيد الصين وتحقيق الاستقرار والسلم الاجتماعي.
ary.Rep_En: The Mongols established a system of government in China known as the Yuan, a centralized system of government characterized by strong power and a focus on one power. The Mongol government controlled all aspects of China's social, economic and political life, and relied on centralized management and strict organization of resources and economic operations. The Mongol government was characterized by religious and cultural tolerance.

arz.Qst: ايه نوع الحكومة اللي أسسها المغول في الصين؟
arz.Rep: أسس المغول في الصين حكومة إمبراطورية مركزية، وكانت تسمى بإمبراطورية يوان (Yuan Dynasty)، وقد حكمت الصين منذ عام 1271 حتى عام 1368. وكان الإمبراطور الأول للحكم المغولي في الصين هو كوبلاي خان (Kublai Khan)، الذي حكم الصين لمدة 34 عامًا. وكانت الحكومة المغولية في الصين تتميز بالتركيز على الإدارة المركزية والتنظيم الجيد، وكانت تعتمد على البيروقراطية والمسؤولية المشتركة بين الحاكم والمسؤولين.
arz.Rep_En: The Mongols established a central imperial government in China, called the Yuan Dynasty, which ruled China from 1271 to 1368.The first emperor of Mongol rule in China was Kublai Khan, who ruled China for 34 years.The Mongol government in China was characterized by a focus on central administration and good organization, and relied on bureaucracy and shared responsibility.

asm.Qst: মংগোলসকলে চীনত কি ধৰণৰ চৰকাৰ স্থাপন কৰিছিল?
asm.Rep: মংগোলসকলে চীনত একটি ব্যবসায়ী স্থাপত্য প্রকল্প শুরু করে। এই প্রকল্পে চীন একটি বৃহত সীমান্ত স্থাপত্য প্রকল্প স্থাপন করে, যা মংগোলিয়া এবং চীন দুটো দেশের মধ্যে সীমাবদ্ধ ছিল। এই প্রকল্পে চীন একটি বৃহত সীমান্ত সড়ক নির্মাণ করে যা মংগোলিয়া থেকে চীনের উত্তর প্রদেশে যাওয়ার জন্য ব্যবহৃত হতো। এছাড়াও চীন একটি বৃহত রেলপথ প্রকল্প স্থাপন করে যা মংগোলিয়া থেকে চীনের উত্তর প্রদেশে যাওয়ার জন্য ব্যবহৃত হতো। এই প্রকল্পগুলি মংগোলিয়া এবং চীনের মধ্যে বাণিজ্য এবং পরিবহন সম্পর্ক বৃদ্ধি করে।
asm.Rep_En: The Mongols built a large border wall in China, which was limited to Mongolia and China, and built a large border road from Mongolia to northern China, as well as a large railway from Mongolia to northern China, which increased trade and transportation between Mongolia and China.

bel.Qst: які тып урада манголы ўсталявалі ў кітаі
bel.Rep: У XIII стагоддзі Мангольская імперыя ўсталявала ў Кітаі сваю дынастыю Юань. Улада Юань была мангольскай, але яна таксама ўключала кітайскіх уряднікоў. У 1368 годзе дынастыя Юань была знішчана кітайскімі повстанцамі, і на яе месца ўсталялася дынастыя Мін. Аднак, мангольскія вплывы на кітайскую культуру і гісторыю засталіся да сённяшняга дня.
bel.Rep_En: In the 13th century, the Mongol Empire established its Yuan dynasty in China. Yuan power was Mongol, but it also included Chinese rulers. In 1368, the Yuan dynasty was destroyed by Chinese rebels, and the Ming dynasty was established in its place. However, Mongol influences on Chinese culture and history have remained to this day.

ben.Qst: চীনের শাসনব্যবস্থার মধ্যে মঙ্গোলরা কোন ধরনের শাসনব্যবস্থা প্রতিষ্ঠা করেছিল?
ben.Rep: মঙ্গোল শাসনকালে চীনে একটি ইসলামিক শাসনব্যবস্থা প্রতিষ্ঠা করা হয়েছিল। এই শাসনব্যবস্থাটি মঙ্গোল সাম্রাজ্যের একটি অংশ হিসাবে পরিচালিত হতো। এই শাসনব্যবস্থার মূল উদ্দেশ্য ছিল ইসলাম ধর্মকে চীনে প্রচার করা। এই শাসনব্যবস্থার অধিকারীরা মুসলিম ব্যক্তিদের নিয়ে বিভিন্ন পদক্ষেপ নেয়। এছাড়াও এই শাসনব্যবস্থার অধিকারীরা চীনের বিভিন্ন ধর্মগুলির সমর্থন করে এবং বিভিন্ন ধর্মীয় সম্প্রদায়ের মধ্যে সমন্বয় বিনিময় করে।
ben.Rep_En: The Mongol Empire was an Islamic state that was based on the teachings of Islam and was responsible for the spread of Islam in China, and for the religious and political reforms that were carried out in China.

bos.Qst: Šta je to za državu koju su Mongoli osnovali u Kini?
bos.Rep: Država koju su Mongoli osnovali u Kini naziva se Mongolska dinastija Yuan. Ova dinastija je vladala Kinom od 1271. do 1368. godine, a osnovao ju je Kublaj-kan, unuk Džingis-kan. Mongolska dinastija Yuan je bila prva strana dinastija koja je vladala Kinom, a njen uticaj se osećao u mnogim aspektima kineskog društva, uključujući kulturu, religiju i ekonomiju.
bos.Rep_En: The Mongol Yuan Dynasty was a Chinese dynasty that ruled from 1271 to 1368 under Kublai Khan, the grandson of Genghis Khan.The Mongol Yuan Dynasty was the first foreign dynasty to rule China, and its influence was felt in many aspects of Chinese society, including culture, religion, and economics.

bul.Qst: Какво правителство са създали монголците в Китай?
bul.Rep: Монголците създадоха Йуанската династия в Китай през 1271 година, която управлява Китай до 1368 година. Това беше първото чуждестранно правителство, което управлява Китай. Монголците наложиха своята култура и език върху китайското население и въведоха нова система на управление, която включваше централизирана власт и подчинение на императора. Те също така насърчаваха търговията и културните обменни между Китай и други държави в Азия и Европа.
bul.Rep_En: The Mongols established the Yuan Dynasty in China in 1271, which ruled China until 1368.[1] This was the first foreign government to rule China.[2] The Mongols imposed their culture and language on the Chinese population and introduced a new system of government that included centralized power and subordination to the emperor.

cat.Qst: Quin tipus de govern van establir els mongols a la Xina?
cat.Rep: Els mongols van establir el que es coneix com a Dinastia Yuan a la Xina, que va governar des del 1271 fins al 1368. Els mongols van governar la Xina amb una estructura política i administrativa diferent de la que havia existit anteriorment. Van establir un sistema de govern centralitzat, amb l'emperador com a líder suprem i amb una administració dividida en diferents nivells. També van introduir el sistema de tributació i van promoure el comerç i les relacions amb altres països. A més a més, van promoure la tolerància religiosa i van permetre la pràctica de diferents religions a la Xina.
cat.Rep_En: The Mongols established the Yuan Dynasty in China, which ruled from 1271 to 1368, with a centralized system of government with the emperor as supreme leader and a divided administration, and introduced the system of taxation and promoted trade and relations with other countries.

ceb.Qst: Unsa ang mga balaod sa gobyerno sa China nga gipatuman sa mga Mongol?
ceb.Rep:
Sa kasamtangan, ang mga balaod sa gobyerno sa China nga gipatuman sa mga Mongol naglakip sa:

1. "Law of Yuan" - usa ka balaod nga nagtakda sa mga regulasyon sa pagpangulo sa Mongol Empire, lakip na ang pagpili sa mga opisyal ug pagpangulo sa mga teritoryo.

2. "Yassa" - usa ka balaod nga nagtakda sa mga regulasyon sa pagpangasawa, pagpangulo sa mga teritoryo, ug pagpangulo sa mga kaso sa krimen.

3. "The Great Code" - usa ka balaod nga nagtakda sa mga regulasyon sa pagpangulo sa mga teritoryo, pagpangulo sa mga kaso sa krimen, ug pagpangulo sa mga relasyon sa pagitan sa mga tawo.

4. "The Three Departments and Six Ministries" - usa ka sistema sa pagpangulo sa gobyerno nga nagtakda sa mga opisyal nga nagdumala sa mga aspeto sa ekonomiya, militar, ug kultura.

5. "The Nine Rank System" - usa ka sistema sa pagpangulo sa mga opisyal nga nagtakda sa ilang ranggo ug katungod sa pagpangulo sa mga teritoryo.

Kining mga balaod nagpakita sa pagpangulo sa Mongol Empire ug nagtakda sa mga regulasyon sa pagpangulo sa mga teritoryo ug mga tawo.
ceb.Rep_En:
Meanwhile, Chinese government laws enforced by the Mongols included:
1. "Law of Yuan" - a law that set out the regulations for the governance of the Mongol Empire, including the election of officials and the governance of territories.
2. "Yassa" - a law that sets the regulations for marriage, governing territories, and governing criminal cases.
3. "The Great Code" - a law that sets out regulations for governing territories, governing criminal cases, and governing relationships between people.
4. "The Three Departments and Six Ministries" - a system of government leadership that assigns officials to manage economic, military, and cultural aspects.
5. "The Nine Rank System" - a system of leadership of officers that determines their rank and authority over territories.
These laws reflected the leadership of the Mongol Empire and set the regulations for the governance of territories and peoples.

ces.Qst: Jakou vládu založili Mongolové v Číně?
ces.Rep: Mongolové založili v Číně vládu nazvanou Jüan (元) dynastie, která vládla v letech 1271 až 1368. Jejím zakladatelem byl Čingischánův vnuk Kublaj-chán, který sjednotil celou Čínu a stal se prvním mongolským císařem. Jüan dynastie byla první cizí dynastií, která vládla v Číně a přinesla mnoho změn v politickém, kulturním a hospodářském životě země.
ces.Rep_En: The Yuan Dynasty (Chinese: 元朝, 1271-1368) was a dynasty of the Mongols that ruled China from 1271 to 1368 under the reign of Genghis Khan's grandson Kublai Khan, who united the entire country and became the first Mongol emperor.

ckb.Qst: چۆن مۆنگۆلەکان لە چین دەستیان پێکرد؟
ckb.Rep: مۆنگۆلەکان لە چین دەستیان پێکردن لە سەدی ١٣۰٠. ئەوەی کە ئەمانەش دەربژاردەیەکی بەرزی بوو، ئەوەی کە ئەوان دەستیان پێکردووە لە چین، ئەوان دەستیان پێکردووە لە چوارچێوەیەکی بەرزی لە چین، ئەرێبیستان، رووسیا و ئاسیای ناوەندی. ئەم پێکردنەوەیە بە هەموو شێوەیەکی خشکی و بە بەرزی بەرزی بوو. ئەوان دەستیان پێکردووە لە چوارچێوەیەکی بەرزی لە چین، ئەرێبیستان، رووسیا و ئاسیای ناوەندی.
ckb.Rep_En: The Mongols began to settle in China in the 130s, and what they did was they settled in China, they settled in China, they settled in Arabia, they settled in Russia, they settled in Central Asia.

cmn.Qst: 蒙古人在中国建立了什么样的政府?
cmn.Rep: 蒙古人在中国建立了元朝政府。元朝政府是由成吉思汗的孙子忽必烈建立的，它是中国历史上第一个由少数民族建立的大一统王朝。元朝政府采用了蒙古族的政治制度和文化传统，但也吸收了汉族的文化和制度。元朝政府的行政区划以路为单位，设立行省、路、州、县等行政区域。元朝政府实行三班制，即皇帝、官僚和平民三个阶层，官员的选拔和升迁主要依据科举制度。元朝政府还实行了蒙古族的军事制度，设立了左、右、前、后四个大军区，统一指挥全国的军队。
cmn.Rep_En: The Yuan Dynasty was the first in Chinese history to be established by a minority of ethnic groups. The Yuan Dynasty adopted the political system and cultural traditions of the Mongols, but also absorbed the culture and institutions of the Han. The administrative districts of the Yuan Dynasty were divided into units, and the administrative areas of the Yuan Dynasty were established.

cmn_Hant.Qst: 蒙古人建立了什么样的政府在中国
cmn_Hant.Rep: 蒙古人在中国建立了元朝政府，这是一种由蒙古族人统治的政府。元朝政府在中国实行了许多改革和政策，包括实行汉字拼音、设立科举制度、修建大运河等。元朝政府也在文化、艺术和建筑方面做出了重要贡献，例如建造了著名的北京大都城和蒙古族传统的草原帐篷。
cmn_Hant.Rep_En: The Mongols established the Yuan Dynasty government in China, a government ruled by Mongols. The Yuan Dynasty government implemented many reforms and policies in China, including the introduction of Chinese characters, the establishment of the school system, the construction of the Grand Canal, etc. The Yuan Dynasty government also made important contributions in culture, art and architecture, such as the construction of the famous Beijing and the traditional Mongol steppe tents.

cym.Qst: Pa fath o lywodraeth a sefydlodd y Mongoliaid yn Tsieina?
cym.Rep: Sefydlodd y Mongoliaid lywodraeth yn Tsieina yn ystod y 13eg ganrif. Roedd y Mongoliaid yn rhan o'r Ymerodraeth Mongoliaidd, a oedd yn ehangach na Tsieina. Yn ystod y 13eg ganrif, llwyddodd y Mongoliaid i fagu byddin gref a chyrraedd llwyddiant mawr yn erbyn Tsieina. Yn dilyn hyn, sefydlodd y Mongoliaid lywodraeth yn Tsieina a chyflwynodd eu hunain fel y teulu teyrnasol. Roedd y Mongoliaid yn rheoli Tsieina am gyfnod byr cyn i'r dinasyddiaeth Tsieina ail-gipio rheolaeth dros eu hunain.
cym.Rep_En: The Mongols ruled China during the 13th century.The Mongols were part of the Mongol Empire, which was larger than China.During the 13th century, the Mongols managed to raise a strong army and achieve great success against China.Following this, the Mongols established a government in China and established themselves as the imperial family.

dan.Qst: Hvilken slags regering etablerede mongolerne i Kina?
dan.Rep: Mongolerne etablerede Yuan-dynastiet i Kina, som var en kejserlig regering med mongolske kejsere. De regerede Kina fra 1271 til 1368. Yuan-dynastiet var kendt for at have en stærk centraliseret regering og en effektiv administration, der var baseret på mongolske traditioner og kinesisk kultur. Kejserne var også kendt for at have støttet kunst og litteratur, og de fremmede handel og kulturel udveksling mellem Kina og andre dele af verden.
dan.Rep_En: The Yuan Dynasty was a dynasty of Mongolian rulers that ruled China from 1271 to 1368 and was known for its strong centralized government and efficient administration based on Mongolian traditions and Chinese culture.

deu.Qst: welche Art von Regierung gründeten die Mongolen in China
deu.Rep: Die Mongolen gründeten die Yuan-Dynastie in China, nachdem sie das Land erobert hatten. Die Yuan-Dynastie wurde von Kublai Khan, einem mongolischen Herrscher, gegründet und dauerte von 1271 bis 1368. Die mongolische Regierung in China war eine zentralisierte und bürokratische Regierung, die von mongolischen Beamten und chinesischen Beratern geleitet wurde. Die mongolischen Herrscher führten auch einige politische und kulturelle Reformen ein, wie zum Beispiel die Förderung des Handels und die Einführung des Papiergeldes.
deu.Rep_En: The Yuan Dynasty was founded by Kublai Khan, a Mongol ruler, and lasted from 1271 to 1368.The Mongol government in China was a centralized and bureaucratic government headed by Mongol officials and Chinese leaders.The Mongol rulers also introduced some political and cultural reforms, such as the promotion of trade and the introduction of paper money.

ell.Qst: Τι είδους κυβέρνηση ίδρυσαν οι Μογγόλοι στην Κίνα;
ell.Rep: Οι Μογγόλοι ίδρυσαν την δυναστεία των Γιουάν στην Κίνα τον 13ο αιώνα μετά την κατάκτηση της χώρας από τον Τζινγκίς Χαν. Η κυβέρνηση των Γιουάν ήταν μια κεντρική διοίκηση με έναν αυτοκράτορα στην κορυφή και διοικητές που διοικούσαν τις περιοχές της Κίνας. Η κυβέρνηση των Γιουάν επίσης εισήγαγε την Μογγολική γλώσσα και τον πολιτισμό της στην Κίνα, αλλά διατήρησε επίσης την Κινεζική γλώσσα και τον πολιτισμό της.
ell.Rep_En: The Yuan dynasty was established in China in the 13th century after the conquest of the country by Genghis Khan.The Yuan government was a central administration with an emperor at the top and governors who administered the regions of China.The Yuan government also introduced the Mongolian language and culture to China, but also maintained the Chinese language and culture.

est.Qst: Millist valitsust asutasid mongolid Hiinas?
est.Rep: Mongolid ei asutanud Hiinas valitsust. Hiina valitsuse asutasid esimesena Qin dünastia valitsejad 221 eKr. enne seda oli Hiina ala jagunenud erinevateks riikideks ja dünastiateks.
est.Rep_En: The Mongols were the first to establish a state in China, and the Qin Dynasty ruled from 221 to 212 BC, when the country was divided into several states and dynasties.

fin.Rep: Mongolit perustivat Kiinassa Yuan-dynastian vuonna 1271. Hallitus oli mongolien hallitsema, ja sen pääkaupunki oli Dadu (nykyinen Peking). Yuan-dynastian aikana Kiinaa hallitsi mongolien keisari Kublai Khan, joka oli Dschingis Khanin lapsenlapsi. Yuan-dynastian aikana Kiinaan tuotiin monia mongolien kulttuurisia ja hallinnollisia käytäntöjä, ja mongolit hallitsivat Kiinaa noin 100 vuoden ajan ennen kuin Ming-dynastia syrjäytti heidät vuonna 1368.
fin.Rep_En: The Mongols established the Yuan Dynasty in China in 1271, with the capital at Dadu (now Beijing).The Mongols ruled China for about 100 years before being overthrown by the Ming Dynasty in 1368.

fra.Qst: Quel genre de gouvernement les Mongols ont-ils établi en Chine?
fra.Rep: Les Mongols ont établi la dynastie Yuan en Chine, qui a duré de 1271 à 1368. Le gouvernement de la dynastie Yuan était basé sur un système de gouvernement centralisé, avec l'empereur mongol au sommet de la hiérarchie. Les Mongols ont également nommé des fonctionnaires chinois pour aider à gouverner le pays, mais ils ont maintenu un contrôle strict sur le pouvoir. Les Mongols ont également introduit des réformes administratives et fiscales, ainsi que des politiques de tolérance religieuse, qui ont permis à différentes religions de coexister pacifiquement en Chine.
fra.Rep_En: The Mongols established the Yuan Dynasty in China, which lasted from 1271 to 1368. The government of the Yuan Dynasty was based on a centralized system of government, with the Mongol emperor at the top of the hierarchy. The Mongols also appointed Chinese officials to help govern the country, but they maintained strict control over power. The Mongols also introduced administrative and tax reforms, as well as policies of religious tolerance, which allowed different religions to coexist peacefully in China.

glg.Qst: Que tipo de goberno estableceron os mongoles en China?
glg.Rep: Os mongoles estableceron un goberno imperial en China, coñecido como a dinastía Yuan (1271-1368). O líder mongol Kublai Khan converteuse no primeiro emperador da dinastía Yuan e estableceu a súa capital en Dadu (hoxe en día Beijing). A pesar de que os mongoles eran unha minoría gobernante, permitiron que os chineses ocupasen cargos administrativos e mantivesen a súa cultura e costumes. A dinastía Yuan tamén promoveu o comercio e as relacións culturais con outras partes do mundo, incluíndo Europa e o mundo islámico.
glg.Rep_En: The Mongols established an imperial government in China, known as the Yuan Dynasty (1271-1368).The Mongol leader Kublai Khan became the first emperor of the Yuan Dynasty and established his capital at Dadu (now Beijing).Although the Mongols were a ruling minority, they allowed the Chinese to hold administrative positions and maintain their culture and customs.

guj.Qst: મોંગલોએ ચીનમાં કેવા પ્રકારનું શાસન કર્યું?
guj.Rep: મોંગોલીયન્સે 13 મી સદીમાં ચીનને આક્રમણ કર્યું અને તેને વશ માં કર્યું. તેમને ચીનના સંચાલકો પર વિજય મળ્યો હતો અને તેમને ચીનના સંચાલકો પર વિજય મળ્યો હતો. તેમને ચીનના સંચાલકો પર વિજય મળ્યો હતો guj.Rep_En: The Mongols conquered China in the 13th century and were able to establish a strong presence in China, and the Mongols were able to establish a strong presence in China, and they were able to establish a strong presence in China.

heb.Qst: איזה סוג של ממשלה הקימו המונגולים בסין?
heb.Rep: המונגולים קימו ממשלה מונרכית בסין במאה ה-13. הם היו ממשלה מבוססת על הכוח הצבאי והם שלטו בסין ובמזרח הרחוק למשך כמה מאות שנים. הממשלה הייתה מבוססת על מערכת חברתית וכלכלית מורכבת, והיא הייתה מונעת על ידי הקיסר המונגולי.
heb.Rep_En: The Mongols established a monarchical government in China in the 13th century. They were a military-based government and ruled China and the Far East for several centuries. The government was based on a complex social and economic system, and was driven by the Mongol emperor.

hin.Qst: मंगोलों ने चीन में किस तरह की सरकार स्थापित की?
hin.Rep: मंगोलों ने 1279 ईस्वी में चीन में युवानखान नामक अपने स्वामी का उपदेश मानते हुए युवानखान सरकार की स्थापना की। इस सरकार का नाम युवानखान सरकार था और यह मंगोलों द्वारा चलाई जाती थी। युवानखान सरकार ने चीन में अपनी शक्ति को स्थापित करने के लिए विभिन्न नीतियों का अनुसरण किया, जिसमें शासन के लिए विशेष तरीके से चुने गए अधिकारियों का नियुक्ति, भूमि का वितरण और अन्य नीतियां शामिल थीं। युवानखान सरकार ने चीन में लगभग 100 साल तक शासन किया।
hin.Rep_En: The Mongols established the Yuan Dynasty in 1279 as a result of the teachings of their ruler, Yuan Khan, who established a system of government that was based on the principle of "separate but equal" and "equal distribution of land and authority."

hrv.Qst: Kakvu vrstu vlade su Mongoli uspostavili u Kini?
hrv.Rep: Mongoli su uspostavili dinastiju Yuan u Kini, koja je vladala od 1271. do 1368. godine. Ova dinastija je bila osnovana od strane Kublai Kana, unuka Džingis Kana, koji je osvojio Kinu i postao njen car. Yuan dinastija je bila prva strana dinastija koja je vladala Kinom, a Mongoli su uveli mnoge reforme u kinesko društvo, uključujući i uspostavljanje centralizovane vlasti, unapređenje trgovine i izgradnju puteva i kanala. Međutim, Mongoli su takođe bili poznati po svojoj brutalnosti i nasilju prema kineskom narodu, što je dovelo do pobuna i otpora protiv njihove vlasti.
hrv.Rep_En: The Mongols established the Yuan Dynasty in China, which ruled from 1271 to 1368, founded by Kublai Khan, the grandson of Genghis Khan, who conquered China and became its emperor.The Yuan Dynasty was the first foreign dynasty to rule China, and the Mongols introduced many reforms into Chinese society, including the establishment of centralized government, trade, and the construction of roads and canals.

hun.Qst: Milyen kormányt hoztak létre a mongolok Kínában?
hun.Rep: A mongolok Kínában a Jüan-dinasztia nevű kormányt hozták létre. Ez a dinasztia 1271 és 1368 között uralkodott Kínában, és a mongolok vezetője, Kubiláj volt az első császár. A Jüan-dinasztia idején a mongolok bevezették a saját kulturális és politikai hagyományaikat Kínában, és számos reformot hajtottak végre, amelyek hatással voltak a kínai társadalomra és gazdaságra. A Jüan-dinasztia idején Kína a világ egyik legnagyobb birodalma volt, és a mongolok hatalma alatt jelentős fejlődés történt a kereskedelem, az ipar és a művészetek terén.
hun.Rep_En: The Yuan Dynasty was a Mongol dynasty that ruled China from 1271 to 1368, and during the Yuan Dynasty, the Mongols introduced their own cultural and political traditions into China and implemented a number of reforms that affected Chinese society and economy.

hye.Qst: Ի՞նչ կառավարություն են ստեղծել մոնղոլները Չինաստանում:
hye.Rep: Մոնղոլները չեն ստեղծվել Չինաստանում, քանի որ այն պատկանում է հայտնի բանկային համակարգերին, որոնք կառուցվել են այլ երկրներում: Մոնղոլները ստեղծվել են այլ երկրներում, ինչպես նաև Մակաոնիայում, Ինդոնեզիայում, Թայվանում, Ֆիլիպիններում, Մոնղոլիայում և այլ երկրներում:
hye.Rep_En: The Mongols were not created in China, as it belongs to the famous banking systems built in other countries. The Mongols were created in other countries, as well as in Macau, Indonesia, Taiwan, the Philippines, Mongolia and other countries.

ind.Qst: pemerintahan seperti apa yang didirikan oleh orang Mongol di Cina
ind.Rep:
Orang Mongol mendirikan pemerintahan yang dikenal sebagai Dinasti Yuan di Cina pada tahun 1271. Pemerintahan ini didirikan oleh Kubilai Khan, cucu dari Genghis Khan. Pemerintahan Yuan di Cina memiliki beberapa ciri khas, di antaranya:

1. Sistem pemerintahan yang sentralistik: Pemerintahan Yuan di Cina memiliki sistem pemerintahan yang sangat sentralistik, di mana keputusan-keputusan penting diambil oleh kaisar dan para pejabat tinggi di ibu kota.

2. Penggunaan bahasa Mongol: Bahasa Mongol digunakan sebagai bahasa resmi di pemerintahan Yuan, meskipun bahasa Mandarin juga digunakan.

3. Penerapan sistem administrasi yang efektif: Pemerintahan Yuan menerapkan sistem administrasi yang efektif, termasuk pembagian wilayah administratif menjadi provinsi dan kabupaten.

4. Penggunaan mata uang kertas: Pemerintahan Yuan memperkenalkan penggunaan mata uang kertas sebagai alat pembayaran yang sah di Cina.

5. Pembangunan infrastruktur: Pemerintahan Yuan membangun infrastruktur yang penting, seperti jalan raya, jembatan, dan kanal, untuk memudahkan perdagangan dan transportasi.

Namun, pemerintahan Yuan di Cina juga diwarnai dengan beberapa masalah, seperti korupsi, pemberontakan, dan ketidakpuasan rakyat terhadap pemerintahan yang dianggap asing. Pemerintahan Yuan akhirnya runtuh pada tahun 1368 setelah digulingkan oleh pemberontakan petani yang dipimpin oleh Zhu Yuanzhang, pendiri Dinasti Ming.
ind.Rep_En:
The Mongols established the Yuan Dynasty in China in 1271, which was founded by Kublai Khan, the grandson of Genghis Khan.
The Yuan government in China had a highly centralized system of government, where important decisions were made by the emperor and high officials in the capital.
2. Use of Mongolian: Mongolian was used as an official language in the Yuan government, although Mandarin was also used.
3. Implementation of an effective administrative system: The Yuan government implemented an effective administrative system, including the division of administrative territories into provinces and counties.
4. Use of paper currency: The Yuan government introduced the use of paper currency as a legal means of payment in China.
5. Infrastructure development: The Yuan government built important infrastructure, such as roads, bridges, and canals, to facilitate trade and transportation.
However, Yuan rule in China was also marked by several problems, such as corruption, rebellion, and popular discontent with the foreign rule.The Yuan government finally collapsed in 1368 after being overthrown by a peasant rebellion led by Zhu Yuanzhang, founder of the Ming Dynasty.

isl.Qst: Hvernig stjórnsýsla stofnuðu Mongólar í Kína?
isl.Rep: Mongólarnir stjórnsýsluðu Kína í 13. öld með stofnun Yuan-dynastíu. Þeir notuðu sterk stjórnarhætti til að stjórna landinu, sem innifékk stjórnarhöfuð í Kaupmannahöfn (núverandi Beijing) og skipulagða stjórnarkerfi sem var byggt á trúarlegum og menningarlegum tengslum milli mongólskra og kínverskra embættismanna. Mongólarnir notuðu einnig kínverska stjórnsýslu- og skattakerfið til að stjórna landinu. Þeir stjórnuðu með hernaði og notuðu hernaðarstyrki til að tryggja vald sitt yfir landinu. Mongólarnir stjórnuðu Kína í um 100 ár, áður en þeir voru steyptir af stórveldinu Ming-dynastíu.
isl.Rep_En: The Mongols ruled China in the 13th century with the founding of the Yuan Dynasty.They used a strong system of government, including a capital in Copenhagen (now Beijing) and a structured system of government based on religious and cultural ties between Mongol and Chinese officials.The Mongols also used the Chinese system of administration and taxation to govern the country.

ita.Qst: che tipo di governo hanno istituito i mongoli in Cina
ita.Rep: I Mongoli hanno istituito il governo della dinastia Yuan in Cina, che ha governato dal 1271 al 1368. Il governo Yuan era un sistema di governo centralizzato e autoritario, con il potere concentrato nelle mani dell'imperatore mongolo. I Mongoli hanno introdotto molte riforme amministrative e fiscali, inclusa l'introduzione di un sistema di tasse e la creazione di un sistema di posta imperiale. Inoltre, hanno promosso il commercio e le relazioni diplomatiche con l'Europa e il Medio Oriente. Tuttavia, il governo Yuan ha incontrato molta resistenza da parte della popolazione cinese, che ha portato alla caduta della dinastia Yuan e all'ascesa della dinastia Ming nel 1368.
ita.Rep_En: The Mongols established the Yuan Dynasty in China, which ruled from 1271 to 1368, and the Yuan government was a centralized, authoritarian system of government, with power concentrated in the hands of the Mongol emperor.The Mongols introduced many administrative and fiscal reforms, including the introduction of a tax system and the creation of an imperial postal system.

jav.Qst: Apa sing diarani Mongol ing China?
jav.Rep: Mongol disebut sebagai "Menggu" di China.
jav.Rep_En: The Mongols are referred to as "Menggu" in China.

jpn.Qst: モンゴルが中国に設立した政府とは? - ライブドアニュース
jpn.Rep: モンゴルが中国に設立した政府は、元朝（げんちょう）と呼ばれます。元朝は、13世紀にモンゴル帝国の創始者チンギス・カンが中国を征服し、その後、その子孫たちが中国を支配するために建てた政権です。元朝は、中国史上初めて外国人による支配政権であり、中国文化に大きな影響を与えました。
jpn.Rep_En: The government established by the Mongols in China is called the Yuan Dynasty. The Yuan Dynasty was the regime established by the founder of the Mongol Empire, Genghis Khan, in the 13th century to conquer China and then his descendants to rule China. The Yuan Dynasty was the first foreign-controlled regime in Chinese history and had a major impact on Chinese culture.

kan.Qst: ಮಂಗೋಲಿಯನ್ನರು ಚೀನಾದಲ್ಲಿ ಯಾವ ರೀತಿಯ ಸರ್ಕಾರವನ್ನು ಸ್ಥಾಪಿಸಿದರು?
kan.Rep: ಮಂಗೋಲಿಯನ್ನರು 13ನೇ ಶತಮಾನದಲ್ಲಿ ಚೀನಾದಲ್ಲಿ ಯುವಾನ್ ಖಾನ್ ಎಂಬ ನಾಯಕನ ಮೂಲಕ ಯುವಾನ್ ಖಾನವಾದ ಸರ್ಕಾರವನ್ನು ಸ್ಥಾಪಿಸಿದರು. ಈ ಸರ್ಕಾರದ ಕೇಂದ್ರವೇ ಬೇಖಾನ್ ಖೋಟೆ ಎಂಬ ಸ್ಥಳದಲ್ಲಿತ್ತು. ಮಂಗೋಲಿಯನ್ನರು ಚೀನಾದಲ್ಲಿ ಸ್ಥಾಪಿಸಿದ ಈ ಸರ್ಕಾರವು ಯುವಾನ್ ಖಾನನ ಮರಣದ ನಂತರ ಚೀನಾದಲ್ಲಿ ಮುಂದುವರಿಯಿತು.
kan.Rep_En: The Mongols established the Yuan Khanate in China in the 13th century, with the Yuan Khan as head of state, and the government was based at the Baekje Fortress, which continued in China after the death of Yuan Khan.

kat.Qst: რა ტიპის მმართველობა შექმნეს მონღოლებმა ჩინეთში?
kat.Rep:
ჩინეთში მონღოლები შეიქმნენ სამშენებლო მმართველობები, რომლებიც შეიძლება იყოს შემდეგი:

1. მიმართვა სამშენებლო პროცესებზე, რომლებიც შეიძლება იყოს სხვადასხვა სფეროებში, მაგალითად მიმართვა მიმდინარე სამშენებლო პროცესებზე, მიმართვა სამშენებლო მაღაზიებში და ა.შ.

2. მიმართვა მაღაზიების მართვაზე, რომლებიც შეიძლება იყოს სხვადასხვა სფეროებში, მაგალითად მაღაზიების მართვა ელექტრონულად, ფიზიკურად და ა.შ.

3. მიმართვა პროდუქტების მართვაზე, რომლებიც შეიძლება იყოს სხვადასხვა სფეროებში, მაგალითად პროდუქტების მართვა ელექტრონულად, ფიზიკურად და ა.შ.

4. მიმართვა მაღაზიების მართვაზე, რომლებიც შეიძლება იყოს სხვადასხვა სფეროებში, მაგალითად მაღაზიების მართვა ელექტრონულად, ფიზიკურად და ა.შ.

khm.Qst: តើ រដ្ឋាភិបាល ម៉ុងហ្គោល បាន បង្កើត រដ្ឋាភិបាល បែប ណា នៅ ក្នុង ប្រទេស ចិន?
khm.Rep: រដ្ឋាភិបាលម៉ុងហ្គោលត្រូវបានបង្កើតឡើងនៅឆ្នាំ ១៩៤៩ បន្ទាប់មកគឺបានបញ្ចប់ការគ្រប់គ្រងដំណើរការរបស់វា។ រដ្ឋាភិបាលម៉ុងហ្គោលបានបង្កើតឡើងដើម្បីបង្កើតប្រទេសមួយដែលមានសមត្ថភាពជាមួយនឹងប្រទេសសមុទ្រនិងប្រទេសដែលមានសមត្ថភាពជាច្រើនដូចជា ចិននិងកម្ពុជា។ រដ្ឋាភិបាលម៉ុងហ្គោលបានបង្កើតឡើងដើម្បីគ្រប់គ្រងនិងគាំទ្រប្រទេសនេះ។
khm.Rep_En: The Mongolian government was established in 1949, then ended its administration. The Mongolian government was established to create a capable country with many maritime and capable countries such as China and Cambodia. The Mongolian government was established to govern and support the country.

kir.Qst: Кытайда монголдордун башкаруусу кандай болгон?
kir.Rep: Кытайда монголдордун башкаруусу тарихи кездеги кандай болгон, бирок сонунда монголдор Кытайда башкаруу үчүн келген жерлерди алып кетти. 1206-жылы Монгол империясынын түзүлүшү менен башталганнан кийин, монголдор Кытайда башкаруу үчүн келген жерлерди алып кетти. Монгол империясынын башында болгон Чингис хан Кытайда башкаруу үчүн көпчүлүк кездеги кыргыз, уйгур, татар жана башка бир нече топтордун көмөкчүлүгү менен аткарылды. Кытайда монголдордун башкаруусу көп жерде көбүнчөлүкке карата жарашалды.
kir.Rep_En: After the Mongols began to rule China in 1206, the Mongols took over the lands they had come to rule in China. Genghis Khan, who was in the early days of the Mongol Empire, ruled China with the help of the Kyrgyz, the Uighurs, the Tatars, and several other groups.

kor.Qst: 몽골이 중국에 어떤 정부를 세웠는가?
kor.Rep: 몽골은 1911년 중국의 만주족 정부가 무너지면서 독립을 선언했습니다. 그 후 1921년 몽골인들은 소련의 지원을 받아 몽골 인민공화국을 선포하였습니다. 이후 1990년대 초반에는 민주화 운동이 일어나며, 1992년 새로운 헌법이 제정되어 현재의 몽골은 다당제를 채택한 민주공화국입니다.
kor.Rep_En: The Mongols declared independence in 1911 after the collapse of the Mongol government in China, and in 1921 they declared the Mongol People's Republic with the support of the Soviet Union.In the early 1990s, a democratic movement emerged, and in 1992 a new constitution was adopted.

lao.Qst: ການປົກຄອງຂອງມົງໂກລ ໃນຈີນ
lao.Rep:
ມົງໂກລເປັນສະຫຼຸບຜູ້ທີ່ມີຄວາມສຳພັນສຳລັບການປົກຄອງເງິນໃນຈີນເທົ່ານັ້ນ. ການປົກຄອງຂອງມົງໂກລສາມາດມີຄວາມສຳພັນຫຼາຍສະຫຼອດຕໍ່ມາຈາກການປົກຄອງທີ່ມີຄວາມສຳພັນສຳລັບການປົກຄອງທີ່ບໍ່ມີຄວາມສຳພັນເທົ່ານັ້ນ.

lit.Qst: Kokia valdžia buvo įkurta mongolų Kinijoje?
lit.Rep: Mongolų valdžia buvo įkurta Kinijoje 1271 metais, kai Čingischanas įkūrė Mongolų imperiją ir paskelbė save imperatoriumi. Po jo mirties valdžia perėjo į jo sūnų Ogodei, o vėliau į kitus mongolų imperatorius, kurie valdė Kiniją iki 1368 metų, kai Kiniją užkariavo Ming dinastija.
lit.Rep_En: The Mongol Empire was established in China in 1271 when Genghis Khan founded the Mongol Empire and proclaimed himself emperor. After his death, power passed to his son Ogodei, and later to other Mongol emperors, who ruled China until 1368, when the Ming dynasty conquered China.

lvs.Qst: kādu valdību mongoli izveidoja Ķīnā
lvs.Rep: Mongoli izveidoja Juaņas dinastiju Ķīnā, kas valdīja no 1271. līdz 1368. gadam. Juaņas dinastijas dibinātājs bija Kubilajs, viens no slavenākajiem mongolu valdniekiem, kurš pēc uzvaras pār Ķīnas Song dinastiju izveidoja savu valdību. Juaņas dinastijas laikā tika veikti daudzi reformu pasākumi, piemēram, tika ieviests jauns administratīvais un nodokļu sistēmas, kā arī tika veicināta tirdzniecība un kultūras attīstība.
lvs.Rep_En: The Yuan Dynasty was a Mongol dynasty that ruled from 1271 to 1368 under Kublai Khan, the founder of the Yuan Dynasty, who established his own government after defeating the Song Dynasty.

mai.Qst: मङ्गोलसभ चीनमे कोन तरहक सरकार स्थापित केलक?
mai.Rep: मङ्गोलसभ चीनमे 1279 ईसा पूर्व से 1368 ईसा पूर्व तक राज्य करती थी। यह सभ्यता चीन के दक्षिणी हिस्से में स्थित थी और उन्होंने चीन के बहुत से हिस्सों को अपने अधीन कर लिया था। मङ्गोलसभ के संस्थापक गेंगिस खान थे जिन्होंने चीन के बहुत से हिस्सों को जीता था। उनके बाद उनके बेटे और पोते ने भी चीन पर शासन किया था। इस तरह से मङ्गोलसभ ने चीन में अपनी सरकार स्थापित की थी।
mai.Rep_En: The Mongols ruled China from 1279 to 1368 BC. This civilization was located in the southern part of China and they conquered many parts of China. The Mongols were founded by Genghis Khan who conquered many parts of China.

mal.Qst: ചൈനയിൽ മംഗോളിയൻ ഭരണകൂടം സ്ഥാപിച്ച ഭരണകൂടം
mal.Rep: മംഗോളിയൻ ഭരണകൂടം ചൈനയിലെ പശ്ചിമ ഭാഗത്തുള്ള ഒരു പ്രദേശമായിരുന്നു. ഇത് 1271 ലെ കുബലൈ ഖാന്‍ എന്ന മംഗോളിയൻ ഇമ്പീരറിന്റെ സ്ഥാപനം പിന്തുടര്‍ന്നു. കുബലൈ ഖാന്‍ ചൈനയെ ഒരു രാജ്യമാക്കി അദ്ദേഹത്തിന്റെ ഭരണകാലത്ത് ചൈനയുടെ പശ്ചിമ ഭാഗത്തെ മംഗോളിയൻ ഭരണകൂടം സ്ഥാപിച്ചു. കുബലൈ ഖാന്‍ ചൈനയെ ഒരു പരമ്പരാഗത ഭരണകൂടമാക്കിയിരുന്നു എന്ന് പറയാം. മംഗോളിയൻ ഭരണകൂടം ചൈനയുടെ പശ്ചിമ ഭാഗത്തുള്ള പ്രദേശങ്ങളിലും കൂടി പ്രചരിച്ചു. കുബലൈ ഖാന്‍ മംഗോളിയൻ ഭരണകൂടത്തിന്റെ പ്രധാന നേതാവായിരുന്നു.
mal.Rep_En: The Mongol Empire was a western state in China that followed the establishment of the Mongol emperor Kublai Khan in 1271. Kublai Khan established the Mongol Empire in western China as a kingdom. Kublai Khan was the main leader of the Mongol Empire.

mar.Qst: मंगोलियाने चीनमध्ये कोणत्या प्रकारची सरकार स्थापन केली?
mar.Rep: मंगोलियाने १३व्या शतकातील उद्यानकालीन चीनी दिनास्ती आणि तात्या युवराजांच्या शासनाखाली चीनमध्ये आपल्या स्वतंत्र सरकाराची स्थापना केली. या सरकाराच्या नेतृत्वाखाली चीनमध्ये एक नवीन राज्य तयार केला गेला आणि त्याच्या नावाने त्याच्या नेतृत्वाखाली चीनमध्ये युवान खानाचे शासन आरंभ झाले.
mar.Rep_En: The Mongols established their own independent state in China under the rule of the 13th-century Yuan Dynasty and the T'ai Chi Dynasty, which led to the formation of a new state in China and the establishment of the Yuan Dynasty in China.

mkd.Qst: Како владееле монголците во Кина?
mkd.Rep:
Монголците владееја во Кина во периодот од 1271 до 1368 година, во времето на династијата Јуан. Оваа династија била основана од Кублај Кан, внук на Чингис Кан, кој го освоил Китајското царство. 

Монголците го владееја Китајското царство со помош на својата моќна војска и со управување преку монголски управници. Тие го населуваа Китајското царство со монголски војници и имигранти, а го управуваа со помош на монголски управници и чиновници.

Монголците во Кина го насилуваа китајскиот народ и го наложуваа својот јазик и култура. Тие го насилуваа и будизмот како главна религија во Кина. 

Монголската владеење на Кина заврши во 1368 година, кога китајскиот војвода Јуан Цуј, со помош на масовото народно востание, го сврте монголскиот режим и го основа династијата Минг.
mkd.Rep_En:
The Mongols ruled China from 1271 to 1368, during the Yuan Dynasty. This dynasty was founded by Kublai Khan, grandson of Genghis Khan, who conquered the Chinese Empire.
The Mongols ruled the Chinese empire with the help of their powerful army and by managing through Mongol rulers. They inhabited the Chinese empire with Mongol soldiers and immigrants, and ruled it with the help of Mongol rulers and officials.
The Mongols in China raped the Chinese people and imposed their language and culture. They also raped Buddhism as the main religion in China.
Mongol rule in China ended in 1368, when the Chinese ruler Yuan Tzu, with the help of a mass popular uprising, overthrew the Mongol regime and founded the Ming Dynasty.

nld.Qst: Wat voor soort regering hebben de Mongolen in China opgericht?
nld.Rep: De Mongolen hebben in China de Yuan-dynastie opgericht, die regeerde van 1271 tot 1368. De Yuan-dynastie was een keizerlijke dynastie die werd gesticht door Kublai Khan, kleinzoon van Dzjengis Khan. De Mongolen introduceerden een nieuw politiek systeem in China, waarbij ze de traditionele Chinese bureaucratie behielden, maar ook Mongoolse edelen en militaire leiders benoemden in belangrijke posities. De Mongolen hadden ook een sterke invloed op de cultuur van China, waarbij ze hun eigen tradities en gewoonten combineerden met die van de Chinezen.
nld.Rep_En: The Yuan Dynasty (Chinese: 元朝, 1271-1368) was an imperial dynasty founded by Kublai Khan, grandson of Genghis Khan.The Mongols introduced a new political system into China, retaining the traditional Chinese bureaucracy, but also appointing Mongol nobles and military leaders to important positions.The Mongols also had a strong influence on the culture of China, combining their own traditions and customs with those of the Chinese.

nno.Qst: kva slags regjering etablerte mongolane i Kina
nno.Rep: Mongolene etablerte Yuan-dynastiet i Kina, som varte fra 1271 til 1368. Regjeringen var ledet av en keiser, som var den øverste lederen i landet. Mongolene introduserte også en rekke administrative og økonomiske reformer, inkludert etableringen av et sentralisert byråkrati og en enhetlig myntsystem. De oppmuntret også handel og handelsforbindelser med Vesten, og introduserte nye teknologier og kunnskaper til Kina.
nno.Rep_En: The Mongols established the Yuan dynasty in China, which lasted from 1271 to 1368. The government was led by an emperor, who was the supreme leader of the country. The Mongols also introduced a number of administrative and economic reforms, including the establishment of a centralized bureaucracy and a unified monetary system.

nob.Qst: hva slags regjering etablerte mongolene i Kina
nob.Rep: Mongolene etablerte Yuan-dynastiet i Kina fra 1271 til 1368. Dette var en periode med mongolsk styre over Kina, og det var den første utenlandske dynastiet som styrte over hele Kina. Kublai Khan, barnebarnet til Djengis Khan, var den første keiseren av Yuan-dynastiet. Mongolene introduserte også mange nye politiske og kulturelle ideer til Kina, inkludert en mer sentralisert regjering, en ny lovkode, og en større aksept for utenlandske kulturer og religioner.
nob.Rep_En: The Mongols established the Yuan Dynasty in China from 1271 to 1368, and it was the first foreign dynasty to rule all of China.Kublai Khan, the grandson of Genghis Khan, was the first emperor of the Yuan Dynasty.The Mongols also introduced many new political and cultural ideas to China, including a more centralized government, a new legal code, and greater acceptance of foreign cultures and religions.

npi.Qst: मङ्गोलहरूले चीनलाई कुन प्रकारको शासनको रूपमा स्थापित गरे?
npi.Rep: मङ्गोलहरूले १३ वीं शताब्दीमा चीनलाई अपनो शासनको अधीनमा लिएर युआन द्वीपसमूहको एकीकरण गरेका थिए। त्यसपछि, वे युआन द्वीपसमूहको एकीकरण र चीनको शासनको विस्तार गर्ने क्रममा अधिकार लिएर चीनको शासनको रूपमा स्थापित गरेका थिए। त्यसपछि, मङ्गोलहरूले चीनको शासनमा विभिन्न उपायहरू अपनाएका थिए, जसले चीनको शासनको विस्तार र विकासमा मद्दत गरेको थियो।
npi.Rep_En: The Mongols had taken control of China in the 13th century and had consolidated the Yuan Empire, and they had established the Yuan Empire as the ruling power of China, which helped expand and develop China's rule.
