pbt.Rep_En: The Chinese government will cooperate with the Mongols on the construction of the Mongols, the Chinese government will cooperate with the Mongols and the International for the project and the International for the revision and development of the Mongols project.

pes.Qst: مغول ها چه نوع حکومتی را در چین ایجاد کردند؟
pes.Rep: مغول ها در چین حکومتی به نام "دودمان یوان" را برپا کردند. این حکومت به رهبری خاندان یوان، که از نسل چنگیز خان بود، بود و در دوره 1271 تا 1368 میلادی حکمرانی کرد. حکومت یوان به سرعت به یکی از بزرگترین و قدرتمندترین حکومت های جهان تبدیل شد و تحت حمایت مغولستان قرار گرفت. این حکومت به سرعت به یکی از بزرگترین و قدرتمندترین حکومت های جهان تبدیل شد و تحت حمایت مغولستان قرار گرفت.
pes.Rep_En: The Mongols established a dynasty in China called the Yuan Dynasty, which ruled from 1271 to 1368.The Yuan Dynasty quickly became one of the largest and most powerful in the world and was supported by the Mongols.

pol.Qst: Jaki rodzaj rządu założyli Mongołowie w Chinach?
pol.Rep: Mongołowie założyli w Chinach dynastię Yuan, która panowała w latach 1271-1368. Rządy Yuan były oparte na systemie feudalnym, w którym władza była skoncentrowana w rękach cesarza, a pod nim znajdowali się urzędnicy i arystokracja. Mongołowie wprowadzili także swoje zwyczaje i kulturę, ale jednocześnie tolerowali i respektowali chińską kulturę i tradycje.
pol.Rep_En: The Mongols established the Yuan Dynasty in China, which ruled from 1271 to 1368, and were based on a feudal system in which power was concentrated in the hands of the emperor, and under him were officials and the aristocracy.

por.Qst: que tipo de governo os mongóis estabeleceram na china
por.Rep: Os mongóis estabeleceram o governo da dinastia Yuan na China, que durou de 1271 a 1368. O governo era liderado por um imperador mongol, que governava com a ajuda de uma elite de oficiais mongóis e chineses. O governo era centralizado e autoritário, com o imperador tendo poder absoluto sobre todas as decisões políticas e militares. Os mongóis também introduziram políticas de tolerância religiosa e cultural, permitindo que as tradições chinesas coexistissem com as tradições mongóis. No entanto, o governo mongol enfrentou resistência e rebeliões por parte dos chineses, que se sentiam oprimidos e explorados pelos governantes estrangeiros.
por.Rep_En: The Mongols established the Yuan Dynasty in China, which lasted from 1271 to 1368, led by a Mongol emperor who ruled with the help of an elite Mongol and Chinese officials, a centralized and authoritarian government with the emperor having absolute power over all political and military decisions, and introduced policies of religious and cultural tolerance, allowing Chinese traditions to coexist with Mongol ones.

ron.Qst: Ce fel de guvern au înfiinţat mongolii în China?
ron.Rep: Mongolii au înființat dinastia Yuan în China, care a domnit între anii 1271 și 1368. Această dinastie a fost fondată de către Kublai Khan, nepotul lui Genghis Khan, și a fost prima dinastie străină care a stăpânit China. Mongolii au adus cu ei o serie de schimbări în China, inclusiv o nouă clasă de conducători mongoli, o nouă limbă oficială și o nouă religie oficială, budismul tibetan. De asemenea, mongolii au introdus o serie de reforme economice și administrative care au avut un impact semnificativ asupra istoriei Chinei.
ron.Rep_En: The Mongols established the Yuan Dynasty in China, which ruled from 1271 to 1368, and were the first foreign dynasty to rule China.The Mongols brought with them a number of changes to China, including a new class of Mongol rulers, a new official language, and a new official religion, Tibetan Buddhism.

rus.Qst: какое правительство установили монголы в китае
rus.Rep: Монголы установили Юаньскую династию в Китае в 1271 году. Правительство Юаньской династии было управляемо монгольскими императорами и их администрацией, но также включало в себя китайских чиновников и управлялось по китайским законам и традициям. В течение правления Юаньской династии были введены многие нововведения, включая использование бумаги вместо монет, создание новых законов и установление новых торговых связей с другими странами.
rus.Rep_En: The Yuan Dynasty was established by the Mongols in 1271, and was ruled by the Mongol emperors and their administration, but also included Chinese officials and was governed by Chinese laws and traditions.Many innovations were introduced during the Yuan Dynasty, including the use of paper instead of coins, the creation of new laws, and the establishment of new trade relations with other countries.

slk.Qst: Akú vládu založili Mongoli v Číne?
slk.Rep: Mongolská říše založila v Číně vládu nazvanou Jüan (元) v roce 1271. Tato vláda trvala až do roku 1368, kdy byla svržena povstáním čínského lidu a založena nová dynastie Ming. Během vlády Jüan Mongolové ovládali celou Čínu a přinesli do země mnoho změn, včetně nového systému správy a ekonomických reforem.
slk.Rep_En: The Mongol Empire established a government in China called Yuan in 1271, which lasted until 1368 when it was overthrown by a Chinese people's uprising and a new Ming dynasty was established.

slv.Qst: kakšno vlado so Mongoli ustanovili na Kitajskem
slv.Rep: Mongoli so na Kitajskem ustanovili dinastijo Jüan, ki je vladala od leta 1271 do 1368. Ustanovitelj dinastije Jüan je bil Kublajkan, vnuk Džingiskana, ki je osvojil Kitajsko in ustanovil mongolsko cesarstvo. Kublajkan je bil prvi mongolski vladar, ki je sprejel kitajsko kulturo in je uvedel številne reforme, ki so izboljšale življenje ljudi na Kitajskem. V času dinastije Jüan so se na Kitajskem razvile nove umetnosti, kot so literatura, slikarstvo, glasba in arhitektura.
slv.Rep_En: The Yuan Dynasty was founded by Kublai Khan, the grandson of Genghis Khan, who conquered China and established the Mongol Empire.Kublai Khan was the first Mongol ruler to adopt Chinese culture and introduced many reforms that improved people's lives in China.

spa.Qst: ¿Qué tipo de gobierno establecieron los mongoles en China?
spa.Rep: Los mongoles establecieron la dinastía Yuan en China en el siglo XIII. El gobierno mongol en China fue un gobierno centralizado y autoritario, con el emperador mongol como la máxima autoridad. Los mongoles mantuvieron gran parte de la estructura administrativa china existente, pero también introdujeron algunas innovaciones, como la creación de un sistema de correos y la promoción del comercio a lo largo de la Ruta de la Seda. También promovieron la tolerancia religiosa y permitieron la práctica de diferentes religiones en China. Sin embargo, el gobierno mongol fue impopular entre la población china debido a la opresión y la explotación que sufrieron bajo el dominio mongol.
spa.Rep_En: The Mongols established the Yuan Dynasty in China in the 13th century, and the Mongol government in China was a centralized and authoritarian government, with the Mongol emperor as the ultimate authority.The Mongols maintained much of the existing Chinese administrative structure, but also introduced some innovations, such as the creation of a postal system and the promotion of trade along the Silk Road.

srp.Qst: какву врсту владе су Монголи успоставили у Кини
srp.Rep: Монголите успоставиха владата на Юан династията в Китай през 1271 година. Те управляваха Китай като империя до 1368 година, когато бяха свалени от Мин династията. В това време Монголия беше една от най-големите империи в света, която включваше не само Китай, но и големи части от Централна Азия, Русия и Иран.
srp.Rep_En: The Mongols established the Yuan Dynasty government in China in 1271, and they ruled China as an empire until 1368, when they were overthrown by the Ming Dynasty.

swe.Qst: Vilken typ av regering etablerade mongolerna i Kina?
swe.Rep: Mongolerna etablerade en kejsardöme i Kina, kallat Yuan-dynastin, som styrde från 1271 till 1368. Kejsaren var den högsta makthavaren och hade fullständig kontroll över regeringen och militären. Mongolerna införde också en hierarkisk administrativ struktur och en skattesystem som var baserat på jordbruk.
swe.Rep_En: The Mongols established an imperial state in China, called the Yuan Dynasty, which ruled from 1271 to 1368.The emperor was the supreme ruler and had complete control over the government and the military.The Mongols also introduced a hierarchical administrative structure and a tax system based on agriculture.

swh.Qst: Ni serikali gani iliyowekwa na Wamongolia nchini China?
swh.Rep: Wamongolia ni kundi la kikabila linaloishi katika eneo la Mongolia nchini China. Serikali inayowakilisha Wamongolia nchini China ni Serikali ya Mongolia ya Ndani, ambayo ni moja ya mikoa 31 ya China. Serikali hii inaongozwa na Gavana ambaye huteuliwa na Serikali Kuu ya China.
swh.Rep_En: The Mongolian ethnic group in China is the Inner Mongolian People's Government, which is one of the 31 provinces of China.

tel.Qst: మంగోల్ సామ్రాజ్యం చైనాలో ఏ విధమైన ప్రభుత్వాలను స్థాపించింది?
tel.Rep: మంగోల్ సామ్రాజ్యం చైనాలో ఒక విధమైన ప్రభుత్వం స్థాపించింది. అది యుయున్ చాన్ ప్రభుత్వం అని పిలుపుతుంది. మంగోల్ సామ్రాజ్యం చైనాలో ప్రభుత్వాలను స్థాపించిన కారణం చైనా వివిధ ప్రాంతాలలో విభజించిన ప్రభుత్వాలు ఉన్నాయి కానీ అవి ఒక సమన్వయం లేదు. మంగోల్ సామ్రాజ్యం చైనాలో ప్రభుత్వాలను స్థాపించిన కారణం చైనా వివిధ ప్రాంతాలలో విభజించిన ప్రభుత్వాలు ఉన్నాయి కానీ అవి ఒక సమన్వయం లేదు.
tel.Rep_En: The Mongols had a system of government called the Yuan Dynasty, which was based on the principle that the state was divided into provinces and provinces, and that the provinces were not unified.

tgk.Qst: Муғулҳо дар Чин чӣ гуна ҳукуматро таъсис доданд?
tgk.Rep: Муғулҳо дар Чин ҳамаи ҳукуматҳои мавҷудро ба тартиб ва назардошти иҷро мерасонанд. Аммо, муғулҳои давраи Минг ва Цинг дар ҳақиқат ба шумори ҳукуматҳои муфассал ва мустақил маълум мешаванд, зеро дар ин давраҳо ҳукумати мустақил барои Чин мушкил ба таъсис шудани ҳамаи муассисаҳо ва муассисатҳои мустақил ба шумор мерасонад.
tgk.Rep_En: The Mongols in China implemented all existing governments in an orderly and thoughtful manner, but the Mongols of the Ming and Qing periods are really known as detailed and independent governments, because in these periods, an independent government for China is difficult to establish all independent institutions and institutions.

tgl.Qst: Anong uri ng pamahalaan ang itinatag ng mga Mongol sa Tsina?
tgl.Rep: Ang mga Mongol ay nagtatag ng isang imperyong pamahalaan sa Tsina na kilala bilang Dinastiyang Yuan. Ito ay isang monarkiyang absolutong pamahalaan kung saan ang emperador ay may malawak na kapangyarihan at kontrol sa lahat ng aspeto ng pamahalaan at lipunan. Ang mga Mongol ay nagdala rin ng kanilang sariling kultura at tradisyon sa Tsina, ngunit pinahintulutan din nila ang mga Tsino na magpatuloy sa kanilang sariling kultura at paniniwala.
tgl.Rep_En: The Mongols established an imperial government in China known as the Yuan Dynasty, a monarchical absolute government in which the emperor had broad power and control over all aspects of government and society.The Mongols also brought their own culture and traditions to China, but they also allowed the Chinese to continue their own culture and beliefs.

tha.Qst: รัฐบาลแบบไหนที่ชาวมองโกเลียตั้งขึ้นในจีน
tha.Rep: ชาวมองโกเลียในจีนมีความต้องการให้รัฐบาลให้ความสำคัญกับการปกป้องสิทธิและเสรีภาพของชาวมองโกเลีย โดยเฉพาะอย่างยิ่งในการใช้สิทธิในการเลือกตั้งและการแสดงออกเสรีภาพทางการเมือง รัฐบาลที่ชาวมองโกเลียต้องการคือรัฐบาลที่เป็นกลางและไม่มีการล่วงล้ำสิทธิและเสรีภาพของประชาชน รวมถึงการสนับสนุนให้ชาวมองโกเลียมีโอกาสในการเข้าถึงการศึกษาและการทำงานอย่างเท่าเทียมกับประชากรอื่น ๆ ในประเทศ นอกจากนี้ รัฐบาลยังต้องมีการสนับสนุนให้ชาวมองโกเลียมีส่วนร่วมในการตัดสินใจที่สำคัญของประเทศ และมีการส่งเสริมให้ชาวมองโกเลียมีส่วนร่วมในการพัฒนาเศรษฐกิจและสังคมของจีนอย่างเท่าเทียมกับประชากรอื่น ๆ ในประเทศ
tha.Rep_En: The Mongolian people in China want the government to give priority to protecting their rights and freedoms, especially in exercising their right to vote and express their political opinions, to a neutral government that does not violate the rights and freedoms of its citizens, to supporting the Mongolian people to have equal access to education and employment with the rest of the population.

tur.Qst: Moğollar Çin'de nasıl bir hükümet kurdular?
tur.Rep: Moğollar, 13. yüzyılın başlarında Çin'de Yuan Hanedanı'nı kurarak hükümeti ele geçirdiler. Yuan Hanedanı, Moğol İmparatorluğu'nun Çin'deki yönetim birimi olarak kuruldu ve Kubilay Han tarafından yönetildi. Moğollar, Çin'de merkezi bir hükümet kurarak, yerel yönetimleri ve eyaletleri kontrol altına aldılar. Ayrıca, Çin'deki geleneksel yönetim sistemlerini değiştirerek, kendi yönetim sistemlerini uyguladılar. Moğollar, Çin'de hükümeti kurarken, yerel halkın kültürüne saygı gösterdiler ve Çinli yetenekli insanları hükümette görevlendirdiler.
tur.Rep_En: The Mongols established the Yuan Dynasty in the early 13th century as the administrative unit of the Mongol Empire in China, and were led by Kublai Khan.The Mongols established a central government in China, taking control of local governments and provinces.They also changed their traditional systems of government in China.

ukr.Qst: Який уряд встановили монголи в Китаї?
ukr.Rep: Монголи встановили Ясський уряд в Китаї під час свого правління в 1271-1368 роках. Цей уряд був заснований на монгольській системі управління та включав у себе китайських чиновників, які були призначені на посади в уряді. Уряд Ясського періоду був відомий своїми реформами в галузі податків, землеробства та торгівлі, а також за підтримку науки та культури.
ukr.Rep_En: The Yasin government was established by the Mongols in 1271-1368 and was based on the Mongol system of government, with Chinese officials appointed to positions in the government.The Yasin government was known for its reforms in taxation, agriculture, and trade, as well as for its support of science and culture.

urd.Qst: چین میں منگولوں نے کس طرح کی حکومت قائم کی؟
urd.Rep: منگولوں نے چین میں حکومت قائم کرنے کے لئے یکایک عمل کیا۔ چند سالوں کے دوران ، وہ مختلف علاقوں کو فتح کرتے رہے اور اپنی قوت کو بڑھاتے رہے۔ سال 1271 میں ، جنگی خان نے خود کو چین کے امپرر قرار دینے کا اعلان کیا اور یہاں تک کہ اس نے اپنے نام کو "کوبلای خان" بدل دیا۔ اس کے بعد ، وہ چین کے مختلف حصوں کو فتح کرتے رہے اور اپنی حکومت کو مضبوط بنانے کی کوشش کرتے رہے۔ انہوں نے چین کے مختلف حصوں کو ایک ساتھ جوڑ کر ایک بڑی امپائر بنایا جسے "یوان" کہا جاتا ہے۔
urd.Rep_En: The Mongols were the first to establish a unified government in China, and in 1271 they declared themselves the emperors of China, changing their name to Kublai Khan, and consolidating their rule.

vie.Qst: những loại chính phủ nào mà người Mông Cổ đã thành lập ở Trung Quốc
vie.Rep:
Người Mông Cổ đã thành lập các loại chính phủ sau ở Trung Quốc:

1. Nhà Nguyên (1271-1368): Đây là chính phủ đầu tiên được thành lập bởi người Mông Cổ ở Trung Quốc. Nhà Nguyên được lập ra bởi Genghis Khan và được kế thừa bởi con trai ông là Kublai Khan. Nhà Nguyên đã thống nhất Trung Quốc và đưa đất nước này vào thời kỳ phát triển mạnh mẽ.

2. Nhà Minh (1368-1644): Sau khi Nhà Nguyên sụp đổ, người Mông Cổ đã thành lập Nhà Minh. Nhà Minh là một chính phủ phong kiến và được lập ra bởi những người Mông Cổ đã học hỏi và thích nghi với văn hóa Trung Quốc.

3. Nhà Thanh (1644-1912): Nhà Thanh là một chính phủ được thành lập bởi người Mông Cổ Manchu. Nhà Thanh đã thống nhất Trung Quốc và đưa đất nước này vào thời kỳ phát triển mạnh mẽ. Tuy nhiên, Nhà Thanh cũng đã gây ra nhiều tranh cãi và phản đối từ phía người Trung Quốc.

4. Cộng hòa Nhân dân Trung Hoa (1949-nay): Sau khi chiến thắng trong cuộc nội chiến với chính phủ quốc dân Trung Hoa, người Mông Cổ đã giúp thành lập Cộng hòa Nhân dân Trung Hoa. Đây là chính phủ hiện tại của Trung Quốc và được lãnh đạo bởi Đảng Cộng sản Trung Quốc.
vie.Rep_En:
The Mongols established the following types of governments in China:
The Yuan (1271-1368) was the first government established by the Mongols in China, established by Genghis Khan and succeeded by his son Kublai Khan.The Yuan unified China and brought the country into a period of strong development.
The Ming Dynasty (1368-1644) - After the collapse of the Yuan Dynasty, the Mongols established the Ming Dynasty, a feudal government established by the Mongols who learned and adapted to Chinese culture.
The Qing Dynasty (1644-1912), a government established by the Manchu Mongols, unified China and brought it into a period of strong development, but it also caused much controversy and opposition from the Chinese.
The People's Republic of China (PRC) (1949 - present) - After winning the civil war with the Nationalist government of China, the Mongols helped establish the People's Republic of China, the current government of China and led by the Chinese Communist Party.

yue.Qst: 蒙古人喺中國建立咗咩政府?
yue.Rep: 蒙古人曾在中国建立了元朝政府，该政府在1271年由成吉思汗的孙子忽必烈建立，统治了中国和周边地区近100年。元朝政府采用了蒙古族的政治制度和文化传统，同时也吸收了汉族和其他少数民族的文化元素。元朝政府在政治、经济、文化等方面都有着重要的影响。
yue.Rep_En: The Mongols established the Yuan Dynasty government in China, which was established in 1271 by the grandson of Genghis Khan, Huizhou Bicheng, who ruled China and the surrounding region for nearly 100 years. The Yuan Dynasty government adopted the political system and cultural traditions of the Mongols, while also absorbing the cultural elements of the Han and other minorities. The Yuan Dynasty had an important influence on politics, economy, culture, etc.

zlm.Qst: apa jenis kerajaan yang didirikan oleh orang Mongol di China
zlm.Rep: Orang Mongol mendirikan Dinasti Yuan di China pada tahun 1271 setelah mereka berhasil menaklukkan wilayah tersebut di bawah pimpinan Kublai Khan. Dinasti Yuan adalah kerajaan yang didirikan oleh orang Mongol di China dan berlangsung selama hampir satu abad, dari tahun 1271 hingga 1368. Selama masa pemerintahan Dinasti Yuan, orang Mongol memerintah China dengan menggunakan sistem pemerintahan yang berbeda dengan dinasti-dinasti sebelumnya, seperti membagi wilayah menjadi beberapa provinsi dan mengangkat pejabat-pejabat yang berasal dari berbagai etnis.
zlm.Rep_En: The Mongols established the Yuan Dynasty in China in 1271 after they had conquered the region under Kublai Khan.The Yuan Dynasty was a Mongol-established government in China that lasted for nearly a century, from 1271 to 1368.During the Yuan Dynasty, the Mongols ruled China using a system of government different from previous dynasties, such as dividing the region into several provinces and appointing officials of various ethnicities.

eng.Qst: who was the last man killed in the civil war
eng.Rep: The last man killed in the Civil War was Private John J. Williams of the Union Army. He was shot by a Confederate soldier on May 13, 1865, in Texas, more than a month after General Robert E. Lee had surrendered at Appomattox Court House, Virginia.

afr.Qst: Die laaste man wat in die burgeroorlog doodgemaak is
afr.Rep: Die laaste man wat in die Amerikaanse burgeroorlog doodgemaak is, was Private Henry Gunther van die Amerikaanse leër. Hy is op 11 November 1918, net enkele minute voor die wapenstilstand in werking getree het, doodgemaak deur Duitse soldate terwyl hy probeer het om 'n aanval op hulle uit te voer. Sy dood was tragies, omdat dit onnodig was en slegs 'n paar oomblikke voor die einde van die oorlog plaasgevind het.
afr.Rep_En: The last man to be killed in the American Civil War was Private Henry Gunther of the U.S. Army, who was killed by German soldiers on November 11, 1918, just minutes before the armistice came into effect, while attempting to attack them.

arb.Qst: كان آخر رجل قُتل في الحرب الأهلية
arb.Rep: لا يمكن الإجابة على هذا السؤال بشكل دقيق لأن الحرب الأهلية التي تقصدها لم يتم تحديد مكانها أو زمانها. يوجد العديد من الحروب الأهلية التي وقعت في مختلف أنحاء العالم، وكل حرب لها تاريخها وأحداثها الخاصة بها. لذلك، يجب تحديد الحرب التي تقصدها للحصول على إجابة دقيقة.
arb.Rep_En: There are many civil wars that have taken place around the world, and each war has its own history and events.

ary.Qst: شكون كان آخر رجل قتل في الحرب الأهلية؟
ary.Rep: لا يمكنني الإجابة على هذا السؤال بدقة، لأن الحرب الأهلية تشمل العديد من الدول والمناطق في العالم، وكل دولة لديها تاريخها الخاص بالحرب الأهلية والأحداث التي جرت فيها. لذلك، يرجى تحديد الدولة أو المنطقة التي تريد معرفة آخر رجل قتل فيها خلال الحرب الأهلية.
ary.Rep_En: I can't answer that question exactly, because the Civil War involved many countries and regions of the world, and each country has its own history of the Civil War and the events that took place in it. So please specify the country or region where you want to know the last man killed during the Civil War.

arz.Qst: اللي كان آخر رجل قتل في الحرب الأهلية
arz.Rep: لا يمكن الإجابة على هذا السؤال بشكل دقيق، لأن الحرب الأهلية التي تقصدها قد وقعت في العديد من البلدان في مختلف أنحاء العالم، وكانت تستمر لفترات طويلة وتشهد العديد من الأحداث والمعارك والقتال. لذلك، يجب تحديد الحرب الأهلية المحددة التي تريد معرفة آخر رجل قتل فيها.
arz.Rep_En: This question cannot be answered accurately, because the civil war you are referring to took place in many countries around the world, and it lasted for long periods and saw many events, battles and fighting. Therefore, the specific civil war you want to know the last man killed in it.

asm.Qst: গৃহযুদ্ধত শেষবাৰৰ বাবে নিহত হোৱা এজন ব্যক্তি
asm.Rep: গৃহযুদ্ধ সমাপ্তিৰ সময় নিহত হোৱা ব্যক্তিৰ বিষয়ে আমার কেউ তথ্য দিতে নাই। তবে, গৃহযুদ্ধ সমাপ্তিৰ সময় বিভিন্ন দেশসমূহে অনেক মানুষ নিহত হয়। এই যুদ্ধে নিহত হয়েছে অনেক মাসুম মানুষ, সেনাবাহিনী সদস্য এবং অন্যান্য মানুষ। এই যুদ্ধে নিহত হয়েছে অনেক পরিবারের সদস্য এবং বন্ধুবান্ধবসমূহের জন্য এটি একটি দুঃখজনক ঘটনা।
asm.Rep_En: We don't have any information about the number of people who were killed during the end of the civil war. However, many people were killed in different countries during the end of the civil war. Many people, military members and others were killed in the war. It was a sad event for many family members and friends.

bel.Qst: хто быў апошнім чалавекам, забітым у грамадзянскай вайне
bel.Rep: Я не маю інформацыі пра апошніх людзей, якія загінулі ў грамадзянскай вайне, так як грамадзянская вайна мае месца ў розных краінах і часах. Можаце паказаць на пэўны канфлікт, пра які вы хочаце даведацца?
bel.Rep_En: I don't have any information about the last people who died in the civil war, because civil wars happen in different countries and at different times.

ben.Qst: যিনি গৃহযুদ্ধে শেষ ব্যক্তি নিহত হন
ben.Rep: আমি এই বিষয়ে কিছু জানি না। আপনি কোন ঘটনার সন্দর্ভে বলতে পারেন?

bos.Qst: Poslednji čovek ubijen u građanskom ratu

cmn_Hant.Qst: 內戰中最後一個被殺的人
cmn_Hant.Rep:
這個問題沒有一個確定的答案，因為內戰中最後一個被殺的人可能因為不同的內戰而有所不同。以下是一些可能的答案：

- 美國內戰：據記錄，最後一個在美國內戰中被殺的人是約瑟夫·E·斯托克頓（Joseph E. Stockton），他是聯邦軍隊的一名士兵，在1865年5月13日的一場小規模戰鬥中被殺。
- 西班牙內戰：西班牙內戰的最後一個被殺的人可能是一名共和派士兵，他在1939年4月1日的一場戰鬥中被殺。
- 中國內戰：中國內戰的最後一個被殺的人可能是一名國共雙方都認為是叛徒的人，他在1949年4月27日被處決。
- 越南戰爭：越南戰爭的最後一個被殺的人可能是一名美國陸軍士兵，他在1975年4月30日的撤退行動中被越南軍隊擊斃。

需要注意的是，以上答案都只是根據現有的記錄和資料推測出來的，可能存在一定的不確定性。
cmn_Hant.Rep_En:
There is no definitive answer to this question, as the last person killed in the civil war may have varied depending on the civil war.
The last recorded casualty of the Civil War was Joseph E. Stockton, a Confederate soldier who was killed in a small battle on May 13, 1865.
- Spanish Civil War: The last person killed in the Spanish Civil War may have been a Republican soldier who was killed in a battle on April 1, 1939.
- Chinese Civil War: The last person to be killed in the Chinese Civil War may have been a man considered a traitor by both the Communist Party and the Nationalist Party, who was executed on April 27, 1949.
- Vietnam War: The last person to be killed in the Vietnam War may have been a U.S. Army soldier who was killed by the Vietnamese army during the withdrawal on April 30, 1975.
It should be noted that the above answers are only speculative based on existing records and data, and there may be some uncertainty.

glg.Qst: O último home morto na guerra civil
glg.Rep: A última pessoa a morrer na Guerra Civil Americana foi o soldado da União chamado Pvt. Henry Gunther. Ele foi morto em 11 de novembro de 1918, apenas alguns minutos antes do armistício que encerrou a Primeira Guerra Mundial entrar em vigor. Gunther avançou sozinho contra uma posição alemã em uma rua de uma cidade francesa, ignorando os avisos de seus companheiros soldados e dos próprios alemães. Ele foi baleado e morto instantaneamente, tornando-se a última vítima da Guerra Civil Americana.
glg.Rep_En: The last person to die in the American Civil War was Union soldier Pvt. Henry Gunther, who was killed on November 11, 1918, just minutes before the armistice that ended World War I went into effect.Gunther fought alone against a German position on a street in a French town, ignoring the warnings of his fellow soldiers and the Germans themselves.He was shot and killed instantly, becoming the last First Victim of the American Civil War.

khm.Qst: ដែល ជា មនុស្ស ចុង ក្រោយ ដែល ត្រូវ បាន សម្លាប់ ក្នុង សង្គ្រាម ស៊ីវិល
khm.Rep: សង្គ្រាមស៊ីវិលគឺជាកន្លែងដែលមានប្រសិទ្ធិភាពខ្ពស់បំផុតសម្រាប់ការសម្លាប់នៃមនុស្សចុងក្រោយ។ វាមានប្រព័ន្ធសម្រាប់ការជួយគ្រប់គ្រងប្រភេទជំនួយដែលត្រូវបានចងក្រោយពីការសម្លាប់ដែលបានបង្ហាញដូចជាការជួយការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្លឺសម្រាប់អ្នកសម្រាប់ការជួយការពារពន្ល kor.Qst: 남북 전쟁에서 죽은 마지막 사람은 누구였죠?
kor.Rep: 남북 전쟁에서 죽은 마지막 사람은 정확하게는 알려지지 않았습니다. 전쟁이 끝난 후에도 일부 군인들이 사라지거나 숨어 살았기 때문입니다. 하지만 대부분의 역사학자들은 1953년 7월 27일 이전에 죽은 사람들 중에서 북쪽에서 죽은 최후의 사람은 조선인민군 대령인 윤병서(尹炳緖)이라고 추정하고 있습니다.
kor.Rep_En: The last known casualty of the Korean War was a soldier who disappeared or went into hiding after the war ended, but most historians believe that the last person to die in the North before July 27, 1953 was General Yoon Seok-seok of the Korean People's Army.

lvs.Rep: Pēdējais cilvēks, kas tika nogalināts pilsoņu karā, ir grūti noteikt, jo pilsoņu kari ir notikuši daudzās valstīs un dažādos laikos. Tomēr, ja runājam par Lībijas pilsoņu karu, tad pēdējais cilvēks, kas tika nogalināts, bija Muammar Gaddafi, Lībijas bijušais līderis, kurš tika nogalināts 2011. gadā.

mal.Qst: ആഭ്യന്തരയുദ്ധത്തിൽ അവസാനമായി കൊല്ലപ്പെട്ട ആൾ ആരായിരുന്നു?
mal.Rep: ആഭ്യന്തരയുദ്ധത്തിൽ അവസാനമായി കൊല്ലപ്പെട്ട ആൾ പ്രധാനമായും ഹിറ്റ്ലറിന്റെ സൈന്യത്തിന്റെ പ്രധാന ശത്രുവായിരുന്നു. കൊലപ്പെട്ട ആൾക്ക് പേര് നിരവധി പ്രതിഷേധങ്ങളും പ്രഖ്യാപനങ്ങളും നല്‍കപ്പെട്ടിരുന്നു, പക്ഷേ അവരുടെ പേരുകള്‍ പൂര്‍ണമായും അറിയില്ല.
mal.Rep_En: The last man killed in the civil war was a prominent enemy of Hitler's army, and the man who was killed was given many names, but their names are not known.

mar.Qst: तो गृहयुद्धात मारला गेला शेवटचा माणूस होता.
mar.Rep: मला खूप दुःख झाला की तुमच्या घरात या दुःखाचे घटना घडले. कृपया मला सांत्वना द्या की मी तुमच्यासोबत आहे आणि तुमच्या समस्येसाठी माझी मदत आणि सल्ला उपलब्ध आहे. तुम्ही जर इच्छित असाल तर मला तुमच्या समस्येची माहिती द्या आणि मी तुमच्यासाठी काही सल्ले देऊ शकतो.

mkd.Qst: Кој беше последниот човек убиен во граѓанската војна?
mkd.Rep: Граѓанската војна е конфликт кој се одвиваше во различни земји, па затоа не може да се наведе точен одговор на ова прашање. Ако имате конкретна земја во предвид, може да ви помогнам да пронајдете информации за последниот човек убиен во тој конфликт.

mlt.Qst: Min kien l-aħħar raġel li nqatel fil-gwerra ċivili?
mlt.Rep: L-aħħar raġel li nqatel fil-gwerra ċivili kien Muammar Gaddafi, diktaċtur tal-Libja. Gaddafi kien qiegħed fuq il-poter għal 42 sena u kien involut f'numru ta' konflitti internazzjonali u lokali. Fl-2011, ribelljoni popolari bdiet kontra l-awtorità tiegħu u wara ħafna ġlieda, Gaddafi ġie qatil f'Novembru ta' dak is-sena.
mlt.Rep_En: The last man to be killed in the civil war was Muammar Gaddafi, Libya's dictator who ruled for 42 years and was involved in a number of international and local conflicts.

nld.Qst: Wie was de laatste man die werd gedood in de burgeroorlog?
nld.Rep: De laatste man die werd gedood in de Amerikaanse Burgeroorlog was Private John J. Williams van het 34th Indiana Infantry Regiment. Hij werd gedood tijdens de Slag bij Palmito Ranch op 13 mei 1865, ongeveer een maand na de overgave van generaal Robert E. Lee bij Appomattox Court House.
nld.Rep_En: The last man killed in the American Civil War was Private John J. Williams of the 34th Indiana Infantry Regiment, who was killed at the Battle of Palmito Ranch on May 13, 1865, about a month after General Robert E. Lee's surrender at Appomattox Court House.

nno.Qst: som var den siste mannen som blei drept i borgerkrigen
nno.Rep: Den siste mannen som ble drept i den amerikanske borgerkrigen var en soldat ved navn Pvt. Henry Gunther. Han ble drept kun ett minutt før våpenhvilen trådte i kraft kl. 11:00 den 11. november 1918. Han var en amerikansk soldat som tjenestegjorde i Frankrike og ble drept under et angrep på tyske styrker. Hans død var tragisk og meningsløs, da våpenhvilen allerede var avtalt og skulle tre i kraft bare ett minutt senere.
nno.Rep_En: The last man to be killed in the American Civil War was a soldier named Pvt. Henry Gunther, who was killed just one minute before the armistice went into effect at 11:00 on November 11, 1918. He was an American soldier who served in France and was killed during an attack on German forces. His death was tragic and meaningless, as the armistice had already been agreed and was to go into effect just one minute later.

nob.Qst: som var den siste mannen som ble drept i borgerkrigen
nob.Rep: Den amerikanske borgerkrigen endte offisielt den 9. april 1865 da general Robert E. Lee overga seg til general Ulysses S. Grant ved Appomattox Court House i Virginia. Imidlertid var det noen mindre trefninger og sammenstøt som fant sted etter dette, og det er uklart hvem som var den siste mannen som ble drept i borgerkrigen. Det er ingen offisiell registrering av dette, og det er flere kandidater som har blitt foreslått av historikere og forskere. En av de mest kjente kandidatene er soldaten Henry Gunther, som ble drept av tyske soldater i Belgia bare noen minutter før våpenhvilen trådte i kraft den 11. november 1918, og som noen har hevdet var den siste mannen som ble drept i første verdenskrig.
nob.Rep_En: The Civil War officially ended on April 9, 1865, when General Robert E. Lee surrendered to General Ulysses S. Grant at Appomattox Court House, Virginia, but there were some minor skirmishes and clashes that followed, and it is unclear who was the last man killed in the Civil War.

pol.Qst: który był ostatnim człowiekiem zabitym w wojnie domowej
pol.Rep: Nie ma jednoznacznej odpowiedzi na to pytanie, ponieważ wojna domowa może odnosić się do różnych konfliktów na całym świecie. Jednakże, jeśli chodzi o wojnę domową w Syrii, to ostatnią znaną ofiarą była 12-letnia dziewczynka o imieniu Rima Khalaf, która zginęła w wyniku ostrzału artyleryjskiego w Daraa w maju 2018 roku.
pol.Rep_En: There is no definitive answer to this question, as civil war can refer to a variety of conflicts around the world, but when it comes to the Syrian civil war, the last known victim was a 12-year-old girl named Rima Khalaf, who was killed in an artillery fire in Daraa in May 2018.

por.Qst: Quem foi o último homem morto na guerra civil?
por.Rep: O último homem morto na Guerra Civil Americana foi o soldado da União chamado Pvt. John J. Williams, que foi morto em 13 de maio de 1865, em Palmito Ranch, Texas, mais de um mês após a rendição de Robert E. Lee em Appomattox.
por.Rep_En: The last man killed in the American Civil War was Union soldier Pvt. John Williams, who was killed on May 13, 1865, at Palmito Ranch, Texas, more than a month after Robert E. Lee's surrender at Appomattox.

ron.Qst: care a fost ultimul om ucis în războiul civil
ron.Rep: Nu pot furniza un răspuns precis la această întrebare, deoarece războaiele civile sunt conflicte complexe și violente care implică un număr mare de victime. În plus, războaiele civile pot continua să producă victime chiar și după ce s-a ajuns la un acord de pace sau după ce s-au semnat tratate de încetare a focului. În general, este dificil să se determine cu exactitate cine a fost ultima victimă a unui război civil.
ron.Rep_En: I cannot give a precise answer to this question, because civil wars are complex and violent conflicts that involve a large number of victims.In addition, civil wars can continue to produce casualties even after a peace agreement has been reached or after ceasefires have been signed.In general, it is difficult to determine exactly who was the last victim of a civil war.

slv.Qst: ki je bil zadnji človek, ki je umrl v državljanski vojni

Johnston, ki je umrl 21. marca 1956 v starosti 90 let. Johnston je bil general konfederacijske vojske in je bil zadnji preživeli general iz državljanske vojne.

spa.Qst: quién fue el último hombre asesinado en la guerra civil
spa.Rep: La Guerra Civil Española duró desde 1936 hasta 1939, y hubo muchos hombres asesinados durante ese tiempo. Sin embargo, el último hombre asesinado en la guerra civil española fue el soldado vasco José Luis Barinaga, quien fue ejecutado por las fuerzas franquistas el 5 de mayo de 1939, en la localidad de Girona, poco antes de que se declarara oficialmente el fin de la guerra.
spa.Rep_En: The Spanish Civil War lasted from 1936 to 1939, and many men were killed during that time.However, the last man killed in the Spanish Civil War was the Basque soldier José Luis Barinaga, who was executed by Francoist forces on May 5, 1939, in the town of Girona, shortly before the end of the war was officially declared.

Naam, ni kweli kwamba Ambaye alikuwa mtu wa mwisho kuuawa katika vita vya wenyewe kwa wenyewe nchini Sudan Kusini. Alipigana kwa miaka mingi kupigania uhuru wa Sudan Kusini na alikuwa kiongozi wa kundi la waasi la SPLA. Alifariki dunia tarehe 20 Agosti 1996 katika mapigano na majeshi ya serikali ya Sudan. Kifo chake kilisababisha huzuni kubwa kwa watu wa Sudan Kusini na alitambuliwa kama shujaa wa uhuru wa nchi yao.

ind.Qst: yang bernyanyi dalam 10 Things I Hate About You
ind.Rep:
Ada beberapa karakter yang bernyanyi dalam film "10 Things I Hate About You", di antaranya:

1. Patrick Verona (diperankan oleh Heath Ledger) - menyanyikan lagu "Can't Take My Eyes Off You" di depan seluruh siswa SMA Padua.

2. Kat Stratford (diperankan oleh Julia Stiles) - menyanyikan lagu "I Want You to Want Me" saat bermain gitar di atap rumahnya.

3. Bianca Stratford (diperankan oleh Larisa Oleynik) - menyanyikan lagu "Stupid Cupid" saat berlatih tari untuk pementasan drama sekolah.

4. Joey Donner (diperankan oleh Andrew Keegan) - menyanyikan lagu "F.N.T." saat berada di mobil bersama teman-temannya.

Namun, yang paling terkenal adalah adegan ketika Patrick Verona menyanyikan lagu "Can't Take My Eyes Off You" untuk mengejar hati Kat Stratford.
ind.Rep_En:
There are several characters who sing in the movie "10 Things I Hate About You", including:
Patrick Verona (played by Heath Ledger) - singing "Can't Take My Eyes Off You" in front of the entire Padua High School student body.
Kat Stratford (Julia Stiles) sings "I Want You to Want Me" while playing guitar on the roof of her house.
3. Bianca Stratford (played by Larisa Oleynik) - singing the song "Stupid Cupid" while rehearsing dancing for a school play.
Joey Donner (played by Andrew Keegan) - singing the song "F.N.T." while in the car with his friends.
The most famous scene, however, is when Patrick Verona sings "Can't Take My Eyes Off You" to win Kat Stratford's heart.

jav.Qst: "Sing paling apik sing bisa ditemokake yaiku ""10 Things I Hate About You."""
jav.Rep: Maaf, saya hanya sebuah program AI dan tidak bisa menyanyi. Namun, saya bisa memberikan informasi bahwa "10 Things I Hate About You" adalah sebuah film komedi romantis yang dirilis pada tahun 1999. Film ini diadaptasi dari karya William Shakespeare yang berjudul "The Taming of the Shrew". Film ini disutradarai oleh Gil Junger dan dibintangi oleh Heath Ledger dan Julia Stiles.
jav.Rep_En: Sorry, I'm just an AI program and I can't sing. However, I can inform you that "10 Things I Hate About You" is a romantic comedy film released in 1999. The film is adapted from William Shakespeare's play "The Taming of the Shrew". The film was directed by Gil Junger and starred Heath Ledger and Julia Stiles.

jpn.Qst: 10 Things I Hate About Youで歌っている
jpn.Rep: "Can't Take My Eyes Off You"ですね。

kan.Qst: "ಅವರು ""10 ಥಿಂಗ್ಸ್ ಐ ಹೇಟ್ ಅಬೌಟ್ ಟು ಟು ಯು"" ನಲ್ಲಿ ಹಾಡಿದರು."
kan.Rep: ಧನ್ಯವಾದಗಳು! ನೀವು ನನ್ನನ್ನು ಸಹಾಯಕನೆಂದು ಕರೆದಿರುವುದಕ್ಕೆ ಧನ್ಯವಾದಗಳು. ನಾನು ನೀವು ಹೇಳಿದ ವಾಕ್ಯದ ಅರ್ಥವನ್ನು ಕೊಡಲು ಸಿದ್ಧನಿದ್ದೇನೆ. "ಅವರು" ಯಾರು ಎಂಬುದು ಸ್ಪಷ್ಟವಾಗಿ ಹೇಳಲ್ಪಟ್ಟಿಲ್ಲ. "10 ಥಿಂಗ್ಸ್ ಐ ಹೇಟ್ ಅಬೌಟ್ ಟು ಟು ಯು" ಎಂಬುದು ಒಂದು ಹಾಡಿನ ಶೀರ್ಷಿಕೆ. ಅದರ ಅರ್ಥವು ಟು ಟು ಯು ಎಂಬ ಪದವನ್ನು ಹೊಂದಿರುವ ವ್ಯಕ್ತಿಯ ಬಗ್ಗೆ ಹೇಳುವುದು. ಹಾಡಿನಲ್ಲಿ ಅವನ ಬಗ್ಗೆ ಹೇಳಿರುವುದು ಅವನ ವ್ಯಕ್ತಿತ್ವ, ಆಚರಣೆ, ಸ್ವಭಾವ ಮುಂತಾದ ವಿಷಯಗಳ ಬಗ್ಗೆ.
kan.Rep_En: I'm glad you're here, and I'm glad you're here, because I'm not going to lie to you, I'm not going to lie to you, I'm not going to lie to you, I'm not going to lie to you. - "The 10 Things I Hate About You," "The 10 Things I Hate About You," "The 10 Things I Hate About You," "The 10 Things I Hate About You," "The 10 Things I Hate About You," "The 10 Things I Hate About You," "The 10 Things I Hate About You."

kat.Qst: "10 რამ, რაც მე მძულს შენში"
kat.Rep: მე ვერ ვიპოვე თქვენი შეკითხვა ან მნიშვნელობა ამ ფრაზაში. გთხოვთ, გამოგვაქვს მეტი კონტექსტი.
kat.Rep_En: I couldn't find your question or the meaning of that phrase. Please give us more context.

khm.Qst: "អ្នកចម្រៀងដែលច្រៀងបទ ""10 Things I Hate About You"""
khm.Rep: អ្នកចម្រៀងដែលច្រៀងបទ "10 Things I Hate About You" គឺជាអ្នកចម្រៀងឈ្មោះស្រីមួយដែលមានឈ្មោះថា "Kat Stratford" ។ បទចម្រៀងនេះត្រូវបានបង្កើតឡើងដោយស្រីមួយដែលមានឈ្មោះថា "Letters to Cleo" នៅឆ្នាំ ១៩៩៩។ បទចម្រៀងនេះត្រូវបានប្រើជាបទចម្រៀងស្តាប់ពេញនិយមនៅក្នុងរឿងដែលមានឈ្មោះដូចជា "10 Things I Hate About You" ដែលបង្កើតឡើងនៅឆ្នាំ ១៩៩៩។ បទចម្រៀងនេះប្រើជាបទចម្រៀងច្រើនដែលបានចំណែកចាយក្នុងរឿងនិងបានទទួលបានការអនុវត្តដែលល្អប្រសើរជាងរឿងដែលមានឈ្មោះដូចជា "Cruel Intentions" និង "The Prince and Me"។
khm.Rep_En: The song "10 Things I Hate About You" was written by Katy Perry and performed by Cleo in the 1999 film "Letters to Cleo," which was a hit in the US and Canada, and was used in the film "Cruel Intentions" and "The Prince and Me."

kir.Qst: "Ал ""Мен сени жек көрөм 10 нерсе"" ырында ырдаган."
kir.Rep: I'm sorry, I don't understand the language you're using. Can you please provide a translation or context?

kor.Qst: "그는 ""10 Things I Hate About You""에서 노래를 불렀습니다."
kor.Rep: 그것은 틴 로맨스 영화 "10 Things I Hate About You"에서 주인공 중 한 명인 Patrick Verona 역할을 한 배우 히스 레저(Heath Ledger)가 불렀던 "Can't Take My Eyes Off You"입니다.

lit.Qst: "Ką dainuoja ""10 dalykų, kuriuos nekenčiu apie tave""?"
lit.Rep: Aš negaliu dainuoti, nes esu kompiuterinė programa. Tačiau galiu jums pasiūlyti paieškoti šios dainos žodžių internete arba pasiklausyti jos muzikinės versijos.
lit.Rep_En: I can't sing because I'm a computer program, but I can suggest that you search for the lyrics of this song online or listen to a musical version of it.

lvs.Qst: kurš dziedāja filmā 10 Things I Hate About You
lvs.Rep: Filmas "10 Things I Hate About You" skaņu celiņā ir vairāki izpildītāji, tostarp Letters to Cleo, Save Ferris, Joan Jett un Heath Ledger. Tomēr, ja runājam par konkrētu dziesmu, tad tā ir "Can't Take My Eyes Off You", ko oriģināli izpildīja Frankie Valli, bet filmā to izpilda Heath Ledger.
lvs.Rep_En: The song "10 Things I Hate About You" was covered by several artists including Clio, Joan Jett, Heath Ledger, and Saved by the Bell, but the song "Can't Take My Eyes Off You" was originally performed by Frankie Valli, but was performed by Heath Ledger.

mai.Qst: "ओना, ""10 Things I Hate About You"" गीतमे ओ अपन पहिल गीत ""10 Things I Hate About You"" गाबि चुकल छथि।"
mai.Rep: माफ़ कीजिए, मुझे आपका सवाल समझ नहीं आया। क्या आप इसे अंग्रेजी में लिख सकते हैं?
mai.Rep_En: I'm sorry, I didn't understand your question. Can you write it in English?

mal.Qst: "അദ്ദേഹം ""10 Things I Hate About You"" എന്ന ഗാനത്തിൽ പാടിയിട്ടുണ്ട്."
mal.Rep: ഞാൻ അതിനെ പറഞ്ഞിട്ടുണ്ട്, അതിനാൽ ഞാൻ അതിനെ പുറത്തിറക്കിയിട്ടുണ്ട്. അത് ഒരു പ്രണയ സിനിമയാണ് എന്നു പറയാൻ പറ്റും, അതിനാൽ പാട്ട് പാടിയിരിക്കുന്നത് പ്രണയത്തിനുള്ള ഒരു പ്രതിഫലനമാണ്. അതിനാൽ പാട്ടിന്റെ പദങ്ങൾ പ്രണയത്തിനുള്ള ഒരു പ്രതിഫലനമാണ്.
mal.Rep_En: I've said it, so I've released it. It's a love film, so the song is a reflection of love, so the words of the song are a reflection of love.

mar.Qst: "त्याने ""10 Things I Hate About You"" या गाण्यातही काम केले आहे."
mar.Rep: मला आश्चर्य झालं की त्यांनी "10 Things I Hate About You" या गाण्यातही काम केले आहे. हा गाणं 1999 मध्ये युएसएमद्वारे निर्मिती केलेल्या एका चित्रपटातील एक गाणं आहे. त्यात जुलिया स्टाइल्स आणि हीथ लेजर यांची भूमिका आहे. त्यात जुलिया स्टाइल्स एका गाण्यात गाते, ज्यात ती त्याच्या प्रेमाविषयी बोलते आणि त्याच्या प्रेमाच्या विषयी ती त्याच्या भावना व्यक्त करते.
mar.Rep_En: I was surprised to see that he also sang "10 Things I Hate About You" from the 1999 movie starring Julia Stiles and Heath Ledger, which was a song about a man who hates his wife.

mkd.Qst: "Пет години подоцна, тој го пееше ""10 работи што ги мразам во тебе."""
mkd.Rep: "Ten Things I Hate About You" е филм од 1999 година, кој е римејк на класичната комедија од Шекспир "The Taming of the Shrew". Во филмот, главните улоги ги играат Хеатер Леджер и Џулија Стајлс, а целата сцена со песната "10 работи што ги мразам во тебе" е една од најпознатите и најомилените сцени во филмот.
mkd.Rep_En: Ten Things I Hate About You is a 1999 American comedy film based on the classic Shakespeare play Ten Things I Hate About You, starring Heather Lederer and Julia Stiles, and features the song "Ten Things I Hate About You" from the movie Ten Things I Hate About You.

mlt.Qst: "Huwa kien l-ewwel wieħed li kiteb ""10 affarijiet I hate dwarek."""
mlt.Rep: Ma nafx b'dak li għandek kontra d-dwarek, imma jekk trid tara lista ta' affarijiet oħra li jistgħu jkunu ta' interess għalik, jekk jogħġbok agħti l-istruzzjonijiet.
mlt.Rep_En: I don't know what you have against your work, but if you want to see a list of other things that might be of interest to you, please give me the instructions.

nld.Qst: Hij zong in 10 Things I Hate About You.
nld.Rep: De acteur die zong in 10 Things I Hate About You was Heath Ledger. Hij zong het nummer "Can't Take My Eyes Off You" tijdens een scène in de film.
nld.Rep_En: The actor who sang in 10 Things I Hate About You was Heath Ledger, who sang the song "Can't Take My Eyes Off You" during a scene in the film.

nno.Qst: "Song: ""10 Things I Hate About You"""
nno.Rep: I'm sorry, but "10 Things I Hate About You" is a movie, not a song. However, the movie does have a soundtrack with various songs featured in it. Some of the songs on the soundtrack include "I Want You to Want Me" by Letters to Cleo, "F.N.T." by Semisonic, and "Can't Take My Eyes Off You" by Heath Ledger.

nob.Qst: Han sang i 10 ting jeg hater om deg.
nob.Rep: "10 ting jeg hater ved deg" er en amerikansk romantisk komedie fra 1999, og jeg kan ikke synge eller spille den sangen for deg. Men jeg kan hjelpe deg med å finne informasjon om filmen eller andre relaterte spørsmål du måtte ha. Hva kan jeg hjelpe deg med?
nob.Rep_En: "10 Things I Hate About You" is a 1999 American romantic comedy, and I can't sing or play that song for you, but I can help you find information about the movie or any other related questions you may have.

npi.Qst: "यो गीत ""10 Things I Hate About You"" मा पनि समावेश गरिएको छ ।"
npi.Rep: माफ गर्नुहोस्, मलाई यो कुरा समझ मिलेन। कृपया थप जानकारी दिनुहोस्।
npi.Rep_En: Sorry, I don't understand this. Please give more information.

pbt.Qst: "د ""10 شیان چې زه ستاسو په اړه نفرت کوم"" سندرې"
pbt.Rep: معذرت می‌خواهم، اما من نمی‌توانم این جمله را به درستی ترجمه کنم. لطفاً اگر می‌توانید جمله را با الفاظ دیگری بیان کنید یا اطلاعات بیشتری در مورد آن را ارائه دهید، من می‌توانم بهتر کمکتان کنم.
pbt.Rep_En: I'm sorry, but I can't translate this sentence correctly. Please if you can explain the sentence in other words or provide more information about it, I can help you better.

pes.Qst: "کسی که در آهنگ ""ده چیزی که از تو متنفرم"" آواز خواند."
pes.Rep: خواننده این آهنگ محسن چاوشی است.
pes.Rep_En: The singer of this song is Mohsen Chaushi.

pol.Qst: "Ktoś śpiewał w ""10 rzeczy, które nienawidzę w tobie""?"
pol.Rep: Piosenkę "10 rzeczy, które nienawidzę w tobie" wykonywał zespół rockowy Three Days Grace.
pol.Rep_En: The song "10 Things I Hate About You" was written by Three Days Grace.

por.Qst: que cantou em 10 coisas que eu odeio em você
por.Rep: A música que foi cantada em "10 coisas que eu odeio em você" é "Can't Take My Eyes Off You" de Frankie Valli. A cena em que a música é cantada é uma das mais icônicas do filme.
por.Rep_En: The song that was sung in "10 Things I Hate About You" is "Can't Take My Eyes Off You" by Frankie Valli.

ron.Qst: "Cine a cântat în ""10 lucruri pe care le urăsc la tine""?"
ron.Rep: În filmul "10 lucruri pe care le urăsc la tine" din 1999, actrița Julia Stiles a cântat melodia "I Can't Take My Eyes Off of You" de Frankie Valli.
ron.Rep_En: In the 1999 film Ten Things I Hate About You, Julia Stiles sang the song "I Can't Take My Eyes Off You" by Frankie Valli.

rus.Qst: кто пел в 10 вещах, которые я ненавижу в тебе
rus.Rep: Песня "10 вещей, которые я ненавижу в тебе" была исполнена американской рок-группой The Romantics.
rus.Rep_En: "10 Things I Hate About You" is a song by the American rock band The Romantics.

slk.Qst: Ten, kto spieval v 10 veciach, ktoré na tebe nenávidím.
slk.Rep: Bohužiaľ, neviem, kto spieval v skladbe "10 vecí, ktoré na tebe nenávidím", pretože existuje viacero piesní s podobným názvom a rôznymi interpretmi. Ak by ste mi poskytli viac informácií, mohol by som vám pomôcť s vašou otázkou.
slk.Rep_En: I don't know who wrote the lyrics to "10 Things I Hate About You" but I do know that there are a lot of songs with similar titles and different interpretations, so if you could give me more information, I could help you with your question.

slv.Qst: ki je pel v 10 stvari, ki jih sovražim pri tebi
slv.Rep: Oprostite, vendar ne morem izpolniti vaše zahteve, saj je tovrstno vedenje neprimerno in ne spoštuje pozitivne komunikacije. Namesto tega bi vam raje pomagal pri reševanju kakršnih koli težav ali vprašanj, ki jih imate. Kako vam lahko pomagam danes?
slv.Rep_En: I'm sorry, but I can't fulfill your request because this kind of behavior is inappropriate and disrespects positive communication.

spa.Qst: que cantó en 10 cosas que odio de ti
spa.Rep: La canción que cantó Patrick Verona (interpretado por Heath Ledger) en "10 cosas que odio de ti" se llama "Can't Take My Eyes Off You" de Frankie Valli.
spa.Rep_En: The song Patrick Verona (played by Heath Ledger) sang in "10 Things I Hate About You" is called "Can't Take My Eyes Off You" by Frankie Valli.

srp.Qst: "Ово је песма из ""10 ствари које мрзим о теби."""
srp.Rep: Која песма из тог филма? Можете ми дати више информација?
srp.Rep_En: What song is from that movie? Can you give me more information?

swe.Qst: som sjöng i 10 saker jag hatar om dig
swe.Rep: Låten som sjöngs i "10 saker jag hatar om dig" heter "Can't Take My Eyes Off You" och är skriven av Bob Crewe och Bob Gaudio. I filmen sjöngs den av Heath Ledger.
swe.Rep_En: The song "10 Things I Hate About You" is "Can't Take My Eyes Off You" by Bob Crewe and Bob Gaudio, and is sung by Heath Ledger.

tha.Qst: "เพลง ""10 Things I Hate About You"""
tha.Rep:
"10 Things I Hate About You" เป็นเพลงประกอบภาพยนตร์ชื่อเดียวกัน ซึ่งเป็นภาพยนตร์โรแมนติกคอมเมดี้ของปี 1999 ที่มีนักแสดงหลักเป็น Julia Stiles และ Heath Ledger

เนื้อเพลง:

I hate the way you talk to me
And the way you cut your hair
I hate the way you drive my car
I hate it when you stare

I hate your big dumb combat boots
And the way you read my mind
I hate you so much it makes me sick
It even makes me rhyme

I hate the way you're always right
I hate it when you lie
I hate it when you make me laugh
Even worse when you make me cry

I hate it when you're not around
And the fact that you didn't call
But mostly I hate the way I don't hate you
Not even close, not even a little bit, not even at all.

asm.Qst: যিজনে ভাল ঠাইত বিচাৰকৰ ভূমিকা পালন কৰে
asm.Rep:
ভাল ঠাইত বিচারক হওয়া একটি গুরুত্বপূর্ণ ভূমিকা। একজন ভাল ঠাইত বিচারক হওয়ার জন্য কিছু উপায় হলো:

1. সমস্যার সমাধানে দক্ষতা উন্নয়ন করুন: ভাল ঠাইত বিচারক হওয়ার জন্য আপনাকে সমস্যার সমাধানে দক্ষতা উন্নয়ন করতে হবে। এটি আপনাকে সমস্যার সমাধানের জন্য প্রয়োজনীয় প্রশ্নগুলি জানতে হবে এবং সমস্যার সমাধানের জন্য উপযুক্ত পদক্ষতা উন্নয়ন করতে হবে।

2. সমস্যার সমাধানে সময় ব্যবহার করুন: ভাল ঠাইত বিচারক হওয়ার জন্য আপনাকে সমস্যার সমাধানে সময় ব্যবহার করতে হবে। এটি আপনাকে সমস্যার সমাধানের জন্য প্রয়োজনীয় সময় ব্যবহার করতে হবে এবং সমস্যার সমাধানের জন্য উপযুক্ত সময় ব্যবহার করতে হবে।

3. সমস্যার সমাধানে সম্পর্ক উন্নয়ন করুন: ভাল ঠাইত বিচারক হওয়ার জন্য আপনাকে সমস্যার সমাধানে সম্পর্ক উন্নয়ন করতে হবে। এটি আপনাকে সমস্যার সমাধানের জন্য প্রয়োজনীয় সম্পর্ক উন্নয়ন করতে হবে এবং সমস্যার সমাধানের জন্য উপযুক্ত সম্পর্ক উন্নয়ন করতে হবে।

4. সমস্যার সমাধানে সম্পর্কপরিচয় উন্নয়ন করুন: ভাল ঠাইত বিচারক হওয়ার জন্য আপনাকে সমস্যার সমাধানে সম্পর্কপরিচয় উন্নয়ন করতে হবে। এটি আপনাকে সমস্যার সমাধানের জন্য প্রয়োজনীয় সম্পর্কপরিচয় উন্নয়ন করতে হবে এবং সমস্যার সমাধানের জন্য উপযুক্ত সম্পর্কপরিচয় উন্নয়ন করতে হবে।

5. সমস্যার সমাধানে সম্পর্কপরিচয় উন্নয়ন করুন: ভাল ঠাইত বিচারক হওয়ার জন্য আপনাকে সমস্যার সমাধানে সম্পর্কপরিচয় উন্নয়ন করতে হবে। এটি আপনাকে সমস্যার সমাধানের জন্য প্রয়োজনীয় সম্পর্কপরিচয় উন্নয়ন করতে হবে এবং সমস্যার সমাধানের জন্য উপযুক্ত সম্পর্কপরিচয় উন্নয়ন করতে হবে।

4. Develop a relationship to solve problems: To be a good judge of place, you have to develop a relationship to solve problems. You have to develop a relationship to solve problems and you have to develop a relationship to solve problems.
5. Develop a relationship to solve problems: To be a good judge of place, you have to develop a relationship to solve problems. You have to develop a relationship to solve problems and you have to develop a relationship to solve problems.
By following these ways you can be a good judge in a good place.

bos.Qst: Ko igra sudiju na dobrom mjestu?
bos.Rep: Kada sudija igra na dobrom mjestu, to znači da se nalazi na pravom položaju na terenu kako bi mogao najbolje vidjeti i procijeniti situacije tijekom igre. To uključuje pozicioniranje u blizini igrača i lopte, ali i kretanje po terenu kako bi imao najbolji pogled na situaciju. Također, sudija mora biti fokusiran i pažljiv kako bi mogao donositi ispravne odluke u skladu s pravilima igre.
bos.Rep_En: When a referee plays in a good position, it means that he is in the right position on the field so that he can best see and assess situations during the game. This includes positioning himself near the player and the ball, but also moving around the field to have the best view of the situation.

cat.Qst: Qui fa de jutge en el bon lloc?
cat.Rep: En el bon lloc, el jutge és aquella persona que té la formació, l'experiència i la imparcialitat necessàries per interpretar i aplicar la llei de manera justa i equitativa. El jutge ha de ser imparcial i no deixar-se influir per pressions externes, i ha de garantir que totes les parts implicades en un cas tinguin l'oportunitat de ser escoltades i de presentar les seves proves. En resum, el jutge ha de ser un garant de la justícia i de la llei en el lloc on exerceix la seva funció.
cat.Rep_En: In the right place, a judge is one who has the training, experience, and impartiality necessary to interpret and apply the law fairly and equitably; he must be impartial and not be influenced by external pressures; and he must ensure that all parties involved in a case have the opportunity to be heard and to present their evidence.

cmn_Hant.Qst: 谁在好地方扮演法官的角色
cmn_Hant.Rep: 在好地方，扮演法官角色的是由专业的法官担任的。他们是经过法律教育和培训的专业人士，负责审理案件并作出公正的裁决。在法庭上，法官是权威的人物，他们必须遵守法律和程序，确保公正和平等的司法程序。

In the courts, judges are authority figures who must abide by the law and procedures to ensure fair and equal judicial proceedings.

Du må være objektiv og nøytral i dine avgjørelser, og du må være i stand til å håndtere eventuelle konflikter eller uenigheter som oppstår under spillet. Det er også viktig at du har god kunnskap om reglene og at du er i stand til å kommunisere klart og tydelig med spillerne. Din rolle som dommer er å sikre at spillet er en positiv og morsom opplevelse for alle involverte.

5. Тоза кардани мизбоҳи моштарӣ: Барои тоза кардани мизбоҳи моштарӣ, шумо метавонед мизбоҳро аз ҷамъвати моштарӣ тоза кунед. Мизбоҳро бояд дар ҷои тоза ва хушбахт насб карда шаванд.

tgl.Qst: sino ang naglalaro ng hukom sa mabuting lugar
tgl.Rep: Ang mga hukom ay mga taong itinalaga o hinirang upang magpasya sa mga kaso at alitan sa isang lugar. Sila ay karaniwang binubuo ng mga abogado o mga taong may sapat na kaalaman sa batas at mayroong integridad at kredibilidad upang magpasya ng patas at makatarungang desisyon. Sa mabuting lugar, ang mga hukom ay maaaring kinabibilangan ng mga lokal na hukuman, mga korte ng katarungan, at iba pang mga ahensya ng gobyerno na may kapangyarihang magpasya sa mga legal na usapin.

yue.Qst: 扮演一個好地方嘅法官
yue.Rep: 作為一個好地方的法官，我會遵守法律和道德準則，公正無私地審理每一個案件。我會嚴格按照法律程序進行審判，確保每個人都有平等的機會為自己辯護。我會聆聽證人和被告人的陳述，仔細分析證據，做出公正的判決。同時，我也會保護受害人的權益，確保他們得到應有的補償和正義。最重要的是，我會以身作則，成為社區中的模範法官，為社會的和諧和穩定做出貢獻。
yue.Rep_En: As a good judge, I will abide by the rules of law and morality, adjudicate every case fairly and impartially, strictly follow the legal procedure for adjudication, ensure that everyone has an equal opportunity to defend themselves, listen to the testimony of witnesses and defendants, carefully analyze the evidence, make fair judgments, and at the same time protect the rights of victims, ensure that they receive compensation and justice.

bul.Qst: Къде са заснели "Клифовете на лудостта"?
bul.Rep: Филмът "Клифовете на лудостта" (One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest) е заснет в различни места в щатите Орегон и Калифорния. Голяма част от филма е заснета в психиатричната болница Орегон в Салем, Орегон. Други места, където са заснети някои от сцените, включват градовете Депо Бей, Нютънвил и Сейлъм в Орегон, както и Лос Анджелис в Калифорния.
bul.Rep_En: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest was filmed in various locations in Oregon and California, with much of the filming taking place at the Oregon Psychiatric Hospital in Salem, Oregon, and other locations where some of the scenes were filmed include Depot Bay, Newtownville, and Salem, Oregon, as well as Los Angeles, California.

cat.Qst: On van filmar els penya-segats de la bogeria?
cat.Rep:
Els penya-segats de la Bogeria es poden filmar des de diferents punts de vista, depenent de l'efecte que es vulgui aconseguir. Algunes opcions podrien ser:

1. Des de la platja: Si es vol capturar la grandesa dels penya-segats, es pot filmar des de la platja, així es podrà veure la seva alçada i la seva imponència.

2. Des de dalt dels penya-segats: Si es vol capturar la vista des del cim dels penya-segats, es pot filmar des de dalt, però això requereix una certa habilitat i equipament de seguretat.

3. Des de l'aire: Si es vol capturar una vista panoràmica dels penya-segats, es pot filmar des de l'aire amb un dron o un helicòpter.

En qualsevol cas, és important tenir en compte les condicions meteorològiques i de seguretat abans de filmar els penya-segats de la Bogeria.
cat.Rep_En:
The cliffs of the Bogeria can be filmed from different points of view, depending on the effect you want to achieve.
If you want to capture the greatness of the cliffs, you can film from the beach, so you can see their height and their grandeur.
If you want to capture the view from the top of the cliffs, you can film from above, but this requires a certain skill and safety equipment.
If you want to capture a panoramic view of the cliffs, you can film from the air with a drone or a helicopter.
In any case, it is important to take into account the weather and safety conditions before filming the cliffs of the Bogeria.

mkd.Qst: "Како се снима ""Клифовите на лудилото""?"
mkd.Rep:
"Клифовите на лудилото" е филм, който е сниман през 1975 година. За да се снима филмът, екипът е използвал различни техники и технологии за това време. 

За да се заснемат някои от сцените на филма, екипът е използвал хеликоптери, за да заснемат пейзажите на гората и планините. Също така, за да се заснемат някои от сцените на реката, екипът е използвал камери, монтирани на лодки.

За да се заснемат сцените в пещерата, екипът е използвал осветление и камери, които са били монтирани на стативи. Също така, за да се заснемат някои от сцените на филма, екипът е използвал специални ефекти, като например звукови ефекти и ефекти на камерата.

Всички тези техники и технологии са били използвани, за да се създаде реалистична и емоционална атмосфера във филма "Клифовите на лудилото".
mkd.Rep_En:
The Cliffs of Furnace is a film that was shot in 1975 to shoot the film, the team used different techniques and technologies for this time.
To shoot some of the scenes in the film, the crew used helicopters to capture the landscapes of the forest and the mountains, and to shoot some of the scenes on the river, the crew used cameras mounted on boats.
To shoot the scenes in the cave, the team used lighting and cameras, which were mounted on tripods. Also, to shoot some of the scenes in the film, the team used special effects, such as sound effects and camera effects.
All of these techniques and technologies were used to create a realistic and emotional atmosphere in the film "Cliffs of Madness".

tgl.Qst: Saan nila kinunan ang Cliffs of Madness?
tgl.Rep: Ang Cliffs of Madness ay isang fictional location sa pelikulang Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End. Hindi ito kinunan sa isang aktuwal na lugar dahil ito ay likha ng mga animator at production designers ng pelikula. Ang mga eksena sa Cliffs of Madness ay maaaring kinunan sa isang green screen studio kung saan ang mga aktor ay nakatayo sa harap ng isang malaking green screen at ang background ay idinagdag sa post-production gamit ang computer-generated imagery (CGI).
tgl.Rep_En: The film is based on the real-life Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End, a fictional world where the characters are trapped in a green screen studio with a computer-generated imagery (CGI) built into the background.
