lit.Qst: kur prasidėjo pramoninė revoliucija Jungtinėse Valstijose
lit.Rep: Pramoninė revoliucija Jungtinėse Valstijose prasidėjo apie 1760-1780 metus, kai pradėjo plisti mechanizacija ir gamybos procesų modernizacija. Tai buvo laikotarpis, kai buvo įdiegta daug naujovių, tokių kaip garo varikliai, mechaninės verpstės, transporto priemonės ir kt. Šios naujovės leido gamybos procesus automatizuoti ir padidinti gamybos efektyvumą. Tai taip pat leido gaminti daugiau prekių, kurios buvo pigesnės ir lengviau pasiekiamos vartotojams. Pramoninė revoliucija Jungtinėse Valstijose turėjo didelės įtakos ekonomikai, socialinei ir politinei raidai, ir padėjo sukurti modernią pramoninę visuomenę.
lit.Rep_En: The Industrial Revolution began in the United States around 1760 and the beginning of the Industrial Revolution in the 1780s, when mechanization and the modernization of manufacturing processes began to spread.This was a period in which many innovations were introduced, such as steam engines, mechanical sewing machines, vehicles, and so on.These innovations allowed manufacturing processes to be automated and increased efficiency.It also allowed consumers to produce more goods that were cheaper and easier to transport.

lvs.Qst: kur sākās rūpnieciskā revolūcija Amerikas Savienotajās Valstīs
lvs.Rep: Rūpnieciskā revolūcija Amerikas Savienotajās Valstīs sākās apmēram 18. gadsimta beigās un turpinājās līdz 19. gadsimta vidum. Tā sākās ar tekstilrūpniecības attīstību, kad tika izgudroti jauni ražošanas procesi, kas ļāva ražot audumus lielos apjomos. Tas noveda pie rūpniecības attīstības un fabriku izveides, kas izmantoja jaunās tehnoloģijas un ražošanas metodes. Šīs izmaiņas radīja jaunas darba vietas un veicināja ekonomikas izaugsmi Amerikas Savienotajās Valstīs.
lvs.Rep_En: The Industrial Revolution began in the late 18th century and continued into the mid-19th century with the development of textiles, which allowed the production of large quantities of textiles, and led to the development of factories that used new technologies and production methods.

mai.Qst: औद्योगिक क्रान्ति कहाँ शुरू भेल?
mai.Rep: औद्योगिक क्रान्ति ब्रिटेन में 18वीं शताब्दी में शुरू हुई थी। इसकी शुरुआत टेक्सटाइल उद्योग से हुई थी जिसे जेम्स हारग्रीव्स ने अपनी उद्यमिता से शुरू किया था। इसके बाद ब्रिटेन में धीरे-धीरे अन्य उद्योगों में भी औद्योगिक क्रान्ति देखी जाने लगी।
mai.Rep_En: The Industrial Revolution began in Britain in the 18th century, with the textile industry pioneered by James Hargreaves, and was gradually extended to other industries in Britain.

mal.Qst: അമേരിക്കയിലെ വ്യാവസായിക വിപ്ലവം ആരംഭിച്ചത് എവിടെ?
mal.Rep: അമേരിക്കയിലെ വ്യാവസായിക വിപ്ലവം 1765 മുതല്‍ ആരംഭിച്ചു. ഇത് ബ്രിട്ടീഷ് സാമ്രാജ്യത്തിന്റെ പിന്തുണയും കൂടിയാണ് ആരംഭിച്ചത്. ഇതിനുപിന്ന് അമേരിക്കയില്‍ പല വിപ്ലവങ്ങളും സംഭവിച്ചു, പ്രധാനമായി അമേരിക്കൻ സ്വാതന്ത്ര്യ സമരം (1775-1783) എന്നത് പേരില്‍ അറിയപ്പെടുന്നു.
mal.Rep_En: The American Industrial Revolution began in 1765 with the support of the British Empire. It was followed by many revolutions in the United States, most notably the American Revolution (1775-1783), also known as the American Revolution.

mar.Qst: औद्योगिक क्रांतीची सुरुवात अमेरिकेत कुठे झाली?
mar.Rep: औद्योगिक क्रांतीची सुरुवात अमेरिकेत न्यू इंग्लंड व न्यूयॉर्क या क्षेत्रातून झाली. 18 व्या शतकाच्या दरम्यान इंग्लंडमधील मानचेस्टर, लीड्स, बिर्मिंघम या शहरांमध्ये उत्पादन व्यवसाय सुरु झाला. नंतर अमेरिकेत न्यूयॉर्क, फिलाडेल्फिया, बाल्टीमोर, बोस्टन, पिट्सबर्ग, डेट्रॉइट, चिकागो या शहरांमध्ये उत्पादन व्यवसाय सुरु झाला.
mar.Rep_En: The Industrial Revolution began in the United States in New England and New York, with manufacturing operations in Manchester, Leeds, Birmingham, and Birmingham in England during the 18th century, followed by manufacturing operations in the United States in New York, Philadelphia, Baltimore, Boston, Pittsburgh, Detroit, and Chicago.

mkd.Qst: Каде започна индустриската револуција во САД?
mkd.Rep: Индустриската револуција во САД започна во Нова Англија, во североисточниот дел на земјата, во првата половина на 19 век. Оваа област била погодна за индустриската револуција поради својата богата текстилна традиција, наличноста на памук и високата концентрација на водени извори кои може да се искористат за работа на фабрики.
mkd.Rep_En: The Industrial Revolution began in New England in the first half of the 19th century, and was a time of great opportunity because of its rich textile tradition, the availability of cotton, and the high concentration of water sources that could be used to run factories.

mlt.Qst: Fejn bdiet ir-Rivoluzzjoni Industrijali fl-Istati Uniti?
mlt.Rep: Ir-Rivoluzzjoni Industrijali fl-Istati Uniti bdiet madwar l-ewwel nofs tal-qarn ta' l-ottocentu. Din kienet perjodu ta' trasformazzjoni ekonomika u soċjali li wasslet għal żieda kbira fil-produzzjoni industriali u ta' teknoloġiji ġodda. Il-produzzjoni ta' maħsubi u prodotti manifatturati bdiet tiżdied b'mod drastiku, u kien hemm żieda kbira fil-komunikazzjoni u l-mobilità. Dan kollu wassal għal żieda kbira fil-ħidma u l-impjiegi fil-fabbrikazzjoni u l-industrija, u kien hemm żieda kbira fil-populazzjoni urbana. Ir-Rivoluzzjoni Industrijali kienet l-ewwel pass kbir lejn l-ekonomija moderna u l-ħidma tal-ħaddiema.
mlt.Rep_En: The Industrial Revolution in the United States began in the mid-1800s as a period of economic and social transformation that led to a dramatic increase in industrial employment and new technologies.The Industrial Revolution was the first major step toward modern labor and the mobility of labor.

nld.Qst: Waar begon de industriële revolutie in de Verenigde Staten?
nld.Rep: De industriële revolutie begon in de Verenigde Staten in de late 18e eeuw en versnelde in de 19e eeuw. De eerste grote industrieën ontstonden in New England, met name in de textielindustrie. De stad Lowell in Massachusetts was een belangrijk centrum van textielproductie in de vroege jaren 1800. Andere belangrijke industrieën die zich ontwikkelden tijdens de industriële revolutie in de Verenigde Staten waren de staalindustrie, de spoorwegindustrie en de olie-industrie.
nld.Rep_En: The Industrial Revolution began in the late 18th century and accelerated in the 19th century, with the first major industries emerging in New England, particularly in the textile industry.The city of Lowell, Massachusetts, was a major center of textile production in the early 1800s.Other major industries that developed during the Industrial Revolution in the United States were the steel industry, the railroad industry, and the oil industry.

nno.Qst: kor begynte den industrielle revolusjonen i USA
nno.Rep: Den industrielle revolusjonen i USA begynte på midten av 1700-tallet og fortsatte gjennom hele 1800-tallet. Det var flere faktorer som bidro til denne revolusjonen, inkludert tilgangen til store mengder naturressurser, som kull og jern, samt en økning i befolkningen og urbaniseringen. Noen av de viktigste milepælene i den amerikanske industrielle revolusjonen inkluderer oppfinnelsen av dampmaskinen, utviklingen av tekstilindustrien og produksjonen av jernbaner og telegraf.
nno.Rep_En: The Industrial Revolution in the United States began in the mid-1700s and continued throughout the 1800s. Several factors contributed to this revolution, including the availability of large amounts of natural resources, such as coal and iron, as well as an increase in population and urbanization. Some of the most important milestones in the American Industrial Revolution include the invention of the steam engine, the development of the textile industry, and the production of railroads.

nob.Qst: hvor begynte den industrielle revolusjonen i USA
nob.Rep: Den industrielle revolusjonen i USA begynte på midten av 1700-tallet, men den virkelige veksten skjedde på midten av 1800-tallet. Det var spesielt i New England-området at den industrielle revolusjonen tok av, med tekstilindustrien som den ledende bransjen. Senere spredte den seg til andre deler av landet, og bidro til å transformere USA fra en primærnæringsbasert økonomi til en industrialisert økonomi.
nob.Rep_En: The Industrial Revolution in the United States began in the mid-1700s, but the real growth occurred in the mid-1800s.It was especially in the New England area that the Industrial Revolution took off, with the textile industry as the leading industry.Later it spread to other parts of the country, and helped transform the United States from a primary industry-based economy to an industrialized economy.

npi.Qst: संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिकामा औद्योगिक क्रान्ति कहाँ सुरु भयो?
npi.Rep: संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिकामा औद्योगिक क्रान्ति 18औं र 19 औं सदीमा सुरु भएको थियो। यो क्रान्ति बहुतै कारणहरूको परिणाम हो। उदाहरणको लागि, विद्युत ऊर्जा, जलवायु परिवर्तन, विज्ञान र प्रविधि विकास, वित्तीय विकास, व्यापार विकास, र नयाँ उत्पादन तथा विनिमय विधि आदि। यो क्रान्ति अमेरिकी इतिहासमा एक महत्वपूर्ण अध्याय हो।
npi.Rep_En: The Industrial Revolution in the United States began in the 18th and 19th centuries. The revolution was the result of many factors, such as electricity, climate change, scientific and technological advances, financial development, trade, and new methods of production and exchange.

pbt.Rep_En: The American Revolution was the first major economic event to take place in the Americas, and the first to be preceded by the Great Depression, the Great Depression, the Great Depression, the Great Depression, the Great Depression, the Great Depression, the Great Depression, the Great Depression, the Great Depression, the Great Depression, the Great Depression, the Great Depression, the Great Depression, the Great Depression, the Great Depression, the Great Depression, the Great Depression, the Great Depression.

pes.Qst: انقلاب صنعتی در ایالات متحده از کجا آغاز شد؟
pes.Rep: انقلاب صنعتی در ایالات متحده در دوره 1760 تا 1840 آغاز شد. این انقلاب با توسعه صنایع نساجی و پاره‌ای از صنایع دستی در شهرها آغاز شد و با توسعه صنایع فلزی، ماشینی و حمل و نقل رو به رشد شد. این انقلاب باعث تغییرات عمده‌ای در اقتصاد، فرهنگ و جامعه آمریکا شد و به عنوان یکی از مهمترین رویدادهای تاریخی در توسعه صنعت و تجارت جهان شناخته می‌شود.
pes.Rep_En: The Industrial Revolution began in the United States in the period from 1760 to 1840 with the development of textile and handicrafts in the cities and grew with the development of metalworking, machinery, and transportation.The revolution brought major changes to the economy, culture, and society of the United States and is recognized as one of the most important historical developments in world industry and commerce.

pol.Qst: Gdzie rozpoczęła się rewolucja przemysłowa w Stanach Zjednoczonych?
pol.Rep: Rewolucja przemysłowa w Stanach Zjednoczonych rozpoczęła się w XIX wieku w Nowej Anglii, a dokładniej w stanie Massachusetts. W tym regionie powstały pierwsze fabryki tekstylne, które wykorzystywały maszyny napędzane parą, co umożliwiło masową produkcję tkanin. Później rewolucja przemysłowa rozprzestrzeniła się na inne regiony kraju, w tym na północno-wschodnie stany, jak i na południowe stany, gdzie rozwijała się przemysł bawełniany.
pol.Rep_En: The Industrial Revolution began in the 19th century in New England, and more specifically in Massachusetts, where the first textile factories were built, using steam-powered machines to mass-produce textiles.

por.Qst: Onde começou a revolução industrial nos Estados Unidos?
por.Rep: A Revolução Industrial nos Estados Unidos começou na região da Nova Inglaterra, no final do século XVIII e início do século XIX. A região era rica em recursos naturais, como madeira, água e minerais, e tinha uma população crescente de imigrantes e trabalhadores locais. As primeiras indústrias foram têxteis, mas logo se expandiram para outras áreas, como a produção de máquinas, ferrovias e produtos químicos. A Revolução Industrial nos Estados Unidos teve um impacto significativo na economia e na sociedade do país, transformando-o de uma nação agrícola em uma potência industrial.
por.Rep_En: The Industrial Revolution began in the New England region in the late 18th and early 19th centuries, rich in natural resources such as timber, water, and minerals, and with a growing population of immigrants and local workers.The first industries were textiles, but soon expanded to other areas such as the production of machinery, railroads, and chemicals.

ron.Qst: Unde a început revoluţia industrială în Statele Unite?
ron.Rep: Revoluția industrială în Statele Unite a început în jurul anilor 1760 și a continuat până în anii 1840. Această perioadă a fost marcată de o creștere semnificativă a producției industriale, dezvoltarea tehnologiei și a mașinilor, precum și de o creștere a urbanizării și a migrației către orașe. Unele dintre cele mai importante invenții și inovații care au contribuit la revoluția industrială în Statele Unite includ mașina cu aburi, telegraful, locomotiva și fabricile de producție în masă.
ron.Rep_En: The Industrial Revolution in the United States began around 1760 and continued until the 1840s, marked by a significant increase in industrial production, the development of technology and machinery, and an increase in urbanization and migration to cities.Some of the most important inventions and innovations that contributed to the Industrial Revolution in the United States include the steam engine, the telegraph, the locomotive, and the mass production plant.

rus.Qst: Где началась промышленная революция в Соединенных Штатах?
rus.Rep: Промышленная революция в Соединенных Штатах началась в Новой Англии, регионе на северо-востоке страны, в середине 19 века. Этот регион был богат ресурсами, такими как дерево, уголь и вода, которые были необходимы для развития промышленности. Кроме того, Новая Англия имела развитую торговую сеть и доступ к международным рынкам, что способствовало развитию экономики и индустрии.
rus.Rep_En: The Industrial Revolution in the United States began in New England, a region in the northeast of the country, in the mid-19th century, a region rich in resources such as timber, coal, and water, which were essential to the development of industry.

slk.Qst: kde začala priemyselná revolúcia v Spojených štátoch
slk.Rep: Priemyselná revolúcia v Spojených štátoch začala v 18. a 19. storočí. Začiatok sa datuje do obdobia po americkom občianskej vojne, keď sa krajina začala rýchlo industrializovať. V tomto období sa začali používať nové technológie a stroje, ktoré umožnili výrobu tovarov v oveľa väčšom množstve a rýchlosti. Výroba sa presunula z domácej dielne do tovární, kde sa využívali parné stroje a iné nové technológie. Tento proces sa začal v oblasti textilného priemyslu a postupne sa rozšíril do ďalších odvetví, ako sú strojárstvo, hutníctvo a ťažba uhlia.
slk.Rep_En: The Industrial Revolution began in the late 18th and early 19th centuries, when the United States began rapid industrialization and the use of new technology and machinery enabled the production of goods at much higher quantities and speeds, moving from home workshops to factories using steam engines and other new technologies.

slv.Qst: kje se je začela industrijska revolucija v Združenih državah?
slv.Rep: Industrijska revolucija se je začela v Združenih državah v drugi polovici 18. stoletja, vendar se je najbolj razvila v 19. stoletju. Prva industrijska revolucija se je začela v Angliji in se je nato razširila po Evropi in Združenih državah. V Združenih državah so se najprej razvile tekstilne tovarne, nato pa so se razvile tudi tovarne za proizvodnjo železa, jekla, strojev in drugih izdelkov. Največji razcvet industrijske revolucije v Združenih državah je bil v drugi polovici 19. stoletja.
slv.Rep_En: The Industrial Revolution began in the United States in the second half of the 18th century, but developed most in the 19th century.The first industrial revolution began in England and then spread to Europe and the United States.In the United States, textile factories first developed, followed by factories for the production of iron, steel, machinery and other products.The Industrial Revolution flourished most in the United States in the second half of the 19th century.

spa.Qst: ¿Dónde comenzó la revolución industrial en los Estados Unidos?
spa.Rep: La Revolución Industrial en los Estados Unidos comenzó en la región de Nueva Inglaterra a finales del siglo XVIII y principios del siglo XIX. La región tenía una gran cantidad de recursos naturales, como agua, madera y minerales, que se utilizaron para impulsar la industrialización. Además, la región tenía una gran cantidad de trabajadores calificados y una infraestructura de transporte bien desarrollada, lo que permitió la rápida expansión de la industria manufacturera.
spa.Rep_En: The Industrial Revolution in the United States began in the New England region in the late 18th and early 19th centuries, the region had a wealth of natural resources, such as water, timber, and minerals, which were used to drive industrialization.

srp.Qst: где је индустријска револуција у Сједињеним Државама почела
srp.Rep: Индустријска револуција у Сједињеним Државама је почела у Новој Англији, на источној обали Сједињених Држава, у другој половини 18. вијека. Овај регион је био погодан за развој индустрије због својих природних ресурса, као што су вода, дрва и руде, као и због своје географске позиције која је омогућила лакшу трговину са Европом.
srp.Rep_En: The Industrial Revolution began in New England, on the east coast of the United States, in the second half of the 18th century, a region that was favorable for industrial development because of its natural resources, such as water, timber, and ore, as well as its geographical position that made it easier to trade with Europe.

swe.Qst: var började den industriella revolutionen i USA
swe.Rep: Den industriella revolutionen i USA började på 1700-talet och fortsatte fram till början av 1900-talet. Det var en period av snabb industrialisering och teknologisk utveckling som förändrade landets ekonomi och samhälle. De första stora industriella framstegen skedde inom textilindustrin i New England på 1790-talet, och sedan spred sig industrialiseringen till andra sektorer som järn- och stålindustrin, transportsektorn och oljeindustrin.
swe.Rep_En: The Industrial Revolution began in the 17th century and continued into the early 20th century, a period of rapid industrialization and technological development that transformed the country's economy and society.The first major industrial advances occurred in the textile industry in New England in the 1790s, and then the industrialization spread to other sectors such as iron and steel, transportation, and oil.

swh.Qst: Mapinduzi ya Viwanda yalianza wapi nchini Marekani?
swh.Rep: Mapinduzi ya Viwanda yalianza nchini Marekani katika karne ya 18 na karne ya 19. Hii ilikuwa wakati wa mageuzi makubwa katika teknolojia ya uzalishaji, ambayo ilisababisha mabadiliko makubwa katika uchumi wa Marekani. Mapinduzi ya Viwanda yalianza katika maeneo ya mashariki mwa Marekani, kama vile New England, ambapo kulikuwa na rasilimali nyingi za asili na nguvu kazi ya kutosha. Baadaye, mapinduzi haya yalitokea katika maeneo mengine ya Marekani, kama vile Midwest na Magharibi.
swh.Rep_En: The Industrial Revolution began in the United States in the 18th and 19th centuries, during a period of dramatic change in manufacturing technology that dramatically altered the American economy.The Industrial Revolution began in the eastern United States, such as New England, where there were abundant natural resources and sufficient labor.Later, it spread to other parts of the United States, such as the Midwest and the West.

tel.Qst: యునైటెడ్ స్టేట్స్ లో పారిశ్రామిక విప్లవం ఎక్కడ ప్రారంభమైంది?
tel.Rep: పారిశ్రామిక విప్లవం యునైటెడ్ స్టేట్స్ లో 1930 లో ప్రారంభమైంది. ఇది దేశంలో ప్రభుత్వ పక్షం మరియు పారిశ్రామిక కమ్యూనిస్ట్ పక్షం వల్ల జరిగింది. ఇది ప్రభుత్వ పక్షం మరియు పారిశ్రామిక కమ్యూనిస్ట్ పక్షం వల్ల జరిగింది. ఇది ప్రభుత్వ పక్షం మరియు పారిశ్రామిక కమ్యూనిస్ట్ పక్షం వల్ల జరిగింది. ఇది ప్రభుత్వ పక్షం మరియు పారిశ్రామిక కమ్యూనిస్ట్ పక్షం వల్ల జరిగింది. ఇది ప్రభుత్వ పక్షం మరియు పారిశ్రామిక కమ్యూనిస్ట్ పక్షం వల్ల జరిగింది.
tel.Rep_En: The Industrial Revolution began in the United States in the 1930s, and was driven by the government and industrial communism.

tgk.Qst: Инқилоби саноатӣ дар Иёлоти Муттаҳида аз куҷо оғоз ёфт?
tgk.Rep: Инқилоби саноатӣ дар Иёлоти Муттаҳида дар соли 1920 оғоз ёфт. Баъд аз ин инқилоб، саноати Иёлоти Муттаҳида сӯруд шуд ва ба замони ҳозир метавонад ба як аз баландтарин саноатҳои дунё муносиб гардиши худро ба даст мегирад.
tgk.Rep_En: The Industrial Revolution in the United States began in the 1920s, and after that revolution, the United States industry exploded, and by now it could be one of the highest-growing industries in the world.

tgl.Qst: saan nagsimula ang rebolusyon sa industriya sa Estados Unidos
tgl.Rep: Ang rebolusyon sa industriya sa Estados Unidos ay nagsimula noong mga taong 1760 hanggang 1840. Ito ay tinatawag na "First Industrial Revolution" at nagsimula sa New England region ng bansa. Ang mga pangunahing sektor ng industriya na nagbago ay ang textile, transportation, at manufacturing. Ang mga teknolohiyang tulad ng power loom, spinning jenny, at steam engine ay nagbigay ng mas mabilis at mas epektibong paraan ng paggawa ng mga produkto. Ito rin ang naging daan upang magkaroon ng mas malawak na merkado at mas mataas na produksyon ng mga produkto.
tgl.Rep_En: The Industrial Revolution (c.1760-1840) was a period of change in the United States that began in the New England region of the United States in the late 19th century.The industrial revolution involved the use of machinery, machinery, and machinery to produce goods.The industrial revolution was a time of rapid change.

tha.Qst: การปฏิวัติอุตสาหกรรมในสหรัฐอเมริกาเริ่มต้นที่ไหน?
tha.Rep: การปฏิวัติอุตสาหกรรมในสหรัฐอเมริกาเริ่มต้นในช่วงปลายของศตวรรษที่ 18 และต้นศตวรรษที่ 19 โดยเฉพาะในภาคเหนือของประเทศ ซึ่งเป็นพื้นที่ที่มีแหล่งพลังงานจากน้ำและไม้ป่าที่เหมาะสมสำหรับการผลิตผ้า การประกอบอุตสาหกรรมผ้าเป็นอุตสาหกรรมหลักในช่วงนั้น และเป็นต้นแบบของการพัฒนาอุตสาหกรรมในสหรัฐอเมริกา ในช่วงต่อมา การประกอบอุตสาหกรรมเหล็กและเครื่องจักรเริ่มเป็นที่นิยมมากขึ้น โดยเฉพาะในภาคตะวันออกของประเทศ ซึ่งเป็นพื้นที่ที่มีแหล่งเหล็กและถ่านหินอย่างมาก การประกอบอุตสาหกรรมเหล็กและเครื่องจักรเป็นอุตสาหกรรมที่สำคัญในการพัฒนาเศรษฐกิจของสหรัฐอเมริกาในช่วงต่อมา.
tha.Rep_En: The Industrial Revolution began in the late 18th and early 19th centuries in the northern United States, where the textile industry was a major source of energy and the textile industry was the main industry.In the United States, the steel and machinery industries became increasingly popular, especially in the eastern United States, which was rich in iron and coal.

tur.Qst: Amerika Birleşik Devletleri'ndeki endüstriyel devrim nerede başladı?
tur.Rep: Amerika Birleşik Devletleri'ndeki endüstriyel devrim, 18. yüzyılın sonlarında İngiltere'deki endüstriyel devrimden etkilenerek, 1790'larda New England bölgesinde başladı. Bu bölge, su gücüne dayalı fabrikaların kurulması için uygun koşullara sahipti ve tekstil üretimi, bu bölgedeki ilk endüstriyel faaliyetlerden biriydi. Daha sonra, 19. yüzyıl boyunca, demiryolu, telegraf, telefon ve elektrik gibi teknolojik gelişmelerin de etkisiyle, endüstriyel üretim diğer bölgelere de yayıldı.
tur.Rep_En: The Industrial Revolution in the United States began in the late 18th century in New England, where water-powered factories were established and textile production was one of the first industries to take off.Later, throughout the 19th century, technological advances such as the railroad, telegraph, telephone, and electricity spread industrial production to other regions.

ukr.Qst: де почалася промислова революція в Сполучених Штатах
ukr.Rep: Промислова революція в Сполучених Штатах почалася в кінці 18 століття, коли було винайдено парову машину та інші технології, що дозволяли виробляти товари швидше та ефективніше. Перші фабрики з'явилися в Новій Англії, де було багато річок, що забезпечували енергію для роботи машин. Протягом наступних десятиліть промисловість розширювалася по всій країні, зокрема в містах, таких як Нью-Йорк, Чикаго та Піттсбург. Промислова революція в США була ключовим фактором у формуванні сучасної економіки та суспільства країни.
ukr.Rep_En: The Industrial Revolution began in the late 18th century with the invention of the steam engine and other technologies that made it possible to produce goods faster and more efficiently.The first factories appeared in New England, where there were many rivers that provided the energy for machinery.Over the next few decades, industry expanded across the country, particularly in cities such as New York, Chicago, and Pittsburgh.

urd.Qst: امریکہ میں صنعتی انقلاب کا آغاز کہاں سے ہوا؟
urd.Rep: امریکہ میں صنعتی انقلاب کا آغاز 18ویں صدی کے آخری دہائی میں شروع ہوا۔ یہ انقلاب برطانیہ سے آئے مستعملہ آلات، تجارتی سمان اور تجارتی تعاملات کی وجہ سے شروع ہوا۔ امریکہ میں صنعتی انقلاب کے دوران، بزرگ ترین تبدیلیاں کوٹن کی کارخانوں، آہار کی کارخانوں، جرثومہ کشی کے ذریعہ بنائی گئی دوائیوں کی تیاری، اور ریلوے کے ذریعہ سامان کی حرکت کے ذریعہ لوگوں کی زندگیوں میں دستخطی تبدیلیوں کے ذریعہ دیکھی جا سکتی ہیں۔
urd.Rep_En: The Industrial Revolution began in the late 18th century in the United States, with the introduction of machinery, trade, and commerce from Britain.The greatest changes in American life were brought about by cotton mills, the manufacture of fertilizers, the manufacture of pesticides, and the railroad.

vie.Qst: cuộc cách mạng công nghiệp ở Hoa Kỳ bắt đầu ở đâu
vie.Rep: Cuộc cách mạng công nghiệp ở Hoa Kỳ bắt đầu vào khoảng giữa thế kỷ 18 và đầu thế kỷ 19. Nó bắt đầu tại khu vực Bắc Đông của Hoa Kỳ, nơi các nhà máy bắt đầu sử dụng máy móc để sản xuất hàng hóa. Các ngành công nghiệp đầu tiên bao gồm ngành dệt, ngành giấy và ngành chế biến thực phẩm. Các thành tựu của cuộc cách mạng công nghiệp đã thúc đẩy sự phát triển của nền kinh tế Hoa Kỳ và đã đưa nước này trở thành một trong những nền kinh tế lớn nhất thế giới.
vie.Rep_En: The Industrial Revolution began in the mid-18th century in the northeastern United States, where factories began using machinery to produce goods.The first industries included textiles, paper, and food processing.The achievements of the Industrial Revolution propelled the U.S. economy and made it one of the largest in the world.

yue.Qst: 美國嘅工業革命喺邊度開始呢?
yue.Rep: 美國的工業革命大約始於18世紀末和19世紀初期，主要集中在東北部的紐英崙地區，特別是在紐約市、波士頓、費城和巴爾的摩等城市。這個時期，美國的工業生產從手工製造轉向機器製造，並且出現了許多新的發明和技術，例如紡織機、蒸汽機、鐵路和電報等。這些技術的發展促進了美國的經濟增長和城市化進程。
yue.Rep_En: The industrial revolution in the United States began in the late 18th and early 19th centuries, mainly in the New England region of the northeast, especially in cities such as New York City, Boston, and Baltimore. During this period, many new inventions and technologies emerged, such as the steam engine, the steam engine, the railroad, and the telegraph.

zlm.Qst: Di mana Revolusi Industri di Amerika Syarikat bermula?
zlm.Rep: Revolusi Industri di Amerika Syarikat bermula pada awal abad ke-19 di New England, khususnya di wilayah Northeastern United States. Wilayah ini memiliki sumber daya alam yang melimpah, seperti air terjun dan sungai yang dapat digunakan untuk menggerakkan mesin-mesin industri. Selain itu, wilayah ini juga memiliki tenaga kerja yang terampil dan terdidik, serta akses yang baik ke pasar dan pelabuhan untuk ekspor barang-barang produksi. Inilah yang membuat New England menjadi pusat Revolusi Industri di Amerika Syarikat pada masa itu.
zlm.Rep_En: The Industrial Revolution began in the early 19th century in New England, particularly in the northeastern United States, where natural resources abounded, such as waterfalls and rivers that could be used to power industrial machinery.The region also had skilled and educated labor, as well as good access to markets and ports for exporting manufactured goods.

eng.Qst: when was the first picture of earth called earthrise taken
eng.Rep: The first picture of Earth called "Earthrise" was taken on December 24, 1968, by astronaut William Anders during the Apollo 8 mission.

afr.Qst: Die eerste foto van die aarde, Earthrise, is geneem.
afr.Rep: Ja, die eerste foto van die aarde, Earthrise, is geneem op 24 Desember 1968 deur die Apollo 8 bemanning terwyl hulle in die maanbaan was. Dit was 'n baie belangrike oomblik in die geskiedenis van die mensheid, omdat dit die eerste keer was dat ons 'n foto van die aarde vanuit die ruimte kon sien. Dit het ons bewus gemaak van die kwesbaarheid van ons planeet en die noodsaaklikheid om dit te beskerm.
afr.Rep_En: The first photograph of the Earth, Earthrise, was taken on December 24, 1968, by the Apollo 8 crew while in lunar orbit, and it was a very important moment in human history because it was the first time we could see a picture of the Earth from space.

arb.Qst: متى تم التقاط أول صورة للأرض تسمى Earthrise؟
arb.Rep: تم التقاط أول صورة للأرض تسمى Earthrise في 24 ديسمبر 1968 خلال رحلة الفضاء أبولو 8. وقد التقطت الصورة من قبل رائد الفضاء وليام أندرسون.
arb.Rep_En: The first image of Earth, called Earthrise, was taken on December 24, 1968, during the Apollo 8 space flight by astronaut William Anderson.

ary.Qst: وقتاش اتخذت أول صورة للأرض تسمى "Earthrise"
ary.Rep: تم التقاط أول صورة للأرض تسمى "Earthrise" في 24 ديسمبر 1968 خلال رحلة الفضاء أبولو 8. وقد التقطت الصورة من قبل رائد الفضاء وليام أندرسون أثناء مرور المركبة الفضائية فوق القمر. وكانت هذه الصورة هي أول صورة تظهر الأرض بالكامل من الفضاء الخارجي.
ary.Rep_En: The first image of Earth, called Earthrise, was taken on December 24, 1968, during the Apollo 8 mission.The image was taken by astronaut William S. Anderson as the spacecraft passed over the Moon.This was the first image to show the Earth entirely from outer space.

arz.Qst: امتى اتخدت أول صورة للأرض بتتسمى ارترايس
arz.Rep: تم التقاط أول صورة للأرض بواسطة القمر الصناعي "ارترايس" في عام 1960. وقد تم تسمية هذه الصورة باسم القمر الصناعي الذي التقطها، وهي تعتبر أول صورة للأرض بالكامل.
arz.Rep_En: The first image of the Earth was taken by the Artrais satellite in 1960. The image was named after the satellite that captured it, and is considered the first image of the entire Earth.

asm.Qst: পৃথিৱীৰ প্ৰথম ছবি 'আৰ্থ্ৰাইজ' কেতিয়া তোলা হৈছিল?
asm.Rep: আৰ্থ্ৰাইজ নামটো পৃথিবীৰ প্ৰথম ছবি নহয়। পৃথিবীৰ প্ৰথম ছবি তোলা হৈছিল বছৰ ১৮৩৯ চনত ফ্ৰেঞ্চ ফটোগ্ৰাফা লুই ডাগেৰেটাইপ দ্বারা। এই ছবিটো পেট্ৰোলিয়াম কম্পানী বিপিএ আয়ারলেণ্ড এবং জর্জ এয়াটন দ্বারা তোলা হৈছিল।
asm.Rep_En: The first photograph of the Earth was taken in 1839 by the French photographer Louis Daguerreotype, taken by the petroleum company BPA Ireland and George Ayrton.

bel.Qst: Калі быў зроблены першы здымак Зямлі пад назвай Зямля ўздыму
bel.Rep: Першы здымак Зямлі зроблены з космасу пад назвай "Зямля ўздыму" быў зроблены 24 снежня 1968 года астронавтамі з экіпажу Апало-8: Фрэнк Борман, Джэймс Лавэл і Уильям Андэрс. Здымак быў зроблены з вышыні 380 000 км над паверхняй Зямлі. Гэты здымак стаў першым здымкам, на якім была паказана ўся Зямля ўздыму.
bel.Rep_En: The first image of the Earth from space was taken on December 24, 1968, by the astronauts of Apollo 8 - Frank Borman, James Lovell and William Anders - from an altitude of 380,000 km above the Earth's surface.

ben.Qst: পৃথিবীর প্রথম ছবি 'আর্ট্রাইস' কবে তোলা হয়?
ben.Rep: পৃথিবীর প্রথম ছবি তোলা হয় ১৯৬৯ সালে আপোলো ১ মিশনের সময় একটি ক্যামেরা দিয়ে। এই ছবি তৈরি করেছিলেন নাসা বিজ্ঞানী ও ফটোগ্রাফার ওয়ারেন এবং এটি পৃথিবীর উত্তর গোলার্ধের একটি অংশ দেখায়।
ben.Rep_En: The first photograph of Earth was taken in 1969 by a camera during the Apollo 1 mission.The image was taken by NASA scientist and photographer Warren and shows a portion of the Earth's northern hemisphere.

bos.Qst: Kada je snimljena prva slika Zemlje pod nazivom Earthrise?
bos.Rep: Prva slika Zemlje pod nazivom Earthrise snimljena je 24. prosinca 1968. godine tijekom misije Apollo 8.
bos.Rep_En: The first image of Earth, called Earthrise, was taken on December 24, 1968, during the Apollo 8 mission.

bul.Qst: кога е направена първата снимка на Земята, наречена "Земно изгреение"
bul.Rep: Първата снимка на Земята, наречена "Земно изгреение", е направена на 24 декември 1968 г. от екипажа на американския космически кораб Аполо 8 по време на техния мисионен полет към Луната.
bul.Rep_En: The first photograph of Earth, called "Earth Rising," was taken on December 24, 1968, by the crew of the American spacecraft Apollo 8 during their mission to the Moon.

cat.Qst: Quan es va fer la primera foto de la Terra anomenada Earthrise?
cat.Rep: La primera foto de la Terra anomenada Earthrise va ser presa el 24 de desembre de 1968 durant la missió Apollo 8 de la NASA.
cat.Rep_En: The first photograph of Earth, called Earthrise, was taken on December 24, 1968, during NASA's Apollo 8 mission.

ceb.Qst: "Ang unang litrato sa yuta nga gitawag nga ""Earthrise"" gihimo sa usa ka tuig."
ceb.Rep: Ang impormasyon nga gihatag nimo dili sakto. Ang unang litrato sa yuta nga gitawag nga "Earthrise" gihimo sa Disyembre 24, 1968 sa usa ka misyon sa Apollo 8 sa National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA). Ang litrato nagpakita sa yuta nga nagtindog sa ibabaw sa bulan ug nagpakita sa kahulogan sa pag-amuma sa atong planeta.
ceb.Rep_En: The first photograph of the Earth, called "Earthrise," was taken on December 24, 1968, by the Apollo 8 mission of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA), showing the Earth standing on the surface of the Moon and showing the significance of our planet's ecology.

ces.Qst: Kdy byl pořízen první obrázek Země nazvaný Earthrise?
ces.Rep: První obrázek Země nazvaný Earthrise byl pořízen během mise Apollo 8 v roce 1968. Konkrétně byl pořízen 24. prosince 1968 astronauty Williamem Andersem, Jimem Lovellem a Frankem Bormanem, kteří byli prvními lidmi, kteří se dostali na oběžnou dráhu kolem Měsíce.
ces.Rep_En: The first image of Earth, called Earth-Earth, was taken during the Apollo 8 mission in 1968 by astronauts William J. Anders, Jim Lovell, and Frank Borman, who were the first people to orbit the moon.

ckb.Qst: یەکەم وێنەی زەوی کە بە ناوی (Earthrise) گیرا،
ckb.Rep: من ناتوانم وێنەی زەوی بە ناوی Earthrise بنێرم، چونکە من یەکەمین وێنەی زەوی نییم. لەگەڵ ئەمەوە، دەتوانیت وێنەی Earthrise لە گوگڵ بگەڕێیت و بینردەوە.
ckb.Rep_En: I can't upload an image of the Earth called Earthrise, because I'm not the first Earth image. With this, you can Google the image of Earthrise and see it.

cmn.Qst: 当第一个地球的照片叫做Earthrise拍摄时
cmn.Rep: 第一个地球的照片叫做Earthrise，是在1968年12月24日阿波罗8号任务期间拍摄的。它是由宇航员威廉·安德斯在月球轨道上拍摄的，这是人类历史上第一次从太空中拍摄到地球的照片。这张照片成为了一个标志性的图像，展示了地球的美丽和脆弱性，也激发了人们对环境保护的关注。
cmn.Rep_En: The first photograph of Earth, called Earthrise, was taken during the Apollo 8 mission on December 24, 1968, by astronaut William S. Anderson in orbit around the moon, and it was the first time in human history that a photograph of Earth from space was taken.

cmn_Hant.Qst: 地球的第一張叫做Earthrise的照片是在何時拍攝的
cmn_Hant.Rep: 地球的第一张叫做Earthrise的照片是在1968年12月24日拍摄的，由阿波罗8号宇航员威廉·安德斯在月球轨道上拍摄。这张照片展示了地球的半球在月球表面的背景下升起，成为了人类历史上最具象征意义的照片之一。
cmn_Hant.Rep_En: The first photograph of the Earth, called Earthrise, was taken on December 24, 1968, by Apollo 8 astronaut William Anders in lunar orbit, showing the Earth's hemisphere rising against the background of the lunar surface, making it one of the most iconic photographs in human history.

cym.Qst: Pan gafodd y llun cyntaf o'r Ddaear ei dynnu?
cym.Rep: Mae'r llun cyntaf o'r Ddaear wedi'i dynnu gan y cerddor a'r artist o'r Almaen, Hans Holbein yng nghanol y bedwaredd ganrif ar bymtheg. Mae'r llun yn dangos y Ddaear fel sfera enfawr sy'n gorwedd ar ddau lygad, sy'n cynrychioli'r Haul a'r Lleuad. Mae'r llun wedi'i dynnu yn ddu ar gefndir gwyn, ac mae'r Ddaear yn cael ei ddangos fel cylch mawr sy'n cael ei chynrychioli fel y lleoliad canolog. Mae'r llun yn dangos hefyd y sêr a'r planedau sy'n cyd-fynd â'r Ddaear yn y system haul.
cym.Rep_En: The first known photograph of the Earth was taken by the German artist Hans Holbein in the mid-19th century, depicting the Earth as a giant sphere resting on two poles, representing the Sun and the Moon.The image is drawn in black on a white background, and the Earth is depicted as a large circle representing its central location.

dan.Qst: Hvornår blev det første billede af jorden kaldet earthrise taget?
dan.Rep: Det første billede af jorden, kendt som "Earthrise", blev taget den 24. december 1968 af astronauterne William Anders, Frank Borman og Jim Lovell under Apollo 8-missionen. Billedet blev taget mens de var i kredsløb omkring månen.
dan.Rep_En: The first image of Earth, known as Earthrise, was taken on December 24, 1968, by astronauts William Anders, Frank Borman and Jim Lovell during the Apollo 8 mission.

deu.Qst: wann wurde das erste Bild der Erde namens Earthrise aufgenommen
deu.Rep: Das erste Bild der Erde namens Earthrise wurde am 24. Dezember 1968 von der Besatzung der Apollo 8-Mission aufgenommen.
deu.Rep_En: The first image of Earth, called Earthrise, was taken on December 24, 1968, by the crew of the Apollo 8 mission.

ell.Qst: Πότε τραβήχτηκε η πρώτη φωτογραφία της Γης που ονομάζεται Earthrise;
ell.Rep: Η πρώτη φωτογραφία της Γης που ονομάζεται Earthrise τραβήχτηκε στις 24 Δεκεμβρίου 1968 από τον αστροναύτη William Anders κατά τη διάρκεια της αποστολής Apollo 8 της NASA.
ell.Rep_En: The first photograph of Earth, called Earthrise, was taken on December 24, 1968, by astronaut William Anders during NASA's Apollo 8 mission.

est.Qst: millal tehti esimene pilt Maast, mida kutsuti Earthrise'iks
est.Rep: Esimese pildi Maast, mida kutsuti Earthrise'iks, tegi astronaut William Anders Apollo 8 missiooni ajal 24. detsembril 1968. Pilt kujutab Maad, mis tõuseb horisondi tagant üles Kuul asuvate astronautide vaateväljas ning on üks tuntumaid kosmosefotograafia ajaloos.
est.Rep_En: The first image of the moon, called Earthrise, was taken by astronaut William Anders on December 24, 1968, during the Apollo 8 mission.The image depicts Earth rising above the horizon in the view of astronauts on the moon and is one of the most famous photographs in the history of space.

fin.Rep: Ensimmäinen "Earthrise" -niminen kuva otettiin Apollo 8 -lennon aikana 24. joulukuuta 1968. Kyseessä oli ensimmäinen kerta, kun ihminen näki Maan kokonaisuudessaan avaruudesta käsin.
fin.Rep_En: The first image of Earth was taken by Apollo 8 on December 24, 1968, and it was the first time that the Earth was seen from space.

fra.Qst: Quand a été prise la première photo de la terre appelée Earthrise?
fra.Rep: La première photo de la Terre appelée Earthrise a été prise le 24 décembre 1968 par l'équipage de la mission Apollo 8 de la NASA.
fra.Rep_En: The first photograph of Earth, called Earthrise, was taken on December 24, 1968, by the crew of NASA's Apollo 8 mission.

glg.Qst: "A primeira fotografía da Terra chamada ""Earthrise"" foi tomada en 1968."
glg.Rep: Sim, a primeira fotografia da Terra vista do espaço, conhecida como "Earthrise", foi tirada em 1968 pela tripulação da missão Apollo 8 da NASA. A imagem icônica mostra a Terra surgindo acima da superfície lunar e se tornou um símbolo da fragilidade e beleza do nosso planeta.
glg.Rep_En: The first photograph of the Earth from space, known as Earthrise, was taken in 1968 by the crew of NASA's Apollo 8 mission.The iconic image shows the Earth rising above the lunar surface and became a symbol of the fragility and beauty of our planet.

guj.Qst: પૃથ્વીની પ્રથમ તસવીર ક્યારે લેવામાં આવી હતી?
guj.Rep: પૃથ્વીની પ્રથમ તસવીર કરી શકાય તેની તારીખો પર ખાસ સમજૂતી નથી. પરંતુ પ્રાચીન સમયમાં માનવી પાસે પાંચ પ્રકારની તસવીરો બનાવવાની કળા હતી જે હથિયારો પર ચિત્રો બનાવવાની સાધનો ઉપયોગ કરતા હતા. તેથી પૃથ્વીની પ્રથમ તસવીર ક્યારે લેવામાં આવી હતી તે ખાસ રીતે જાણીતી નથી.
guj.Rep_En: There is no definitive record of when the first photographs of the earth were taken, but it is known that humans had five different techniques for making photographs, using tools such as a weapon, so it is not known exactly when the first photographs of the earth were taken.

heb.Qst: מתי צולמה התמונה הראשונה של כדור הארץ שנקראת "Earthrise"?
heb.Rep: התמונה הראשונה של כדור הארץ שנקראת "Earthrise" צולמה ב-24 בדצמבר 1968 על ידי אחד מחברי צוות המשימה אפולו 8 שנמצא על הירח.
heb.Rep_En: The first image of Earth, called "Earthrise", was taken on December 24, 1968, by a member of the Apollo 8 mission crew on the Moon.

hin.Qst: पृथ्वी की पहली तस्वीर कब ली गई थी जिसे पृथ्वी उगना कहा जाता है
hin.Rep: पृथ्वी की पहली तस्वीर 1968 में अपोलो 8 मिशन के दौरान ली गई थी। इस तस्वीर को "पृथ्वी उगना" कहा जाता है।
hin.Rep_En: The first photograph of Earth was taken in 1968 during the Apollo 8 mission, and it is called "Earth Rising."

hrv.Qst: Kada je snimljena prva slika Zemlje pod nazivom Earthrise?
hrv.Rep: Prva slika Zemlje pod nazivom Earthrise snimljena je 24. prosinca 1968. godine tijekom misije Apollo 8.
hrv.Rep_En: The first image of Earth, called Earthrise, was taken on December 24, 1968, during the Apollo 8 mission.

hun.Qst: Mikor készült az első kép a Földről, amit Földfelkelésnek hívnak?
hun.Rep: Az első Földfelkelésnek nevezett kép 1968. december 24-én készült az Apollo 8 űrhajó fedélzetéről, amikor az űrhajósok először látták a Földet a Hold körüli pályán. A kép azóta ikonikus lett, és az emberiségnek az űrben való felfedezésének egyik legfontosabb pillanatát jelenti.
hun.Rep_En: The first image of the eclipse was taken on December 24, 1968, from the Apollo 8 spacecraft, when the astronauts first saw the Earth orbiting the Moon.The image has since become iconic and represents one of the most important moments in humanity's exploration of space.

hye.Qst: Երկրի առաջին լուսանկարը, որը կոչվում է Earthrise, նկարվել է
hye.Rep: 1968 թվականին, Ապոլլոն 8 միսիայի ընթացքում: Այն նկարն է, որը առաջարկվել է երկրի մուտքի կողմից մուտք գործող ամերիկյան աստղադիտարանի միջոցով: Այն առաջին անգամ նկարվել է երկրի մուտքի կողմից մուտք գործող մարդկանց կողմից: Այն նկարն է, որը ցույց է տվել երկրի մուտքի կողմից մուտք գործող մարդկանց կողմից:
hye.Rep_En: The Apollo 8 mission in 1968 was the first time that a satellite had been photographed by humans entering the Earth's atmosphere.

ind.Qst: kapan gambar pertama bumi yang disebut earthrise diambil
ind.Rep: Gambar pertama Bumi yang disebut Earthrise diambil pada tanggal 24 Desember 1968 oleh astronaut William Anders selama misi Apollo 8. Gambar tersebut diambil saat pesawat Apollo 8 sedang mengorbit bulan dan menunjukkan Bumi yang terbit di atas cakrawala bulan. Gambar tersebut menjadi salah satu gambar paling terkenal dalam sejarah eksplorasi luar angkasa dan menjadi simbol penting dari kesadaran akan keindahan dan kerapuhan planet kita.
ind.Rep_En: The first image of Earth, called Earthrise, was taken on December 24, 1968, by astronaut William Anders during the Apollo 8 mission, and it shows Earth rising above the lunar horizon, becoming one of the most famous images in the history of space exploration and an important symbol of our planet's beauty and fragility.

isl.Qst: "Þegar var fyrsta myndin af jörðinni, sem kallast ""Earthrise,"" tekin?"
isl.Rep: Fyrsta myndin af jörðinni sem kallast "Earthrise" var tekin af Apollo 8 árið 1968. Þetta var fyrsta skotið sem sýndi jörðina sem heild, sem var mikilvægur stundum í sögu mannkyns.
isl.Rep_En: The first image of the Earth called "Earthrise" was taken by Apollo 8 in 1968. This was the first shot to show the Earth as a whole, which was sometimes important in human history.

ita.Qst: quando fu scattata la prima foto della terra chiamata earthrise
ita.Rep: La prima foto della Terra chiamata "Earthrise" fu scattata il 24 dicembre 1968 durante la missione Apollo 8 della NASA. La foto fu scattata dall'astronauta William Anders mentre l'equipaggio orbitava intorno alla Luna. La foto è diventata un'icona della storia della fotografia e dell'esplorazione spaziale.
ita.Rep_En: The first photo of Earth, called "Earthrise," was taken on December 24, 1968, during NASA's Apollo 8 mission, by astronaut William Anders as the crew orbited the moon, and has become an icon of the history of photography and space exploration.

jav.Qst: "Piranti iki uga dikenal kanthi jeneng ""Earthrise"" (Pangetikan Bumi)."
jav.Rep: "Piranti iki dikenal uga minangka Earthrise (Pemandangan Bumi) karena menehi pandangan pertama manusia tentang Bumi saka luar angkasa nalika misi Apollo 8 ing taun 1968."
jav.Rep_En: "This device is also known as the Earthrise (Earth View) because it gave man's first view of the Earth from space during the Apollo 8 mission in 1968."

jpn.Qst: 地球の写真Earthriseはいつ撮られたのか? - 地球の写真
jpn.Rep: Earthriseの写真は、アポロ8号のミッション中に1968年12月24日に撮影されました。アポロ8号は、アメリカ航空宇宙局（NASA）によって打ち上げられた最初の有人宇宙船で、月の周りを周回することを目的としていました。このミッション中に、アポロ8号のクルーは、地球の出現を目撃し、その瞬間を写真に収めました。この写真は、地球の環境保護運動の象徴として、また、人類が地球上で生きることの重要性を示すものとして、広く知られています。
jpn.Rep_En: The Earthrise photograph was taken on December 24, 1968, during the Apollo 8 mission, the first manned spacecraft launched by the U.S. National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) to orbit the Moon. During this mission, the Apollo 8 crew witnessed and photographed the moment of the Earth's appearance. This photograph is widely known as a symbol of the Earth's environmental movement and as an indication of the importance of human life on Earth.

kan.Qst: "ಈ ಚಿತ್ರವು ""ಎರ್ತ್ ರೈಸ್"" ಎಂಬ ಹೆಸರಿನ ಭೂಮಿಯ ಮೊದಲ ಚಿತ್ರಣವನ್ನು ತೆಗೆದುಕೊಂಡಿತು."
kan.Rep: ಧನ್ಯವಾದಗಳು! ನಿಮ್ಮ ವಿವರಣೆ ಸೂಕ್ತವಾಗಿದೆ.
kan.Rep_En: Thank you! Your description is appropriate.

kat.Qst: "როდის გადაიღეს დედამიწის პირველი ფოტო, სახელწოდებით ""Earthrise""?"
kat.Rep: დედამიწის პირველი ფოტო, სახელწოდებით "Earthrise", გადაიღეს 1968 წლის დეკემბრის 24-ს დასახელებას მიიღოს ასტრონომი ბილი ორინისის მიერ გამოყენებული კამერით, რომელიც იყო აპოლო 8-ის მიერ მიღებული.
kat.Rep_En: The first photograph of Earth, called Earthrise, was taken on December 24, 1968, by the camera used by astronomer Bill Orrin, who was on Apollo 8.

khm.Qst: រូបថត ដំបូង របស់ ផែនដី ដែល គេ ហៅ ថា Earthrise ត្រូវ បាន ថត នៅ ពេល ណា?
khm.Rep: រូបថត Earthrise ត្រូវបានថតនៅឆ្នាំ ១៩៦៨ ដែលបានចេញពីផ្ទៃក្រឡាចនៃផែនដីដែលបានទាញយកដោយម៉ាក ១១ នៅលើវេសកករកម្ពុជាក្រោមកម្ពស់។ វាបានថតដោយអេកូអារីកំពុងធ្វើការបង្ហាញពីការទទួលបានការប្រើប្រាស់ផ្ទៃក្រឡាចនៃផែនដីដែលបានបង្ហាញជាមួយនឹងភាពស្រស់ស្អាតនៃភាពប្រើប្រាស់បច្ចេកទេសរបស់មន្តដែលកើតឡើងក្នុងសន្តិភាពបច្ចុប្បន្ន។
khm.Rep_En: The image was taken in 1968 from the Earth's crust, taken by the Mars 11 spacecraft on the C-1B rover, and was taken by Ericsson, who is working on a demonstration of the Earth's crust's utilization, along with the beauty of the technology used in modern space exploration.

kir.Qst: "Жердин биринчи сүрөтү ""Earthrise"" деп аталган."
kir.Rep: Бул сүрөт "Аполлон-8" космонавттары тарабынан 1968-жылдын 24-дүйнө күнү жердүн орбитасында чектелген учурда жакшы көрүнүштөрдүн бирине жетиштирип көрүнүшүн көрсөтөт.
kir.Rep_En: This image shows one of the best views of Apollo 8 on Earth's orbit on Earth Day 24, 1968.

kor.Qst: 지구의 첫 번째 사진인 'Earthrise'는 언제 찍혔습니까?
kor.Rep: 'Earthrise'는 1968년 12월 24일 아폴로 8호 미션 중에 찍혔습니다.
kor.Rep_En: The first Earth-bound mission was on December 24, 1968, during the Apollo 8 mission.

lao.Qst: ຮູບພາບ ທໍາ ອິດຂອງໂລກທີ່ເອີ້ນວ່າ Earthrise ຖືກຖ່າຍເມື່ອໃດ?
lao.Rep: ຮູບພາບທໍາອິດຂອງໂລກ Earthrise ຖືກຖ່າຍເມື່ອໃດໜ້ອຍກວ່າ 50 ປີກ່ອນ, ໃນວັນທີ 24 ມີນາທີ 1968 ທີ່ຜູ້ບັນຊີສະໜາມ NASA ສະເພາະສ້າງຮູບພາບນີ້ໃຫ້ຜູ້ທີ່ເອີ້ນວ່າ Earthrise ທີ່ຢູ່ໃນໂລກທີ່ຖືກຕັດສິນສຸດໃນຊຸດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ໃນຊຸດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມີຄວາມສາມາດຕິດຕັ້ງໄດ້ສູງສຸດຂອງອາກາດຕະຫຼາດທີ່ມ lao.Rep_En: The first ever satellite image of Earth was taken in 1968 by NASA astronaut John C. Marshall, who was the first to capture the image of the Earth's magnetic field, which is the highest temperature ever recorded in the universe.

lit.Qst: Kada buvo nufotografuota pirmoji Žemės nuotrauka, vadinama Žemės išėjimo nuotrauka?
lit.Rep: Pirmoji Žemės išėjimo nuotrauka buvo nufotografuota 1968 metais gruodžio 24 dieną Apollo 8 misijos metu. Tai buvo pirmoji kartą, kai žmonės pamačiau savo planetą iš kosmoso.
lit.Rep_En: The first image of the Earth's orbit was taken on December 24, 1968, during the Apollo 8 mission, and it was the first time humans had seen their planet from space.

lvs.Qst: kad tika uzņemta pirmā Zemes attēla, ko sauca par Zemes uzcelšanos
lvs.Rep: Pirmā Zemes attēla uzņemšana, ko sauca par "Zemes uzcelšanos" notika 1968. gadā, kad NASA Apollo 8 misijas laikā astronauti uzņēma attēlu no Zemes, kas bija redzams no Mēness. Šis attēls kļuva par slavenāko Zemes attēlu, kas parāda mūsu planētu kā mazu zilu punktu tukšumā.
lvs.Rep_En: The first image of Earth was taken in 1968 during NASA's Apollo 8 mission, when astronauts took a picture of Earth visible from the Moon, which became the most famous image of Earth ever taken, showing our planet as a tiny blue dot in space.

mai.Qst: पृथ्वीक पहिल तस्वीर कखन लेल गेल छल?
mai.Rep: मानव इतिहास के अनुसार, पृथ्वी की पहली तस्वीर 1839 में फ्रांसीसी वैज्ञानिक लुई डगेर ने ली थी। उन्होंने एक सिल्वर नाइट्रेट धातु को एक तरल निर्देशिका के साथ मिश्रित कर दिया था जिससे एक तस्वीर बनती थी। यह तकनीक फोटोग्राफी के लिए आधुनिक आधार बन गई थी।
mai.Rep_En: The first photograph of the Earth was taken by Louis Daguerre in 1839, when he mixed a silver nitrate with a liquid to form a photograph, which became the basis for modern photography.

mal.Qst: എർത്ത്റൈസ് എന്ന പേരിൽ ഭൂമിയിലെ ആദ്യത്തെ ചിത്രം എടുത്തത് എപ്പോഴാണ്?
mal.Rep: എർത്ത്റൈസ് എന്ന പേരിൽ ഭൂമിയിലെ ആദ്യത്തെ ചിത്രം എടുത്തത് 1972 ജൂൺ 10 ന് അമേരിക്കൻ ഉപഗ്രഹം ലാന്ഡ് സാറ്റ് 1 നടത്തിയ മിഷൻ പിന്തുടരുന്നതാണ്.
mal.Rep_En: The first image of Earth, called Earthrise, was taken on June 10, 1972, following a mission by the American satellite Landsat 1.

mar.Qst: पृथ्वीचा पहिला फोटो 'आर्थराइज' कधी काढला गेला?
mar.Rep:
पृथ्वीचा पहिला फोटो १९६६ मध्ये आर्थर एडम्स यांनी खालील लिंकवर टेक्नोलॉजी रिव्यु मासिकात दाखविलेल्या फोटोमध्ये काढला आहे: 

https://www.technologyreview.com/s/608812/the-story-of-the-first-ever-photo-of-earth-from-space/
mar.Rep_En:
The first photograph of the Earth was taken by Arthur Adams in 1966 in a photo featured in Technology Review magazine at the following link:
This is the story of the first ever photo of the earth from space.

mkd.Qst: "Кога беше направена првата слика на Земјата наречена ""Earthrise""?"
mkd.Rep: Првата слика на Земјата наречена "Earthrise" беше направена на 24 декември 1968 година од астронавтите на Аполо 8 мисијата, Франк Борман, Уилијам Андерс и Джим Ловел.
mkd.Rep_En: The first image of Earth called Earthrise was taken on December 24, 1968, by the astronauts of the Apollo 8 mission, Frank Borman, William Anders, and Jim Lovell.

mlt.Qst: Meta ttieħdet l-ewwel ritratt tad-dinja?
mlt.Rep: Il-ewwel ritratt tad-dinja huwa l-iskultura preistorika tal-"Venus of Willendorf" li nstab f'Willendorf, Austria. Din l-iskultura hija datata madwar is-sena 28,000 BCE u hija magħrufa għall-forma ġeneruża tagħha u l-fatt li mhijiex rappreżentata b'xi dettalji ta' wħud mill-partijiet tal-ġisem.
mlt.Rep_En: The first known photograph of the Venus of Willendorf is a prehistoric sculpture from the city of Willendorf, Austria, dating from around 28,000 BC, and is known for its generous shape and the fact that it does not depict some of the details of the human body.

nld.Qst: Wanneer werd de eerste foto van de aarde genaamd earthrise genomen?
nld.Rep: De eerste foto van de aarde genaamd "Earthrise" werd genomen op 24 december 1968 tijdens de Apollo 8-missie.
nld.Rep_En: The first photograph of Earth, called "Earthrise," was taken on December 24, 1968, during the Apollo 8 mission.

nno.Qst: Når ble det første bildet av jorden som vart kalt earthrise tatt?
nno.Rep: Det første bildet av jorden som ble kalt "Earthrise" ble tatt av astronauten William Anders under Apollo 8-misjonen den 24. desember 1968. Bildet viser jorden som stiger opp over horisonten av månen og ble et ikonisk symbol på menneskehetens utforskning av verdensrommet.
nno.Rep_En: The first image of the Earth, called "Earthrise", was taken by astronaut William Anders during the Apollo 8 mission on December 24, 1968. The image shows the Earth rising above the horizon of the Moon and became an iconic symbol of humanity's exploration of space.

nob.Qst: når ble det første bildet av jorden kalt earthrise tatt
nob.Rep: Det første bildet av jorden kalt "Earthrise" ble tatt av astronauten William Anders under Apollo 8-misjonen den 24. desember 1968.
nob.Rep_En: The first image of the Earth, called Earthrise, was taken by astronaut William Anders during the Apollo 8 mission on December 24, 1968.

npi.Qst: पृथ्वीको पहिलो तस्बिर 'आर्थराइज' कहिले खिचिएको थियो?
npi.Rep: पृथ्वीको पहिलो तस्बिर 'आर्थराइज' जुलाई १९६९ मा अपोलो ११ अनुभव गर्ने अमेरिकी अंतरिक्ष यात्री नील आर्मस्ट्राङ्गले खिचिएको थियो।
npi.Rep_En: The first image of the Earth, Earthrise, was taken by American astronaut Neil Armstrong during the Apollo 11 experience in July 1969.

pbt.Qst: د ځمکې د لومړۍ انځور انځور د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د ځمکې د
pbt.Rep: I'm sorry, I don't understand what you're trying to say. Can you please rephrase or provide more context?

pes.Qst: اولین عکس از زمین به نام Earthrise چه زمانی گرفته شد؟
pes.Rep: اولین عکس از زمین به نام Earthrise در تاریخ ۲۴ دسامبر ۱۹۶۸ توسط خلبانان مأموریت آپولو ۸ گرفته شد.
pes.Rep_En: The first image of Earth, called Earthrise, was taken on December 24, 1968, by the pilots of the Apollo 8 mission.

pol.Qst: Kiedy zrobiono pierwsze zdjęcie Ziemi o nazwie Earthrise?
pol.Rep: Pierwsze zdjęcie Ziemi o nazwie Earthrise zostało zrobione 24 grudnia 1968 roku przez astronautów misji Apollo 8, którzy byli na orbicie Księżyca.
pol.Rep_En: The first photograph of Earth, called Earthrise, was taken on December 24, 1968, by the Apollo 8 astronauts who were in orbit around the moon.

por.Qst: quando foi tirada a primeira foto da Terra chamada Earthrise
por.Rep: A primeira foto da Terra chamada Earthrise foi tirada em 24 de dezembro de 1968, durante a missão Apollo 8 da NASA. A foto foi tirada pelo astronauta William Anders enquanto a nave estava orbitando a Lua. A imagem icônica mostrou a Terra surgindo acima do horizonte lunar e se tornou um símbolo da fragilidade e beleza do nosso planeta.
por.Rep_En: The first photograph of Earth, called Earthrise, was taken on December 24, 1968, during NASA's Apollo 8 mission, by astronaut William Anders while the spacecraft was orbiting the moon.The iconic image showed Earth rising above the lunar horizon and became a symbol of our planet's fragility and beauty.

ron.Qst: Când a fost făcută prima fotografie a Pământului numită Earthrise?
ron.Rep: Prima fotografie a Pământului numită Earthrise a fost făcută pe 24 decembrie 1968 de către astronautul William Anders în timpul misiunii Apollo 8. Fotografia a fost realizată în timp ce nava spațială se afla în orbită lunară și a devenit una dintre cele mai cunoscute și influente imagini din istoria fotografiei.
ron.Rep_En: The first photograph of Earth, called Earthrise, was taken on December 24, 1968, by astronaut William Anders during the Apollo 8 mission.The photograph was taken while the spacecraft was in lunar orbit and became one of the most famous and influential images in the history of photography.

rus.Qst: когда была сделана первая фотография Земли под названием " Земной восход "
rus.Rep: Первая фотография Земли под названием "Земной восход" была сделана 24 декабря 1968 года во время миссии "Аполлон 8".
rus.Rep_En: The first photograph of Earth, called "Earth Rising," was taken on December 24, 1968, during the Apollo 8 mission.

slk.Qst: kedy bol urobený prvý obrázok Zeme nazývaný Earthrise
slk.Rep: Prvý obrázok Zeme nazývaný Earthrise bol urobený 24. decembra 1968 počas letu Apolla 8. Astronauti William Anders, Frank Borman a Jim Lovell boli prví ľudia, ktorí videli Zem z diaľky a zachytili ju na fotografii. Tento moment bol veľmi dôležitý pre výskum vesmíru a pre naše porozumenie nášmu miestu v kozme.
slk.Rep_En: The first image of Earth, called Earthrise, was taken on December 24, 1968, during the Apollo 8 mission.Astronauts William Anders, Frank Borman, and Jim Lovell were the first people to see Earth from a distance and capture it in a photograph.This moment was very important for space exploration and for our understanding of our place in the cosmos.

slv.Qst: kdaj je bila posneta prva slika Zemlje, imenovana Earthrise
slv.Rep: Prva slika Zemlje, imenovana Earthrise, je bila posneta 24. decembra 1968 med misijo Apollo 8, ko so trije astronavti prvič poleteli okoli Lune. Slika je bila posneta s kamero na krovu vesoljskega plovila in prikazuje Zemljo, ki se dviga nad obzorjem Lune. Ta slika je postala simbol za zaščito okolja in poudarja krhkost našega planeta.
slv.Rep_En: The first image of Earth, called Earthrise, was taken on December 24, 1968, during the Apollo 8 mission, when three astronauts flew around the Moon for the first time.The image was taken with a camera on board the spacecraft and shows the Earth rising above the lunar horizon.

spa.Qst: ¿Cuándo se tomó la primera foto de la Tierra llamada Earthrise?
spa.Rep: La primera foto de la Tierra llamada Earthrise fue tomada el 24 de diciembre de 1968 por la tripulación del Apolo 8, la primera misión tripulada que orbitó la Luna. La foto fue tomada por el astronauta William Anders desde la ventana de la nave espacial y muestra la Tierra emergiendo sobre el horizonte lunar. La imagen se convirtió en un icono de la exploración espacial y se considera una de las fotografías más influyentes de la historia.
spa.Rep_En: The first photo of Earth called Earthrise was taken on December 24, 1968 by the crew of Apollo 8, the first manned mission to orbit the Moon.The photo was taken by astronaut William Anders from the window of the spacecraft and shows the Earth emerging over the lunar horizon.The image became an icon of space exploration and is considered one of the most influential photographs in history.

srp.Qst: када је направљена прва слика Земље под називом Земљоизлазак
srp.Rep: Прва слика Zemljinoizlazak (Earthrise) napravljena je 24. decembra 1968. godine tokom misije Apollo 8, kada su astronauti William Anders, Frank Borman i Jim Lovell bili u orbiti oko Meseca.
srp.Rep_En: The first image of Earth's orbit was taken on December 24, 1968, during the Apollo 8 mission, when astronauts William Anders, Frank Borman, and Jim Lovell were in orbit around the Moon.

swe.Qst: när togs den första bilden av jorden som kallas earthrise
swe.Rep: Den första bilden av jorden som kallas Earthrise togs den 24 december 1968 av astronauten William Anders under Apollo 8-missionen. Bilden togs när rymdfarkosten var på väg runt månen och visar jorden som en blå och vit klot mot en svart bakgrund med månens yta i förgrunden. Earthrise-bilden anses vara en av de mest ikoniska bilderna i rymdforskningens historia.
swe.Rep_En: The first image of Earth, called Earthrise, was taken on December 24, 1968, by astronaut William Anders during the Apollo 8 mission, when the spacecraft was orbiting the moon, and shows the Earth as a blue and white sphere against a black background with the moon's surface in the foreground.

swh.Qst: Picha ya kwanza ya dunia iliyoitwa Earthrise ilichukuliwa lini?
swh.Rep: Picha ya kwanza ya dunia iliyopigwa kutoka angani na kuitwa Earthrise ilichukuliwa na wanaanga wa chombo cha Apollo 8, Frank Borman, Jim Lovell, na William Anders, mnamo tarehe 24 Desemba 1968. Picha hiyo ilipigwa wakati chombo hicho kilikuwa kinaelekea kwenye mzunguko wa mwezi. Picha hiyo ilikuwa ya kihistoria kwa sababu ilikuwa mara ya kwanza watu kuona dunia yao kutoka mbali hivyo.
swh.Rep_En: The first aerial view of the Earth, called Earthrise, was taken by astronauts Frank Borman, Jim Lovell, and William Anders on December 24, 1968, as the spacecraft was orbiting the moon, and it was historic because it was the first time humans had seen their planet from that distance.

tel.Qst: "ఈ చిత్రం ""ఎర్త్ రైజ్"" అని పిలువబడే మొదటి భూమి యొక్క చిత్రాన్ని తీసుకుంది."
tel.Rep: సరే, మీరు చెప్పిన చిత్రం "ఎర్త్ రైజ్" అని పిలువబడే మొదటి భూమి యొక్క చిత్రం అని తెలుపుతుంది. మీరు చెప్పిన వివరాలు సరేనా ఉన్నాయి. మరిన్ని సహాయం కావాలంటే పదాలు చెప్పండి.
tel.Rep_En: The first thing you need to know is that the Earth is the center of the universe, and the first thing you need to know is that the Earth is the center of the universe, and the first thing you need to know is that the Earth is the center of the universe.

tgk.Qst: кай аввалин тасвири Замин бо номи Earthrise гирифта шуд
tgk.Rep: تصویر Earthrise، که به عنوان اولین تصویری از زمین از فضا شناخته می‌شود، در دوران مأموریت Apollo 8 در سال ۱۹۶۸ توسط خلبانان آن مأموریت گرفته شد. این تصویر نشان دهنده ظاهری است که زمین به عنوان یک سیاره زیبا و آبی در فضا دارد.
tgk.Rep_En: Earthrise, known as the first image from Earth in space, was taken during the Apollo 8 mission in 1968 by its pilots. This image shows that Earth is a beautiful, blue planet in space.

tgl.Qst: "Ang unang larawan ng lupa na tinatawag na ""Earthrise"" ay kinuha noong"
tgl.Rep: Ang unang larawan ng lupa na tinatawag na "Earthrise" ay kinuha noong Disyembre 24, 1968, ng Apollo 8 mission ng NASA.
tgl.Rep_En: The first image of Earth, called "Earthrise," was taken on December 24, 1968, by NASA's Apollo 8 mission.

tha.Qst: เมื่อรูปแรกของโลกที่เรียกว่า Earthrise ถูกถ่าย
tha.Rep: รูป Earthrise ถูกถ่ายครั้งแรกโดยอัปโหลดอวกาศแห่งสหรัฐอเมริกา (NASA) ในวันที่ 24 ธันวาคม ค.ศ. 1968 โดยอัปโหลดชื่อ William Anders จากยานอวกาศอพอลโล 8 ที่กำลังเดินทางไปยังดวงจันทร์ รูปภาพนี้เป็นภาพที่แสดงโลกเป็นวงกลมเล็กๆ ที่เกิดขึ้นจากมุมมองของอวกาศ และเป็นภาพที่เปลี่ยนแปลงวิวัฒนาการของมนุษย์ในการมองโลกและอวกาศในปัจจุบัน
tha.Rep_En: The first image of Earth taken by NASA on December 24, 1968 by William Anderson of the Apollo 8 spacecraft was a small, circular image of the Earth from a space telescope that changed the way humans view the world and space.

tur.Qst: Earthrise adında Dünya'nın ilk resmi ne zaman çekildi?
tur.Rep: Dünya'nın ilk resmi olarak bilinen "Earthrise" fotoğrafı, Apollo 8 uzay aracının mürettebatı tarafından 24 Aralık 1968'de çekildi. Bu fotoğraf, Ay'ın yüzeyinden yükselirken Dünya'nın yarısının yükseldiği bir anı yakalıyor ve insanlık için unutulmaz bir anı olarak tarihe geçti.
tur.Rep_En: The first official image of the moon was taken by the crew of the Apollo 8 spacecraft on December 24, 1968, and it captures the moment when half of the moon was rising from the moon.

ukr.Qst: Коли було зроблено перше зображення Землі під назвою "Земля встає"?
ukr.Rep: Перше зображення Землі під назвою "Земля встає" було зроблено 24 грудня 1968 року під час місії "Аполлон-8" астронавтами Френком Борманом, Джимом Ловеллом та Вільямом Андерсом. Знімок був зроблений з вікна космічного корабля на відстані близько 380 000 кілометрів від Землі. Це було перше зображення Землі, на якому було видно її повну кругову форму та було зроблено з космосу.
ukr.Rep_En: The first image of Earth, called Earth Rising, was taken on December 24, 1968, during the Apollo 8 mission by astronauts Frank Borman, Jim Lovell, and William Anders from a window of a spacecraft about 380,000 kilometers from Earth.

urd.Qst: "اس نے زمین کی پہلی تصویر ""Earthrise"" کو بھی دیکھا۔"
urd.Rep: معذرت ، میں آپ کی زبان نہیں بولتا۔ کیا آپ انگریزی میں بتا سکتے ہیں کہ آپ کیا کہنا چاہتے ہیں؟
urd.Rep_En: Sorry, I don't speak your language. Can you tell me in English what you want to say?

vie.Qst: khi nào bức ảnh đầu tiên của trái đất được gọi là earthrise được chụp
vie.Rep: Bức ảnh đầu tiên của Trái Đất được gọi là Earthrise được chụp vào ngày 24 tháng 12 năm 1968 bởi phi hành đoàn của tàu vũ trụ Apollo 8 trong chuyến bay đầu tiên của con người vòng quanh Mặt Trăng. Bức ảnh này đã trở thành biểu tượng của sự hiểu biết và tình yêu thương đối với Trái Đất và đã có một ảnh hưởng lớn đến phong trào bảo vệ môi trường.
vie.Rep_En: The first photograph of the Earth, known as the Earthrise, was taken on December 24, 1968, by the crew of the Apollo 8 spacecraft on the first manned flight around the moon, and has become a symbol of understanding and compassion for the Earth and has had a major impact on the environmental movement.

yue.Qst: 地球嘅第一張叫做"地球升起"嘅相係幾時拍攝嘅
yue.Rep: "地球升起"是由美國宇航局（NASA）於1968年12月24日拍攝的。當時，阿波羅8號太空船上的三名宇航員在月球軌道上拍攝了這張經典的照片。
yue.Rep_En: "Earth Rising" was taken by NASA on December 24, 1968, when three astronauts on the Apollo 8 spacecraft took this classic photo on the lunar orbit.

zlm.Qst: bila gambar pertama bumi yang disebut earthrise diambil
zlm.Rep: Gambar pertama Bumi yang disebut Earthrise diambil pada tanggal 24 Desember 1968 oleh astronaut William Anders selama misi Apollo 8. Gambar tersebut diambil saat pesawat Apollo 8 sedang mengorbit bulan dan menunjukkan Bumi yang terbit di atas cakrawala bulan. Gambar tersebut menjadi salah satu gambar paling terkenal dalam sejarah eksplorasi luar angkasa dan menjadi simbol penting dari keindahan dan kerapuhan planet kita.
zlm.Rep_En: The first image of Earth, called Earthrise, was taken on December 24, 1968, by astronaut William Anders during the Apollo 8 mission, and it shows Earth rising above the lunar horizon, becoming one of the most famous images in the history of space exploration and an important symbol of the beauty and fragility of our planet.

eng.Qst: when does trick or treat start and end
eng.Rep: Trick or treating usually starts around dusk or early evening and ends around 8 or 9 pm, depending on the neighborhood and local regulations. However, it's always a good idea to check with your local community or city government for specific guidelines and recommendations.

afr.Qst: Wanneer begin en eindig trick or treat?
afr.Rep: Trick or treat begint meestal in de late namiddag of vroege avond op 31 oktober en eindigt rond 21.00 uur. Het is echter belangrijk om de lokale regels en voorschriften te controleren, omdat sommige gemeenschappen specifieke tijden hebben vastgesteld voor trick or treat-activiteiten.
afr.Rep_En: Trick or treat usually starts in the late afternoon or early evening of 31 October and ends around 21:00, but it is important to check the local rules and regulations, as some communities have set specific times for trick or treat activities.

asm.Qst: ট্ৰিট বা ট্ৰিট কেতিয়া আৰম্ভ হয় আৰু শেষ হয়?
asm.Rep:
ট্ৰিট বা ট্ৰিট কেতিয়া হ'ল একটি প্ৰক্ৰিয়া যেখানে একটি পণ্য বা সেবা বিনিময়ে দেওয়া হয় এবং এটি শেষ হয় যখন পণ্য বা সেবা প্ৰদান কৰা হয়। এই প্ৰক্ৰিয়াটো ব্যবহাৰ কৰে ব্যবসাসমূহ কাষ্ঠকালৰ গ্ৰাহকসকলক আকৰ্ষণ কৰি তাদেৰ বিক্ৰয় বাৰ্তা বাঢ়াই আৰু লভ্যাংশ বাঢ়াই কৰে। 

ট্ৰিট বা ট্ৰিট কেতিয়া শেষ হয় যখন পণ্য বা সেবা প্ৰদান কৰা হয় এবং গ্ৰাহকসকলে তাদেৰ পছন্দ অনুযায়ী সন্তুষ্টি প্ৰকাশ কৰে। এই প্ৰক্ৰিয়াটো ব্যবহাৰ কৰি ব্যবসাসমূহ তাদেৰ গ্ৰাহকসকলক আকৰ্ষণ কৰি তাদেৰ বিক্ৰয় বাৰ্তা বাঢ়াই আৰু লভ্যাংশ বাঢ়াই কৰে।
asm.Rep_En:
A treat is a process where a product or service is exchanged and it ends when the product or service is provided. This process is used by businesses to attract customers over time by increasing their sales message and increasing their profits.
Treatment is when the product or service is provided and customers express satisfaction with the product or service. This process is used by businesses to attract customers to the product or service by increasing the sales message and increasing profits.

bel.Qst: калі ж пачынаецца і заканчваецца Trick or treat?
bel.Rep: Trick or treat - гэта традыцыйная фраза, якую кажуць дзеці ў дзень Halloween, калі ходзяць па домах і просяць салодасці. Гэта пачынаецца звычайна ўвечары 31 кастрычніка і заканчваецца да паўночы.

ben.Qst: কখন ট্রিক বা চিকিত্সা শুরু এবং শেষ হয়

উদাহরণস্বরূপ, আপনি একটি কম্পিউটার সমস্যার সমাধান করতে চান। আপনি প্রথমে সমস্যাটি চিন্তা করবেন এবং তারপরে সমাধান খুঁজবেন। একবার সমাধান পাওয়া হলে, আপনি আর কোনও পদক্ষেপ নেন না এবং সমস্যাটি শেষ হয়ে যায়।

For example, you want to solve a computer problem. You will think about the problem first and then find a solution. Once the solution is found, you take no further action and the problem is over.

bos.Qst: Kada počinje i završava trik ili tretman?
bos.Rep: Početak i kraj trika ili tretmana ovise o vrsti trika ili tretmana koji se izvodi. Na primjer, ako je u pitanju trik sa kartama, početak bi bio kada se karte izvuku iz špila, a kraj bi bio kada se otkrije posljednja karta ili kada se trik završi na drugi način. Ako je u pitanju tretman u kozmetičkom salonu, početak bi bio kada klijent sjedne u stolicu, a kraj bi bio kada se tretman završi i klijent napusti salon. U svakom slučaju, početak i kraj trebaju biti jasno definirani kako bi se osigurala učinkovitost i uspješnost trika ili tretmana.
bos.Rep_En: The beginning and end of a trick or treatment depend on the type of trick or treatment being performed. For example, if it is a card trick, the beginning would be when the cards are drawn from the deck, and the end would be when the last card is revealed or when the treatment ends in another way. If it is a trick or treatment in a beauty salon, the beginning would be when the client sits in a chair and the end would be when the client leaves the salon.

glg.Qst: Cando comeza e remata o truco ou o trato?
glg.Rep: O "Truco ou Trato" é uma tradição popular que é celebrada na noite de Halloween, que é no dia 31 de outubro. Geralmente, começa ao anoitecer e termina por volta da meia-noite. As crianças se fantasiam e vão de porta em porta pedindo doces, dizendo a frase "Trick or Treat" (Truque ou Trato). Se a pessoa que atende a porta dá doces, as crianças agradecem e vão para a próxima casa. Se a pessoa se recusa a dar doces, as crianças podem fazer uma brincadeira ou travessura.
glg.Rep_En: The "Trick or Treat" tradition is a popular tradition that begins at midnight on Halloween night, usually ending around midnight, where children go from door to door asking for sweets, saying "Trick or treat" or "Trick or treat" if the person at the door gives them sweets, the children thank them and go to the next house.
