Usually, the beginning of a trick or treasure is when players or characters start searching or trying to achieve something, and the end of a trick or treasure is when they succeed in obtaining or reaching the desired goal.

hye.Qst: Երբ է սկսվում եւ ավարտվում Trick or Treat- ը:
hye.Rep: Trick or Treat-ը սկսվում է հոկտեմբերի 31-ին եւ ավարտվում է նոյեմբերի 1-ին:
hye.Rep_En: Trick or Treat starts on October 31 and ends on November 1.

ind.Qst: kapan trik atau memperlakukan mulai dan berakhir
ind.Rep: Saya membutuhkan informasi tambahan untuk dapat memberikan jawaban yang tepat. Mohon jelaskan lebih detail mengenai konteks atau topik yang Anda maksud. Terima kasih.
ind.Rep_En: I need additional information to be able to give a proper answer. Please explain in more detail the context or topic you are referring to. Thank you.

isl.Qst: Hvenær byrjar og endar gjafir eða gjafir?
isl.Rep: Gjafir eru yfirleitt gefnar á sérstökum tímum, eins og afmæli, hátíðum eða jafnvel til að fagna sérstökum atburðum. Byrjun og endir gjafaferlisins eru yfirleitt mismikið eftir því hvaða tilefni er um að ræða. Til dæmis getur afmælisgjöf verið gefin á afmælisdegi einstaklingsins, en hátíðargjafir eru yfirleitt gefnar á sérstökum hátíðum eins og jólin, nýársdagur eða Valentínusardagur. Endir gjafaferlisins er yfirleitt þegar allar gjafir hafa verið gefnar og þegar tilefnið er liðið.
isl.Rep_En: Gifts are usually given at special times, such as birthdays, holidays, or even to celebrate special events. The beginning and end of the gift-giving process is usually different depending on the occasion. For example, a birthday gift may be given on the person's birthday, but all holiday gifts are usually given on special occasions such as Christmas, New Year's Day, or Valentine's Day.

ita.Qst: Quando inizia e finisce il trucco o il dolce?
ita.Rep: Il trucco inizia quando si applica il primo prodotto sul viso e finisce quando si completa l'ultimo passaggio, come l'applicazione del rossetto o della cipria. Il dolce inizia quando si inizia a preparare gli ingredienti e finisce quando si completa la decorazione e si serve il dolce.
ita.Rep_En: The makeup begins when the first product is applied to the face and ends when the last step is completed, such as the application of lipstick or lipstick.The dessert begins when the ingredients are prepared and ends when the decoration is completed and the dessert is served.

jav.Qst: Nalika Trick utawa Treat diwiwiti lan rampung?
jav.Rep: Nalika Trick utawa Treat diwiwiti nalika malam Halloween lan rampung nalika kabeh anak-anak wis mbukak pintu lan ngasilake permen utawa hadiah saka tetangga-tetangga lan warga liyane. Biasane, kegiatan Trick utawa Treat dimulai antara jam 5 sore lan 6 sore lan rampung nalika kabeh anak-anak wis mbukak pintu lan ngasilake permen utawa hadiah saka tetangga-tetangga lan warga liyane utawa nalika kabeh permen utawa hadiah wis habis.
jav.Rep_En: Trick or Treat usually starts between 5 p.m. and 6 p.m. and ends when all the children have opened the door and produced candy or gifts from the neighbors and other residents or when all the candy or gifts have been used up.

jpn.Qst: トリック・オア・トリートはいつ始まって終わるのか?
jpn.Rep: トリック・オア・トリートは、一般的には10月31日のハロウィンの夜に行われます。始まる時間は地域によって異なりますが、夕方から夜にかけて行われることが多いです。終わる時間も地域によって異なりますが、一般的には深夜まで行われることがあります。ただし、地域の法律や規制によっては、特定の時間帯に制限されることがありますので、事前に確認することをお勧めします。
jpn.Rep_En: The trick-or-treating is usually done on the night of Halloween, October 31st, the start time varies from region to region, but it is often done in the evening to the night, the end time also varies from region to region, but it is usually done until midnight, but it may be limited to certain hours by local laws and regulations, so we recommend checking in advance.

kan.Qst: ಟ್ರಿಕ್ ಅಥವಾ ಟ್ರೀಟ್ ಪ್ರಾರಂಭವಾಗುವುದು ಮತ್ತು ಕೊನೆಗೊಳ್ಳುವುದು ಯಾವಾಗ?
kan.Rep: ಟ್ರಿಕ್ ಅಥವಾ ಟ್ರೀಟ್ ಪ್ರಾರಂಭವಾಗುವುದು ಸಾಮಾನ್ಯವಾಗಿ ಒಂದು ಕೆಲಸದ ಪೂರ್ಣತೆಗೆ ಹೊಂದಿಕೊಳ್ಳುವ ಸಮಯದಲ್ಲಿ ಅಥವಾ ಒಂದು ಉತ್ಸಾಹದ ಸಂದರ್ಭದಲ್ಲಿ ಪ್ರಾರಂಭವಾಗುತ್ತದೆ. ಕೊನೆಗೆ, ಟ್ರಿಕ್ ಅಥವಾ ಟ್ರೀಟ್ ಪೂರ್ಣಗೊಳ್ಳುವುದು ಸಾಮಾನ್ಯವಾಗಿ ಅದರ ಉದ್ದೇಶವನ್ನು ಸಾಧಿಸಿದ ಸಮಯದಲ್ಲಿ ಅಥವಾ ಅದರ ಕೆಲಸವು ಪೂರ್ಣಗೊಂಡ ಸಮಯದಲ್ಲಿ ಆಗುತ್ತದೆ.
kan.Rep_En: The trick starts at the time of completion of a task or a passion, and the trick ends at the time of completion of its purpose or its work.

kat.Qst: როდის იწყება და მთავრდება ტრეკი ან ტრეიტი?
kat.Rep: ტრეკი იწყება როდესაც მუსიკალური კომპოზიცია იწყება და მთავრდება როდესაც ის სრულად დასრულდება. ტრეიტი კი არის მუსიკალური მოტივი, რომელიც იყენება რეპეტიციისთვის და არ არის სრულად დასრულებული.
kat.Rep_En: The track starts when the musical composition begins and ends when it is fully completed, while the treat is a musical motif used for rehearsal and is not fully completed.

khm.Qst: ពេលណាដែល Trick or Treat ចាប់ផ្តើម និងបញ្ចប់?
khm.Rep: Trick or Treat ចាប់ផ្តើមនៅថ្ងៃទី ៣១ តុលា និងបញ្ចប់នៅថ្ងៃទី ១ វិច្ឆិកា។ បើអ្នកនៅក្នុងប្រទេសដែលមានសកលវិទ្យាល្បីបំផុតដូចជា USA ឬអូស្ត្រាលីក នោះវាចាប់ផ្តើមនៅពេលល្ងាច់នេះដែរ។ ប៉ុន្តែក្នុងប្រទេសផ្សេងទៀតគឺអាចមានការចាប់ផ្តើមនៅពេលផ្សេងទៀតដែរ។
khm.Rep_En: Trick or Treat starts on October 31 and ends on November 1. If you're in a country with the most advanced technology, like the USA or Australia, it starts this afternoon, but in other countries it might start at a different time.

kir.Qst: "Кимге сыйкыр кылабыз?" оюнун качан баштайсыз жана качан аяктайсыз?
kir.Rep: "Кимге сыйкыр кылабыз?" оюну Кыргызстанда ойлонулат. Бул оюнду качан баштайсыз жана качан аяктайсыз болсо да, бул бирок эки катардын арасындагы сөздөрдүн туура түзүлүшүнө жардам берет. Оюнду баштоо үчүн биринчи катада "Ким?" сөзүнөн баштап, андан кийин "ге" сөзүн көрсөтүңүз. Аяктап учурганда, аяктаган сөздүн аягына "кыр" сөзүн көрсөтүңүз. Мисалы: "Кимге сыйкыр кылабыз? - Азаматка сыйкыр кыламын."
kir.Rep_En: The game "Who are we going to spell?" is thought of in Kyrgyzstan. Even if you don't know when to start and when to end this game, it will help you to form the words correctly between the two lines. To start the game, start with the word "Who?" in the first line, then indicate the word "to". When you finish, indicate the word "spell" at the end of the finished word.

kor.Qst: 트릭 오브 트리트 (Trick or Treat) 는 언제 시작되고 끝납니까?
kor.Rep: 트릭 오어 트릿은 보통 10월 31일 할로윈(Halloween)날에 시작되고, 밤 늦게까지 계속됩니다. 하지만 몇몇 지역에서는 할로윈 전후로도 이벤트를 진행하기도 합니다.
kor.Rep_En: Trick-or-treating usually starts on Halloween, October 31st, and continues late into the night, but in some areas, the event is held before or after Halloween.

lao.Qst: ການຫຼິ້ນ Trick or Treat ຈະເລີ່ມຕົ້ນແລະສິ້ນສຸດລົງເມື່ອໃດ?
lao.Rep: ການຫຼິ້ນ Trick or Treat ຈະເລີ່ມຕົ້ນແລະສິ້ນສຸດລົງເມື່ອໃດສາມາດຖືກຕັດສິນໃຫ້ສະມາຊິກທີ່ມີຄວາມຮູ້ກັບການຫຼິ້ນສູງສຸດຂອງປີເກີດນີ້. ສະມາຊິກຈະຕັດສິນໃຫ້ສູງສຸດເມື່ອສິ້ນສຸດຂອງການຫຼິ້ນສູງສຸດຖືກເຂົ້າຮ້ອງຂໍ້ມູນຂອງການຫຼິ້ນທີ່ມີຄວາມຮູ້ກັບການຫຼິ້ນສູງສຸດຂອງປີເກີດນີ້. ສະມາຊິກຈະຕັດສິນໃຫ້ສູງສຸດເມື່ອສິ້ນສຸດຂອງການຫຼິ້ນສູງສຸດຖືກສັ່ງສົ່ງກັບຄຳສັ່ງຈາກຄວາມຮູ້ຂອງການຫຼິ້ນທີ່ມີຄວາມຮູ້ກັບການຫຼິ້ນສູງສຸດຂອງປີເກີດນີ້.
lao.Rep_En: The start and end times of the Trick or Treat game can be judged by the member with the most knowledge of the game. The member will judge the maximum when the end of the maximum game is entered. The member will judge the maximum when the end of the maximum game is sent with the order from the player with the most knowledge of the game.

lit.Qst: kada prasideda ir baigiasi žaislas ar gėrimas
lit.Rep: Žaislas ar gėrimas gali prasidėti ir baigtis skirtingais laikais, priklausomai nuo situacijos ir aplinkybių. Pavyzdžiui, žaislas gali prasidėti tada, kai žmonės susirenka ir pradeda žaisti, o baigtis tada, kai visi nusprendžia sustoti arba kai pasibaigia numatytas žaidimo laikas. Gėrimas gali prasidėti tada, kai žmonės užsisako gėrimus, o baigtis tada, kai jie išgeria visus gėrimus arba kai jie nusprendžia sustoti gerti. Taigi, nėra vienareikšmiško atsakymo į šį klausimą.
lit.Rep_En: The game can be played at any time of the day, and the game can start and end at any time of the day, depending on the situation and the circumstances.The game can start when people get together and start playing, and end when everyone decides to stop, or when the game is over.The game can start and end when people order drinks, or when they finish all their drinks, or when they decide to stop drinking.

lvs.Qst: kad sākas un beidzas triks vai saldējums
lvs.Rep: Triks sākas ar triku izpildīšanas brīdi un beidzas, kad triks ir pabeigts. Saldējums sākas ar tā ražošanas procesu un beidzas, kad tas ir iepakots un gatavs patēriņam. Tomēr, ja runājam par saldējuma patēriņu, tad tas beidzas, kad saldējums ir pilnībā apēsts.
lvs.Rep_En: The trick starts when the trick is done and ends when the trick is done. The ice cream starts with the process of making it and ends when it's packaged and ready to eat. However, if we're talking about ice cream consumption, it ends when the ice cream is fully eaten.

mai.Qst: ट्रिक या ट्रीट कखन शुरू होइत अछि आ कखन समाप्त होइत अछि
mai.Rep: मुझे लगता है कि आपने अपना प्रश्न गलत तरीके से लिखा है। कृपया अपना प्रश्न सही ढंग से लिखें ताकि मैं आपकी मदद कर सकूं।
mai.Rep_En: I think you spelled your question wrong. Please spell your question correctly so I can help you.

mal.Qst: ട്രിക്ക് അല്ലെങ്കിൽ ട്രീറ്റ് എപ്പോഴാണ് ആരംഭിക്കുകയും അവസാനിക്കുകയും ചെയ്യുന്നത്?
mal.Rep:
ട്രീറ്റ് അല്ലെങ്കിൽ ട്രിക്ക് ഒരു ഡാറ്റാ സ്ട്രക്ചർ ആണ്, അത് ഒരു റൂട്ട് എന്നപോലെ കണ്ടുപിടിക്കാനും ഡാറ്റയുടെ സംരക്ഷണത്തിനും ഉപയോഗിക്കാം. ട്രീറ്റ് ഒരു ഹയർക്കളസ്സിഫിക്കേഷൻ മോഡൽ ആണ്, അത് ഡാറ്റാ സെറ്റിങ്ങുകൾ നടത്താൻ ഉപയോഗിക്കുന്നു. 

ട്രീറ്റ് ആരംഭിക്കുന്നത് ഒരു റൂട്ടിന്റെ പ്രഥമ നോഡാണ്. അത് ഒരു പ്രശ്നത്തിന് പരിഹാരം നൽകുന്നു. പ്രത്യേകിച്ച്, ട്രീറ്റിന്റെ പ്രഥമ നോഡ് റൂട്ട് നോഡാണ്. 

ട്രീറ്റ് അവസാനിക്കുന്നത് എന്നത് പ്രശ്നത്തിന് പരിഹാരം ലഭിച്ചാൽ അല്ലെങ്കിൽ പ്രശ്നത്തിന് പരിഹാരം നൽകാൻ കഴിയുന്ന മറ്റൊരു പ്രവർത്തനം നടത്താൻ ഉപയോഗിക്കുന്നു. 

ട്രീറ്റ് നിർമ്മിക്കുന്നത് പ്രശ്നത്തിന് പരിഹാരം നൽകുന്നതിനുള്ള ഒരു പ്രക്രിയയാണ്. പ്രശ്നത്തിന് പരിഹാരം നൽകാൻ കഴിയാത്ത പ്രശ്നങ്ങൾക്ക് ട്രീറ്റ് നിർമ്മിക്കുന്നതിന് ഉപയോഗിക്കാം.
mal.Rep_En:
A treat or trick is a data structure that can be used as a route to find and protect data. A treat is a hyperclassification model that is used to perform data settings.
The treat starts with the first node of a root that solves a problem. In particular, the first node of the treat is the root node.
Ending the treat is used when the problem is solved or to perform another operation that can solve the problem.
Creating a treat is a process of providing a solution to a problem. Problems that cannot provide a solution to a problem can be used to create a treat.

mar.Qst: ट्रिक किंवा ट्रीट कधी सुरू होते आणि संपते?
mar.Rep: ट्रिक किंवा ट्रीट अक्सर हॅलोवीन दिवशी सुरू होते आणि संपते. हॅलोवीन दिवशी ऑक्टोबर 31 च्या दिवशी साजरा केला जातो आणि ट्रिक किंवा ट्रीट दिवशी अमेरिकेत ऑक्टोबरच्या अंतिम शनिवारी दिवशी साजरा केला जातो.
mar.Rep_En: Trick or treat often starts and ends on Halloween, which is celebrated on October 31st, and Trick or treat day is celebrated on the last Saturday of October in the United States.

mkd.Qst: Кога започнува и завршува трикот или лекот?
mkd.Rep: Трикот или лекот може да започне и да завърши в различни моменти, в зависимост от това какъв е контекстът. Например, ако говорим за трикот или леко в рамките на спортна игра, те могат да започнат и да завършат в рамките на няколко секунди. Ако пък говорим за трикот или леко в контекста на изпълнение на музикално произведение, те могат да продължат от няколко секунди до няколко минути. В общия случай, трикот или лекот се считат за завършени, когато целта им е постигната и действието е изпълнено успешно.
mkd.Rep_En: A trick or trick can start and end at different times, depending on the context. For example, if we talk about a trick or trick within a sporting game, they can start and end in a few seconds. If we talk about a trick or trick in the context of a musical piece, they can continue for a few seconds to a few minutes. In general, a trick or trick is considered successful when its purpose is achieved and the action is performed.

mlt.Qst: Meta Trick or Treat tibda u tispiċċa?
mlt.Rep: Meta Trick or Treat tibda u tispiċċa, dan ifisser li qed tikkonċentra fuq l-attivitajiet ta' Halloween. Trick or Treat hija tradizzjoni popolari fejn tfittex ħelu minn nies f'kaz ta' Halloween. Tibda tikkonċentra fuq l-attivitajiet ta' Halloween u tispiċċa meta tibda tikkollegġi mal-familja u l-ħbieb biex tikkondividi l-esperjenza ta' Halloween.
mlt.Rep_En: Trick or Treat is a popular tradition where you look for candy from people in a Halloween costume. It starts by concentrating on Halloween activities and ends when you start hanging out with family and friends to share the Halloween experience.

nld.Qst: Wanneer begint en eindigt de trick or treat?
nld.Rep: Trick or treat begint meestal in de late namiddag of vroege avond op 31 oktober en eindigt rond 21.00 uur. Het is echter belangrijk om de lokale regels en voorschriften te controleren, omdat sommige gemeenschappen mogelijk specifieke tijden hebben vastgesteld voor trick or treat-activiteiten.
nld.Rep_En: Trick or treat usually starts in the late afternoon or early evening of October 31 and ends around 9pm, however it is important to check local rules and regulations as some communities may have specific times set for trick or treat activities.

nno.Qst: Når begynner og sluttar "trick or treat"
nno.Rep: "Trick or treat" er en aktivitet som vanligvis begynner rundt skumringstid på Halloween, som er 31. oktober. Det varer vanligvis til tidlig kveld, rundt kl. 20-21, avhengig av hvor du bor. Det er vanligvis ikke vanlig å gå "trick or treating" etter dette tidspunktet, da det kan være farlig å gå rundt i mørket.
nno.Rep_En: "Trick or treat" is an activity that usually starts around dusk on Halloween, which is October 31st, and usually lasts until early evening, around 20-21 hours, depending on where you live. It is usually not common to go "trick or treat" after this time, as it can be dangerous to walk around in the dark.

nob.Qst: når begynner og slutter trick or treat
nob.Rep: Trick or treating begynner vanligvis rundt skumringstid på Halloween, som er 31. oktober. Det varer vanligvis i et par timer, avhengig av hvor mange barn som deltar og hvor mange hus de besøker. Trick or treating slutter vanligvis når det blir mørkt eller når de fleste husene har gitt ut godteri. Det er viktig å følge lokale regler og retningslinjer for Halloween-feiringen.
nob.Rep_En: Trick or treating usually starts around dusk on Halloween, which is October 31st, and usually lasts for a couple of hours, depending on how many children participate and how many houses they visit.

npi.Qst: ट्रिक वा ट्रिट कहिले सुरु हुन्छ र कहिले समाप्त हुन्छ?
npi.Rep: ट्रिक वा ट्रिट सामान्यतया एक विशिष्ट समय अवधि भित्र सुरु हुन्छ र समाप्त हुन्छ। यो समय अवधि ट्रिक वा ट्रिटको प्रकृति र उद्देश्यबाट निर्भर गर्छ। केही ट्रिक वा ट्रिट एक घण्टा वा दुई घण्टा समय अवधि भित्र समाप्त हुन्छन्, जबकि केही अन्य ट्रिक वा ट्रिट एक दिन वा दुई दिन समय अवधि भित्र समाप्त हुन्छन्। यो समय अवधि ट्रिक वा ट्रिटको विवरण र उद्देश्यबाट निर्भर गर्छ।
npi.Rep_En: The trick usually starts and ends within a specific time period. This time period depends on the nature and purpose of the trick or trick. Some tricks or tricks end within an hour or two time period, while other tricks or tricks end within a day or two time period.

pbt.Qst: کله چې د چال یا درملنې پیل او پای ته رسیږي
pbt.Rep: من نمی‌توانم به زبان دری صحبت کنم، لطفاً اگر سوال یا درخواست دیگری دارید که به زبان انگلیسی باشد، بگویید تا بتوانم به شما کمک کنم.
pbt.Rep_En: I can't speak English, so please if you have any other questions or requests, if you speak English, please let me know and I'll help you.

pes.Qst: چه زمانی شروع و پایان ترفند یا درمان است؟
pes.Rep: زمان شروع و پایان ترفند یا درمان به وابستگی به نوع درمان و شرایط فردی متفاوت است. برای مثال، درمان برای یک بیماری مزمن ممکن است به مدت سال‌ها ادامه داشته باشد، در حالی که یک ترفند کوتاه مدت ممکن است تنها چند روز یا هفته طول بکشد. همچنین، شرایط فردی مانند سن، سلامتی، وضعیت جسمانی و روحی، و میزان تاثیرگذاری درمان بر روی بیماری نیز می‌تواند بر زمان شروع و پایان ترفند یا درمان تاثیر بگذارد. بهتر است با پزشک یا متخصص درمانی خود در مورد زمان شروع و پایان درمان خود صحبت کنید.
pes.Rep_En: The timing of treatment varies depending on the type of treatment and individual circumstances. For example, treatment for a chronic illness may last for years, while a short-term treatment may last only a few days or weeks. Also, individual conditions such as age, health, physical and mental status, and the degree to which they affect the disease can also affect the timing of treatment.

pol.Qst: Kiedy zaczyna się i kończy sztuczka lub przysmak?
pol.Rep: Sztuczka lub przysmak zaczyna się w momencie, gdy pies wykonuje pożądaną akcję, na którą został nauczony, a kończy się w momencie, gdy pies otrzymuje nagrodę lub pochwałę za wykonanie tej akcji. Ważne jest, aby nagradzać psa natychmiast po wykonaniu pożądanej akcji, aby pies mógł zrozumieć, co dokładnie jest nagradzane.
pol.Rep_En: The trick begins when the dog performs the desired action and ends when the dog receives a reward or praise for the action, and the dog is rewarded immediately after the action.

por.Qst: Quando é que o truque ou o doce começa e termina?
por.Rep: O truque ou o doce, também conhecido como "Halloween", geralmente começa no final de outubro, no dia 31 de outubro, e termina na mesma noite. As crianças se fantasiam e vão de porta em porta pedindo doces, enquanto os adultos decoram suas casas com temas assustadores. É uma tradição popular em muitos países, especialmente nos Estados Unidos, Canadá, Reino Unido e Irlanda.
por.Rep_En: The Halloween tradition, also known as "Halloween," usually begins in late October and ends on the same night, with children going door-to-door asking for candy while adults decorate their homes with creepy themes.

ron.Qst: Când începe şi se termină trucul sau tratamentul?
ron.Rep: Nu am suficiente informații pentru a răspunde la această întrebare. Te rog să îmi spui despre ce truc sau tratament este vorba și voi încerca să te ajut.
ron.Rep_En: I don't have enough information to answer this question. Please tell me what trick or treatment it is and I will try to help you.

rus.Qst: Когда начинается и заканчивается " трюк или лакомство "?
rus.Rep: "Трюк или лакомство" (англ. "Trick or Treat") - это традиционный обряд, который отмечается в ночь с 31 октября на 1 ноября в Северной Америке и некоторых других странах. Обычно дети в костюмах ходят по домам и просят у владельцев домов конфеты, говоря фразу "Trick or Treat!" (трюк или лакомство). Обряд начинается вечером 31 октября и продолжается до полуночи.
rus.Rep_En: Trick or Treat is a traditional ritual that takes place on the night of October 31st to October 1st in North America and some other countries, usually children in costumes go around the houses and ask the owners for candy, saying the phrase "Trick or Treat!"

slk.Qst: kedy začína a končí trik alebo liečba
slk.Rep: Začiatok a koniec triku alebo liečby závisí od konkrétneho prípadu a typu triku alebo liečby. Niektoré triky môžu byť krátke a trvať len niekoľko minút, zatiaľ čo iné môžu trvať niekoľko dní alebo dokonca týždňov. Liečba môže trvať od niekoľkých dní až po niekoľko mesiacov alebo rokov, v závislosti od závažnosti ochorenia a typu liečby. Je dôležité sa poradiť s lekárom alebo odborníkom na danú oblasť, aby ste získali presné informácie o tom, ako dlho bude trvať konkrétny trik alebo liečba.
slk.Rep_En: The start and end of a treatment depend on the specific case and type of treatment.Some treatments may be short, lasting only a few minutes, while others may last for days or even weeks.Treatment can last from a few days to several months or years, depending on the severity of the condition and the type of treatment.It is important to consult a doctor or specialist in the field to get accurate information about how long a particular trick or treatment will last.

slv.Qst: kdaj se začne in konča trik ali poslastica
slv.Rep: Začetek in konec trika ali poslastice sta odvisna od vrste trika ali poslastice. Na primer, če gre za trik s kartami, se začne s prikazom kart in konča s razkritjem izbrane karte. Če pa gre za poslastico, se začne s pripravo sestavin in konča s serviranjem in uživanjem poslastice.
slv.Rep_En: The beginning and end of a trick or treat depends on the type of trick or treat, for example, if it is a trick with cards, it starts with the presentation of the cards and ends with the disclosure of the selected cards, but if it is a treat, it starts with the preparation of the ingredients and ends with the serving and enjoying the treat.

spa.Qst: ¿Cuándo comienza y termina el truco o el regalo?
spa.Rep: El truco o el regalo, también conocido como Halloween, comienza el 31 de octubre y termina a la medianoche de ese mismo día. Sin embargo, en algunos lugares se celebra durante todo el fin de semana más cercano al 31 de octubre.
spa.Rep_En: The trick or gift, also known as Halloween, begins on October 31 and ends at midnight on the same day.

srp.Qst: када се трка или третман почиње и завршава
srp.Rep: То зависи од конкретног трка или третмана. Обично се време почетка и завршетка наводи у распореду догађаја или најави за третман. Ако нисте сигурни, можете контактирати организаторе или провајдере услуга да бисте добили тачне информације.
srp.Rep_En: It depends on the specific race or treatment. Usually the start and end times are listed in the event schedule or announcements for the treatment. If you are not sure, you can contact the organizers or service providers for accurate information.

swe.Qst: När börjar och slutar "Trick or Treat"?
swe.Rep: "Trick or Treat" börjar vanligtvis runt skymningen på Halloween, vilket är den 31 oktober. Det slutar vanligtvis när det blir för sent på kvällen eller när de flesta husen har stängt av sina ljus och inte längre delar ut godis. Det är vanligt att "Trick or Treat" pågår mellan kl. 17.00 och 21.00 på kvällen. Men det kan variera beroende på var du bor och vad som är vanligt i din region.
swe.Rep_En: Trick or Treat usually starts around dusk on Halloween, which is October 31st, and usually ends when it gets too late in the evening or when most houses have turned off their lights and are no longer handing out candy.

swh.Qst: Wakati ni ujanja au matibabu kuanza na mwisho
swh.Rep: Hii inategemea na hali au tatizo linalohusika. Kwa mfano, katika matibabu ya magonjwa ya ngozi, ni muhimu kuanza na mwanzo wa tatizo ili kuzuia kuenea zaidi. Lakini katika kazi za ujenzi, mara nyingi ni bora kuanza na mwisho ili kuhakikisha kuwa kazi imekamilika vizuri kabla ya kuanza sehemu nyingine. Kwa hiyo, ni muhimu kuzingatia hali ya kila tatizo na kufanya uamuzi sahihi kuhusu kuanza na mwisho au mwanzo.
swh.Rep_En: This depends on the condition or problem involved.For example, in the treatment of skin diseases, it is important to start at the beginning of the problem to prevent further spread.But in construction work, it is often better to start at the end to ensure that the work is completed before starting another part.Therefore, it is important to consider the situation of each problem and make the right decision about the beginning and end.

tel.Qst: ట్రిక్ లేదా ట్రీట్ ఎప్పుడు ప్రారంభమవుతుంది మరియు ముగుస్తుంది
tel.Rep: ట్రిక్ లేదా ట్రీట్ ప్రారంభమవుతుంది మరియు ముగుస్తుంది వివిధ కారణాల వల్ల. కొన్ని ట్రిక్లు ప్రారంభం అవుతాయి కానీ అవి పూర్తి కార్యకలాపం కావాలి అని తెలుసుకోవాలి. మరియు ట్రీట్లు ప్రారంభం అవుతాయి కానీ అవి పూర్తి చేయబడినవి కావాలి అని తెలుసుకోవాలి. మీరు మీ ట్రిక్లు లేదా ట్రీట్లు ప్రారంభం చేయడానికి ముందు పూర్తి ప్రకటనలు చేయాలి మరియు పూర్తి ప్రకటనలు చేయబడిన తరువాత మీరు మీ ట్రిక్లు లేదా ట్రీట్లు ముగుస్తుందని తెలుసుకోవచ్చు.
tel.Rep_En: The trick starts and ends for a variety of reasons, some tricks start but need to be completed, and some tricks start but need to be completed, so you should make a complete declaration before you start your tricks and you should know that your tricks will end after you have completed them.

tgk.Qst: кай "чароғ ё ширинӣ" оғоз ва хотима меёбад
tgk.Rep: Менингизда "чароғ ё ширинӣ" нима маъноси бор? Агар шумо маъносини муфассалро ба ман беред, ман метавонам Шуморо бо маъноси муфассал кӯмак кунам.
tgk.Rep_En: If you give me the meaning in detail, I can help you with the meaning in detail.

tgl.Qst: Kailan magsisimula at magtatapos ang trick or treat?
tgl.Rep: Ang Trick or Treat ay karaniwang nagsisimula sa hapon o gabi ng Oktubre 31 at nagtatapos sa mga oras ng gabi. Ngunit depende pa rin ito sa lugar at sa mga patakaran ng komunidad. Maari kang magtanong sa inyong lokal na pamahalaan o barangay para sa mas detalyadong impormasyon.
tgl.Rep_En: The event usually starts at noon or late in the evening, but depending on the location and the local rules, you can contact your local authority for more information.

tha.Qst: เมื่อไหร่ที่ Trick or Treat จะเริ่มและจบ
tha.Rep: Trick or Treat เริ่มต้นในวันฮาโลวีน (Halloween) ที่ 31 ตุลาคมของทุกปี และจะสิ้นสุดในเวลาต่างๆขึ้นอยู่กับสถานที่และวิธีการจัดการ Trick or Treat ของแต่ละท้องถิ่น โดยทั่วไปแล้ว Trick or Treat จะเริ่มต้นเมื่อเย็นๆ หลังจากที่เด็กๆแต่งตัวเสร็จแล้ว และจะสิ้นสุดเมื่อเย็นถึงหรือเมื่อเด็กๆได้รับขนมหวานเพียงพอตามที่ตั้งใจไว้แล้ว
tha.Rep_En: The trick starts on Halloween, October 31st, and ends at different times depending on the location and the trick-or-treating method, usually in the evening after the children have finished dressing and ends in the evening or when the children have had enough candy.

tur.Qst: şaka veya şekerleme ne zaman başlar ve biter?
tur.Rep: Şaka ve şekerleme genellikle 1 Nisan'da başlar ve gün boyunca devam eder. Ancak bazı insanlar herhangi bir zamanda şaka yapabilir veya şekerleme yapabilirler. Şaka ve şekerlemelerin ne zaman bittiği tamamen kişisel tercihlere bağlıdır.
tur.Rep_En: The joke usually starts on April 1st and continues throughout the day, but some people may joke or swear at any time, and when the joke ends is entirely up to personal preference.

ukr.Qst: коли починається і закінчується "Трик або ласощі"
ukr.Rep: Точний час початку і закінчення програми "Трик або ласощі" може залежати від країни та телеканалу, на якому вона транслюється. Зазвичай програма йде ввечері або вночі, і триває близько години. Найкраще перевірити розклад трансляції на сайті телеканалу, який ви дивитесь.
ukr.Rep_En: The start and end times of the show vary depending on the country and channel you're watching, but it's usually in the evening or at night, and it lasts about an hour.

urd.Qst: ٹرک یا علاج کب شروع اور ختم ہوتا ہے؟
urd.Rep: میں آپ کی معذرت خواہ ہوں، لیکن آپ کو بتانے کے لئے مزید تفصیلات درکار ہیں کہ آپ کس ٹرک یا علاج کی بات کر رہے ہیں۔ کسی بھی ٹرک یا علاج کی دورانیہ اس کے استعمال کے مقصد اور طریقہ کار پر منحصر ہوتا ہے۔ براہ کرم مزید تفصیلات فراہم کریں تا کہ میں آپ کو بہتر جواب دے سکوں۔
urd.Rep_En: I'm sorry, but I need more details to tell you what trick or treatment you're talking about. The duration of any trick or treatment depends on the purpose and method of its use. Please provide more details so I can give you a better answer.

vie.Qst: khi nào trò lừa đảo hoặc xử lý bắt đầu và kết thúc
vie.Rep:
Trò lừa đảo có thể bắt đầu và kết thúc tùy thuộc vào loại trò lừa đảo đó. Tuy nhiên, nó thường bắt đầu bằng việc kẻ lừa đảo tiếp cận nạn nhân và tạo ra một câu chuyện hoặc lời giải thích để lừa đảo nạn nhân. Sau đó, kẻ lừa đảo sẽ yêu cầu nạn nhân cung cấp thông tin cá nhân hoặc tiền bạc.

Việc xử lý và bắt kẻ lừa đảo cũng phụ thuộc vào quy mô và tính phức tạp của trò lừa đảo đó. Nếu trò lừa đảo là một vụ lừa đảo nhỏ, nạn nhân có thể báo cáo cho cơ quan chức năng hoặc cảnh sát để giải quyết vấn đề. Tuy nhiên, nếu trò lừa đảo là một vụ lừa đảo lớn và phức tạp, cơ quan chức năng sẽ phải tiến hành điều tra và thu thập bằng chứng để bắt giữ kẻ lừa đảo.
vie.Rep_En:
The scam can start and end depending on the type of scam, but it usually starts with the scammer approaching the victim and creating a story or explanation to trick the victim, then asking the victim for personal information or money.
The scam's size and complexity also depend on the scam's handling and capture, if the scam is a small one, the victim can report it to the authorities or police to resolve the issue, but if the scam is a large and complex one, the authorities will have to conduct an investigation to arrest and collect evidence.

yue.Qst: 咩時候開始同結束呢?
yue.Rep: 不好意思，請問您可以告訴我您問的是什麼事情嗎？這樣我才能更好地回答您的問題。
yue.Rep_En: Sorry, can you ask me what's going on? So I can answer your question better.

zlm.Qst: bila trik atau merawat bermula dan berakhir
zlm.Rep:
Trik atau cara merawat dapat dimulai dengan memahami jenis benda atau hal yang akan dirawat, kemudian menentukan metode atau produk yang tepat untuk merawatnya. Selanjutnya, lakukan perawatan secara teratur dan sesuai dengan petunjuk yang diberikan.

Setelah melakukan perawatan, pastikan untuk membersihkan dan menyimpan benda atau hal tersebut dengan baik agar tetap terjaga kualitasnya. Jangan lupa untuk melakukan perawatan secara berkala untuk menjaga keawetan dan kualitasnya.

Dalam merawat, penting juga untuk memperhatikan faktor lingkungan seperti suhu, kelembaban, dan paparan sinar matahari yang dapat mempengaruhi kondisi benda atau hal yang dirawat. Jadi, pastikan untuk menyimpan dan merawat dengan benar agar tetap awet dan terjaga kualitasnya.
zlm.Rep_En:
The trick or treatment can be started by understanding the type of object or thing to be treated, then determining the right method or product to treat it.
After the treatment, make sure to clean and store the item or thing well to maintain its quality. Do not forget to do the treatment regularly to maintain its durability and quality.
In caring, it's also important to pay attention to environmental factors such as temperature, humidity, and sunlight exposure that can affect the condition of the object or thing being cared for, so make sure to store and care for it properly to keep it durable and of good quality.

eng.Qst: who all has played elle woods on broadway
eng.Rep:
There have been two actresses who have played Elle Woods on Broadway:

1. Laura Bell Bundy originated the role of Elle Woods in the Broadway production of "Legally Blonde: The Musical" in 2007.

2. Bailey Hanks took over the role of Elle Woods in the Broadway production in 2008, after winning the reality TV competition "Legally Blonde: The Musical – The Search for Elle Woods."

afr.Qst: Die rol van Elle Woods op Broadway
afr.Rep:
Elle Woods is 'n fiktiewe karakter wat bekend geword het deur die fliek "Legally Blonde" uit 2001. Sy is 'n slim, modebewuste blondine wat besluit om regsgeleerdheid te studeer nadat haar kêrel haar gedump het vir 'n meer "serieuze" meisie. Elle Woods het later 'n rol op Broadway gekry in die musiekblyspel "Legally Blonde: The Musical" wat in 2007 begin het.

In die musiekblyspel is Elle Woods 'n energieke en optimistiese student aan Harvard-wetenskaplike skool. Sy moet haarself bewys teenoor haar medestudente en die professorate, maar sy slaag daarin deur haar slimheid, vasberadenheid en positiewe ingesteldheid. Die musiekblyspel bevat 'n reeks aansteklike liedjies en dansnommers, en Elle Woods se karakter is 'n inspirasie vir jong vroue wat hul drome wil najaag.

Die rol van Elle Woods op Broadway is 'n uitdagende een, wat 'n aktrise vereis wat kan sing, dans en akteer. Dit is 'n rol wat 'n groot impak op die gehoor kan hê en 'n ikoniese karakter kan skep wat lank na die musiekblyspel onthou sal word.
afr.Rep_En:
Elle Woods is a fictional character from the 2001 film Legally Blonde, a smart, fashion-conscious blonde who decides to study law after her boyfriend dumped her for a more "serious" girl.
In the musical, Elle Woods is an energetic and optimistic student at Harvard Science School. She has to prove herself to her fellow students and the professors, but she succeeds through her intelligence, determination and positive attitude. The musical contains a series of catchy songs and dance numbers, and Elle Woods' character is an inspiration to young women who want to pursue their dreams.
The role of Elle Woods on Broadway is a challenging one, requiring an actress who can sing, dance and act. It is a role that can have a major impact on audiences and create an iconic character who will be remembered long after the musical.

arb.Qst: كل من لعب دور (إيل وودز) على برودواي
arb.Rep:
لعب دور (إيل وودز) على برودواي عدة ممثلين، ومنهم:

1- جون ليثجو: لعب دور (إيل وودز) في العرض الأصلي لمسرحية "Chicago" عام 1975.

2- جيمس نايت: لعب دور (إيل وودز) في إعادة إنتاج مسرحية "Chicago" عام 1996.

3- ريتشارد جير: لعب دور (إيل وودز) في إعادة إنتاج مسرحية "Chicago" عام 2002.

asm.Qst: "এলে উডছ (Elle Woods) ৰ চৰিত্ৰত অভিনয় কৰা ""এলে উডছ"" (Elle Woods) ৰ চৰিত্ৰটো ব্ৰডৱে'ত অভিনয় কৰা হৈছিল।"
asm.Rep: ঠিক আছে! "এলে উডছ" হ'ল একটি প্ৰসিদ্ধ চলচ্চিত্র যা 2001 সালে মুক্তি পায়। এই চলচ্চিত্রটি রিস উইদারস্পুন এবং লেগাল কমেডি জনরে অভিনয় করেন। এলে উডছ হ'ল একটি স্মার্ট এবং সুন্দর মেয়ে যিনি হারভার্ড লস স্কুলে ভর্তি হয়। একদিন তার বয়ফ্রেন্ড তাকে ছেড়ে চলে যায় এবং তার জন্য একটি নতুন জীবন শুরু করতে হয়। এলে উডছ তার স্বপ্ন পুরণ করতে হার্ড ওয়ার্ক করে এবং একটি মামলায় অভিযোগী হিসেবে নিজেকে প্রমাণ করে। এই চলচ্চিত্রটি একটি সফল কমেডি হিসাবে পরিচিত এবং এলে উডছ হ'ল একটি প্রসিদ্ধ চরিত্র।
asm.Rep_En: The film is based on the bestselling novel of the same name by author Reese Witherspoon, and stars Johnnie Darcy, a young man who is sent to Harvard Law School to find out if his boyfriend is a real person, and his dream of becoming a lawyer is realized.

bul.Qst: Всички, които са играли Ел Уудс на Бродуей
bul.Rep:
Ел Уудс е една от най-известните и дълготрайни мюзикъли на Бродуей. Играта е базирана на романа на Стивън Сондхайм и Джеймс Лапайн и разказва историята на група от ученици от гимназията, които се изправят пред трудни решения и проблеми в живота си.

Много хора са играли в Ел Уудс на Бродуей през годините, включително Бернадет Питърс, Манди Патинкин, Бет Мидлър, Нийл Патрик Харис, Кристин Ченоуит и много други. Всички те са допринесли за успеха на мюзикъла и са оставили незабравими спомени за феновете на Ел Уудс.
bul.Rep_En:
Elsewhere is a musical based on the novel of the same name by Stephen Sondheim and James Lapine, about a group of high school students who face difficult decisions and problems in their lives.
Many people have starred in "The Wild West" on Broadway over the years, including Bernadette Peters, Mandy Patinkin, Bette Midler, Neil Patrick Harris, Christine Chenoweth, and many others, all of whom contributed to the success of the musical and left unforgettable memories for fans of "The Wild West".

cym.Qst: Mae'r ffilm yn cynnwys Elle Woods ar Broadway.
cym.Rep: Mae'r ffilm hwn yn sôn am Elle Woods, sy'n mynychu'r Brifysgol Harvard Law School ar ôl iddi gael ei rhoi'r gorau i fynd ar ôl ei chariad. Yn ystod ei hamser yno, mae hi'n ymuno â grŵp o fyfyrwyr i gynorthwyo gyda achos cyfreithiol sy'n ymwneud â Broadway. Mae'r ffilm yn cynnwys llawer o gerddoriaeth a dawnsio, ac mae'n dangos sut mae Elle Woods yn defnyddio ei dawnau i ennill parch a chydnabyddiaeth yn y byd cyfreithiol a chwarae'r brif ran yn y sioe gerdd.
cym.Rep_En: The film follows the story of Ellie Woods, a law student at Harvard Law School who is forced to drop out of school to pursue her dream of becoming a lawyer, and joins a group of students to help them with a Broadway lawsuit.The film includes a lot of music and dance, and shows how she uses her talents to gain respect and acceptance in the legal world.

kir.Qst: "Элле Вудс" (англ. Elle Woods) - Бродвейдеги эң белгилүү актриса."
kir.Rep: "Элле Вудс" (англ. Elle Woods) - это персонаж мюзикла "Легко быть женщиной" (англ. Legally Blonde), который был создан на основе одноименного фильма. Главную роль Элле Вудс в мюзикле исполняли различные актрисы на Бродвее и в других театрах мира. Некоторые из них стали известными и популярными благодаря этой роли, например, Лора Белл Банди, Бэйли Хансен, Сьюзанн Сомерс и другие.
kir.Rep_En: Elle Woods is a character in the musical Easy to Be a Woman, which is based on the film of the same name. The main role of Elle Woods in the musical was played by various actresses on Broadway and in other theaters of the world. Some of them became famous and popular thanks to this role, such as Laura Bell Bundy, Bayliss Han, Susan Sommers and others.

kor.Qst: 브로드웨이에서 엘리 우즈 역을 맡은 모든
kor.Rep:
배우들은 뛰어난 연기력과 노래실력을 갖추고 있습니다. 그 중에서도 특히 뛰어난 배우들은 다음과 같습니다.

1. 제시카 뮬란 (Jessica Muller) - "Dear Evan Hansen"의 코너리 역에서 뛰어난 연기력과 노래실력을 선보였습니다.

2. 벤 플래트 (Ben Platt) - "Dear Evan Hansen"의 에반 역에서 뛰어난 연기력과 노래실력을 선보였으며, 이를 인정받아 토니상을 수상했습니다.

3. 레나이 루이스 (Renée Elise Goldsberry) - "Hamilton"의 엘리자 역에서 뛰어난 연기력과 노래실력을 선보였으며, 이를 인정받아 토니상을 수상했습니다.

4. 브라이언 스토크스 미첼 (Brian Stokes Mitchell) - "Ragtime"의 콜하우스 워커 역에서 뛰어난 연기력과 노래실력을 선보였으며, 이를 인정받아 토니상을 수상했습니다.

5. 켈리 오하라 (Kelli O'Hara) - "The King and I"의 안나 역에서 뛰어난 연기력과 노래실력을 선보였으며, 이를 인정받아 토니상을 수상했습니다.
kor.Rep_En:
The actors have a great voice and singing ability, and some of the most outstanding actors are as follows:
Jessica Mullins, who played the lead role in "Dear Evan Hansen," is a great actress and singer.
Ben Platt's performance as Evan in "Dear Evan Hansen" earned him a Tony Award for Best Actor.
Renee Elyse Goldsberry, who played Eliza in Hamilton, won a Tony Award for her performance.
Brian Stokes-Mitchell, who played the role of Coleridge Walker in Ragtime, won a Tony Award for Best Actor in a Leading Role.
Kelly O'Hara, who played Anna in The King and I, won a Tony Award for her performance.

swh.Qst: mashabiki wanachagua: Elle Woods on Broadway
swh.Rep:
Elle Woods on Broadway is a musical adaptation of the popular movie "Legally Blonde," which follows the story of Elle Woods, a sorority girl who decides to attend Harvard Law School to win back her ex-boyfriend. Along the way, she discovers her own strength and becomes a successful lawyer.

The musical features catchy songs and energetic dance numbers, as well as a talented cast of performers. It's a fun and uplifting show that celebrates the power of self-confidence and determination. If you're a fan of the movie or just love musical theater, Elle Woods on Broadway is definitely worth checking out!

1. Laura Bell Bundy - đóng vai Elle Woods trong phiên bản Broadway đầu tiên của Legally Blonde: The Musical từ năm 2007 đến năm 2008.

2. Bailey Hanks - thay thế Laura Bell Bundy và đóng vai Elle Woods từ tháng 7 năm 2008 đến tháng 2 năm 2009.

3. Becky Gulsvig - thay thế Bailey Hanks và đóng vai Elle Woods từ tháng 2 năm 2009 đến tháng 10 năm 2009.
vie.Rep_En:
A total of three actresses have played the role of Elle Woods on the Broadway stage:
Laura Bell Bundy - played the role of Elle Woods in the first Broadway version of Legally Blonde: The Musical from 2007 to 2008.

Becky Golosevic replaced Bailey Hanks as Elle Woods from February 2009 to October 2009.

eng.Qst: which ocean contains the lowest point on earth
eng.Rep: The Pacific Ocean contains the lowest point on Earth, which is the Challenger Deep in the Mariana Trench. The depth of the Challenger Deep is approximately 36,070 feet (10,994 meters) below sea level.

afr.Qst: Die oseaan bevat die laagste punt op aarde.
afr.Rep: Dit is korrek. Die diepste punt in die oseaan is die Mariannasleuf in die Stille Oseaan, met 'n diepte van ongeveer 11 km. Dit is ook die diepste punt op aarde.
afr.Rep_En: That's right. The deepest point in the ocean is the Mariana Trench in the Pacific Ocean, with a depth of about 11 km. It's also the deepest point on Earth.

arb.Qst: المحيط الذي يحتوي على أدنى نقطة على الأرض
arb.Rep: المحيط الذي يحتوي على أدنى نقطة على الأرض هو المحيط الهادئ (Pacific Ocean)، والنقطة المقصودة هي النقطة المعروفة باسم "حفرة ماريانا" (Mariana Trench)، وهي عبارة عن منطقة عميقة في قاع المحيط الهادئ تبلغ عمقها حوالي 11 كيلومتراً، وتعتبر أعمق نقطة على سطح الأرض.
arb.Rep_En: The deepest point on Earth is the Pacific Ocean, and the point of interest is the Mariana Trench, a deep area in the Pacific Ocean that is about 11 kilometers deep, and is the deepest point on Earth.

ary.Qst: المحيط اللي فيه أدنى نقطة على الأرض
ary.Rep: المحيط الذي يحتوي على أدنى نقطة على الأرض هو المحيط الهادئ (Pacific Ocean)، والتي تقع فيه أدنى نقطة على الأرض وهي النقطة المعروفة باسم "خندق ماريانا" (Mariana Trench)، وتبلغ عمقها حوالي 11 كيلومترًا تحت سطح الماء.
ary.Rep_En: The ocean with the lowest point on Earth is the Pacific Ocean, where the lowest point on Earth is the point known as the Mariana Trench, about 11 kilometers below the surface of the water.

arz.Qst: المحيط اللي فيه أدنى نقطة على الأرض
arz.Rep: المحيط الذي يحتوي على أدنى نقطة على الأرض هو المحيط الهادئ (Pacific Ocean)، والتي تقع فيه أدنى نقطة على الأرض وهي النقطة المعروفة باسم "خندق ماريانا" (Mariana Trench)، وتبلغ عمقها حوالي 11 كيلومترًا تحت سطح الماء.
arz.Rep_En: The ocean with the lowest point on Earth is the Pacific Ocean, where the lowest point on Earth is the point known as the Mariana Trench, about 11 kilometers below the surface of the water.

asm.Qst: মহাসাগৰীয় অঞ্চলসমূহ পৃথিৱীৰ আটাইতকৈ নিম্নতম স্থান।
asm.Rep:
মহাসাগৰীয় অঞ্চলসমূহ পৃথিবীৰ নিম্নতম স্থানসমূহ হল:

1. দক্ষিণ সান্তার সাগর (৩৫০ মিটাৰ)
2. কারিবিয়ান সাগর (৭৫০ মিটাৰ)
3. হিমালয় পাহাড়ের উপর (৮৪৬ মিটাৰ)
4. আন্টার্কটিকা ফ্রস্টবাইট (২,০০০ মিটাৰ)
5. আর্কটিক ওশেন (৩,৮৮৮ মিটাৰ)
6. সাউথ পোল (৪,৩৯৩ মিটাৰ)
7. তারাই খাদ্য গ্রহ (৫,০০০ মিটাৰ)
8. ভূমি স্থানান্তর বিন্দু (১০,০০০ মিটাৰ)
asm.Rep_En:
Oceanic zones are the lowest places on Earth:
1. The South Santa Sea (350 meters)
2. The Caribbean Sea (7.5 meters high)
3. On the Himalayas (846 meters)
4. The Antarctic frostbite (2,000 meters) is the largest frostbite in the world.
5. The Arctic Ocean (3,888 meters) is the largest ocean in the world.
6. The South Pole (4393 meters)
7. The food planet of Tara (5,000 meters)
8. Point of land shift (1,000 meters)

bel.Qst: У акіяне знаходзіцца самая нізкая кропка на Зямлі.
bel.Rep: Так, у японській префектурі Тотторі, що знаходиться на заході країни, є регіон, де знаходиться найнижча кропка на Землі. Це місце розташоване на узбережжі Японського моря і має висоту 2,5 метра нижче рівня моря.
bel.Rep_En: So, in the Japanese prefecture of Tottori, which is in the west of the country, there is a region where the lowest point on Earth is located. This place is located on the coast of the Sea of Japan and has a height of 2.5 meters below sea level.

ben.Qst: সমুদ্রের মধ্যে পৃথিবীর সবচেয়ে নিচু স্থান রয়েছে।
ben.Rep: সমুদ্রের মধ্যে পৃথিবীর সবচেয়ে নিচু স্থানটি মারিয়ানা ট্রেঞ্চ নামে পরিচিত। এটি প্রশান্ত মহাসাগরের উত্তর পূর্বে অবস্থিত একটি খাঁচা বা খাড়ি যা দীর্ঘতম সমুদ্র খাঁচার মধ্যে অবস্থিত। এটি গভীরতা দৃষ্টিতে পৃথিবীর সবচেয়ে গভীর স্থান হিসাবে পরিচিত।
ben.Rep_En: The deepest point in the ocean is the Mariana Trench, a crater in the Pacific Ocean that is the deepest point in the world.

bos.Qst: Okean sadrži najnižu tačku na Zemlji.
bos.Rep: Tačno, najniža tačka na Zemlji je Mrtvo more, koje se nalazi na granici Izraela, Jordana i Palestine, a nalazi se 430 metara ispod nivoa mora.
bos.Rep_En: The lowest point on Earth is the Dead Sea, which lies on the border of Israel, Jordan and Palestine, and is 430 meters below sea level.

bul.Qst: океан, който съдържа най-ниската точка на Земята
bul.Rep: Това е Тихият океан, който съдържа най-ниската точка на Земята - Марианската пропаст. Тя се намира в западната част на Тихия океан и е най-дълбоката точка в света, с дълбочина от около 11 километра.
bul.Rep_En: The Pacific Ocean, which contains the lowest point on Earth, the Mariana Trench, is located in the western Pacific Ocean and is the deepest point in the world, with a depth of about 11 kilometers.

cat.Qst: L'oceà que conté el punt més baix de la Terra
cat.Rep: El punt més baix de la Terra es troba a la depressió de la Vall de la Mort, als Estats Units, i no està situat a l'oceà. No obstant això, si ens referim al punt més profund dels oceans, aquest es troba a la fossa de les Marianes, al Pacífic occidental. La profunditat màxima d'aquesta fossa és de 10.994 metres.
cat.Rep_En: The lowest point on Earth is in Death Valley, USA, but the deepest point in the ocean is in the Mariana Trench in the western Pacific Ocean, which is 10,994 meters deep.

ceb.Qst: Ang dagat mao ang labing ubos nga punto sa yuta.
ceb.Rep: Oo, matuod gyud ka. Ang dagat naglangkob sa labing daghang bahin sa atong planeta ug nagpakita og kadaghanan sa kinaiyahan nga wala pa nato masinati. Sa ubang bahin sa kalibutan, ang dagat naghatag og panginabuhian sa mga tawo pinaagi sa pagpangisda ug turismo. Apan, kinahanglan usab nato panalipdan ang atong mga kadagatan ug ang mga kinaiyahan nga anaa sa ilang sulod aron mapreserba nato kini alang sa kaugmaon sa atong mga kabataan.
ceb.Rep_En: The ocean is the largest ocean on earth, and it contains a lot of life that we have never experienced before. In other parts of the world, the ocean provides people with a livelihood through fishing and tourism. But we also need to protect our oceans and the life that lives in them so that we can preserve them for the future of our children.

ces.Qst: Oceán, který obsahuje nejnižší bod na Zemi.
ces.Rep: Tento oceán se nazývá Mrtvé moře a nachází se mezi Jordánskem, Izraelem a Západním břehem. Jeho hladina se nachází asi 430 metrů pod úrovní moře a je tak nejnižším bodem na Zemi. Mrtvé moře je také známé pro své vysoké zastoupení solí a minerálů, což mu dává léčebné vlastnosti a přitahuje turisty z celého světa.
ces.Rep_En: The Dead Sea is located between the Jordan River, the West Bank and the Red Sea, and is the lowest point on Earth at 430 meters, and is known for its high salinity and mineral content, which gives it healing properties and attracts tourists from all over the world.

ckb.Qst: ئەو زەریایەی کە نزمترین خاڵی لەسەر زەوی تێدایە
ckb.Rep: زەریایەی نزمترین خاڵی لەسەر زەوی تێدایە، زەردەمی خاڵی ئاوێزی (hydrogen)ە. ئەم زەریاکە بەرزترین چارەسەری ئەندامانی تەختەکلیلی (atomic nucleus) دەگۆڕدرێت، وەکو ئەوەی لەگەڵ زەریاکانی تر، تەنها یەک پێکەوە دەگۆڕدرێت. زەردەمی خاڵی ئاوێزی بە شێوازی هەڵبژاردنی (fusion) دەگۆڕدرێت، کە لەگەڵ زەریاکانی تر، زەویی بەرزتر دەگۆڕدرێت. لەبەر ئەمەش، زەردەمی خاڵی ئاوێزی بەرزترین خاڵی کە دەتوانرێت بە شێوازی هەڵبژاردنی دابەش بکرێت، وەکو ئەوەی لەگەڵ زەریاکانی تر، دەتوانرێت بە شێوازی هەڵبژاردنی دابەش بکرێت.
ckb.Rep_En: The lowest point on the planet is the hydrogen atom, which is the lowest point on the planet's surface. This is the point where the highest members of the atomic nucleus interact, as with other planets, only one of which interact. The lowest point on the planet's surface is the hydrogen atom, which can be divided by the selection method.

cmn.Qst: 包含地球上最低点的海洋
cmn.Rep: 地球上最低点的海洋是位于约旦河谷的死海。它的海平面高度为地球海平面的最低点，约为海平面的负417米。
cmn.Rep_En: The lowest point on Earth is the Dead Sea in the Jordan Valley, which has a sea level of about minus 417 meters above sea level.

cmn_Hant.Qst: 海洋是地球上最低的地面
cmn_Hant.Rep: 海洋是地球表面的一部分，它覆盖了地球表面的约71%。海洋的平均深度约为3,800米，最深处达到了大约11,000米。虽然海洋的表面看起来平静，但实际上海洋中存在着各种各样的生物和地质活动，包括海底火山、地震、海啸等。因此，海洋并不是地球上最低的地面，但它是地球上最广阔的地面。
cmn_Hant.Rep_En: The ocean is part of the Earth's surface, covering about 71% of the Earth's surface. The average depth of the ocean is about 3,800 meters, and the deepest reaches about 11,000 meters. Although the surface of the ocean looks calm, there is actually a wide variety of biological and geological activity in the ocean, including undersea volcanoes, earthquakes, and tsunami.

cym.Qst: Mae'r cefnfor yn cynnwys y pwynt isaf ar y ddaear.
cym.Rep: Yn wir, mae'r cefnfor yn cynnwys y pwynt isaf ar y ddaear, sef y dyfnder mwyaf o'r ddaear sydd ar gael. Mae'r dyfnder hwn yn amrywio o fewn y cefnfor, ond mae'r dyfnder mwyaf yn y Cefnfor Tawel yn y Dwyrain Canol. Mae'r dyfnder hwn yn oddeutu 11,034 metr (36,200 troedfedd) o ddyfnder.
cym.Rep_En: The deepest point in the Earth's crust is the deepest point on Earth, which is the deepest point on Earth, and the deepest point is the Pacific Ocean, which is about 11,034 meters (36,200 feet) deep.

dan.Qst: som indeholder det laveste punkt på jorden
dan.Rep: Det laveste punkt på jorden er Dødehavet, som ligger ca. 430 meter under havets overflade.
dan.Rep_En: The lowest point on Earth is the Dead Sea, which is about 430 meters below sea level.

deu.Qst: der Ozean enthält den niedrigsten Punkt der Erde
deu.Rep: Das ist nicht ganz korrekt. Der tiefste Punkt der Erde ist der Marianengraben im Pazifischen Ozean, der eine Tiefe von etwa 11.000 Metern erreicht. Allerdings ist der Marianengraben nicht der niedrigste Punkt der Erde, da er sich unterhalb des Meeresspiegels befindet. Der niedrigste Punkt der Erde ist das Tote Meer, das sich zwischen Israel und Jordanien befindet und eine Tiefe von etwa 430 Metern unter dem Meeresspiegel hat.
deu.Rep_En: The deepest point on Earth is the Mariana Trench in the Pacific Ocean, which reaches a depth of about 11,000 meters, but the Mariana Trench is not the lowest point on Earth, as it is below sea level.

ell.Qst: Ο ωκεανός που περιέχει το χαμηλότερο σημείο στη γη
ell.Rep: Ο ωκεανός που περιέχει το χαμηλότερο σημείο στη γη είναι ο Ειρηνικός Ωκεανός. Το σημείο αυτό είναι η Αποβάθρα Τσαλέ, στη Νότια Ανταρκτική, και βρίσκεται σε βάθος περίπου 10.920 μέτρων κάτω από την επιφάνεια της θάλασσας.
ell.Rep_En: The lowest point on Earth is the Pacific Ocean, which is located at the Chalice Pier in Antarctica, at a depth of about 10,920 meters below sea level.

est.Qst: mis on Maa madalaim punkt.
est.Rep: Maa madalaim punkt on Kaspia mere kaldal asuv Väike Kaukasuse mäestikus asuv Kaspia mere absoluutne nullpunkt, mis asub 28 meetrit allpool merepinda. See on kõige madalam punkt Maa pinnal.
est.Rep_En: The lowest point on Earth is the Caspian Sea, which is located 28 meters below sea level.

fin.Qst: Alueella on myös maailman matalin piste.
fin.Rep: Tämä on totta. Maailman matalin piste sijaitsee Jordanian ja Israelin rajalla sijaitsevassa Kuolleessa meressä. Sen pinta-ala on noin 430 metriä merenpinnan alapuolella.
fin.Rep_En: The lowest point in the world is the Dead Sea, which lies on the border between Jordan and Israel and is about 430 meters below sea level.

fra.Qst: l'océan qui contient le point le plus bas de la terre
fra.Rep: L'océan qui contient le point le plus bas de la terre est l'océan Pacifique. Le point le plus bas de la terre est la fosse des Mariannes, située dans l'océan Pacifique, à une profondeur de 10 994 mètres.
fra.Rep_En: The ocean that contains the lowest point on earth is the Pacific Ocean. The lowest point on earth is the Mariana Trench, located in the Pacific Ocean, at a depth of 10,994 meters.

glg.Qst: O océano contén o punto máis baixo da Terra.
glg.Rep: Correcto! O punto máis baixo da Terra é a Fosa das Marianas, que se atopa no Océano Pacífico e ten unha profundidade de case 11 quilómetros.
glg.Rep_En: The lowest point on Earth is the Mariana Trench, which lies in the Pacific Ocean and is nearly seven miles (11 km) deep.

guj.Qst: સમુદ્રમાં પૃથ્વી પર સૌથી નીચલા બિંદુ છે.
guj.Rep: સાચું છે, સમુદ્રમાં પૃથ્વી પર સૌથી નીચલા બિંદુ માનવ જીવન માટે અસ્તવ્યસ્ત છે કારણકે તેને સામૂહિક રીતે સંકળાયેલા પ્રદૂષણ અને વિવિધ પ્રકારના કારણોથી પ્રભાવિત થાય છે. આ બિંદુને માનવ સભ્યતા માટે ખુબ મહત્વ આપવામાં આવે છે કારણકે સમુદ્ર પર આધારિત કેટલાક ઉપકરણો અને સેવાઓ માનવ જીવન માટે મહત્વના છે.
guj.Rep_En: The lowest point on Earth is the ocean, which is a disaster for human life because of its mass pollution and other factors.This point is of great importance to human civilization because of the many sea-based devices and services that are essential to human life.

heb.Qst: האוקיינוס המכיל את הנקודה הנמוכה ביותר על פני האדמה.
heb.Rep: הנקודה הנמוכה ביותר על פני האדמה היא באזור המצוי בין ים סרטוב (Sea of Serov) וים פרסי (Persian Gulf) במזרח קזחסטן, והיא נמצאת בעומק של 8,377 מטרים מתחת לפני המים. האזור הזה ידוע כמפרץ צ'אלקן (Challenger Deep) והוא חלק מהאוקיינוס השקט.
heb.Rep_En: The lowest point on Earth is in the area between the Sea of Serov and the Persian Gulf in eastern Kazakhstan, and it's 8,377 meters below the surface. This area is known as the Challenger Deep and is part of the Pacific Ocean.

hin.Qst: जिसमें पृथ्वी पर सबसे निचला बिंदु है
hin.Rep: पृथ्वी पर सबसे निचला बिंदु अंतःआधार है। यह भारत के अंडमान निकोबार द्वीप समूह में स्थित है।
hin.Rep_En: The lowest point on Earth is Antarctica, located in the Andaman and Nicobar Islands of India.

hrv.Qst: ocean koji sadrži najnižu točku na Zemlji
hrv.Rep: Najniža točka na Zemlji je Mrtvo more, koje se nalazi na granici Izraela, Jordana i Palestine. Mrtvo more je slano jezero koje se nalazi 430 metara ispod razine mora, što ga čini najnižom točkom na Zemlji.
hrv.Rep_En: The lowest point on Earth is the Dead Sea, which lies on the border of Israel, Jordan, and Palestine. The Dead Sea is a salt lake that lies 430 meters below sea level, making it the lowest point on Earth.

hun.Qst: amely az óceánban található a Föld legalacsonyabb pontja.
hun.Rep: Az óceánban található Föld legalacsonyabb pontja a Mariana-árok Challenger mélyének nevezett helye a Csendes-óceánban, amelynek mélysége mintegy 11 kilométer.
hun.Rep_En: The lowest point on Earth is the Mariana Trench in the Pacific Ocean, which is about 11 kilometers deep.

hye.Qst: Օվկիանոսը, որը պարունակում է Երկրի ամենացածր կետը
hye.Rep: Օվկիանոսը պարունակում է Հայաստանի ամենացածր կետը, որը գտնվում է Ջրվեժ գավառի հարավային մարմնի վրա: Այս կետը բացառությամբ հանդիսանում է ամենաբարձր գետնի կետը այդ տարածքում:
hye.Rep_En: The ocean contains the lowest point in Armenia, located on the southern body of the Jerevezh province. This point is by far the highest land point in the area.

ind.Qst: lautan yang berisi titik terendah di bumi
ind.Rep: Lautan yang berisi titik terendah di bumi adalah Laut Mati. Titik terendahnya terletak sekitar 430 meter di bawah permukaan laut.
ind.Rep_En: The lowest point on Earth is the Dead Sea, which is about 430 meters below sea level.

isl.Qst: Hafið er lægsta staðurinn á jörðu.
isl.Rep: Það er ekki rétt. Hafið er ekki lægsta staðurinn á jörðu. Lægsta staðurinn á jörðu er Döðuhlíð í Mýrdalssandi á Suðurlandi íslenska. Hann er 130 metra undir sjávarmáli.
isl.Rep_En: It's not true. The ocean is not the lowest place on earth. The lowest place on earth is Dead Sea Reef in Mýrdalssandi in southern Iceland. It's 130 meters below sea level.

ita.Qst: che contiene il punto più basso della terra
ita.Rep: Il punto più basso della terra è la Fossa delle Marianne, situata nell'Oceano Pacifico, a circa 11 chilometri di profondità sotto il livello del mare.
ita.Rep_En: The lowest point on Earth is the Mariana Trench, located in the Pacific Ocean, about 11 kilometers below sea level.

jav.Qst: Samodra sing ngemot titik paling ngisor ing bumi
jav.Rep: Saya mohon maaf, saya tidak dapat memahami kalimat yang Anda tulis. Apakah Anda bisa memberikan informasi lebih lanjut atau mengubah bahasa ke dalam bahasa Inggris atau Indonesia yang lebih mudah dipahami?
jav.Rep_En: I'm sorry, I can't understand what you're saying. Can you give me more information or change the language to English or Indonesian that is easier to understand?

jpn.Qst: 海は地球上で最も低い点を 含んでいる
jpn.Rep: 海は地球上で最も低い点を含んでいます。マリアナ海溝は、地球上で最も深い場所であり、深さは約11キロメートルに達しています。また、海面下にある場所もあり、例えば、地中海の最深部は海面下約5キロメートルにあります。
jpn.Rep_En: The ocean contains the lowest point on Earth, the Mariana Trench, which is the deepest place on Earth, reaching a depth of about 11 kilometers, and there are places below sea level, such as the deepest part of the Mediterranean Sea, which is about 5 kilometers below sea level.

kan.Qst: ಭೂಮಿಯ ಮೇಲಿನ ಅತ್ಯಂತ ಕಡಿಮೆ ಬಿಂದುವನ್ನು ಹೊಂದಿರುವ ಸಾಗರ
kan.Rep:
ಭೂಮಿಯ ಮೇಲಿನ ಅತ್ಯಂತ ಕಡಿಮೆ ಬಿಂದುವನ್ನು ಹೊಂದಿರುವ ಸಾಗರ ಹೊಂದಿರುವ ಬಿಂದುವಿನ ಆಳ ಮತ್ತು ವಿಸ್ತಾರವನ್ನು ಪರಿಶೀಲಿಸಬೇಕು. ಸಾಮಾನ್ಯವಾಗಿ, ಸಾಗರದ ಆಳ ಕಡಿಮೆಯಾಗಿರುವುದು ಕೆಲವು ಕಾರಣಗಳಿಂದ ಹೀಗೆ ಆಗುತ್ತದೆ:

1. ಸಾಗರದ ಸುತ್ತಲೂ ಭೂಮಿಯ ಸ್ಥಳಗಳು ಕಡಿಮೆಯಾಗಿರುವುದು.
2. ಸಾಗರದ ನೀರು ಬಹಳ ಕಡಿಮೆ ಆಳವಾಗಿರುವುದು.
3. ಸಾಗರದ ನೀರು ಬಹಳ ಶಾಂತವಾಗಿರುವುದು.

ಇವುಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ಯಾವುದೇ ಒಂದು ಕಾರಣವೂ ಸಾಗರದ ಆಳಕ್ಕೆ ಪರಿಣಾಮವನ್ನು ಬೀರಬಹುದು.
kan.Rep_En:
The depth of the ocean is the lowest point on the earth, and the depth of the ocean is the lowest point on the earth.
1.Low land areas around the ocean.
2. The depth of the ocean is very shallow.
3. The water in the ocean is very calm.
Any one of these reasons could have an impact on the depth of the ocean.

kat.Qst: ოკეანე, რომელიც დედამიწის ყველაზე დაბალ წერტილს შეიცავს
kat.Rep: დეპრესიული პაციენტების მკურნალობის პროცესში გამოყენებული ოკეანები არიან მაღალი ტერაპევტიკული პოტენციალით დამოუკიდებლად დაბალ წერტილებში მდგომარეობს. ეს არის რადგან ამასთან, რომ დეპრესიას წარმოადგენს სიმპტომები, რომლებიც მაღალი დოზე მიეკუთვნება ოკეანების მეშვეობით, რეცეპტორების მიერ განახლებული აქტივობაზე დამოკიდებულია. ამიტომ, ოკეანები შეიძლება იყოს ეფექტური დამოკიდებულების მიღებისთვის დეპრესიის მკურნალობაში.
kat.Rep_En: The use of OTCs in the treatment of depression is highly therapeutic, even at low doses, because the symptoms of depression are associated with high doses of OTCs, which depend on the reactivity of the receptors.

khm.Qst: សមុទ្រ ដែល មាន ចំណុច ទាប បំផុត នៅ លើ ផែនដី
khm.Rep: សមុទ្រដែលមានចំណុចទាបបំផុតនៅលើផែនដីគឺជាសមុទ្រដែលមានកម្ពស់ជាងគេប្រើប្រាស់នៅក្នុងការសិក្សាប្រព័ន្ធដី។ វាមានឈ្មោះថា "Mount Everest" និងកម្ពស់ប្រហែលជាង ៨៨០០ម៉ែត្រ។ វាមានទិសដៅនៅក្នុងតំបន់ប្រសើរវាស់ប្រទេសប៉ាស៊ីហ្គាស់ប៊ី។
khm.Rep_En: The lowest point on Earth is the highest point used in the study of the earth's crust. It is called "Mount Everest" and is about 8,800 meters high. It is oriented in the Pacific Ocean.

kir.Qst: Жер бетиндеги эң төмөнкү чекитти камтыган океан
kir.Rep: Көптөгөн жер беттеринде океандардын деңгээндери болуп саналат. Бирок, эң төмөнкү чекитти камтыган океан Атлантика океандын деңгээндеринден бири болуп, өз аймагында өзгөчөлүктөрү бар. Океандын деңгээндери жер бетининг көпчүлүгүнө карай көбүнчө бөлүнөт.
kir.Rep_En: Many land surfaces are ocean levels, but the ocean that contains the lowest point is the Atlantic Ocean, which is one of the ocean levels, and has features on its own territory.

kor.Qst: 지구상에서 가장 낮은 지점을 포함하는 바다
kor.Rep: 지구상에서 가장 낮은 지점은 마리아나해저에 위치한 마리아나해구(Mariana Trench)입니다. 이 해구는 태평양과 필리핀해, 동중국해, 동해 등이 만나는 지점에 위치하며, 깊이는 약 11,000m에 달합니다. 따라서, 마리아나해구는 지구상에서 가장 깊은 곳이기도 합니다.
kor.Rep_En: The lowest point on Earth is the Mariana Trench, located in the Mariana Trench, where the Pacific Ocean, Philippine Sea, East China Sea, and the East China Sea meet, and is about 11,000 meters deep.

lao.Qst: ທະເລສາບທີ່ ມີຈຸດທີ່ ຕ່ໍາ ສຸດ ໃນ ໂລກ.
lao.Rep:
ທະເລສາບທີ່ມີຈຸດທີ່ຕ່ໍາສຸດໃນໂລກສາມາດປັບປຸງໄດ້ທີ່ນີ້:

1. ປະຕິບັດການຕັ້ງຄ່າໂລກ: ຕັ້ງຄ່າໂລກເປັນວິທີການຕັ້ງຄ່າທີ່ຈະເປັນຕົວເລືອກຂອງຜູ້ໃຊ້. ທີ່ນີ້ຈະເປັນຕົວເລືອກທີ່ສາມາດປັບປຸງໄດ້ສະຫຼັດສະຫຼູບສະຫຼາດຂອງໂລກຂອງຜູ້ໃຊ້.

2. ການຕັ້ງຄ່າຜູ້ໃຊ້: ຕັ້ງຄ່າຜູ້ໃຊ້ເປັນວິທີການຕັ້ງຄ່າທີ່ຈະເປັນຕົວເລືອກຂອງຜູ້ໃຊ້. ທີ່ນີ້ຈະເປັນຕົວເລືອກທີ່ສາມາດປັບປຸງໄດ້ສະຫຼັດສະຫຼູບສະຫຼາດຂອງຜູ້ໃຊ້.

3. ການຕັ້ງຄ່າສະຖານະການຕັ້ງຄ່າ: ຕັ້ງຄ່າສະຖານະການຕັ້ງຄ່າເປັນວິທີການຕັ້ງຄ່າທີ່ຈະເປັນຕົວເລືອກຂອງຜູ້ໃຊ້. ທີ່ນີ້ຈະເປັນຕົວເລືອກທີ່ສາມາດປັບປຸງໄດ້ສະຫຼັດສະຫຼູບສະຫຼາດຂອງຜູ້ໃຊ້.

4. ການຕັ້ງຄ່າຜູ້ຕິດຕາມ: ຕັ້ງຄ່າຜູ້ຕິດຕາມເປັນວິທີການຕັ້ງຄ່າທີ່ຈະເປັນຕົວເລືອກຂອງຜູ້ໃຊ້. ທີ່ນີ້ຈະເປັນຕົວເລືອກທີ່ສາມາດປັບປຸງໄດ້ສະຫຼັດສະຫຼູບສະຫຼາດຂອງຜູ້ຕິດຕາມ.

lit.Qst: vandenynas, kuriame yra žemiausias taškas Žemėje
lit.Rep: Žemėje yra kelios vietos, kuriose yra žemiausias taškas, tačiau didžiausias gylis yra Ramiojo vandenyno Marių gelmėje, kurioje yra įregistruotas 10 911 metrų gylis. Ši vieta vadinama Čallengerio giluma ir yra pripažinta kaip žemiausia taškas Žemėje.
lit.Rep_En: The deepest point on Earth is the Mariana Trench in the Pacific Ocean, which is 1011 meters deep, and is known as the Challenger Trench.

lvs.Qst: okeāns, kurā atrodas zemākais punkts uz Zemes
lvs.Rep: Zemākais punkts uz Zemes atrodas Klusajā okeānā, pie Fidži salām, un to sauc par Mariana grāvju. Šis grāvis ir aptuveni 11 kilometru dziļš.
lvs.Rep_En: The lowest point on Earth is in the Pacific Ocean, off the Fiji Islands, and it's called the Mariana Trench.

mai.Qst: समुद्रक निचला भाग पृथ्वीक निचला भाग छी ।
