mai.Rep_En: I'm sorry, I don't understand the exact meaning of this sentence. Please clarify it so I can help you.

mal.Qst: സമുദ്രത്തിന്റെ ഏറ്റവും താഴ്ന്ന ഭാഗം ഭൂമിയിലെ ഏറ്റവും താഴ്ന്ന സ്ഥലമാണ്.
mal.Rep: സമുദ്രത്തിന്റെ ഏറ്റവും താഴ്ന്ന ഭാഗം മരിച്ചപ്പോൾ ഭൂമിയിലെ ഏറ്റവും താഴ്ന്ന സ്ഥലമായിരിക്കും. ഇത് മരുഭൂമിയിലെ മരുത്തുകൾ അല്ലെങ്കിൽ കാരണക്കാരുകൾ എന്നും പറയപ്പെടുന്നു. സമുദ്രത്തിന്റെ ഏറ്റവും ഉയർന്ന ഭാഗം ഹിമാലയത്തിലാണ് അവസാനത്തെ പീക്ക് എന്നും പറയപ്പെടുന്നു.
mal.Rep_En: The lowest part of the ocean is the lowest place on earth when it dies. It is also called the desert marshes or causeways. The highest part of the ocean is in the Himalayas and is also called the last peak.

mar.Qst: ज्या महासागरामध्ये पृथ्वीवरील सर्वात खालचा बिंदू आहे
mar.Rep: त्या बिंदूचे नाव हे हेर्नान्डेज बिंदू आहे आणि तो दक्षिण आणि पूर्व क्षेत्रात आहे. तो भारताच्या पश्चिमेकडील अरब समुद्रात आहे.
mar.Rep_En: The point is called Hernandez Point and it's in the southern and eastern regions. It's in the Arabian Sea in the western part of India.

mkd.Qst: Океан кој ја содржи најниската точка на Земјата
mkd.Rep: Океанот кој го содржи најниската точка на Земјата е Тихиот Океан. Најниската точка на Земјата е Маријанската пропаст, која се наоѓа во западниот дел на Тихиот Океан и има длабочина од околу 11 километри.
mkd.Rep_En: The ocean that contains the lowest point on Earth is the Pacific Ocean. The lowest point on Earth is the Mariana Trench, which is located in the western part of the Pacific Ocean and has a depth of about 11 kilometers.

mlt.Qst: L-oċean huwa l-aktar punt baxx fuq l-art.
mlt.Rep: Iva, l-oċean huwa l-aktar punt baxx fuq l-art. F'daqqa ta' 71% tal-art huwa koperat mill-oċean, u huwa l-aktar sors ta' oksigenju u frott tal-ħajja fuq il-pjaneta. Huwa wkoll joffri sorsi ta' ikel u għajnuna għall-kummerċ u l-ekonomija globali.
mlt.Rep_En: The ocean is the lowest point on Earth, covering 71% of the Earth's surface and is the largest source of oxygen and life on the planet, as well as a source of food and aiding global trade and economy.

nld.Qst: oceaan die het laagste punt op aarde bevat
nld.Rep: De oceaan die het laagste punt op aarde bevat is de Grote Oceaan. Het diepste punt in de oceaan is de Marianentrog, gelegen in de westelijke Stille Oceaan, ten oosten van de Filipijnen. Het diepste punt van de Marianentrog is de Challengerdiepte, die ongeveer 11 kilometer onder het zeeoppervlak ligt. Dit is het laagste punt op aarde.
nld.Rep_En: The deepest point in the ocean is the Mariana Trench, located in the western Pacific Ocean east of the Philippines, the deepest point of the Mariana Trench is the Challenger Trench, which is about 11 kilometers below sea level.

nno.Qst: som inneholder det laveste punktet på jorden
nno.Rep: Det laveste punktet på jorden er Dødehavet, som ligger ca. 430 meter under havnivået.
nno.Rep_En: The lowest point on Earth is the Dead Sea, which is about 430 meters below sea level.

nob.Qst: som inneholder det laveste punktet på jorden
nob.Rep: Det laveste punktet på jorden er Dødehavet, som ligger ca. 430 meter under havnivået.
nob.Rep_En: The lowest point on Earth is the Dead Sea, which is about 430 meters below sea level.

npi.Qst: समुद्रको सबैभन्दा तल्लो भागमा पृथ्वीको सबैभन्दा तल्लो स्थान रहेको छ ।
npi.Rep: हो, तपाईं सही छन्। समुद्र तल्लो भागमा रहेको छ र पृथ्वीको सबैभन्दा तल्लो स्थानमा रहेको छ।
npi.Rep_En: Yes, you're right. The ocean is at the bottom and is the lowest place on Earth.

pbt.Qst: سمندر د ځمکې تر ټولو ټیټه نقطه ده.
pbt.Rep: ممکن است سوال شما را درست نفهمیده باشم. آیا می‌توانید سوال خود را با جزئیات بیشتری توضیح دهید؟
pbt.Rep_En: I may not have understood your question correctly. Can you explain the question in more detail?

pes.Qst: اقیانوس که پایین ترین نقطه ی زمین را در خود جای داده است.
pes.Rep: اقیانوس دوغابی (Mariana Trench) در اقیانوس آرام، پایین ترین نقطهٔ زمین است که در آن عمق آب به ۱۰٬۹۹۱ متر می‌رسد.
pes.Rep_En: The Mariana Trench in the Pacific Ocean is the lowest point on Earth, with a water depth of 10,911 meters.

pol.Qst: ocean, który zawiera najniższy punkt na Ziemi
pol.Rep: To Ocean Spokojny, a najniższym punktem na Ziemi jest Row Mariański, który znajduje się w tym oceanie i ma głębokość około 11 kilometrów poniżej poziomu morza.
pol.Rep_En: The lowest point on Earth is the Mariana Trench, which lies in the Pacific Ocean and is about 11 kilometers below sea level.

por.Qst: que contém o ponto mais baixo da Terra
por.Rep: O ponto mais baixo da Terra é o Mar Morto, localizado entre Israel, Jordânia e Palestina, com uma profundidade de cerca de 304 metros abaixo do nível do mar.
por.Rep_En: The lowest point on Earth is the Dead Sea, located between Israel, Jordan and Palestine, with a depth of about 304 meters below sea level.

ron.Qst: care conţine cel mai jos punct de pe Pământ
ron.Rep: Cel mai jos punct de pe Pământ este Depresiunea Marelui Lac Sărat din Israel, situată la aproximativ 429 de metri sub nivelul mării.
ron.Rep_En: The lowest point on Earth is the Great Salt Lake Depression in Israel, which is about 429 meters below sea level.

rus.Qst: океан, в котором находится самая низкая точка на Земле
rus.Rep: Этот океан называется Мертвое море. Он расположен на границе Израиля, Иордании и Палестины, и его самая низкая точка находится на уровне 430,5 метров ниже уровня моря.
rus.Rep_En: The Dead Sea is located on the border of Israel, Jordan and Palestine, and its lowest point is at 430.5 meters below sea level.

slk.Qst: oceán, ktorý obsahuje najnižší bod na Zemi
slk.Rep: Tento oceán sa nazýva Mŕtve more a nachádza sa medzi Izraelom a Jordánskom. Jeho najnižší bod sa nachádza 430 metrov pod hladinou mora.
slk.Rep_En: The Dead Sea is located between Israel and Jordan and its lowest point is 430 meters below sea level.

slv.Qst: ocean, ki vsebuje najnižjo točko na Zemlji
slv.Rep: Najnižja točka na Zemlji se nahaja v Mrtvem morju, ki je slano jezero na meji med Izraelom, Jordanijo in Palestino. Njegova najnižja točka je 430 metrov pod morsko gladino.
slv.Rep_En: The lowest point on Earth is located in the Dead Sea, which is a salt lake on the border between Israel, Jordan, and Palestine.

spa.Qst: océano que contiene el punto más bajo de la tierra
spa.Rep: El océano que contiene el punto más bajo de la tierra es el Mar Muerto, ubicado entre Israel, Jordania y Palestina. Su punto más bajo se encuentra a unos 430 metros por debajo del nivel del mar.
spa.Rep_En: The ocean that contains the lowest point on earth is the Dead Sea, located between Israel, Jordan and Palestine. Its lowest point is about 430 meters below sea level.

srp.Qst: океан који садржи најнижу тачку на Земљи
srp.Rep: Најнижа тачка на Земљи је Мртво море, које се налази на границама Израела, Јордана и Палестине. Мртво море је најнижа тачка на сувом копну, са најнижом тачком на -429 метара испод нивоа мора.
srp.Rep_En: The lowest point on Earth is the Dead Sea, which lies on the borders of Israel, Jordan, and Palestine. The Dead Sea is the lowest point on land, with the lowest point at -429 meters below sea level.

swe.Qst: som innehåller den lägsta punkten på jorden
swe.Rep: Den lägsta punkten på jorden är Döda havet, som ligger på gränsen mellan Israel och Jordanien. Döda havet ligger cirka 430 meter under havsytan.
swe.Rep_En: The lowest point on Earth is the Dead Sea, which lies on the border between Israel and Jordan.

swh.Qst: Bahari ya Dunia ina sehemu ya chini kabisa duniani
swh.Rep: Ndiyo, Bahari ya Dead (Bahari ya Chumvi) ina sehemu ya chini kabisa duniani, ambayo iko takriban mita 304 chini ya usawa wa bahari. Sehemu hii inaitwa "Mkondo wa Afar" na iko kati ya Israel, Yordani na Palestina.
swh.Rep_En: The Dead Sea is the deepest part of the world, at about 304 meters below sea level, and is located between Israel, Jordan and Palestine.

tel.Qst: ఈ మహాసముద్రం భూమిపై అతి తక్కువ స్థాయిని కలిగి ఉంది.
tel.Rep: మహాసముద్రం భూమిపై అతి తక్కువ స్థాయిని కలిగి ఉందని అర్థం లేదు. దయచేసి మీరు మీ ప్రశ్నను సరిగా వివరించండి, నేను మీకు సహాయం చేస్తాను.
tel.Rep_En: The ocean is the lowest point on earth, so please explain your question correctly and I will help you.

tgk.Qst: ки дар он нуқтаи пасттарини Замин мавҷуд аст
tgk.Rep: Ман наметавонам точикирои маълумоти шуморо дар бораи нуқтаи пасттарини Замин ба шумо берам, зеро ман маълумоти камоланда барои ин мавзу надорам. вумо метавонед бо мансабат ба ин мавзу маълумоти бештарро ҳамохӯй гиред.
tgk.Rep_En: I can't give you a rough idea of your information about the lowest point on Earth, because I don't have a lot of information for this season, but you can get more information about this season by following the career.

tgl.Qst: Ang karagatan ay naglalaman ng pinakamababang punto sa mundo.
tgl.Rep: Tama po ang inyong sinabi. Ang Challenger Deep sa Mariana Trench sa Pasipiko ay itinuturing na pinakamababang punto sa mundo na may kabuuang lalim na 10,994 metro o 36,070 talampakan. Ito ay isang napakalalim na bahagi ng karagatan na hindi pa lubusang nalalaman ang mga itinatagong yaman at mga uri ng buhay na maaaring matagpuan dito.
tgl.Rep_En: The Challenger Deep in the Mariana Trench in the Pacific Ocean is the deepest point in the world, at 10,994 meters (36,070 feet), and is the deepest part of the ocean where the hidden resources and life forms that can be found are not yet fully understood.

tha.Qst: มหาสมุทรที่มีจุดต่ําสุดบนโลก
tha.Rep: มหาสมุทรที่มีจุดต่ำสุดบนโลกคือ มหาสมุทรแปซิฟิก โดยจุดต่ำสุดของมหาสมุทรแปซิฟิกอยู่ที่จุดชื่อว่า ดีเอพซีฟ (Deep Sea) หรือ ช่องมหาสมุทรมารีนา (Mariana Trench) ซึ่งตั้งอยู่ในมหาสมุทรแปซิฟิกระหว่างอเมริกาใต้และญี่ปุ่น โดยจุดต่ำสุดนี้มีความลึกประมาณ 11,034 เมตรจากระดับน้ำทะเลปกคลุมโลก ซึ่งเป็นจุดที่มีความลึกมากที่สุดบนโลกด้วยกัน
tha.Rep_En: The deepest point in the world is the Pacific Ocean, which is located in the Mariana Trench, between South America and Japan, at a depth of 11,034 meters above sea level.

tur.Qst: Okyanus, Dünya'nın en düşük noktasını içerir.
tur.Rep: Hayır, Dünya'nın en düşük noktası, Pasifik Okyanusu'ndaki Mariana Çukuru'dur. Bu çukur, yaklaşık 11 kilometre derinliğiyle Dünya'nın en derin noktasıdır.
tur.Rep_En: The lowest point in the world is the Mariana Trench in the Pacific Ocean, which is about 11 kilometers deep.

ukr.Qst: Океан, який містить найнижчу точку на Землі
ukr.Rep: Найнижча точка на Землі - це Мертве море, яке знаходиться на кордоні Ізраїлю, Йорданії та Палестини. Його рівень води становить близько 430 метрів нижче рівня світового океану.
ukr.Rep_En: The lowest point on Earth is the Dead Sea, which lies between Israel, Jordan and Palestine, and is about 430 meters below sea level.

urd.Qst: سمندر کا وہ حصہ جس میں زمین کا سب سے نچلا مقام موجود ہے
urd.Rep: سمندر کا وہ حصہ جس میں زمین کا سب سے نچلا مقام موجود ہے کو سمندر کی گہرائی کہتے ہیں۔ اس حصہ کی گہرائی مختلف سمندروں میں مختلف ہوتی ہے۔ مثلاً، خلیجِ میکسیکو کی گہرائی تقریباً ۴۰۰ فیٹ ہے جبکہ فلپائن کے قریبی سمندر کی گہرائی تقریباً ۳۵،۰۰۰ فیٹ ہے۔
urd.Rep_En: The deepest part of the ocean is called the ocean floor, and the depth varies from ocean to ocean, with the Gulf of Mexico at about 400 feet deep and the Philippines at about 35,000 feet.

vie.Qst: đại dương có điểm thấp nhất trên trái đất
vie.Rep: Điểm thấp nhất trên trái đất là Đại Tây Dương, tại Vực Mariana, với độ sâu khoảng 11.034 mét so với mực nước biển. Nơi này nằm ở phía tây nam của đảo Guam, thuộc lãnh thổ Hoa Kỳ.
vie.Rep_En: The lowest point on Earth is the Atlantic Ocean at the Mariana Trench, at a depth of about 11,034 meters above sea level, southwest of the U.S. territory of Guam.

yue.Qst: 海洋係地球上最低嘅位置
yue.Rep: 海洋是地球上海拔最低的地方，海平面的平均高度约为海拔0米。全球约71%的地表被海洋覆盖，海洋是地球上最大的水体，也是地球上最重要的生态系统之一。
yue.Rep_En: The ocean is the lowest point on Earth, with an average elevation of about 0 meters above sea level. About 71% of the world's surface is covered by the ocean. The ocean is the largest body of water on Earth, and one of the most important ecosystems on Earth.

zlm.Qst: lautan yang mengandungi titik terendah di bumi
zlm.Rep: Lautan yang mengandungi titik terendah di bumi adalah Laut Mati. Titik terendahnya terletak sekitar 430 meter di bawah permukaan laut.
zlm.Rep_En: The ocean that contains the lowest point on earth is the Dead Sea, whose lowest point is about 430 meters below sea level.

eng.Qst: what are the names of the atom bombs dropped on japan
eng.Rep: The names of the atom bombs dropped on Japan are "Little Boy" and "Fat Man".

afr.Qst: Wat is die name van die atoombomme wat op Japan gegooi is?
afr.Rep: Die atoombomme wat op Japan gegooi is, was genoem "Little Boy" en "Fat Man". "Little Boy" is op 6 Augustus 1945 op Hiroshima gegooi en "Fat Man" is op 9 Augustus 1945 op Nagasaki gegooi.
afr.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped on Japan were called "Little Boy" and "Fat Man". "Little Boy" was dropped on Hiroshima on August 6, 1945, and "Fat Man" was dropped on Nagasaki on August 9, 1945.

arb.Qst: ما هي أسماء القنابل الذرية التي أسقطت على اليابان؟
arb.Rep:
أسقطت الولايات المتحدة الأمريكية قنبلتين ذريتين على اليابان خلال الحرب العالمية الثانية، وهما:

1- قنبلة "ليتل بوي" التي أسقطت على مدينة هيروشيما في 6 أغسطس 1945.

2- قنبلة "فاطمة" التي أسقطت على مدينة ناغازاكي في 9 أغسطس 1945.
arb.Rep_En:
The United States dropped two atomic bombs on Japan during World War II, namely:
The Little Boy bomb dropped on Hiroshima on August 6, 1945.
The Fatima bomb dropped on the city of Nagasaki on August 9, 1945.

ary.Qst: اشنو اسماء القنابل الذرية اللي تم إسقاطها على اليابان؟
ary.Rep:
تم إسقاط قنبلتين ذريتين على اليابان خلال الحرب العالمية الثانية، وهما:

1- قنبلة "ليتل بوي" التي أسقطت على مدينة هيروشيما في 6 أغسطس 1945.

2- قنبلة "فاطمة" التي أسقطت على مدينة ناغازاكي في 9 أغسطس 1945.
ary.Rep_En:
Two atomic bombs were dropped on Japan during World War II, namely:
The "Little Boy" bomb dropped on the city of Hiroshima on August 6, 1945.
The Fatima bomb dropped on Nagasaki on August 9, 1945.

arz.Qst: ايه اسماء القنابل الذرية اللي اتسقطت على اليابان؟
arz.Rep:
تم إسقاط قنبلتين ذريتين على اليابان خلال الحرب العالمية الثانية، وكانت أسماءهما:

1- قنبلة "ليتل بوي" التي أسقطت على مدينة هيروشيما في 6 أغسطس 1945.

2- قنبلة "فاطمة" التي أسقطت على مدينة ناغازاكي في 9 أغسطس 1945.
arz.Rep_En:
Two atomic bombs were dropped on Japan during World War II, and their names were:
The "Little Boy" bomb dropped on the city of Hiroshima on August 6, 1945.
2- The "Fatima" bomb dropped on the city of Nagasaki on August 9, 1945.

asm.Qst: জাপানত পৰমাণু বোমা নিক্ষেপ কৰা কেইখনমান দেশৰ নাম কি?
asm.Rep: জাপানত পৰমাণু বোমা নিক্ষেপ কৰা হৈছে 1945 চনত।
asm.Rep_En: The atomic bomb was dropped on Japan in 1945.

bel.Qst: як называюцца атамныя бомбы, скінутыя на Японію
bel.Rep: Атомные бомбы, сброшенные на Японию в 1945 году, назывались "Литл Бой" и "Фэт Мен".
bel.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped on Japan in 1945 were called "Little Boy" and "Fat Man".

ben.Qst: জাপানে পরমাণু বোমা নিক্ষেপের নাম কি?
ben.Rep: জাপানে পরমাণু বোমা নিক্ষেপের নাম হল "হিরোশিমা ও নাগাসাকি নিঃশ্বাসিত করা"।
ben.Rep_En: The name of the atomic bomb dropped on Japan is "Breathing out Hiroshima and Nagasaki".

bos.Qst: Kako su nazvane atomske bombe bačene na Japan?
bos.Rep: Atomske bombe bačene na Japan su nazvane "Little Boy" i "Fat Man". "Little Boy" je bačen na Hirošimu 6. avgusta 1945. godine, dok je "Fat Man" bačen na Nagasaki tri dana kasnije, 9. avgusta 1945. godine.
bos.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped on Japan were called "Little Boy" and "Fat Man". "Little Boy" was dropped on Hiroshima on August 6, 1945, while "Fat Man" was dropped on Nagasaki three days later, August 9, 1945.

bul.Qst: Какви са имената на атомните бомби, хвърлени върху Япония?
bul.Rep: Имената на атомните бомби, хвърлени върху Япония през Втората световна война, са "Литъл Бой" и "Фат Мен". "Литъл Бой" беше хвърлена върху Хирошима на 6 август 1945 г., а "Фат Мен" беше хвърлена върху Нагасаки на 9 август 1945 г.
bul.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped on Japan during World War II were the Little Boy and Fat Man bombs, the Little Boy bomb dropped on Hiroshima on August 6, 1945, and the Fat Man bomb dropped on Nagasaki on August 9, 1945.

cat.Qst: Quins són els noms de les bombes atòmiques llançades sobre el Japó?
cat.Rep: Les bombes atòmiques que van ser llançades sobre el Japó durant la Segona Guerra Mundial van ser anomenades "Little Boy" i "Fat Man". "Little Boy" va ser llançada sobre la ciutat d'Hiroshima el 6 d'agost de 1945, mentre que "Fat Man" va ser llançada sobre la ciutat de Nagasaki el 9 d'agost de 1945.
cat.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped on Japan during World War II were called "Little Boy" and "Fat Man," with "Little Boy" dropped on Hiroshima on August 6, 1945, and "Fat Man" dropped on Nagasaki on August 9, 1945.

ceb.Qst: Unsa ang ngalan sa mga bomba atomiko nga gibubo sa Hapon?
ceb.Rep: PROMPT_TRIGGERING_CONTENT_MANAGEMENT_POLICY
ceb.Rep_En: This is a list of all the characters that appear in the game.

ces.Qst: Jaké jsou názvy atomových bomb, které byly hodeny na Japonsko?
ces.Rep: Atomové bomby, které byly hodeny na Japonsko během druhé světové války, se jmenovaly "Little Boy" a "Fat Man". "Little Boy" byla bomba, která byla shozována na Hirošimu 6. srpna 1945 a "Fat Man" byla bomba, která byla shozována na Nagasaki 9. srpna 1945.
ces.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped on Japan during World War II were called "Little Boy" and "Fat Man" - "Little Boy" was the bomb dropped on Hiroshima on August 6, 1945, and "Fat Man" was the bomb dropped on Nagasaki on August 9, 1945.

ckb.Qst: ناوی ئەو بۆمبە ئەتۆمییانەی کە لە ژاپۆن فڕێدراون
ckb.Rep: ناوی ئەو بۆمبە ئەتۆمییانەی کە لە ژاپۆن فڕێدراون، بۆمبای هیروشیما و ناگازاکی دەگۆڕێت.
ckb.Rep_En: It changes the name of the atomic bombs dropped on Japan, the Hiroshima and Nagasaki bombs.

cmn.Qst: 日本被投下的原子弹的名字是什么?
cmn.Rep: 日本被投下的原子弹的名字是“Little Boy”和“Fat Man”。“Little Boy”于1945年8月6日被投下在广岛市，“Fat Man”于1945年8月9日被投下在长崎市。
cmn.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped by Japan were named "Little Boy" and "Fat Man" on August 6, 1945 in the city of Hiroshima, and "Fat Man" on August 9, 1945 in the city of Nagasaki.

cmn_Hant.Qst: 日本上投下原子彈的名稱是什么?
cmn_Hant.Rep: 日本上投下原子弹的名称是“小男孩”和“胖子”。小男孩是指在1945年8月6日，美国在广岛市投下的原子弹，而胖子是指在1945年8月9日，美国在长崎市投下的原子弹。
cmn_Hant.Rep_En: The names of the atomic bombs dropped on Japan are "Little Boy" and "Fat Boy" in reference to the atomic bomb dropped by the United States on the city of Hiroshima on August 6, 1945, and "Fat Boy" in reference to the atomic bomb dropped by the United States on the city of Nagasaki on August 9, 1945.

cym.Qst: Beth yw enwau'r bomiau atomig a gollwyd ar Japan?
cym.Rep: Roedd enwau'r bomiau atomig a gollwyd ar Japan yn Hiroshima ac Nagasaki.
cym.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped on Japan were named Hiroshima and Nagasaki.

dan.Qst: Hvad hedder de atombomber, der blev kastet over Japan?
dan.Rep: De atombomber, der blev kastet over Japan, hedder "Little Boy" og "Fat Man". "Little Boy" blev kastet over byen Hiroshima den 6. august 1945, mens "Fat Man" blev kastet over byen Nagasaki den 9. august 1945.
dan.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped on Japan were called "Little Boy" and "Fat Man" - "Little Boy" was dropped on Hiroshima on August 6, 1945, while "Fat Man" was dropped on Nagasaki on August 9, 1945.

deu.Qst: Wie heißen die Atombomben, die auf Japan abgeworfen wurden?
deu.Rep: Die Atombomben, die auf Japan abgeworfen wurden, hießen "Little Boy" und "Fat Man". "Little Boy" wurde am 6. August 1945 über Hiroshima abgeworfen und "Fat Man" wurde am 9. August 1945 über Nagasaki abgeworfen.
deu.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped on Japan were called "Little Boy" and "Fat Man" - "Little Boy" was dropped on Hiroshima on August 6, 1945 and "Fat Man" was dropped on Nagasaki on August 9, 1945.

ell.Qst: Ποια είναι τα ονόματα των ατομικών βόμβων που έπεσαν στην Ιαπωνία;
ell.Rep: Οι ατομικές βόμβες που έπεσαν στην Ιαπωνία ήταν η "Little Boy" που έπεσε στο Χιροσίμα στις 6 Αυγούστου 1945 και η "Fat Man" που έπεσε στο Ναγκασάκι στις 9 Αυγούστου 1945.
ell.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped on Japan were the "Little Boy" dropped on Hiroshima on August 6, 1945 and the "Fat Man" dropped on Nagasaki on August 9, 1945.

est.Qst: millised on Jaapani peale visatud aatomipommide nimed
est.Rep: Jaapani peale visatud aatomipommide nimed olid "Little Boy" ja "Fat Man". "Little Boy" visati Hiroshimale 6. augustil 1945 ja "Fat Man" visati Nagasakile 9. augustil 1945.
est.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped on Japan were the "Little Boy" and "Fat Man" bombs, the "Little Boy" bomb dropped on Hiroshima on August 6, 1945, and the "Fat Man" bomb dropped on Nagasaki on August 9, 1945.

fin.Rep: Toisen maailmansodan aikana Yhdysvallat pudotti atomipommit Hiroshimaan ja Nagasakiin. Ensimmäinen pommi, nimeltään "Little Boy", pudotettiin Hiroshimaan 6. elokuuta 1945 ja toinen pommi, nimeltään "Fat Man", pudotettiin Nagasakiin 9. elokuuta 1945. Pommit aiheuttivat valtavan määrän tuhoa ja kuolemaa, ja ne ovat edelleen yksi historian traagisimmista tapahtumista.
fin.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped on Hiroshima and Nagasaki on August 6, 1945 and on Nagasaki on August 9, 1945 by the United States were the most devastating and deadly atomic bombs ever dropped.

fra.Qst: Quels sont les noms des bombes atomiques larguées sur le Japon?
fra.Rep: Les noms des bombes atomiques larguées sur le Japon sont "Little Boy" sur Hiroshima le 6 août 1945 et "Fat Man" sur Nagasaki le 9 août 1945.
fra.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped on Japan were "Little Boy" on Hiroshima on August 6, 1945 and "Fat Man" on Nagasaki on August 9, 1945.

glg.Qst: Como se chamaron as bombas atómicas lanzadas sobre Xapón?
glg.Rep: As bombas atômicas lançadas sobre o Japão foram chamadas de "Little Boy" e "Fat Man". "Little Boy" foi lançada sobre a cidade de Hiroshima em 6 de agosto de 1945, enquanto "Fat Man" foi lançada sobre a cidade de Nagasaki em 9 de agosto de 1945.
glg.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped on Japan were called "Little Boy" and "Fat Man". "Little Boy" was dropped on the city of Hiroshima on August 6, 1945, while "Fat Man" was dropped on the city of Nagasaki on August 9, 1945.

guj.Qst: જાપાન પર ફેંકવામાં આવેલા અણુ બોમ્બના નામો શું છે?
guj.Rep: જાપાન પર ફેંકવામાં આવેલા અણુ બોમ્બના નામ "હિરોશિમા અને નાગાસાકી બોમ્બ" છે.
guj.Rep_En: The name of the atomic bombs dropped on Japan is "Hiroshima and Nagasaki Bombs".

heb.Qst: מה השמות של הפצצות האטומיות שנפלו על יפן?
heb.Rep: שתי הפצצות האטומיות שנפלו על יפן במלחמת העולם השנייה היו הפצצה האטומית הראשונה שנקראה "ליטל בוי" והפצצה השנייה שנקראה "פאט מן".
heb.Rep_En: The two atomic bombs dropped on Japan in World War II were the first atomic bomb called "Little Boy" and the second bomb called "Fat Man".

hin.Qst: जापान पर गिराए गए परमाणु बम के नाम क्या हैं?
hin.Rep: जापान पर गिराए गए परमाणु बम के नाम "हिरोशिमा बम" और "नागासाकी बम" हैं।
hin.Rep_En: The names of the atomic bombs dropped on Japan are "Hiroshima bomb" and "Nagasaki bomb".

hrv.Qst: Kako se zovu atomske bombe bačene na Japan?
hrv.Rep: Atomske bombe bačene na Japan su nazvane "Little Boy" i "Fat Man". "Little Boy" je bačen na Hirošimu 6. avgusta 1945. godine, dok je "Fat Man" bačen na Nagasaki tri dana kasnije, 9. avgusta 1945. godine.
hrv.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped on Japan were called "Little Boy" and "Fat Man". "Little Boy" was dropped on Hiroshima on August 6, 1945, while "Fat Man" was dropped on Nagasaki three days later, on August 9, 1945.

hun.Qst: Mik a nevek az atombombáknak, amiket Japánra dobtak?
hun.Rep: Az atombombák nevei, amelyeket Japánra dobtak, a "Little Boy" és a "Fat Man" voltak. "Little Boy" az első atombomba volt, amelyet 1945. augusztus 6-án dobtak le Hiroshimára, míg a "Fat Man" a második atombomba volt, amelyet 1945. augusztus 9-én dobtak le Nagaszakira.
hun.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped on Japan were called the "Little Boy" and the "Fat Man" - the first atomic bomb dropped on Hiroshima on August 6, 1945, and the second atomic bomb dropped on Nagasaki on August 9, 1945.

hye.Qst: Ճապոնիայի վրա նետված ատոմային ռումբերի անունները
hye.Rep:
Ճապոնիայի վրա նետված ատոմային ռումբերի անունները հետևյալն են.

1. Little Boy (Փոքր տղամարդ)
2. Fat Man (Համբարձում մարդ)
3. Castle Bravo (Կաստել Բրավո)
4. Tsar Bomba (Թսար Բոմբա)
5. Ivy Mike (Այվի Մայք)
6. Baker (Բեյքեր)
7. Able (Էյբլ)
8. Trinity (Տրինիթի)
9. RDS-1 (ՌԴՍ-1)
10. Hurricane (Հուրիկան)

ind.Qst: apa nama bom atom yang dijatuhkan di Jepang
ind.Rep: Bom atom yang dijatuhkan di Jepang pada tahun 1945 adalah bom atom yang pertama kali dijatuhkan oleh Amerika Serikat pada tanggal 6 Agustus 1945 di kota Hiroshima dengan kode nama "Little Boy", dan bom atom kedua dijatuhkan pada tanggal 9 Agustus 1945 di kota Nagasaki dengan kode nama "Fat Man".
ind.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped on Japan in 1945 were the first atomic bombs dropped by the United States on August 6, 1945 on the city of Hiroshima, codenamed "Little Boy," and the second atomic bomb dropped on August 9, 1945 on Nagasaki, codenamed "Fat Man."

isl.Qst: Hvað voru kjarnorkusprengjurnar sem voru kastaðar á Japan?
isl.Rep: Kjarnorkusprengjurnar sem voru kastaðar á Japan voru tvennar: "Little Boy" var kastaður á Hiroshima af Bandaríkjunum á 6. ágúst 1945 og "Fat Man" var kastaður á Nagasaki á 9. ágúst 1945. Þessar sprengjur voru fyrstu og einu kjarnorkusprengjurnar sem hafa verið notuð í stríði. Þær valdaðu miklum skaða og dauða í báðum borgum.
isl.Rep_En: The two atomic bombs dropped on Japan were "Little Boy" dropped on Hiroshima, Japan, on August 6, 1945, and "Fat Man" dropped on Nagasaki, Japan, on August 9, 1945.These bombs were the first and only atomic bombs ever used in war.They caused great damage and death in both cities.

ita.Qst: quali sono i nomi delle bombe atomiche sganciate sul Giappone
ita.Rep: Le bombe atomiche sganciate sul Giappone durante la Seconda Guerra Mondiale furono chiamate "Little Boy" e "Fat Man". "Little Boy" fu sganciata sulla città di Hiroshima il 6 agosto 1945, mentre "Fat Man" fu sganciata sulla città di Nagasaki il 9 agosto 1945.
ita.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped on Japan during World War II were called "Little Boy" and "Fat Man" - "Little Boy" was dropped on Hiroshima on August 6, 1945, while "Fat Man" was dropped on Nagasaki on August 9, 1945.

jav.Qst: Apa jeneng bom atom sing dibom ing Jepang?
jav.Rep: Bom atom yang dijatuhkan di Jepang pada tahun 1945 memiliki dua nama, yaitu "Little Boy" yang dijatuhkan di kota Hiroshima pada tanggal 6 Agustus 1945 dan "Fat Man" yang dijatuhkan di kota Nagasaki pada tanggal 9 Agustus 1945.
jav.Rep_En: The atomic bomb dropped on Japan in 1945 has two names, namely "Little Boy" dropped on Hiroshima on August 6, 1945 and "Fat Man" dropped on Nagasaki on August 9, 1945.

jpn.Qst: 日本に投下された原子爆弾の名前は?
jpn.Rep: 日本に投下された原子爆弾の名前は、広島に投下されたものが「リトルボーイ」、長崎に投下されたものが「ファットマン」と呼ばれています。
jpn.Rep_En: The names of the atomic bombs dropped on Japan are: the one dropped on Hiroshima, Little Boy, the one dropped on Nagasaki, Fat Man.

kan.Qst: ಜಪಾನ್ ಮೇಲೆ ಎಸೆದ ಪರಮಾಣು ಬಾಂಬ್ಗಳ ಹೆಸರುಗಳು ಯಾವುವು?
kan.Rep: ಹಿರೋಶಿಮಾ ಮತ್ತು ನಾಗಾಸಾಕಿ ಎಂಬ ಎರಡು ಪರಮಾಣು ಬಾಂಬ್ಗಳನ್ನು ಅಮೇರಿಕಾ ಸರ್ಕಾರವು ಜಪಾನ್ ಮೇಲೆ ಎಸೆದಿತು.
kan.Rep_En: The two atomic bombs, Hiroshima and Nagasaki, were dropped on Japan by the U.S. government.

kat.Qst: რა იყო იაპონიაზე ჩამოგდებული ატომური ბომბების სახელები?
kat.Rep:
იაპონიაში ჩამოწერილი ატომური ბომბების სახელები შედგება შვილებისგან:

1. ჰიროშიმა - 6 აგვისტო, 1945
2. ნაგასაკი - 9 აგვისტო, 1945

ამოცანაში დაგეხმარება მეტყველება იაპონიის ისტორიის შესახებ.
kat.Rep_En:
The names of atomic bombs listed in Japan consist of the following children:
1. Hiroshima, August 6, 1945 (also known as Hiroshima, Japan)
2. Nagasaki - August 9, 1945 How did the war end?
The problem will help you to tell about the history of Japan.

khm.Qst: តើ មាន ឈ្មោះ អ្វី ខ្លះ ដែល ត្រូវ បាន គេ ទម្លាក់ គ្រាប់ បែក អាតូម ទៅ លើ ប្រទេស ជប៉ុន?
khm.Rep: ឈ្មោះនៅលើប្រទេសជប៉ុនដែលត្រូវបានគេទម្លាក់គ្រាប់បែកអាតូមគឺ "អង់គ្លេស" (Angklech)។
khm.Rep_En: The name on the Japanese country where the atomic bomb was dropped is "Angklech".

kir.Qst: Жапонияга атылган атомдук бомбалардын аталыштары кандай?
kir.Rep: Жапонияга атомдук бомбалардын аталыштары 1945 жылы 6-шы желтоқсанда Америка қазіргі Нью-Мексико штатындағы Аламогордо қаласындағы тесттерден кейін жүзеге асырылды. Осы жылында Америка Қытайға қарсы атомдық бомбаны Хирошима және Нагасаки қалаларына жіберді. Хирошимада 1945 жылы 6-шы тамызда, Нагасакида 1945 жылы 9-шы тамызда атомдық бомбаларды жоғары орналастырылған жерлерге жіберіп, осы қалалардың қарғысындағы және орталық аймақтардың қатарындағы адамдарға қатысты жоғары деңгейде көзіметтік және медициналық қатерлер туғызды. Осы аталыштар қазіргі күнге дейінгі ең үлкен және қатал жәнеңіздердің бірі болып табылады.
kir.Rep_En: On December 6, 1945, the United States dropped atomic bombs on Hiroshima and Nagasaki, Japan, following tests in Alamogordo, New Mexico, and on August 9, 1945, Hiroshima and Nagasaki, Japan, dropped atomic bombs on the highest points in the world, causing high levels of visual and medical hazards to people in the central region and the city.

kor.Qst: 일본에 떨어졌던 원자폭탄의 이름은 무엇인가?
kor.Rep: 일본에 떨어졌던 원자폭탄의 이름은 "리틀보이"와 "팻맨"입니다. 리틀보이는 1945년 8월 6일에 히로시마에 떨어졌고, 팻맨은 1945년 8월 9일에 나가사키에 떨어졌습니다.
kor.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped on Japan were the Little Boy and the Batman, the first two dropped on Hiroshima on August 6, 1945, and the second on Nagasaki on August 9, 1945.

lao.Qst: ຊື່ ຂອງ ລະ ເບີດ ອາ ຕອມ ທີ່ ວາງ ລົງ ໃນ ຍີ່ປຸ່ນ ແມ່ນ ຫຍັງ?
lao.Rep: ຂອງລະເບີດອາຕອມທີ່ວາງລົງໃນຍີ່ປຸ່ນຫຍັງບໍ່ສົມບູນຄືນຂ້ອຍບໍ່ຮູ້ຈັກຊື່ຂອງລະເບີດນີ້ເທົ່ານັ້ນ. ຂໍຂອບໃຈທີ່ທ່ານຕິດຕໍ່ກັບຂໍ້ມູນຂອງຂ້ອຍ.
lao.Rep_En: I don't know the name of this bomb. Thank you for contacting me.

lit.Qst: Kokie yra atominių bombų, išmestų į Japoniją, pavadinimai?
lit.Rep: Pirmoji atomine bomba, išmesta į Hirošimą, buvo pavadinta "Little Boy". Antrasis atomine bomba, išmesta į Nagasaki, buvo pavadinta "Fat Man".
lit.Rep_En: The first atomic bomb dropped on Hiroshima was called Little Boy, and the second atomic bomb dropped on Nagasaki was called Fat Man.

lvs.Qst: Kā sauc atombombas, kas tika izmettas uz Japānu?
lvs.Rep: Atombombas, kas tika izmestas uz Japānu, sauc par "Little Boy" un "Fat Man". "Little Boy" tika izmests uz Hirošimu 1945. gada 6. augustā, bet "Fat Man" tika izmests uz Nagasaki 1945. gada 9. augustā.
lvs.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped on Japan are called "Little Boy" and "Fat Man" The "Little Boy" was dropped on Hiroshima on August 6, 1945, and the "Fat Man" was dropped on Nagasaki on August 9, 1945.

mai.Qst: जापान पर प्रहार कएल गेल परमाणु बमसभक नाम की अछि?
mai.Rep: जापान पर प्रहार किए गए परमाणु बमसभक का नाम हिरोशिमा और नागासाकी था। इन दो शहरों पर 1945 में अमेरिकी सेना ने परमाणु बमसभक का प्रयोग किया था।
mai.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped on Japan were Hiroshima and Nagasaki. These two cities were used by the U.S. military in 1945.

mal.Qst: ജപ്പാനിൽ വീണ ആറ്റോം ബോംബുകളുടെ പേരുകൾ എന്തൊക്കെയാണ്?
mal.Rep:
ജപ്പാനിൽ വീണ ആറ്റോം ബോംബുകളുടെ പേരുകൾ ഇതാണ്:

1. Little Boy
2. Fat Man
3. Hiroshima Bomb
4. Nagasaki Bomb
5. RDS-1
6. Joe-1

ഇവയിൽ പലതും പരിശോധനക്കായി ഉപയോഗിച്ച പേരുകൾ മാത്രമാണ്.
mal.Rep_En:
The names of the atomic bombs dropped on Japan are:
The Little Boy 1.
The Fat Man 2.
3. The Hiroshima bomb
4. The bombing of Nagasaki
5. The RDS-1
Joe one six.
Many of these are just names used for testing.

mar.Qst: जपानवर टाकण्यात आलेल्या अणुबॉम्बची नावे काय आहेत?
mar.Rep: जपानच्या वर्षांतील अणुबॉम्बची नावे "हिरोशिमा बॉम्ब" आणि "नागासाकी बॉम्ब" आहेत.
mar.Rep_En: The names of Japan's atomic bombs in the years are "Hiroshima bomb" and "Nagasaki bomb".

mkd.Qst: Како се викаа атомските бомби фрлени врз Јапонија?
mkd.Rep: Атомските бомби фрлени врз Јапонија се нарекуваат "Литл Бој" и "Фат Мен".
mkd.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped on Japan are called "Little Boy" and "Fat Man".

mlt.Qst: X'inhuma l-ismijiet tal-bombi atomiċi li tkeċċew fuq il-Ġappun?
mlt.Rep: L-ismijiet tal-bombi atomiċi li tkeċċew fuq il-Ġappun huma "Little Boy" u "Fat Man". "Little Boy" kien il-ħarba atomika li tkeċċa fuq Ħiroxma fis-6 ta' Awwissu 1945, filwaqt li "Fat Man" kien il-ħarba atomika li tkeċċa fuq Nagasaki fis-9 ta' Awwissu 1945.
mlt.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped on Japan are called "Little Boy" and "Fat Man" - "Little Boy" was the atomic bomb dropped on Hiroshima on August 6, 1945, while "Fat Man" was the atomic bomb dropped on Nagasaki on August 9, 1945.

nld.Qst: Wat zijn de namen van de atoombommen die op Japan zijn gegooid?
nld.Rep: De namen van de atoombommen die op Japan zijn gegooid zijn "Little Boy" en "Fat Man". "Little Boy" werd op 6 augustus 1945 op Hiroshima gegooid en "Fat Man" werd op 9 augustus 1945 op Nagasaki gegooid.
nld.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped on Japan were called "Little Boy" and "Fat Man" - "Little Boy" on Hiroshima on August 6, 1945 and "Fat Man" on Nagasaki on August 9, 1945.

nno.Qst: kva er navnene på atombombane som blei kastet over Japan
nno.Rep: De to atombombene som ble kastet over Japan under andre verdenskrig var "Little Boy" som ble sluppet over byen Hiroshima den 6. august 1945, og "Fat Man" som ble sluppet over byen Nagasaki den 9. august 1945.
nno.Rep_En: The two atomic bombs dropped on Japan during World War II were "Little Boy" dropped on Hiroshima on August 6, 1945, and "Fat Man" dropped on Nagasaki on August 9, 1945.

nob.Qst: hva er navnene på atombomberne som ble kastet på Japan
nob.Rep: De to atombombene som ble kastet på Japan under andre verdenskrig var "Little Boy" og "Fat Man". "Little Boy" ble sluppet over byen Hiroshima den 6. august 1945, mens "Fat Man" ble sluppet over byen Nagasaki den 9. august 1945.
nob.Rep_En: The two atomic bombs dropped on Japan during World War II were "Little Boy" and "Fat Man". "Little Boy" was dropped over Hiroshima on August 6, 1945, while "Fat Man" was dropped over Nagasaki on August 9, 1945.

npi.Qst: जापानमा खसालिएका परमाणु बमहरूको नाम के हो?
npi.Rep: जापानमा खसालिएका परमाणु बमहरूको नाम "हिरोशिमा बम" र "नागासाकी बम" हो।
npi.Rep_En: The names of the atomic bombs dropped on Japan are "Hiroshima bomb" and "Nagasaki bomb".

pbt.Qst: په جاپان کې د اټومي بمونو نومونه څه دي؟
pbt.Rep: د اټومي بمونو نوم ژاپني ټکنالوجي د ګرانيوو علمي او پوهنځي پوهنتونو د څېر دي. دا نوم ټوکيو د پوهنتونو د اټومي بمونو څخه په نوم کې داخل شوی دی. دا بمون د اټومي پوهنتونو د څېر دی او دا هم د ژاپن کې د اټومي او نوونکي ادارو د څېر دی.
pbt.Rep_En: The name of the atomic bombs is similar to the Japanese faculties of science and technology, such as the Granito faculty. The name has been incorporated into the name of the atomic bombs of the faculties of Tokyo. This bomb is similar to the atomic faculties and also to the atomic and new institutions in Japan.

pes.Qst: نام بمب های اتمی که بر ژاپن انداخته شده است چیست؟
pes.Rep: نام بمب اتمی اولیه که در 6 اوت 1945 بر هیروشیما انداخته شد، "لیتل بوی" (Little Boy) بود. نام بمب اتمی دومی که در 9 اوت 1945 بر ناگازاکی انداخته شد، "فاطمه" (Fat Man) بود.
pes.Rep_En: The first atomic bomb dropped on Hiroshima on August 6, 1945 was called "Little Boy". The second atomic bomb dropped on Nagasaki on August 9, 1945 was called "Fat Man".

pol.Qst: Jak nazywane są bomby atomowe zrzucone na Japonię?
pol.Rep: Bomby atomowe zrzucone na Japonię w 1945 roku nosiły nazwy "Little Boy" (rzucana na Hiroszimę) i "Fat Man" (rzucana na Nagasaki).
pol.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped on Japan in 1945 were called "Little Boy" and "Fat Man."

por.Qst: Quais são os nomes das bombas atômicas lançadas sobre o Japão?
por.Rep: As bombas atômicas lançadas sobre o Japão foram chamadas de "Little Boy" e "Fat Man". "Little Boy" foi lançada sobre a cidade de Hiroshima em 6 de agosto de 1945, enquanto "Fat Man" foi lançada sobre a cidade de Nagasaki em 9 de agosto de 1945.
por.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped on Japan were called "Little Boy" and "Fat Man" and "Little Boy" was dropped on Hiroshima on August 6, 1945, while "Fat Man" was dropped on Nagasaki on August 9, 1945.

ron.Qst: Care sunt numele bombelor atomice aruncate asupra Japoniei?
ron.Rep: Numele bombelor atomice aruncate asupra Japoniei sunt "Little Boy" și "Fat Man". "Little Boy" a fost aruncată pe Hiroshima la 6 august 1945, iar "Fat Man" a fost aruncată pe Nagasaki la 9 august 1945.
ron.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped on Japan were called "Little Boy" and "Fat Man" - "Little Boy" was dropped on Hiroshima on August 6, 1945, and "Fat Man" was dropped on Nagasaki on August 9, 1945.

rus.Qst: как называются атомные бомбы, сброшенные на Японию?
rus.Rep: Атомные бомбы, сброшенные на Японию в 1945 году, назывались "Little Boy" и "Fat Man". "Little Boy" была сброшена на Хиросиму 6 августа 1945 года, а "Fat Man" - на Нагасаки 9 августа 1945 года.
rus.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped on Japan in 1945 were called "Little Boy" and "Fat Man" - "Little Boy" was dropped on Hiroshima on August 6, 1945, and "Fat Man" on Nagasaki on August 9, 1945.

slk.Qst: Aké sú mená atómových bômb, ktoré boli zhodené na Japonsko?
slk.Rep: Dve atómové bomby, ktoré boli zhodené na Japonsko počas druhej svetovej vojny, mali názvy "Little Boy" a "Fat Man". "Little Boy" bol zhodený na Hirošimu 6. augusta 1945 a "Fat Man" bol zhodený na Nagasaki 9. augusta 1945.
slk.Rep_En: The two atomic bombs dropped on Japan during World War II were named "Little Boy" and "Fat Man" - "Little Boy" on Hiroshima on August 6, 1945, and "Fat Man" on Nagasaki on August 9, 1945.

slv.Qst: Kakšna so imena atomskih bomb, ki so jih vrgli na Japonsko?
slv.Rep: Dve atomski bombi, ki so jih vrgli na Japonsko med drugo svetovno vojno, sta bili imenovani "Little Boy" in "Fat Man". "Little Boy" je bil vrgel na Hirošimo 6. avgusta 1945, "Fat Man" pa na Nagasaki 9. avgusta 1945.
slv.Rep_En: The two atomic bombs dropped on Japan during World War II were named "Little Boy" and "Fat Man" - "Little Boy" on Hiroshima on August 6, 1945, and "Fat Man" on Nagasaki on August 9, 1945.

spa.Qst: ¿Cuáles son los nombres de las bombas atómicas arrojadas sobre Japón?
spa.Rep: Las bombas atómicas arrojadas sobre Japón fueron llamadas "Little Boy" y "Fat Man". "Little Boy" fue lanzada sobre la ciudad de Hiroshima el 6 de agosto de 1945, mientras que "Fat Man" fue lanzada sobre la ciudad de Nagasaki el 9 de agosto de 1945.
spa.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped on Japan were called "Little Boy" and "Fat Man". "Little Boy" was dropped on the city of Hiroshima on August 6, 1945, while "Fat Man" was dropped on the city of Nagasaki on August 9, 1945.

srp.Qst: Како се зову атомске бомбе бачене на Јапан?
srp.Rep: Атомске бомбе бачене на Јапан су називане "Little Boy" и "Fat Man". "Little Boy" је бомба која је бачена на Хирошиму 6. августа 1945. године, док је "Fat Man" бомба која је бачена на Нагасаки три дана касније, 9. августа 1945. године.
srp.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped on Japan were called "Little Boy" and "Fat Man". "Little Boy" was the bomb dropped on Hiroshima on August 6, 1945, while "Fat Man" was the bomb dropped on Nagasaki three days later, on August 9, 1945.

swe.Qst: Vad heter de atombomber som släpptes över Japan?
swe.Rep: De atombomber som släpptes över Japan heter "Little Boy" och "Fat Man". "Little Boy" släpptes över staden Hiroshima den 6 augusti 1945 och "Fat Man" släpptes över staden Nagasaki den 9 augusti 1945.
swe.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped on Japan are called "Little Boy" and "Fat Man". "Little Boy" was dropped on Hiroshima on August 6, 1945 and "Fat Man" was dropped on Nagasaki on August 9, 1945.

swh.Qst: Ni nini jina la mabomu ya atomu iliyopigwa juu ya Japan?
swh.Rep: Jina la mabomu ya atomu yaliyopigwa juu ya Japan ni "Little Boy" na "Fat Man". Little Boy ilipigwa juu ya mji wa Hiroshima tarehe 6 Agosti 1945 na Fat Man ilipigwa juu ya mji wa Nagasaki tarehe 9 Agosti 1945.
swh.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped on Japan were called "Little Boy" and "Fat Man" - "Little Boy" was dropped on Hiroshima on August 6, 1945 and "Fat Man" was dropped on Nagasaki on August 9, 1945.

tel.Qst: జపాన్ పై విసిరిన అణు బాంబుల పేర్లు ఏమిటి?
tel.Rep: జపాన్ పై విసిరిన అణు బాంబుల పేర్లు "హిరోషిమా బాంబు" మరియు "నాగాసాకి బాంబు" అని అంటారు.
tel.Rep_En: The names of the atomic bombs dropped on Japan are "Hiroshima bomb" and "Nagasaki bomb".

tgk.Qst: Номҳои бомбҳои атомӣ, ки ба Ҷопон партофта шуданд, кадомҳоянд?
tgk.Rep: Дар соли 1945, США ба Ҷопон бомби атомӣ занг заданд. Ду бомб, "Литтл Бой" ва "Фат Мен", ба Ҷопон партофта шуданд.
tgk.Rep_En: In 1945, the United States dropped two atomic bombs on Japan, the Little Boy and the Fat Man.

tgl.Qst: Ano ang mga pangalan ng mga bomba atomika na inihagis sa Hapon?
tgl.Rep: Ang mga pangalan ng mga bomba atomika na inihagis sa Hapon ay "Little Boy" at "Fat Man". Ang "Little Boy" ay inihagis sa Hiroshima noong Agosto 6, 1945, habang ang "Fat Man" ay inihagis sa Nagasaki tatlong araw pagkatapos, noong Agosto 9, 1945.
tgl.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped on Japan were named "Little Boy" and "Fat Man" - "Little Boy" was dropped on Hiroshima on August 6, 1945, while "Fat Man" was dropped on Nagasaki three days later, on August 9, 1945.

tha.Qst: ชื่อของระเบิดอะตอมที่โยนลงบนญี่ปุ่น
tha.Rep: ระเบิดอะตอมที่โยนลงบนญี่ปุ่นชื่อว่า "Little Boy" ซึ่งเป็นชื่อที่ได้รับการตั้งชื่อโดยโครงการการพัฒนาอาวุธระเบิดของสหรัฐอเมริกาในช่วงสงครามโลกครั้งที่สอง โดยระเบิดนี้ถูกใช้ในการโจมตีเมืองฮิโรชิมาในวันที่ 6 สิงหาคม ค.ศ. 1945 และเป็นสาเหตุให้ญี่ปุ่นประกาศยอมแพ้ในสงคราม โดยมีผลกระทบต่อชีวิตและสุขภาพของผู้คนในพื้นที่โดยตรงและระยะไกลอย่างมาก โดยเฉพาะผู้รอดชีวิตจากการระเบิดที่มีผลกระทบต่อสุขภาพจนต้องเผชิญกับผลกระทบต่อร่างกายตลอดชีวิต
tha.Rep_En: The atomic bomb dropped on Japan, the Little Boy, was the name given to the atomic bomb used to bomb Hiroshima on August 6, 1945, and it caused Japan to declare war, affecting the lives and health of people in the area, especially those in the immediate and long-range areas.

tur.Qst: Japonyaya atılan atom bombalarının isimleri nelerdir?
tur.Rep: Japonya'ya atılan atom bombalarının isimleri "Little Boy" ve "Fat Man" olarak bilinmektedir. "Little Boy" bombası, 6 Ağustos 1945'te Hiroşima'ya atılmıştır. "Fat Man" bombası ise 9 Ağustos 1945'te Nagasaki'ye atılmıştır.
tur.Rep_En: The atomic bombs used in the attack were the Little Boy and Fat Man bombs dropped on Hiroshima on August 6, 1945 and the Fat Man bomb dropped on Nagasaki on August 9, 1945.

ukr.Qst: Як називалися атомні бомби, скинуті на Японію?
ukr.Rep: Атомні бомби, скинуті на Японію, називалися "Літак-бомбардувальник Енола Гейя" та "Літак-бомбардувальник Бокскар".
ukr.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped on Japan were called the "Enola Gey Air Bomb" and the "Boksar Air Bomb".

urd.Qst: جاپان پر گرائے گئے ایٹم بموں کے نام کیا ہیں؟
urd.Rep: جاپان پر گرائے گئے ایٹم بموں کے نام "ہیروشیما" اور "ناگاساکی" ہیں۔
urd.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped on Japan are called "Hiroshima" and "Nagasaki".

vie.Qst: tên của những quả bom nguyên tử bị ném xuống Nhật Bản là gì?
vie.Rep: Hai quả bom nguyên tử bị ném xuống Nhật Bản trong Thế chiến II có tên là "Little Boy" và "Fat Man".
vie.Rep_En: Two atomic bombs were dropped on Japan during World War II named "Little Boy" and "Fat Man".

yue.Qst: 日本被投<unk>嘅原子彈叫咩名?
yue.Rep: 日本被投放的原子弹分别是“小男孩”和“胖子”，分别投放于广岛和长崎。
yue.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped in Japan were the "little boy" and the "fat boy", respectively, in Guangdong and Nagasaki.

zlm.Qst: apa nama bom atom yang dijatuhkan ke Jepun
zlm.Rep: Bom atom yang dijatuhkan ke Jepang pada tahun 1945 adalah Little Boy dan Fat Man. Little Boy dijatuhkan di kota Hiroshima pada tanggal 6 Agustus 1945, sedangkan Fat Man dijatuhkan di kota Nagasaki pada tanggal 9 Agustus 1945.
zlm.Rep_En: The atomic bombs dropped on Japan in 1945 were Little Boy and Fat Man. Little Boy was dropped on Hiroshima on August 6, 1945, while Fat Man was dropped on Nagasaki on August 9, 1945.

eng.Qst: in what environment did the zoroaster granite form
eng.Rep: The Zoroaster Granite is a type of igneous rock that formed in a plutonic environment, which means it was formed deep within the Earth's crust. Specifically, it formed during the Proterozoic Era, around 1.7 billion years ago, in what is now the Grand Canyon region of Arizona, USA. The granite was formed from the slow cooling and solidification of magma that intruded into the existing rocks of the region.

afr.Qst: In watter omgewing het die Zoroaster-graniet gevorm?
afr.Rep: Die Zoroaster-graniet het gevorm in 'n diepsee-omgewing. Dit is 'n tipe graniet wat bekend staan as 'n "intrusiewe" rots, wat beteken dat dit gevorm het deur magma wat in die aardkors afgekoel het en uiteindelik 'n harde, soliede rots gevorm het. Die Zoroaster-graniet is 'n kenmerkende rotsformasie in die Grand Canyon in die VSA en is ongeveer 1,7 miljard jaar oud.
afr.Rep_En: Zoroaster granite is a type of granite known as an "intrusive" rock, meaning that it was formed by magma cooling in the Earth's crust, eventually forming a hard, solid rock.

arb.Qst: في أي بيئة تشكلت جرانيت الزرادشت؟
arb.Rep: تشكلت جرانيت الزرادشت في بيئة متحولة جيولوجياً تحت الأرض، وتحديداً في البيئة النارية البركانية. وتتكون الجرانيت عادةً من الكوارتز والفلسبار والميكا، وتتشكل عندما يتم تبريد الصهارة المنصهرة تحت الأرض ببطء، مما يسمح للمعادن بالترسب والتجمع معًا لتشكل الصخرة الصلبة.
arb.Rep_En: Granite is formed in a geologically altered underground environment, specifically in a volcanic volcanic environment. Granite is usually composed of quartz, feldspar, and mica, and is formed when molten magma is slowly cooled underground, allowing minerals to sediment and clump together to form solid rock.

ary.Qst: فشنو البيئة شكلت الجرانيت الزرادشتي؟
ary.Rep: الجرانيت الزرادشتي هو نوع من الجرانيت الذي يتميز بتركيبته الكيميائية الفريدة والتي تشمل الكوارتز والفلسبار والميكا. تشكل الجرانيت الزرادشتي في البيئات الجيولوجية العميقة والعالية الضغط والحرارة، ويتم تشكيله بسبب التحولات الجيولوجية التي تحدث في الصخور الأساسية. وتتأثر الصخور الأساسية بالعوامل الجيولوجية المختلفة مثل الحرارة والضغط والتآكل والتعرية، وهذه العوامل تؤدي إلى تشكيل الجرانيت الزرادشتي بتركيبته الفريدة.
ary.Rep_En: Zaradest granite is a type of granite characterized by its unique chemical composition, which includes quartz, feldspar, and mica. Zaradest granite forms in deep geological, high pressure and heat environments, and is formed by geological transformations that occur in the basic rocks. The basic rocks are affected by various geological factors such as heat, pressure, corrosion and erosion, and these factors lead to the formation of Zaradest granite.

arz.Qst: في أي بيئة اتشكل جرانيت الزرادشت
arz.Rep: يتشكل الجرانيت الزرادشت في البيئة النارية، وهي بيئة تتكون من الصخور النارية المتحولة والمتجانسة، وتتميز بارتفاع درجات الحرارة والضغط العاليين. ويتكون الجرانيت الزرادشت من الكوارتز والفلسبار والميكا، ويتميز بالصلابة والمتانة والمقاومة للتآكل، مما يجعله مادة مثالية للاستخدام في البناء والتشييد. ويتواجد الجرانيت الزرادشت بكثرة في بعض المناطق في إيران والهند والبرازيل والصين وأمريكا الشمالية.
arz.Rep_En: Granite granite is formed in the igneous environment, an environment consisting of volcanic and homogeneous rocks, characterized by high temperatures and high pressures. Granite granite is composed of quartz, feldspar, and mica, and is characterized by hardness, durability, and corrosion resistance, making it an ideal material for use in construction. Granite granite is abundant in some areas in Iran, India, Brazil, China, and North America.

asm.Qst: এই ভূমিকম্পৰ সময়ত জৰুআষ্টাৰৰ গ্ৰানাইটৰ সৃষ্টি হৈছিল।
asm.Rep: হ্যাঁ, এই ভূমিকম্পৰ সময়ত জৰুআষ্টাৰৰ গ্ৰানাইটৰ সৃষ্টি হয়েছিল। জৰুআষ্টাৰ একটি প্রাকৃতিক দুর্ঘটনা যা ভূমিতে ভূমিকম্প উত্পন্ন করে। এই ভূমিকম্পের ফলে ভূমিতে বিভিন্ন প্রকারের পাথর ও পাথরের সমষ্টি উত্পন্ন হয়। জৰুআষ্টাৰ এলোমেলো পাথর এবং গ্ৰানাইট উত্পন্ন হয়েছে যা আমাদের পৃথিবীতে বিভিন্ন স্থানে পাওয়া যায়।
asm.Rep_En: Yes, during these earthquakes, granite was formed. A geothermal event is a natural disaster that causes earthquakes. These earthquakes produce different types of rocks and aggregates in the ground. Geothermal rocks and granites have been formed that are found in different places on our planet.

bel.Qst: У якім асяроддзі з'явіўся граніт Зараастра?
bel.Rep: Граніт Зараастра - це легендарний камінь, який згадується в зороастрыйських текстах. За легендою, цей камінь з'явився в середині річки Дайра-Еченга в Ірані, коли Заратустра, засновник зороастризму, перетнув річку. Однак, наукової підтримки цій легенді немає, тому точне місце знаходження граніту Зараастра залишається невідомим.
bel.Rep_En: The Zoroastrian granite is a legendary stone mentioned in the Zoroastrian texts. According to legend, this stone appeared in the middle of the Daira-Echenga River in Iran, where Zoroaster, the founder of Zoroastrianism, crossed the river. However, according to this scientific legend, there is no exact location of the Zoroastrian granite.

ben.Qst: কোন পরিবেশের মধ্যে জরোয়াস্টার গ্রানাইট গঠিত হয়েছিল?
ben.Rep: জরোয়াস্টার গ্রানাইট প্রায় সমস্ত পরিবেশে পাওয়া যায়। তবে এর সবচেয়ে বেশি উন্নয়নশীল এলাকাগুলো হলো ব্রাজিল, ইন্ডিয়া, চীন, ইতালি এবং স্রীলঙ্কা।
ben.Rep_En: Zoroaster granite is found in almost all environments, but its most developed areas are Brazil, India, China, Italy and Sri Lanka.

bos.Qst: U kojoj je sredini formiran Zoroastrov granit?
bos.Rep: Zoroastrov granit je formiran u srednjem devonskom periodu, oko 390 miliona godina pre naše ere. Nalazi se u planinskom lancu Zoroastrovog masiva u Nacionalnom parku Grand Canyon u Sjedinjenim Američkim Državama.
bos.Rep_En: Zoroastrian granite was formed in the Middle Devonian period, about 390 million years BC. It is located in the Zoroastrian Massif mountain range in the Grand Canyon National Park in the United States.

bul.Qst: В каква среда се е образувал зороастрийският гранит?
bul.Rep: Зороастрийският гранит е образуван в среда на магматични скали, като гранит, съдържащи голямо количество кристализирани минерали като кварц, фелдспат и микa. Този тип гранит е намерен в Иран и е свързан с религията на зороастрийците, която е била популярна в тази област през древността.
bul.Rep_En: Zoroastrian granite is formed in an environment of igneous rocks such as granite containing a large amount of crystallized minerals such as quartz, feldspar and mica. This type of granite is found in Iran and is associated with the Zoroastrian religion, which was popular in this area during ancient times.

cat.Qst: En quin entorn es va formar el granit de Zoroastre?
cat.Rep: El granit de Zoroastre és una formació rocosa que es troba a la vall de Yosemite, a Califòrnia, Estats Units. Aquest granit es va formar fa uns 100 milions d'anys durant l'era del Cretaci, quan la zona estava sota el mar. Amb el temps, la pressió i la temperatura van transformar les roques sedimentàries en granit. La formació del granit de Zoroastre va ser el resultat de l'activitat tectònica i volcànica que va afectar la regió durant milions d'anys.
cat.Rep_En: Zoroaster granite is a rock formation found in the Yosemite Valley of California, United States.This granite was formed about 100 million years ago during the Cretaceous era, when the area was under the sea.With time, pressure, and temperature, the sedimentary rocks were transformed into granite.The formation of Zoroaster granite was the result of tectonic and volcanic activity that affected the region for millions of years.

ceb.Qst: Sa unsang palibot ang Zoroaster granite naporma
ceb.Rep: Wala ko kahibaw sa Zoroaster granite nga naporma. Apil ba kini sa mga lugar o mga butang nga mahimo nako masuta?
ceb.Rep_En: I'm not sure if the Zoroastrian granite is part of the places or things that I can measure?

ces.Qst: V jakém prostředí se zoroastrský žuly vytvořil?
ces.Rep: Zoroastrický žul se nevytvořil v žádném konkrétním prostředí, ale je to uměle vytvořený kámen, který se používá v zoroastrických svatyních a hrobech. Je tvořen z různých minerálů, jako je křemen, živec a slída, a je obvykle bílý nebo světle šedý s tmavými pruhy. Vytváří se zpravidla v dílnách kameníků a je velmi oblíbeným materiálem pro sochy, reliéfy a další umělecké předměty.
ces.Rep_En: Zoroastrian granite is a type of stone used in Zoroastrian shrines and tombs, and is usually white or light gray with dark stripes, and is a popular material for sculptures, reliefs, and other art objects.

ckb.Qst: چ جۆرە گڕانیتیەکی زۆرادۆستەر دروست بووە؟
ckb.Rep: گڕانیتیەکی زۆرادۆستەر لەوانەیە کە زۆر بە شێوەیەکی تایبەت بە کاری ئەوەی دەکات، بەرامبەر زیاترین کارایی لە کاتی کەمترین کارگێری دەکات. بەڵام ئەگەر زۆر بە شێوەیەکی زۆرادۆست بەکارببەیت، دەتوانێت بەرامبەر زیاترین کارایی لە کاتی زیاترین کارگێری دەکات، بەڵام زۆریارییەکانی ئەم جۆرە گڕانییە بەردەست نییە و دەتوانێت بەشێوەیەکی دڵخواز و بەرهەمێکی تایبەت بە کاری ئەوەی دەکات بەکارببەیت.
ckb.Rep_En: A Zoroaster granite may be highly efficient in its specific function, producing more efficiency at a lower cost. But if you use it very efficiently, it can produce more efficiency at a higher cost, but the abundance of this type of granite is not available and you can use it in a preferred and specific product.

cmn.Qst: 佐罗亚斯特花<unk>岩是在什么环境中形成的
cmn.Rep: 很抱歉，我无法回答这个问题，因为“佐罗亚斯特花岩”这个词语在我的知识库中没有相关信息。如果您能提供更多上下文或信息，我将尽力回答您的问题。
cmn.Rep_En: I'm sorry I can't answer this question because the word "Zoolander" doesn't have any relevant information in my knowledge base, so if you can provide more context or information, I'll do my best to answer your question.

cmn_Hant.Qst: 石的形成 石的形成是何種環境下
cmn_Hant.Rep:
石的形成可以在不同的環境下發生，以下是一些常見的石的形成環境：

1. 沉積環境：沉積環境是指在水中或陸地上，由於風化、侵蝕、運輸等作用，將岩石碎屑或有機物質沉積在一起形成的環境。例如，砂岩、泥岩、石灰岩等都是在沉積環境下形成的。

2. 火山環境：火山環境是指在火山活動或火山岩浆噴發的過程中形成的環境。例如，玄武岩、安山岩、流紋岩等都是在火山環境下形成的。

3. 變質環境：變質環境是指在高溫高壓下，原有的岩石發生化學、物理變化形成新的岩石的環境。例如，片麻岩、石榴岩、大理岩等都是在變質環境下形成的。

4. 節理環境：節理環境是指在地殼運動或應力作用下，岩石發生斷裂形成節理，再經過風化、侵蝕等作用形成的環境。例如，花崗岩、閃長岩等都是在節理環境下形成的。

總之，石的形成環境多種多樣，不同的環境會形成不同種類的石。
cmn_Hant.Rep_En:
The formation of stones can occur in a variety of environments, and here are some of the most common environments in which stones form:
1. Sedimentary environment: A sedimentary environment is an environment in water or on land that is formed by the deposition of rock debris or organic matter together by the effects of weathering, erosion, transport, etc. For example, sandstone, mudstone, limestone, etc. are formed in a sedimentary environment.
Volcanic environment: A volcanic environment is an environment formed by volcanic activity or eruption of volcanic lava. For example, basalt, volcanic rock, and lava are all formed in a volcanic environment.
3. Metamorphic environment: A metamorphic environment is an environment in which chemical and physical changes occur in the original rock under high temperatures and high pressures to form new rocks. For example, limestone, granite, and marble are all formed in a metamorphic environment.
4. Lattice environment: A lattice environment is an environment in which rocks break and form lattice under the action of crustal motion or stress, and then undergo erosion and other effects. For example, granite, shiny granite, etc. are formed in a lattice environment.
In short, there are many different environments in which rocks are formed, and different environments can form different types of limestone.

cym.Qst: Yn y cyfnod hwn, mae'r granit Zoroaster yn cael ei greu.
cym.Rep: Mae granit Zoroaster yn un o'r mathau mwyaf o greigiau sy'n cael eu darganfod ar wyneb y ddaear. Mae'n cael ei greu o ganlyniad i brosesau daearol naturiol dros amser, gan gynnwys crynodiad a gwresogi. Mae'r granit hwn yn cael ei enwi ar ôl Zoroaster, y proffwyd a sefydlodd ffydd Zoroastrianism yn yr Iran gyfoes. Mae granit Zoroaster yn cael ei darganfod yn bennaf yn yr Unol Daleithiau, yn enwedig yn yr ardal o Arizona. Mae'n un o'r atyniadau naturiol mwyaf poblogaidd yn yr ardal hon.
cym.Rep_En: The Zoroastrian granite is one of the largest types of rocks found on Earth.It is created as a result of natural geological processes over time, including condensation and heating.This granite is named after Zoroaster, the prophet who founded the faith of Zoroastrianism in modern Iran.Zoroastrian granite is found mainly in the United States, especially in the Arizona area.

dan.Qst: I hvilket miljø blev Zoroaster-granitten dannet?
dan.Rep: Zoroaster-granitten blev dannet i en magmatisk miljø, hvor magmaen steg op fra jordens indre og afkølede og krystalliserede langsomt under overfladen. Denne proces skete for omkring 1,7 milliarder år siden i det område, der nu er kendt som Grand Canyon i Arizona, USA.
dan.Rep_En: The Zoroaster crater was formed in a magmatic environment, where magma rose from the interior of the Earth and cooled and crystallized slowly beneath the surface, a process that occurred about 1.7 billion years ago in the area now known as the Grand Canyon in Arizona.

deu.Qst: in welcher Umgebung entstand der Zoroaster-Granit
deu.Rep: Der Zoroaster-Granit ist ein Gestein, das in der Nähe des Zoroaster-Tempels im Grand Canyon National Park in Arizona, USA, entstanden ist. Es ist ein porphyrischer Granit, der vor etwa 1,7 Milliarden Jahren während des Proterozoikums gebildet wurde.
deu.Rep_En: Zoroaster granite is a porphyry granite formed about 1.7 billion years ago during the Proterozoic Era near the Zoroaster Temple in Grand Canyon National Park in Arizona, USA.

ell.Qst: Σε ποιο περιβάλλον σχηματίστηκε ο γρανίτης του Ζωροάστρου;
ell.Rep: Ο γρανίτης του Ζωροάστρου σχηματίστηκε σε μαγματικό περιβάλλον, όταν λάβα εξέχυσε και κρύωσε βαθιά κάτω από την επιφάνεια της γης. Καθώς η λάβα κρυώνει, οι μεγάλοι κρύσταλλοι του γρανίτη σχηματίζονται από τα μεταλλικά στοιχεία που βρίσκονται στο μαγματικό ρευστό.
ell.Rep_En: The granite of the Zoroaster was formed in a magmatic environment, when lava poured out and cooled deep beneath the earth's surface. As the lava cools, large granite crystals are formed by the metallic elements found in the magmatic fluid.

est.Qst: millises keskkonnas Zoroastri graniit moodustati
est.Rep: Zoroastri graniit moodustati enam kui 500 miljonit aastat tagasi Paleosoikumi ajastul. Selle moodustumine toimus sügaval maakoore all, kus kuumus ja rõhk muundasid settekivimid graniidiks. Zoroastri graniit leidub peamiselt Iraanis, kus see on olnud oluline ehitusmaterjal juba tuhandeid aastaid.
est.Rep_En: Zoroastrian granite was formed more than 500 million years ago during the Paleozoic era, deep beneath the earth's crust, where heat and pressure turned sedimentary rocks into granite.

fin.Rep: Zoroasterin graniitti muodostui Arkeeisessa aikakaudessa noin 2,5-3,0 miljardia vuotta sitten. Se muodostui syvällä maan kuoren alla, kun magma jähmettyi ja kiteytyi kovaksi kivimateriaaliksi. Tämä tapahtui yleisesti vuoristoalueilla, joissa maankuoren liikkeet ja kallistukset saivat syvällä olevan kivimateriaalin nousemaan pinnalle. Zoroasterin graniitti sijaitsee Grand Canyonin alueella Yhdysvalloissa, joka on tunnettu monimuotoisesta geologisesta historiastaan.
fin.Rep_En: The Zoroastrian granite was formed in the Archean period about 2.5 to 3 billion years ago, deep beneath the Earth's crust, when magma froze and crystallized into hard rock, commonly in mountainous areas where the movement and slope of the Earth's crust caused deep rock to rise to the surface.

fra.Qst: Dans quel environnement le granit de Zoroastre s'est formé?
fra.Rep: Le granit de Zoroastre est une formation géologique située dans le parc national de Yosemite, en Californie, aux États-Unis. Il s'est formé il y a environ 100 millions d'années, pendant le Crétacé, à partir de magma qui a lentement refroidi et cristallisé en profondeur sous la surface de la Terre. Le granit de Zoroastre est composé principalement de quartz, de feldspath et de mica, et il est connu pour sa texture granulaire et sa couleur gris clair.
fra.Rep_En: Zoroaster granite is a geological formation located in Yosemite National Park, California, United States. It was formed about 100 million years ago, during the Cretaceous, from magma that slowly cooled and crystallized deep beneath the Earth's surface. Zoroaster granite is composed mainly of quartz, feldspar and mica, and is known for its granular texture and light gray color.

glg.Qst: En que ambiente se formou o granito de Zoroastro?
glg.Rep: O granito de Zoroastro é uma rocha ígnea que se formou em um ambiente plutônico, ou seja, no interior da crosta terrestre. Especificamente, ele se originou a partir do resfriamento lento e solidificação do magma em profundidades elevadas, formando cristais grandes e visíveis a olho nu. Esse processo ocorreu há cerca de 550 milhões de anos, durante o período Cambriano, na região do Monte Zoroastro, no Parque Nacional do Grand Canyon, nos Estados Unidos.
glg.Rep_En: Zoroastrian granite is a volcanic rock that formed in a plutonic environment, specifically in the interior of the Earth's crust, from the slow cooling and solidification of magma at high depths, forming large, naked-eye crystals.

guj.Qst: શું ઝોરોસ્ટ્રા ગ્રેનાઇટનું નિર્માણ થયું?
guj.Rep: ઝોરોસ્ટ્રા ગ્રેનાઇટ એક ઉચ્ચ ગુણવત્તાવાળું ગ્રેનાઇટ છે જે પોર્ટુગીઝ સામ્રાજ્યના ઝોરોસ્ટ્રા શહેરમાં સ્થાપિત થયું હતું. આ ગ્રેનાઇટનું નિર્માણ પોર્ટુગીઝ સામ્રાજ્યના સમયમાં થયું હતું જ્યારે ઝોરોસ્ટ્રા શહેરમાં સામુદ્રિક વ્યાપાર અને સંસ્કૃતિની વિકાસ થતી હતી. આ ગ્રેનાઇટ આજકાલ પોર્ટુગીઝ સામ્રાજ્યના ઝોરોસ્ટ્રા શહેરમાં પણ ઉપલબ્ધ છે.
guj.Rep_En: Zoroastrian granite is a high quality granite that was established in the city of Zoroastrian in the Portuguese Empire.This granite was produced during the Portuguese Empire when the city of Zoroastrian was developing maritime trade and culture.This granite is also available today in the city of Zoroastrian in the Portuguese Empire.

heb.Qst: באיזה סביבה נוצר גרניט זורוסטר?
heb.Rep: גרניט זורוסטר נוצר בסביבה מגמתית, כלומר בתנאים של לחץ גבוה וטמפרטורה גבוהה במיוחד. הוא נוצר בתוך הקרקע על ידי התגבשות של נוזלים וגזים מתחת לקרקע, ובכך יוצרים גרניט זורוסטר.
heb.Rep_En: Zoroaster granite is formed in a magnetic environment, i.e. in conditions of high pressure and extremely high temperature. It is formed inside the ground by the solidification of liquids and gases underground, thereby creating Zoroaster granite.

hin.Qst: ज़ोरास्टर ग्रेनाइट किस वातावरण में बना था?
hin.Rep: ज़ोरास्टर ग्रेनाइट एक मजबूत और दुर्गम पत्थर है जो मुख्य रूप से उच्च तापमान और तटस्थ दबाव के तहत बनता है। यह आमतौर पर गहन तथा उच्च तापमान वाले विशिष्ट वातावरण में बनता है, जैसे कि दीवारों, फ्लोरिंग, काउंटरटॉप्स, आदि के लिए उपयुक्त होता है।
hin.Rep_En: Zoroaster is a hard, durable stone that is formed mainly under high temperatures and neutral pressures.It is usually formed in a high temperature specific environment, such as walls, floors, countertops, etc.

hrv.Qst: U kojem je okruženju formiran zoroastrijski granit?
hrv.Rep: Zoroastrijski granit se najčešće nalazi u Iranu, koji je bio središte zoroastrizma. Također se može naći u drugim dijelovima svijeta gdje su živjeli zoroastrijci, kao što su Indija i Afganistan. Međutim, važno je napomenuti da je zoroastrizam danas manjinska religija, pa se granitni spomenici i drugi artefakti povezani s ovom vjerom mogu naći samo u određenim dijelovima svijeta.
hrv.Rep_En: Zoroastrian granite is most commonly found in Iran, which was the center of Zoroastrianism, and can also be found in other parts of the world where Zoroastrians lived, such as India and Afghanistan.

hun.Qst: Milyen környezetben alakult ki a zoroasztriánus gránit?
hun.Rep: A zoroasztriánus gránit nem egy valódi kőzet, hanem egy fiktív kifejezés, amelyet a fantasy irodalomban használnak. Ezért nem alakult ki semmilyen környezetben, mivel nem valóságos kőzet. Ha van bármilyen más kérdésed, szívesen segítek!
hun.Rep_En: Zoroastrian granite is not a real stone, but a fictitious term used in fantasy literature, so it didn't form in any environment, because it's not a real stone.

hye.Qst: Ինչպիսի՞ միջավայրում է ձեւավորվել Զորոտաստրի գրանիտը:
hye.Rep:
Զորոտաստրի գրանիտը ձեր համակարգչում կարող է ձեւավորվել հետևյալ եղանակով.

1. Բացեք ձեր վեբ բրաուզերը և մուտքագրեք "Zorotaster font" որոնման դաշտում:
2. Ընտրեք առաջին արդյունքը, որը կարող է լինել "Zorotaster font - Armenian fonts" կայքից:
3. Սեղմեք այն ու ներբեռնեք գրանիտը:
4. Կցեք գրանիտը ձեր համակարգչի տեղադրման պահին:
5. Անջատեք ձեր բրաուզերը և բացեք ցանկացած տեքստ ծրագրում:
6. Ընտրեք "Zorotaster font" ձեր ծրագրի տակ գրանիտի տեսքով:
7. Պահպանեք և ավելացրեք ձեր տեքստը նորմալ երկարամյա գրանիտով:
hye.Rep_En:
Zoroastrian granite in your computer can be formed in the following way:
1. Open your web browser and type "Zorotaster font" in the search box.
2. Choose the first result, which can be from the "Zorotaster font - Armenian fonts" website.
Click it and download the granite.
4. Place the granite at the time of installation of your computer.
5. Turn off your browser and open any text in the app.
6. Select "Zorotaster font" under your project in the form of granite.
7. Keep and add your text in normal durable granite.

ind.Qst: dalam lingkungan apa granit Zoroaster terbentuk
ind.Rep: Granit Zoroaster terbentuk di lingkungan batuan beku intrusif. Batuan beku intrusif terbentuk ketika magma mendingin dan mengkristal di bawah permukaan bumi. Granit Zoroaster terbentuk di bawah permukaan bumi dan terdiri dari mineral-mineral seperti kuarsa, feldspar, dan mika. Granit Zoroaster terbentuk di wilayah pegunungan dan sering ditemukan di sekitar pegunungan Zoroaster di Grand Canyon, Arizona, Amerika Serikat.
ind.Rep_En: Zoroaster granite is formed in the environment of intrusive igneous rock, when magma cools and crystallizes beneath the earth's surface, and is composed of minerals such as quartz, feldspar, and mica.Zoroaster granite is formed in mountainous areas and is often found around the Zoroaster Mountains in the Grand Canyon, Arizona, USA.

isl.Qst: Í hvaða umhverfi myndaðist Zoroaster granít?
isl.Rep: Zoroaster granít myndaðist í geislastreymi í Grand Canyon í Arizona í Bandaríkjunum.
isl.Rep_En: Zoroaster granite was formed in a stream in the Grand Canyon of Arizona, United States.

ita.Qst: In che ambiente si è formato il granito di Zoroastro?
ita.Rep: Il granito di Zoroastro è una roccia ignea plutonica che si è formato in profondità all'interno della crosta terrestre, attraverso il raffreddamento e la solidificazione del magma. In particolare, il granito di Zoroastro si è formato durante il periodo Precambriano, circa 2,5 miliardi di anni fa, in un ambiente geologico caratterizzato da intense attività vulcaniche e tettoniche. Questo tipo di roccia è composta principalmente da quarzo, feldspato e mica, ed è nota per la sua durezza e resistenza.
ita.Rep_En: Zoroastrian granite is a plutonic igneous rock that formed deep within the Earth's crust through the cooling and solidification of magma.Zoroastrian granite was formed during the Precambrian period, about 2.5 billion years ago, in a geological environment characterized by intense volcanic and tectonic activity.This type of rock is composed mainly of quartz, feldspar and mica.

jav.Qst: Ing ngendi Zoroaster granit digawe?
jav.Rep: Maaf, saya tidak mengerti pertanyaan Anda. Bisakah Anda mengulanginya dalam bahasa yang lebih jelas atau memberikan konteks yang lebih spesifik?
jav.Rep_En: I'm sorry, I don't understand your question. Can you repeat it in a clearer language or give a more specific context?

jpn.Qst: ゾロアスターの花崗岩はどんな環境で形成されたのか?
jpn.Rep: ゾロアスターの花崗岩は、火山活動によって形成されたマグマが地下深部で冷却・結晶化したものです。具体的には、地球のマントルから上昇するマグマが地殻に達し、深部で冷却されて結晶化したものが、花崗岩として現れたと考えられています。この過程は、非常に高温・高圧の環境下で起こるため、非常に長い時間をかけて形成されました。
jpn.Rep_En: The Zoroastrian granite is thought to be the result of the cooling and crystallization of magma formed by volcanic activity deep underground, specifically, magma rising from the Earth's mantle reaching the crust and cooling and crystallizing deep underground, which emerged as granite. This process took a very long time because it occurs in an environment of very high temperature and pressure.

kan.Qst: ಯಾವ ಪರಿಸರದಲ್ಲಿ ಝೋರಾಸ್ಟ್ರ ಗ್ರಾನೈಟ್ ರೂಪುಗೊಂಡಿತು?
kan.Rep: ಝೋರಾಸ್ಟ್ರ ಗ್ರಾನೈಟ್ ಪ್ರಮುಖವಾಗಿ ಭಾರತದ ಕರ್ನಾಟಕ ರಾಜ್ಯದ ರಾಮನಗರ ಜಿಲ್ಲೆಯ ಇಲ್ಲಿ ರೂಪುಗೊಂಡಿದೆ.
kan.Rep_En: Zoroastrian granite is mainly formed here in the Ramanagar district of the Indian state of Karnataka.

kat.Qst: რა გარემოში ჩამოყალიბდა ზაროასტრის გრანიტი?
kat.Rep: ზაროასტრის გრანიტი ჩამოყალიბდა საქართველოში, კარტლის რაიონში. ეს გრანიტი არის მაღალი ხელოვნების მქონე სიმღერე, რომელიც გამოიყენება მრავალი არქიტექტურული პროექტის შესრულებაში. ამის გამო, ზაროასტრის გრანიტი არის ერთ-ერთი საუკეთესო მასალა, რომელიც გამოიყენება მრავალი არქიტექტურული პროექტის შესრულებაში.
kat.Rep_En: Zoroastrian granite was formed in the Kartli district of Georgia. This granite is a high-quality stone used in the execution of many architectural projects. Because of this, Zoroastrian granite is one of the best materials used in the execution of many architectural projects.

khm.Qst: តើ Zoroaster មាន ប្រភព ដើម មក ពី ភព ណា?
khm.Rep: Zoroaster គឺជាអ្នកអានព្រះសេចក្តីប្រកាសដែលបានបង្កើតឡើងនៅប្រទេសអាស៊ីប៉ាស៊ីហ្គីយ៉ាដែលមានឈ្មោះថា អាស្ថានីយ៍ពូរ៉ាស៊ីន (Persia) នៅពេលវេលាដែលមានឈ្មោះថា ប្រទេសអ៊ីរ៉ង់ (Iran) បន្ទាប់មក។ គេបានស្វែងយល់ថាប្រភពដើមរបស់ Zoroaster គឺមានពីរប្រភពដែលជាប្រភពស្រីនិងប្រភពប្រុស។ ប្រភពស្រីគឺជាប្រភពមួយដែលមានឈ្មោះថា ប៊ុនស្រី (Pouruchista) ហើយប្រភពប្រុសគឺជាប្រភពមួយដែលមានឈ្មោះថា ប៊ុនស្រី (Pourushaspa)។
khm.Rep_En: Zoroaster was a Persian mystic who lived in the 4th century BC, and is believed to have had two sources: a male and a female, the first being the Purushita.

kir.Qst: Зороастр граниттин пайда болушуна эмне себеп болгон?
kir.Rep: Зороастр граниттин пайдасынын себеби, ул биринчи заманда Месопотамияда жашаган биринчи теологлардан бири болгон. kir.Rep_En: The Zoroastrian theologian and philosopher, Zoroaster, was one of the first theologians to live in Mesopotamia, and he was known for his theological, philosophical, and cultural insights that helped him understand the nature of life, the goodness of life, and the goodness of youth.

kor.Qst: 어떤 환경에서 조로아스터 그라나이트가 형성되었습니까?
kor.Rep: 조로아스터 그라나이트는 대부분 지하에서 형성되는 화성암 중 하나입니다. 이 암석은 지하에서 깊이가 깊어질수록 높은 압력과 온도에 노출되어 형성됩니다. 이러한 환경에서 암석의 성분이 녹아서 섞이고, 냉각되면서 결정화되어 조로아스터 그라나이트가 형성됩니다. 이러한 과정은 수백만 년 동안 지속되며, 지하에서 발생하는 지진과 같은 지질 활동으로 인해 지표면으로 노출됩니다.
kor.Rep_En: Zoroaster granite is a type of marble that is formed in the deeper layers of the Earth's crust, where it is exposed to high pressure and temperature, and where it solidifies and crystallizes to form Zoroaster granite, which is exposed to the Earth's crust by earthquakes and other geological events.
