lit.Qst: Kokia aplinka suformavo Zoroasterio granitą?
lit.Rep:
Zoroasterio granitas yra tikrai įspūdingas akmuo, tačiau jis nėra susijęs su Zoroasteriu, kuris buvo senovės Persijos religijos reformatorius. Tai yra tik pavadinimas, kuris buvo suteiktas tam granitui. 

Granitas yra natūralus akmuo, susidedantis iš kvarco, feldspato ir mėlynojo mineralo. Jis susidaro giliai po žeme, kai magma atvėsta ir kristalizuojasi. Tai reiškia, kad granitas formuojasi tik po žeme, o ne ant jos. 

Dauguma Zoroasterio granito yra iškirsta iš kalnų uolų, kurios yra senovės Persijos teritorijoje. Tai yra viena iš priežasčių, kodėl šis akmuo yra taip vertinamas, nes jis yra retas ir sunkiai prieinamas. 

Taigi, nors aplinka negali tiesiogiai paveikti granito formavimosi, ji gali turėti įtakos jo išgavimui ir prieinamumui.
lit.Rep_En:
Zoroaster granite is a very rare stone, but it is not related to Zoroaster, the Persian religious reformer, and is only a nickname given to the stone.
Granite is a natural rock composed of quartz, feldspar, and blue mineral. It is formed deep underground when magma evaporates and crystallizes, which means that granite forms only underground, not on top of it.
Most Zoroastrian granite is quarried from mountain rocks in ancient Persia, which is one of the reasons why this stone is so valued, because it is rare and difficult to access.
Thus, although the environment cannot directly affect the formation of granite, it can influence its extraction and availability.

lvs.Qst: kādā vidē izveidojās Zoroastras granīts
lvs.Rep: Zoroastras granīts izveidojās viduslaikos, apmēram 13. gadsimtā, uz Zoroastras kultūras un reliģijas centru - Persijas impērijas teritorijā, kas atrodas tagadējā Irānā. Granīts ir saistīts ar Zoroastras reliģiju, kas bija viena no senākajām monoteistiskajām reliģijām pasaulē. Granīts satur uzrakstus un simbolus, kas saistīti ar Zoroastras reliģiju un tās kultūru.
lvs.Rep_En: The Zoroastrian granite was formed in the Middle Ages, around the 13th century, at the center of Zoroastrian culture and religion - the territory of the Persian Empire, located in present-day Iran.

mai.Qst: कुन क्षेत्रमा जरोआस्टर ग्रानिटको निर्माण भयो?
mai.Rep: जरोआस्टर ग्रानाइट एक उत्तर प्रदेश राज्य के जिला जालौन में स्थित है। यहाँ पर जरोआस्टर ग्रानाइट के खनन और उत्पादन का काम किया जाता है।
mai.Rep_En: Zaroaster Granite is located in Jalaun district of Uttar Pradesh state. Zaroaster granite is mined and produced here.

mal.Qst: ഏത് പരിതസ്ഥിതിയിലാണ് സരോസ്തർ ഗ്രാനൈറ്റ് രൂപം കൊണ്ടത്?
mal.Rep: സരോസ്തർ ഗ്രാനൈറ്റ് ഒരു കാര്യക്ഷമമായ സാധാരണ പരിസ്ഥിതിയില്‍ രൂപം കൊണ്ടിരിക്കുന്നു. ഇത് ഒരു കാര്യക്ഷമമായ പരിസ്ഥിതിയില്‍ ഉണ്ടാകുന്നില്ല. സരോസ്തർ ഗ്രാനൈറ്റ് ഒരു കാര്യക്ഷമമായ പരിസ്ഥിതിയില്‍ ഉണ്ടാകുന്നത് പ്രകൃതിയുടെ വികസനത്തിന്റെ ഫലമാണ്. സരോസ്തർ ഗ്രാനൈറ്റ് പരിസ്ഥിതികളില്‍ ഉണ്ടാകുന്നില്ല, അതിനാല്‍ അത് ഒരു സാധാരണ പരിസ്ഥിതിയില്‍ രൂപം കൊണ്ടിരിക്കുന്നു.
mal.Rep_En: Zoroastrian granite is forming an efficient normal environment. It's not forming an efficient environment. Zoroastrian granite is forming an efficient environment as a result of the development of nature. Zoroastrian granites are not forming a normal environment.

mar.Qst: कोणत्या वातावरणात झोरोस्टर ग्रॅनाइट तयार झाला?
mar.Rep: झोरोस्टर ग्रॅनाइट भारतातील महाराष्ट्र राज्यातील जांभुळ येथे तयार केला जातो. या वातावरणात उष्णता आणि उष्णता असते आणि येथे शिल्पकारांनी अनेक वर्षे झोरोस्टर ग्रॅनाइट तयार केले आहेत.
mar.Rep_En: Zoroaster granite is produced in Jambol, Maharashtra, India. This environment is hot and humid, and here, craftsmen have been producing Zoroaster granite for many years.

mkd.Qst: Во која средина се формира Зороастровиот гранит?
mkd.Rep: Зороастровиот гранит е формиран во магматската средина, односно во гранитните интрузии кои се формираат кога магмата се интрузира во постоечките стенски породи. Оваа средина е карактеристична за геолошките области каде што има активна вулканска активност или каде што има богатство на магматски породи.
mkd.Rep_En: Granite is formed in the magmatic environment, i.e. in the granite intrusions that are formed when magma intrudes into existing rock rocks.This environment is characteristic of geological areas where there is active volcanic activity or where there is a wealth of magmatic rocks.

mlt.Qst: X'inhuma l-elementi li jagħmlu l-granit ta 'Zoroaster?
mlt.Rep: Granit ta 'Zoroaster huwa tip ta' granit li jinkludi diversi elementi kemm primarji kif ukoll sekondarji. L-elementi ewlenin li jinstabu f'dan il-granit huma silikati bħall-feldspar, kwartż, u mika. Elementi oħra li jinstabu huma l-aluminju, l-feru, il-magni, il-kalċju, u l-potassju. Dan il-granit huwa parti mill-formazzjoni tal-Ġebel Zoroaster fil-Grand Canyon tal-Amerika.
mlt.Rep_En: Zoroaster granite is a type of granite that includes several elements both primary and secondary.The main elements found in this granite are silicates such as feldspar, quartz, and mica.Other elements found are aluminum, iron, magnesium, calcium, and potassium.This granite is part of the Zoroaster Formation in the Grand Canyon of America.

nld.Qst: In welke omgeving werd het zoroastergranit gevormd?
nld.Rep: Het Zoroaster-graniet is gevormd in een plutonische omgeving, wat betekent dat het is ontstaan door de stolling van magma die diep onder het aardoppervlak is afgekoeld en gestold. Het graniet is vernoemd naar de Zoroaster-tempel in het Grand Canyon National Park in de Verenigde Staten, waar het veel voorkomt.
nld.Rep_En: Zoroaster granite is formed in a plutonic environment, meaning it was formed by the cooling and solidification of magma deep beneath the Earth's surface, and is named after the Zoroaster Temple in Grand Canyon National Park, where it is found.

nno.Qst: I kva miljø ble Zoroaster-granitt dannet?
nno.Rep: Zoroaster-granitten ble dannet i en intrusiv bergartsmasse i den geologiske perioden kalt proterozoikum. Denne bergarten finnes hovedsakelig i Grand Canyon-området i Arizona, USA. Granitten ble dannet for rundt 1,7 milliarder år siden gjennom en prosess kalt magmatisk differensiering, der magmaen som steg opp fra jordens mantel ble avkjølt og krystallisert i jordskorpen.
nno.Rep_En: Zoroaster granite was formed in an intrusive rock mass in the geological period called the Proterozoic. This rock type is found mainly in the Grand Canyon area of Arizona, USA. Granite was formed about 1.7 billion years ago through a process called magmatic differentiation, in which the magma that rose from the earth's mantle was cooled and crystallized in the earth's crust.

nob.Qst: i hvilket miljø ble Zoroaster granitt dannet
nob.Rep: Zoroaster Granite ble dannet i en intrusiv miljø, det vil si at den ble dannet dypt under jorden av magma som sakte avkjølte og krystalliserte seg over tid. Dette skjedde for rundt 1,7 milliarder år siden i det som nå er Grand Canyon-området i Arizona, USA.
nob.Rep_En: Zoroaster Granite was formed in an intrusive environment, that is, it was formed deep underground by magma that slowly cooled and crystallized over time.

npi.Qst: कुन क्षेत्रमा जरोआस्टर ग्रानिटको निर्माण भएको थियो?
npi.Rep: जरोआस्टर ग्रानाइटको निर्माण भारतको राजस्थान प्रदेशको जोधपुर जिल्लाको पाली उपत्यकामा भएको थियो।
npi.Rep_En: Zoroaster Granite was built in the Pali valley of Jodhpur district of Rajasthan state, India.

pbt.Qst: په کوم چاپیریال کې د زرتشت ګرانایټ رامینځته شوی؟
pbt.Rep: زرتشت ګرانایټ د ایران د نیشتمن په مرکز کې د یوه ګرانه دی. دا ګرانه د ایران د مشهد ښار کې د مشهد بزرگ مسجد کې د محراب په ځای کې د موجود دی. دا ګرانه د ایران د مشهد ښار کې د مشهد بزرگ مسجد کې د محراب په ځای کې د موجود دی.
pbt.Rep_En: Zartasht Granite is a granite in the center of Nishtman, Iran. It is located in the place of the mihrab of the Great Mosque of Mashhad in the city of Mashhad, Iran.

pes.Qst: گرانیت زرتشت در چه محیطی شکل گرفت؟
pes.Rep: گرانیت زرتشت یکی از نوع‌های سنگ‌های گرانیت است که در محیط‌های زمینی شکل گرفته است. این سنگ به دلیل ترکیبات معدنی خود از جمله فلزات سنگین و کوارتز، در محیط‌هایی که فشار و دمای بالایی دارند، شکل می‌گیرد. به عنوان مثال، در محیط‌های زیر دریاچه‌ها و کوه‌های بلند، گرانیت زرتشت شکل می‌گیرد.
pes.Rep_En: Granite is one of the types of granite rocks that form in terrestrial environments. It forms due to its mineral compounds, including heavy metals and quartz, in environments that have high pressures and temperatures. For example, in environments under lakes and high mountains, granite forms.

pol.Qst: W jakim środowisku powstał granit zoroasterowy?
pol.Rep: Granit zoroasterowy powstał w środowisku magmowym, w wyniku krystalizacji magmy głębinowej. Został odkryty w Parku Narodowym Yosemite w Kalifornii, USA.
pol.Rep_En: Zoroaster granite was formed in a magma environment by the crystallization of deep-sea magma and was discovered in Yosemite National Park in California, USA.

por.Qst: Em que ambiente se formou o granito de Zoroastro?
por.Rep: O granito de Zoroastro é uma rocha ígnea plutônica que se formou no ambiente profundo da crosta terrestre, a partir do resfriamento e solidificação do magma. Especificamente, ele se formou no ambiente de uma câmara magmática subterrânea, onde o magma ficou preso e esfriou lentamente ao longo de milhões de anos, permitindo a formação de cristais de quartzo, feldspato e mica que compõem o granito.
por.Rep_En: Zoroastrian granite is a plutonic igneous rock that formed in the deep environment of the Earth's crust from the cooling and solidification of magma, specifically in the environment of a subterranean magma chamber where magma was trapped and slowly cooled over millions of years, allowing the formation of quartz, feldspar and mica crystals that make up granite.

ron.Qst: În ce mediu s-a format granitul Zoroaster?
ron.Rep: Granitul Zoroaster este un tip de granit care se găsește în Parcul Național Grand Canyon din Statele Unite ale Americii. Acesta s-a format într-un mediu de magmă intruzivă, adică a fost format prin răcirea lentă a magmei sub suprafața Pământului. Granitul Zoroaster este considerat a fi unul dintre cele mai vechi tipuri de granit din lume, cu o vechime estimată la aproximativ 1,7 miliarde de ani.
ron.Rep_En: Zoroaster granite is a type of granite found in the Grand Canyon National Park in the United States, formed in an intrusive magma environment, that is, formed by the slow cooling of magma beneath the Earth's surface.Zoroaster granite is considered to be one of the oldest types of granite in the world, with an estimated age of about 1.7 billion years.

rus.Qst: в какой среде сформировался гранит зороастра
rus.Rep: Гранит - это глубинная горная порода, которая образуется из магмы, остывающей под землей. Поэтому гранит зороастра, как и любой другой гранит, сформировался в глубине земли, в магматической среде.
rus.Rep_En: Granite is a deep rock that is formed from magma that cools underground, so Zoroastrian granite, like any other granite, was formed deep in the earth, in a magmatic environment.

slk.Qst: V akom prostredí sa vytvorila zoroastrská žuly
slk.Rep: Zoroastrská žula sa vytvorila v prostredí, ktoré bolo bohaté na kremenné minerály a kyselinu fluorovodíkovú. Tieto minerály sa nachádzali v horninách, ktoré boli vystavené vysokým teplotám a tlakom v dôsledku geologických procesov, ako je napríklad metamorfóza. Tieto procesy sa zvyčajne vyskytujú v oblastiach s vysokou geologickou aktivitou, ako sú pohoria a zóny subdukcie. Konkrétne sa zoroastrská žula vyskytuje v oblastiach Iránu, Afganistanu a Pakistánu.
slk.Rep_En: Zoroastrian granite was formed in environments rich in silica and fluorine, which were found in rocks that were exposed to high temperatures and pressure as a result of geological processes such as metamorphosis, which typically occur in areas of high geological activity such as mountains and subduction zones.

slv.Qst: V kakšnem okolju je nastal zoroastrski granit
slv.Rep: Zoroastrski granit je nastal v okolju, ki je bilo nekoč vulkansko. Gre za vrsto granita, ki vsebuje veliko kremena, feldsparja in mika. Ta vrsta granita se običajno nahaja v bližini vulkanskih območij, kjer so se v preteklosti pojavljale vulkanske aktivnosti. Zoroastrski granit je dobil ime po zoroastrizmu, starodavni religiji, ki izvira iz Irana, kjer se ta vrsta granita pogosto nahaja.
slv.Rep_En: Zoroastrian granite is a type of granite that contains a lot of flint, feldspar, and mica.This type of granite is usually found near volcanic areas where volcanic activity has occurred in the past.Zoroastrian granite is named after the ancient religion of Zoroastrianism, which originated in Iran, where this type of granite is often found.

spa.Qst: En qué entorno se formó el granito de Zoroastro
spa.Rep: Lo siento, pero no tengo suficiente información para responder a esa pregunta. ¿Podrías proporcionar más contexto o detalles sobre el granito de Zoroastro? De esa manera, podré ayudarte mejor.
spa.Rep_En: I'm sorry, but I don't have enough information to answer that question. Could you provide more context or details about Zoroastrian granite? That way, I can help you better.

srp.Qst: у којој је средини формиран зороастријски гранит
srp.Rep: Нажалост, не разумем шта тачно питате. Молим Вас да ми пружите више информација или да поставите јасније питање. Хвала Вам!
srp.Rep_En: Unfortunately, I don't understand what you're asking exactly. Please give me more information or ask a clearer question. Thank you!

swe.Qst: i vilken miljö bildades zoroastergraniten
swe.Rep: Zoroastergraniten bildades för cirka 1,7 miljarder år sedan i en miljö av högt tryck och hög temperatur. Den bildades genom metamorfism av sedimentära bergarter som utsattes för dessa extrema förhållanden i jordskorpan. Zoroastergraniten finns främst i Grand Canyon-området i Arizona, USA.
swe.Rep_En: Zoroaster granite was formed about 1.7 billion years ago in an environment of high pressure and high temperature, through metamorphism of sedimentary rocks exposed to these extreme conditions in the earth's crust.

swh.Qst: Ni nini kilichotokea wakati Zoroaster granite ilitengenezwa?
swh.Rep: Zoroaster Granite ni jina la jiwe kubwa la granite lililopo katika eneo la Zoroaster Temple katika Hifadhi ya Taifa ya Grand Canyon nchini Marekani. Jiwe hilo lilianza kuundwa takriban miaka milioni 1.7 iliyopita wakati magma ilipoanza kujikusanya chini ya ardhi. Baadaye, miamba iliyokuwa juu yake ilieruka na kufunika magma, na kwa muda mrefu, joto na shinikizo vilisababisha magma kugeuka kuwa jiwe la granite. Kwa hiyo, hakuna tukio maalum lililotokea wakati Zoroaster Granite ilitengenezwa, bali ni mchakato wa kiasili wa kijiolojia uliochukua mamilioni ya miaka.
swh.Rep_En: The Zoroaster granite, found in the Zoroaster Temple in Grand Canyon National Park, was formed about 1.7 million years ago when magma began to accumulate underground, and the rock layers on top of it eventually collapsed, causing the magma to turn into granite.

tel.Qst: ఏ వాతావరణంలో జొరాస్ట్రస్ గ్రానైట్ ఏర్పడింది?
tel.Rep: జొరాస్ట్రస్ గ్రానైట్ ఒక ఉత్తమ క్వార్ట్జ్ గ్రానైట్ విధానంలో ఉంటుంది. ఇది ప్రధానంగా ప్రకాశం, వాతావరణ మరియు తెలుగు ప్రాంతాల్లో ఉన్న స్థానాలు కారణంగా ఎంచుకోబడింది. ఇది కఠినమైన స్థాయిలత మరియు వాటర్ రిసిస్టెంట్ ప్రధానంగా ఉంటుంది, కాబట్టి ఇది కార్పెట్ మరియు ఫ్లోర్ టైల్స్ లో ఉపయోగించబడుతుంది.
tel.Rep_En: Zoroastrian granite is a fine quartz granite material, chosen primarily for its brightness, weather, and location in the Mediterranean region.It is hard, smooth, and waterproof, so it is mainly used in carpets and floor tiles.

tgk.Qst: Дар кадом муҳит гранити Зороастр ташаккул ёфт?
tgk.Rep: Гранити Зороастрийский был найден в различных местах, включая Иран, Индию и Пакистан. Он был использован для создания многих зороастрийских святынь и памятников, таких как храмы и могилы. Одним из наиболее известных мест, где был использован гранит Зороастрийский, является храм огня в Иране, который считается одним из самых священных мест для зороастрийцев.
tgk.Rep_En: Zoroastrian granite has been found in various places, including Iran, India and Pakistan. It has been used to create many Zoroastrian shrines and monuments, such as temples and tombs. One of the most famous places where Zoroastrian granite has been used is the fire in Iran, which is considered one of the most sacred places for Zoroastrian shrines.

tgl.Qst: Sa anong kapaligiran nabuo ang granito ng Zoroaster?
tgl.Rep: Ang granito ng Zoroaster ay nabuo sa loob ng mga bundok ng Grand Canyon sa Arizona, Estados Unidos. Ito ay nabuo sa ilalim ng matagal na panahon ng pagkakapit ng mga bato at pag-init ng magma mula sa ilalim ng lupa. Ang resulta ay isang matibay at magandang bato na ginagamit sa konstruksyon at dekorasyon.
tgl.Rep_En: The Zoroaster granite is formed in the Grand Canyon in Arizona, USA, under the long period of rock formation and heating of magma from underground, resulting in a strong and beautiful stone used in construction and decoration.

tha.Qst: ในสภาพแวดล้อมใดที่โกรนิต Zoroaster เกิดขึ้น?
tha.Rep: โกรนิต Zoroaster เกิดขึ้นในสภาพแวดล้อมของชาวอารียาน (Aryan) ในภูมิภาคเอเชียกลาง ประมาณ 3,500 ปีก่อนคริสต์ศักราช ชาวอารียานเป็นกลุ่มคนที่เคลื่อนย้ายตามภูมิภาคเอเชียกลาง และมีวัฒนธรรมที่มีความเชื่อมั่นในพระเจ้าและการบูชาเทพเจ้า โกรนิต Zoroaster เกิดขึ้นในสภาพแวดล้อมที่มีการแข่งขันระหว่างศาสนาและวัฒนธรรมต่างๆ และเขาได้สร้างศาสนาซึ่งเน้นการต่อสู้กับความชั่วร้ายและการเลือกทางดีเป็นหลัก ซึ่งเป็นศาสนาโซโรอัสเตอร์ (Zoroastrianism) ที่มีผู้นับถือมากในอินเดียและเปอร์เซียในปัจจุบัน
tha.Rep_En: The Zoroastrians were a nomadic people who lived in Central Asia from about 3500 BC to about 1000 BC.The Zoroastrians were a religious and religious people who were known for their devotion to the gods and their worship of the gods.The Zoroastrians were the first people to practice Zoroastrianism.

tur.Qst: Zoroaster granit hangi ortamda oluştu?
tur.Rep: Zoroaster granit, ABD'nin Arizona eyaletindeki Grand Canyon bölgesinde oluştu. Bu granit, Proterozoik dönemde (yaklaşık 1,7 milyar yıl önce) magma yataklarının soğuması ve kristalleşmesi sonucu oluştu.
tur.Rep_En: Zoroaster granite was formed in the Grand Canyon in Arizona, USA, during the Proterozoic era (about 1.7 billion years ago) as a result of the cooling and crystallization of magma deposits.

ukr.Qst: У якому середовищі утворився граніт Зороастра?
ukr.Rep: Граніт Зороастра утворився в глибинних гірських породах, в середовищі магматичної діяльності, близько 550 мільйонів років тому. Це було в ері Палеозойської ери, коли на Землі відбувалися інтенсивні геологічні процеси, що призвели до утворення багатьох гірських порід, включаючи граніт. Граніт Зороастра знаходиться в Ірані, в горах Загрос, і є одним з найстаріших гранітів на Землі.
ukr.Rep_En: Zoroaster granite was formed in the deep rocks, in the environment of magmatic activity, about 550 million years ago, during the Paleozoic era, when intense geological processes took place on Earth, which led to the formation of many rocks, including granite.

urd.Qst: زرتشت کے گرینیٹ کی تشکیل کس ماحول میں ہوئی؟
urd.Rep: زرتشت کے گرینیٹ کی تشکیل برسوں پہلے کے ایرانی ماحول میں ہوئی۔ اس کی بنیادی تعلیمات زرتشت کے مذہبی تعلیمات پر مبنی ہیں جو ایرانی فرسی زبان کے لوگوں کے درمیان پھیلی تھیں۔ اس کے علاوہ، یہ فلسفی تعلیمات بھی شامل تھیں جو ایرانی فرسی زبان کے فکری اور فرہنگی ماحول سے منسوب تھیں۔
urd.Rep_En: The Zoroastrianism of the early 20th century was a movement of religious and philosophical thought that took its roots in the Persian culture and was influenced by the Iranian philosophy of the time.

vie.Qst: trong môi trường nào đã hình thành đá granit Zoroaster
vie.Rep: Đá granit Zoroaster được hình thành trong môi trường núi lửa. Nó được tạo ra từ magma đổ ra từ lòng đất và sau đó làm nguội và đông cứng trong thời gian dài. Quá trình này tạo ra các hạt khoáng vôi và feldspar, tạo nên cấu trúc tinh thể của đá granit Zoroaster. Nó được tìm thấy chủ yếu ở khu vực Grand Canyon ở Arizona, Hoa Kỳ.
vie.Rep_En: Zoroaster granite is formed in volcanic environments, where magma is released from the earth and then cooled and solidified over a long period of time, producing granules of limestone and feldspar that form the granite's crystal structure.

yue.Qst: 佐羅阿斯特石喺咩環境下形成?
yue.Rep: 佐羅阿斯特石是一種由於高壓和高溫下形成的礦物。它通常在地殼深處的變質岩中形成，例如板岩、片麻岩和角閃岩等。在這些岩石中，高壓和高溫會導致礦物的結晶和變化，從而形成佐羅阿斯特石。此外，佐羅阿斯特石也可以在火山活動和熔岩流中形成。
yue.Rep_En: Zoharite is a type of mineral that is formed under high pressure and temperature. It is usually formed in the deformed rocks deep in the earth's crust, such as plate rocks, limestone and coral reefs. In these rocks, high pressure and temperature lead to the crystallization and transformation of minerals, from which Zoharite is formed.

zlm.Qst: Di mana Zoroaster granit terbentuk?
zlm.Rep: Zoroaster Granite terbentuk di wilayah pegunungan Zoroaster di Grand Canyon, Arizona, Amerika Serikat.
zlm.Rep_En: Zoroaster Granite was formed in the Zoroaster mountain range in the Grand Canyon, Arizona, United States.

eng.Qst: who sings meant to be with georgia florida line
eng.Rep: The song "Meant to Be" is performed by Florida Georgia Line featuring Bebe Rexha.

afr.Qst: "Die liedjie ""Made to Be with Georgia"" is deur die Amerikaanse sanger George Florida geskryf."
afr.Rep: Ek dink jy bedoel "Made to Love" deur John Legend. Dit is 'n Amerikaanse sanger en liedjieskrywer.
afr.Rep_En: I think you mean "Made to Love" by John Legend. It's an American singer and songwriter.

ary.Rep_En: I'm sorry, I can't understand your question. Can you clarify it further?

arz.Qst: اللي بيغني مع جورجيا فلوريدا لاين
arz.Rep: أعتقد أنك تقصد أغنية "Georgia on My Mind" التي غناها راي تشارلز. لم يغنِّ جورجيا فلوريدا لاين هذه الأغنية.
arz.Rep_En: I think you mean the song "Georgia on My Mind" by Ray Charles. Georgia Florida Line didn't sing this song.

asm.Qst: "যিজনে গীত গায়, তেওঁ ""জৰ্জিয়া ফ্ল'ৰিডা লাইন""ৰ সৈতে থাকিব লাগে"
asm.Rep: I'm sorry, but I don't understand the language you're using. Can you please translate it to English or provide more context so I can assist you better?

bel.Qst: Хто спявае прызначаны быць з Джорджыяй Фларыда лініі
bel.Rep: Песьня "Low" была спявана Фла-Рыдай і Т-Пейн.
bel.Rep_En: The song "Low" was sung by Fla-Rida and T-Pain.

ben.Qst: "যে গানটি ""ফ্লোরিডা"" গানটি গানের জন্য জোর্জিয়া ফ্লোরিডা লাইনকে বোঝায়"
ben.Rep: গানটির নাম "Georgia Florida Line" এবং এর শিল্পী হলেন জেইএফ এল (JFL).
ben.Rep_En: The song is called "Georgia Florida Line" and it's performed by JFL.

bos.Rep_En: I'm sorry, but I'm not sure what exactly your request is about.

bul.Qst: Който пее "Наречено да бъде с Джорджия Флорида Лайн"
bul.Rep: Песента "Наречено да бъде" е изпълнена от Джорджия Флорида Лайн.
bul.Rep_En: The song "Destined to Be" is performed by Georgia Florida Line.

cat.Qst: "El que canta ""Fant to Be with Georgia"" (La línia de Georgia) "
cat.Rep: Lo siento, no entiendo la pregunta. ¿Podrías proporcionar más contexto o información para que pueda ayudarte mejor?
cat.Rep_En: I'm sorry, I don't understand the question. Could you provide more context or information so I can help you better?

ceb.Qst: Ang mga tawo nga nag-awit sa mga kanta sa Georgia Florida
ceb.Rep:
Ang mga tawo nga nag-awit sa mga kanta sa Georgia Florida ay mga sikat na musikero at banda sa Southern United States. Ilan sa mga ito ay ang mga sumusunod:

- Florida Georgia Line
- Luke Bryan
- Jason Aldean
- Thomas Rhett
- Cole Swindell
- Kane Brown
- Sam Hunt
- Miranda Lambert
- Lady Antebellum
- Zac Brown Band

Ang mga ito ay kilala sa kanilang mga kantang country at southern rock na nagpapakita ng kanilang pagmamahal sa kanilang mga lugar at kultura.
ceb.Rep_En:
The people who sing the songs of Georgia Florida are famous musicians and bands from the Southern United States. Some of them are the following:
- The Florida Georgia Line
- Luke Bryan is here.
- This is Jason Aldean.
- This is Thomas Rhett.
- This is Cole Swindell.
- This is Kane Brown.
- This is Sam Hunt.
- This is Miranda Lambert.
- The Lady of the Antebellum
- The Zac Brown Band
They are known for their country and southern rock songs that express their love for their places and culture.

ces.Qst: Kdo zpívá "Myslím být s Georgie Florida Line"
ces.Rep: Píseň "Meant to Be" zpívají Bebe Rexha a Florida Georgia Line.
ces.Rep_En: "Meant to Be" by Bebe Rexha and Florida Georgia Line

ckb.Qst: "ئەو گۆرانییەی کە "" مەبەست بوو لەگەڵ جۆرجیا فلۆریدا بێت"""
ckb.Rep:
واو، ئەم گۆرانییە چۆنیەتییەکی خۆشەویستی دا دەردەکەوێت! ئەم گۆرانییە بە شێوەیەکی هەڵسەنگاندنی و پێشنیارییەکانی جۆرجیا فلۆریدا دەرچووە. ئەگەر دەتەوێت زانیاری زیاتر بدۆزیتەوە، دەتوانی لەم بەستەرەی خوارەوە بچۆڵەوە:

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Florida_(song)
ckb.Rep_En:
Wow, this song sounds like love! This song is based on the evaluations and recommendations of Georgia Florida. If you want to find out more, you can check out the following link:
This is a list of airports in Florida, USA.

cmn.Qst: 谁唱的"注定与乔治亚佛罗里达线"
cmn.Rep: 这首歌是由中国歌手李宇春演唱的，原曲为美国歌手Ray Charles的经典歌曲"Georgia on My Mind"。李宇春的版本名为"注定与乔治亚佛罗里达线"，收录于她的专辑《偏爱》中。
cmn.Rep_En: The song was performed by Chinese singer Li Yuchun, and is the original song of American singer Ray Charles' classic song "Georgia on My Mind". Li Yuchun's version is titled "Fated to Meet Georgia Florida Line", included on her album "Preferred Love".

cmn_Hant.Qst: 唱歌的意思是与乔治亚佛罗里达线
cmn_Hant.Rep: 我不太明白你的问题，请问你能提供更多的上下文或信息吗？
cmn_Hant.Rep_En: I don't quite understand your question, can you please provide more context or information?

cym.Qst: Mae'r gân yn cael ei chanu gan Georgia Florida.
cym.Rep: Diolch am y wybodaeth! Mae Georgia Florida yn artist gwlad/pop Americana sy'n enwog am ei cherddoriaeth. Mae'n dda clywed bod y gân yn cael ei chanu gan artist o'r radd flaenaf.
cym.Rep_En: The song is a tribute to the late George Washington, a famous American singer and songwriter, who was born in the United States, and it is a tribute to the fact that he was born in the United States.

dan.Qst: Hvem synger "Måtte være med Georgia Florida Line"
dan.Rep: Sangen "Cruise" synges av Georgia Florida Line.
dan.Rep_En: The song "Cruise" is sung by Georgia Florida Line.

deu.Qst: wer singt mit georgia florida line
deu.Rep:
Es gibt mehrere Sänger, die mit Florida Georgia Line zusammengearbeitet haben, darunter:

- Bebe Rexha (für den Song "Meant to Be")
- Nelly (für den Song "Cruise")
- Tim McGraw (für den Song "May We All")
- Luke Bryan (für den Song "This Is How We Roll")
- Jason Derulo (für den Song "Women")

Es gibt jedoch noch viele andere Künstler, mit denen Florida Georgia Line zusammengearbeitet hat.
deu.Rep_En:
There are several singers who have collaborated with Florida Georgia Line, including:
- Bebe Rexha (for the song "Meant to Be")
- Nelly (for the song "Cruise")
- Tim McGraw (for the song "May We All")
- Luke Bryan (for the song "This Is How We Roll")
- Jason Derulo (for the song "Women")
However, there are many other artists that Florida Georgia Line has collaborated with.

jpn.Qst: ジョージア・フロリダ・ライン
jpn.Rep: ジョージア・フロリダ・ラインは、アメリカ合衆国の鉄道会社で、ジョージア州とフロリダ州を結ぶ路線を運行しています。この路線は、主に貨物輸送に使用されていますが、一部に旅客列車も運行されています。また、ジョージア・フロリダ・ラインは、他の鉄道会社との接続点を持っており、アメリカ南東部の物流ネットワークにおいて重要な役割を果たしています。
jpn.Rep_En: The Georgia-Florida Line is a U.S. railroad company that operates routes between Georgia and Florida. The line is used primarily for freight, but some passenger trains are also operated. The Georgia-Florida Line has connections with other railroad companies and plays an important role in the logistics network of the southeastern United States.

ของฟลอริด้าไลน์ที่ชื่อว่า "Made to Be with Georgia" เป็นเพลงที่มีเนื้อเพลงเกี่ยวกับความรักและความอุ่นใจของผู้หญิงที่ชื่อ Georgia ซึ่งเป็นคนที่ฟลอริด้าไลน์รักอย่างสุดหัวใจ นี่คือเนื้อเพลงของ "Made to Be with Georgia" โดยฟลอริด้าไลน์

Verse 1:
I've been around the world
Seen a lot of pretty faces
But none of them compare
To the one that I embrace
She's got a heart of gold
And a smile that lights up the room
I thank my lucky stars
That I found her when I did

Chorus:
Cause I was made to be with Georgia
She's the one that I adore
I was made to be with Georgia
And I'll love her forevermore

Verse 2:
We've had our ups and downs
But we always work it out
Cause when you find true love
You don't let it slip away
She's my best friend and my soulmate
And I thank God every day
That I get to spend my life
With the one that I love

Chorus:
Cause I was made to be with Georgia
She's the one that I adore
I was made to be with Georgia
And I'll love her forevermore

Bridge:
I don't need no fancy cars
Or a big house on the hill
As long as I've got Georgia
I know that I always will
She's my everything
And I'll never let her go
Cause I was made to be with Georgia
And I'll love her forevermore

Chorus:
Cause I was made to be with Georgia
She's the one that I adore
I was made to be with Georgia
And I'll love her forevermore

zlm.Rep: The song "Meant to Be" is performed by Florida Georgia Line featuring Bebe Rexha.

eng.Qst: who is the undead maid of honor tna
eng.Rep: The Undead Maid of Honor in TNA (Total Nonstop Action) was a character played by professional wrestler, Daffney. She was a member of the stable known as The Beautiful People and was known for her gothic and undead appearance. Daffney sadly passed away in 2021.

afr.Qst: Wie is die onsterflike bruidsmeisie?
afr.Rep: De Onsterfelijke Bruidsmeisje is een personage uit de Griekse mythologie genaamd Iris. Ze was de godin van de regenboog en diende als boodschapper van de goden. In sommige verhalen wordt ze beschreven als een bruidsmeisje bij de huwelijken van de goden. Haar onsterfelijkheid komt voort uit haar goddelijke afkomst.
afr.Rep_En: The Immortal Bride is a character from Greek mythology named Iris. She was the goddess of the rainbow and served as a messenger of the gods. In some stories she is described as one of the bridesmaids at the weddings of the gods. Her immortality comes from her divine ancestry.

arb.Rep_En: There's nothing to suggest there's a character or a fictional character called the Undead Maid of Honor.

asm.Rep: অমৃত কন্যা একটি পৌরাণিক ব্যক্তি যার নাম পুরাতন ভারতীয় সাহিত্যে উল্লেখ করা হয়েছে। তিনি একটি অমৃত পান করতে পারেন এবং তার কাছে যে কোনও রোগ থেকে মুক্তি পাওয়া যায়। তিনি একটি দেবী হিসাবে পূজা করা হয়।
asm.Rep_En: Amrit Kanya is a mythical figure whose name is mentioned in ancient Indian literature. She can drink an amrit and get rid of any disease she has. She is worshipped as a goddess.

bel.Qst: хто з'яўляецца нежывым нявестай гонар TNA
bel.Rep: Нежывым нявестай гонар TNA з'яўляецца тытул чэмпіёна TNA Knockouts, які прызначаецца найлепшай жаночай рестлерцы ў прафесійнай рэслінг-кампаніі TNA (Total Nonstop Action Wrestling). Гэты тытул быў створаны ў 2007 годзе і з таго часу быў выйграны многімі талентамі, у тым ліку Гейл Кім, Міккі Джеймс, Тара, Андэрсан, Гейл Кім і многія іншыя.
bel.Rep_En: The TNA Knockout Championship is a title awarded to the best female wrestler in the professional wrestling organization Total Nonstop Action Wrestling (TNA).The title was created in 2007 and has since been won by many talents, including Gail Kim, Mickey James, Tara Anderson, Gail Kim, and many others.

ben.Qst: আমি যে অ-মৃত কন্যার সাথে দেখা করতে চাই তা হ'ল টিএনএ।
ben.Rep: আপনি কি টিএনএ নামের কোন ব্যক্তি বা কিছু সংক্ষিপ্ত বর্ণনা দিতে পারেন? তাহলে আমি আপনাকে সঠিক তথ্য দিতে পারব।

bos.Qst: Šta je Undead Maid of Honor?
bos.Rep: Undead Maid of Honor je izraz koji se koristi u horor filmovima i književnosti, a odnosi se na lik koji je bio kuma na venčanju, ali je nakon smrti vaskrsao kao zombi ili drugi oblik nemrtvog bića. Ovaj lik obično ima za cilj da osveti svoju smrt ili da izvrši neku drugu vrstu osvete. Ovaj koncept se često koristi u horor žanru kao način da se dodaju elementi napetosti i straha u priču.
bos.Rep_En: The undead maid of honor is a term used in horror films and literature to refer to a character who was the best man at a wedding but was resurrected after death as a zombie or other form of undead creature. the character usually aims to avenge his death or to carry out some other kind of revenge. the concept is often used in the horror genre as a way to add elements of tension and fear to the story.

bul.Qst: Коя е не-мъртвата шаферка?
bul.Rep: Не-мъртвата шаферка е фантастичен обект, който се появява в различни филми, книги и игри. Обикновено тя е представена като магически или технологичен артефакт, който може да възкресява мъртвите или да им дава безсмъртие. Най-известната не-мъртва шаферка е вероятно тази от филма "Хари Потър и философският камък", която може да възкресява мъртвите.
bul.Rep_En: The Undead Bride is a fictional character in the Harry Potter series, who is a magical and magical being who can resurrect the dead, and the most famous undead bride is the one from the movie Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone.

ces.Rep_En: The Immortal Bride is a fictional character from Total Nonstop Action Wrestling (TNA), whose real name is Chelsea Green and she performed under this gimmick in 2016.

ckb.Rep: من ناتوانم بە دەستی کەسێکی خاص بەهێزی بەردەوام بکەم، لەبیرکرداری ئەم پرسیارە، ئەگەر بە شازادەی شازادەی کوردستان دەتوانیم بگونجیم کە ئەوەی کەسێکی بە ناوی شازادەی شازادەی کوردستان نییە.

cym.Rep: Nid wyf yn gallu ateb y cwestiwn hwn yn uniongyrchol gan nad yw digon o fanylion ynghylch y cyd-destun. Ond fel rheol, mae'r uned-dead maid of honor yn cyfeirio at ffrind agos neu berthynas sydd wedi marw ac sydd wedi cael eu dewis i fod yn rhan o briodas fel maid of honor. Mae'r term yn aml yn cael ei ddefnyddio mewn ffilmiau a nofelau.
cym.Rep_En: I'm not sure if this is a good idea, but I'm not sure if it's a good idea, because the term "maiden of honor" is often used to refer to a close friend or relative who has died and has been chosen to be part of a wedding as a maid of honor.

Tämä on kuitenkin vain fiktiivinen hahmo, eikä sillä ole todellista vastinetta todellisessa elämässä.

guj.Rep: અજીવ-મૃત્યુની કન્યા યમુના નદી છે. હિંદુ ધર્મના પરંપરાને અનુસરીને યમુના નદી મોક્ષની નદી છે જેથી લોકો તેને પવિત્ર માની રહ્યા છે.
guj.Rep_En: The river Yamuna is the bride of life and death. Following the tradition of Hinduism, the river Yamuna is the river of salvation so that people are considering it sacred.

hrv.Qst: Tko je nemrtva djeveruša TNA?
hrv.Rep: Nemrtva djeveruša TNA je fiktivni lik iz profesionalnog hrvanja. To je lik koji je bio dio TNA (Total Nonstop Action Wrestling) promocije, a igrala ju je američka profesionalna hrvačica po imenu Chelsea Green. Lik nemrtve djeveruše je bio dio njezine priče u kojoj je bila udata za hrvača po imenu Matt Hardy, ali je nakon što je preminula, vratila se kao nemrtva i počela mučiti njegovog brata Jeffa Hardyja.
hrv.Rep_En: The Immortal Bride is a fictional character from the professional wrestling (TNA) promotion, played by Chelsea Green, who was married to Matt Hardy and later returned to torment his brother Jeff Hardy.

hun.Qst: Ki a nem halott koszorúslány?
hun.Rep: A nem halott koszorúslány egy olyan személy, aki a menyasszonyt kíséri az oltárhoz, de nem visel fekete ruhát vagy koszorút, mint a hagyományos koszorúslányok a temetéseken. Általában a menyasszony barátnője vagy rokona vállalja ezt a szerepet, és a menyasszony ruhájához illő, de eltérő színű ruhát visel. A nem halott koszorúslányok szerepe az esküvői ceremónián azonos a hagyományos koszorúslányokéval, segítik a menyasszonyt és a vőlegényt, és hozzájárulnak az esküvő hangulatához.
hun.Rep_En: A bridesmaid is a person who accompanies the bride to the altar, but does not wear a black dress or a wedding ring, as is the case with traditional bridesmaids at funerals. Usually, the bride's girlfriend or relative assumes this role and wears a dress that matches the bride's dress but is a different color. The role of a bridesmaid is identical to that of a traditional bridesmaid at a wedding ceremony.

hye.Qst: Ո՞վ է անմահ հարսնացուն:
hye.Rep: Անմահ հարսնացուն չի գտնվում մարդկանց միջոցով, այլ այն մարդկանց համար է, որ մահացել են:
hye.Rep_En: The immortal bride is not found through people, but for people who are dead.

isl.Qst: Hver er hinn óláti brúðkaupi?
isl.Rep: Hinn óláti brúðkaupi er einnig þekkt sem "runaway brúðkaup" eða "secret brúðkaup". Þetta er þegar brúður og brúðgumi giftast án þess að tilkynna það fyrir fjölskyldu og vinum eða án þess að fylgjast með hefðbundnum brúðkaupsferli.
isl.Rep_En: The secret wedding is also known as a "runaway wedding" or "secret wedding". This is when the bride and groom get married without notifying family and friends or following the traditional wedding ceremony.

jpn.Qst: 不死のメイド オブ オナーとは?
jpn.Rep: 「不死のメイド オブ オナー」は、日本のライトノベル作品であり、著者は藤原佑介氏です。物語は、第二次世界大戦中のドイツを舞台に、不死身のメイドであるユリスと、彼女を雇うことになった元ドイツ軍兵士の少年ヨハンの冒険を描いています。戦争の中で、ユリスとヨハンは様々な困難に直面しながら、互いに助け合いながら生き抜く姿が描かれています。
jpn.Rep_En: The story is set in Germany during World War II, and follows the adventures of Ulysses, an immortal maid, and Johann, a former German soldier, who is forced to hire her. In the war, Ulysses and Johann face various difficulties and help each other survive.

swe.Qst: Vem är den odöda brudflickan?
swe.Rep: Den odöda brudflickan är en fiktiv karaktär som förekommer i olika berättelser och myter. I vissa versioner av berättelsen sägs det att hon är en ung kvinna som dog på sin bröllopsdag och sedan återvände som en spöke för att hämnas på sin fästman eller på bröllopsgästerna. I andra versioner sägs det att hon är en kvinna som dog under tragiska omständigheter och sedan återvänder som en spöke för att söka hämnd eller för att få upprättelse. Berättelsen om den odöda brudflickan har funnits i olika kulturer och tros ha sitt ursprung i gamla folktro och legender.
swe.Rep_En: The undead bride is a fictional character who appears in various stories and myths.In some versions of the story, she is a young woman who died on her wedding day and then returned as a ghost to take revenge on her fiancé or the wedding guests.In other versions, she is a woman who died under tragic circumstances and then returns as a ghost to seek revenge or to get revenge.

ukr.Qst: Хто є неживою подружкою честі?
ukr.Rep: Неживою подружкою честі є відповідь на це питання - це символічний образ, який нагадує про те, що чесність та правдивість є важливими якостями, які має дотримуватися кожна людина.
ukr.Rep_En: The immortal bride of honor is the answer to that question - a symbolic image that reminds us that honesty and truthfulness are important qualities that every human being should adhere to.

urd.Qst: کون ہے undead bridesmaid کے
urd.Rep: Undead Bridesmaid ایک واقعیت نہیں ہے بلکہ یہ ایک فنکاری کا نام ہے جو کہ ہارور فکشن کے تحت کام کرتا ہے۔ یہ فنکاری عام طور پر ہالووین کے موقع پر استعمال کی جاتی ہے جہاں لوگ اپنے لباسوں کو ڈراوٹا اور خوفناک بنانے کے لئے اس کی مدد لیتے ہیں۔
urd.Rep_En: The Undead Bridesmaid is a fictional character in the horror genre, commonly used as a Halloween costume to make people look scary.

vie.Qst: Ai là phù dâu không chết?
vie.Rep: The phrase "Ai là phù dâu không chết?" is in Vietnamese and it roughly translates to "Who is the immortal bridesmaid?" I'm sorry, but I do not have information on any immortal bridesmaid in any culture or mythology.

yue.Qst: 邊個係未死嘅伴娘?
yue.Rep: 我不知道你在說什麼，請提供更多上下文或資訊，讓我可以更好地回答你的問題。

zlm.Qst: siapa yang menjadi pendamping kehormatan yang tidak mati?
zlm.Rep: Pendamping kehormatan yang tidak mati adalah "The Unknown Soldier" atau "Prajurit Tak Dikenal". Ini adalah gelar yang diberikan kepada prajurit yang meninggal dalam tugas dan tidak dapat diidentifikasi. Prajurit ini dihormati dengan upacara pemakaman yang sangat seremonial dan dianggap sebagai simbol pengorbanan dan pengabdian kepada negara. Banyak negara memiliki "Prajurit Tak Dikenal" mereka sendiri, termasuk Amerika Serikat, Inggris, Prancis, dan Australia.
zlm.Rep_En: The unknown soldier is a title given to a soldier who has died in the line of duty and cannot be identified.The soldier is honored with a highly ceremonial funeral and is considered a symbol of sacrifice and devotion to his country.Many countries have their own unknown soldiers, including the United States, Britain, France, and Australia.

eng.Qst: when was the last time the kansas city chiefs played in a superbowl
eng.Rep: The Kansas City Chiefs played in the Super Bowl on February 2, 2020, where they defeated the San Francisco 49ers to win Super Bowl LIV.

afr.Qst: Die Kansas City Chiefs het die laaste keer in die Super Bowl gespeel.
afr.Rep: Dit is korrek. Die Kansas City Chiefs het in die Super Bowl LIV gespeel teen die San Francisco 49ers en het die wedstryd gewen met 'n telling van 31-20. Dit was hul tweede Super Bowl-oorwinning in die geskiedenis van die span.
afr.Rep_En: The Kansas City Chiefs played in Super Bowl LIV against the San Francisco 49ers and won the game by a score of 31-20.

arb.Qst: متى كانت آخر مرة لعب فيها فريق كانساس سيتي تشيفز في سوبر بول؟
arb.Rep: آخر مرة لعب فيها فريق كانساس سيتي تشيفز في سوبر بول كان في الموسم الرياضي 2019-2020، حيث خسروا أمام فريق سان فرانسيسكو 49ers بنتيجة 31-20.
arb.Rep_En: The last time the Kansas City Chiefs played in the Super Bowl was in the 2019-2020 season, where they lost to the San Francisco 49ers 31-20.

ary.Qst: وقتاش كانت آخر مرة لعب فيها فريق كانساس سيتي تشيفز في السوبر بول؟
ary.Rep: آخر مرة لعب فيها فريق كانساس سيتي تشيفز في السوبر بول كان في الموسم الكروي 2019، حيث فاز الفريق باللقب بعد تغلبه على فريق سان فرانسيسكو 49ers بنتيجة 31-20.
ary.Rep_En: The Kansas City Chiefs last played in the Super Bowl in the 2019 season, where the team won the title after beating the San Francisco 49ers 31-20.

arz.Qst: امتى كانت اخر مرة لعب فيها فريق كانساس سيتي تشيفز في السوبر بول؟
arz.Rep: لعب فريق كانساس سيتي تشيفز في السوبر بول في الموسم الذي أقيم فيه السوبر بول الخامس والأربعين (Super Bowl XLV) والذي كان في عام 2011، ولكنهم خسروا أمام فريق غرين باي باكرز (Green Bay Packers) بنتيجة 31-25.
arz.Rep_En: The Kansas City Chiefs played in the Super Bowl for the 45th time (Super Bowl XLV) in 2011, but lost to the Green Bay Packers (Green Bay Packers) 31-25.

asm.Qst: শেষবাৰৰ বাবে কেতিয়া কানছাছ চিটি চিফছে ছুপাৰ ব'লত খেলিছিল?
asm.Rep: আমি দুঃখিত, আমি এই প্রশ্নের উত্তর দিতে পারছি না। এটি কোনো নির্দিষ্ট সংশ্লিষ্ট বিষয়ের সম্পর্কে না হলেও এটি বাংলা ভাষার অনুষ্ঠানে সম্ভবত উত্তর দেওয়া হতে পারে। আপনি অন্য কোনো প্রশ্ন থাকলে আমি সেটির জন্য সহায়তা করতে পারি।
asm.Rep_En: We're sorry, we can't answer this question. Even if it's not about a specific topic, it's probably answered in a Bengali language program. We can help if you have any other questions.

bel.Qst: Калі ў апошні раз Канзас-Сіці начальнікі гулялі ў Суперкубку
bel.Rep: У апошні раз Канзас-Сіці не гуляла ў Суперкубку. Аднак, у сезоне 2019 року команда Канзас-Сіці Чіфс перемагла у Суперкубку, пасля чаго стала чэмпіёнам Нацыянальнай футбольнай лігі (NFL).
bel.Rep_En: The last time Kansas City did not play in the Super Bowl, however, in the 2019 season, the Kansas City Chiefs won the Super Bowl, becoming the National Football League (NFL) champions.

ben.Qst: শেষ কবে কানসাস সিটি চিফস সুপার বাউলে খেলেছিল?
ben.Rep: কানসাস সিটি চিফস সুপার বাউল খেলা হয়েছিল ২ ফেব্রুয়ারি ২০২০ তারিখে।
ben.Rep_En: The Kansas City Chiefs Super Bowl was played on February 2, 2020.

bos.Qst: Kada su Kansas City Chiefs posljednji put igrali u Super Bowlu?
bos.Rep: Kansas City Chiefs su posljednji put igrali u Super Bowlu u sezoni 2019. godine, kada su pobijedili San Francisco 49ers sa 31-20 u Super Bowlu LIV.
bos.Rep_En: The Kansas City Chiefs last played in the Super Bowl in the 2019 season, when they defeated the San Francisco 49ers 31-20 in Super Bowl LIV.

bul.Qst: Кога за последно Канзас Сити Чийфс играха в Супер Боул?
bul.Rep: Kansas City Chiefs играха в Супер Боул LIV (54) на 2 февруари 2020 година, където победиха San Francisco 49ers с резултат 31-20.
bul.Rep_En: The Kansas City Chiefs played in Super Bowl LIV (54) on February 2, 2020, where they defeated the San Francisco 49ers by a score of 31-20.

cat.Qst: Quan va ser l'última vegada que els Kansas City Chiefs van jugar a la Super Bowl?
cat.Rep: Els Kansas City Chiefs van jugar a la Super Bowl LIV el 2 de febrer de 2020, on van guanyar els San Francisco 49ers per un marcador de 31-20.
cat.Rep_En: The Kansas City Chiefs played in Super Bowl LIV on February 2, 2020, where they defeated the San Francisco 49ers by a score of 31-20.

ceb.Qst: Sa katapusan nga higayon nga ang Kansas City Chiefs sa usa ka Super Bowl
ceb.Rep: Kini mao ang unang higayon nga ang Kansas City Chiefs nakadaog sa usa ka Super Bowl sukad sa 50 ka tuig. Kini nahitabo sa Super Bowl LIV sa Pebrero 2, 2020, diin sila nakadaog batok sa San Francisco 49ers sa usa ka score nga 31-20. Si Patrick Mahomes, ang quarterback sa Chiefs, gidapit sa MVP award tungod sa iyang maayong performance sa dula.
ceb.Rep_En: The Kansas City Chiefs won their first Super Bowl in 50 years on February 2, 2020 with a 31-31 victory over the San Francisco 49ers.

ces.Qst: Kdy naposledy hráli Kansas City Chiefs v Superbowl?
ces.Rep: Kansas City Chiefs hráli v Superbowlu v roce 2020, kde porazili San Francisco 49ers a získali tak svůj druhý titul v historii.
ces.Rep_En: The Kansas City Chiefs played in the 2020 Super Bowl, where they defeated the San Francisco 49ers to win their second Super Bowl title.

ckb.Qst: دوایین جار کەی یانەی کانزاس سیتی لە یاریی سوپەر بۆڵ بەشداری کرد؟

ckb.Rep_En: I won't be able to attend the last Kansas City Super Bowl, because I'm not an American correspondent. Because of this, you can search for this game with multiple images or special topics to learn more.

guj.Qst: જ્યારે છેલ્લી વખત કેન્સાસ સિટી ચીફ્સ સુપર બાઉલમાં રમ્યા હતા

guj.Rep_En: Yes, the menu remembers that the Kansas City Chiefs played in the Super Bowl 2020 and they had a chance to win. They won against the San Francisco 49ers.

hye.Qst: "Ե՞րբ է վերջին անգամ ""Կանսաս Սիթի Չիֆս"" թիմը խաղացել ""Սուպեր Բոուլին"""

hye.Rep_En: The Kansas City Chiefs last played a Super Bowl game on January 24, 2021.

ind.Qst: Kapan terakhir kali Kansas City Chiefs bermain di Superbowl?
ind.Rep: Kansas City Chiefs terakhir kali bermain di Super Bowl pada tahun 2020, di mana mereka berhasil memenangkan gelar juara setelah mengalahkan San Francisco 49ers dengan skor 31-20.
ind.Rep_En: The Kansas City Chiefs last played in the Super Bowl in 2020, where they won the championship after beating the San Francisco 49ers 31-20.

isl.Qst: Hvenær spiluðu Kansas City Chiefs í síðasta skipti í Super Bowl?
isl.Rep: Kansas City Chiefs spiluðu í síðasta skipti í Super Bowl í febrúar 2020, þegar þeir mættu San Francisco 49ers í Super Bowl LIV. Chiefs vann 31-20 og sigraði þar með í sínum fyrsta Super Bowl í 50 ár.
isl.Rep_En: The Kansas City Chiefs last played in the Super Bowl in February 2020, when they faced the San Francisco 49ers in Super Bowl LIV. The Chiefs won 31-20 to win their first Super Bowl in 50 years.

ita.Qst: Quando e' stata l'ultima volta che i Kansas City Chiefs hanno giocato al Superbowl?
ita.Rep: I Kansas City Chiefs hanno giocato l'ultimo Super Bowl il 2 febbraio 2020, quando hanno vinto il Super Bowl LIV contro i San Francisco 49ers.
ita.Rep_En: The Kansas City Chiefs played their last Super Bowl on February 2, 2020, when they won Super Bowl LIV against the San Francisco 49ers.

jav.Qst: Nalika iku pungkasan wektu Kansas City Chiefs diputer ing Superbowl
jav.Rep: Ing Superbowl XLV, Kansas City Chiefs diputer ing tanggal 2 Februari 2020. Chiefs menang lawan San Francisco 49ers dengan skor 31-20.
jav.Rep_En: In Superbowl XLV, the Kansas City Chiefs played on February 2, 2020. The Chiefs defeated the San Francisco 49ers by a score of 31-20.

jpn.Qst: カンザスシティ・チーフズがスーパーボウルで優勝したのはいつ? - ライブドアニュース
jpn.Rep: カンザスシティ・チーフズがスーパーボウルで優勝したのは、2020年の第54回スーパーボウルでした。彼らはサンフランシスコ・フォーティナイナーズを31-20で破り、50年ぶりのスーパーボウル優勝を果たしました。
jpn.Rep_En: The Kansas City Chiefs won the Super Bowl, the 54th Super Bowl in 2020, when they beat the San Francisco Forty-Nines 31-20 to win their first Super Bowl in 50 years.

kan.Qst: ಕಳೆದ ಬಾರಿ ಕನ್ಸಾಸ್ ಸಿಟಿ ಚೀಫ್ಸ್ ಸೂಪರ್ ಬೌಲ್ನಲ್ಲಿ ಆಡಿದಾಗ
kan.Rep: ನೀವು ಕನ್ಸಾಸ್ ಸಿಟಿ ಚೀಫ್ಸ್ ಸೂಪರ್ ಬೌಲ್ನಲ್ಲಿ ಆಡಿದ್ದು ಹೇಗಿತ್ತು ಎಂದು ಕೇಳಿದ್ದೀರಿ. ನಾನು ಒಂದು ಸಹಾಯಕ ಸಿದ್ಧನಾಗಿದ್ದೇನೆ. ನೀವು ಆಡಿದ ಅನುಭವವನ್ನು ನನ್ನಿಂದ ಹೇಳಿಕೊಳ್ಳಬಹುದು.
kan.Rep_En: I've heard that the Kansas City Chiefs have a Super Bowl, and I'm a fan of the Super Bowl, so I'm going to try to get a little bit of a feel for it.

kat.Qst: "კანსას სიტი ქიფსი"" სუპერბოულში"
kat.Rep: გამარჯობა! მე ვისწავლი როგორ გამოვიყენოთ Google Maps-ის მარტივი ფუნქცია "მიმართვების ძებნა". ამ ფუნქციით შეგიძლიათ მოძებნოთ "Kansas City Chiefs" და "Super Bowl" და გადახედოთ, რომელი სტადიონისთვის არის მიმართვები. შემდეგ შეგიძლიათ გამოიყენოთ მარკერები, რომელიც განსაზღვრულია სტადიონის მდებარეობაზე. მაგალითად, თუ სტადიონი არის "Arrowhead Stadium", შეგიძლიათ დააჭიროთ მარკერზე და მიიღოთ მისი მისამართი. ისევ, თუ სტადიონი არ არის ამ მარკერზე, შეგიძლიათ მიიღოთ მისი მისამართი მეტროპოლიტენის მარკერებიდან და შემდეგ მიიღოთ მისი მიმართვები. ისევ, თუ გსურთ, შეგიძლიათ მიიღოთ მიმართვები სასურველი ტრანსპორტით, როგორც მაგალითად, ავტობუსით ან მეტროსთან. ისევ, თუ გსურთ, შეგიძლიათ მიიღოთ მიმართვები მანქანით, როგორც მაგალითად, Uber-ით ან Lyft-ით. საკმარისია, რომ გამოიყენოთ მარტივი ფუნქცია "მიმართვების ძებნა" Google Maps-ზე, რათა მარტივად იპოვოთ მიმართვები სტადიონზე.

- الموسم الثاني: 12 حلقة
- الموسم الثالث: 12 حلقة
- الموسم الرابع: 13 حلقة

High School DxD is a Japanese anime series consisting of 4 seasons and 49 episodes. The four seasons are:
- Season one: 12 episodes.
- Season two: 12 episodes.
- Season three: 12 episodes.
- Season four: 13 episodes.
So, the total number of episodes of Hey Doge is 49.

ceb.Qst: pila ka yugto sa hey duggee ang anaa
ceb.Rep:
Mayroong limang yugto sa Hey Duggee:

1. The Squirrel Club - Ito ang unang yugto kung saan ipinakilala ang mga miyembro ng Squirrel Club at ang kanilang mga adventure.

2. The Badge - Sa yugtong ito, tinuturuan ng mga miyembro ng Squirrel Club ang mga bata kung paano kumpletuhin ang kanilang mga badge.

3. The Happy Badge - Sa yugtong ito, tinutulungan ng mga miyembro ng Squirrel Club ang isang malungkot na bata na mahanap ang kanyang saya.

4. The Dancing Badge - Sa yugtong ito, tinutulungan ng mga miyembro ng Squirrel Club ang mga bata na matuto ng mga sayaw.

5. The Super Squirrel Badge - Sa huling yugto, tinutulungan ng mga miyembro ng Squirrel Club ang mga bata na maging mga superhero at kumpletuhin ang kanilang Super Squirrel Badge.
ceb.Rep_En:
There are five stages of Hey Duggee:
1. The Squirrel Club - This is the first episode where the members of the Squirrel Club and their adventures are introduced.
2. The Badge - During this stage, Squirrel Club members teach children how to complete their badges.
3. The Happy Badge - In this episode, Squirrel Club members help a sad child find his or her way.
4. The Dancing Badge - During this stage, Squirrel Club members help children learn the dances.
5. The Super Squirrel Badge - In the final stage, Squirrel Club members help children become superheroes and complete their Super Squirrel Badge.

cym.Qst: Faint o gyfres o Hey Duggie sydd yno?
cym.Rep:
Mae nifer o gyfresau o Hey Duggie ar gael, gan gynnwys:

1. Hey Duggie - mae hwn yn y gyfres wreiddiol a dilynwn Duggie, y ci, a'i ffrindiau wrth iddynt ddysgu am y byd o'u cwmpas.

2. Hey Duggee: The Stick Badge - mae'r gyfres hon yn canolbwyntio ar y broses o ddysgu a datblygu sgiliau drwy chwarae gyda chwibanod.

3. Hey Duggee: The Space Badge - mae'r gyfres hon yn canolbwyntio ar anturiaethau Duggie a'i ffrindiau yn y gofod.

4. Hey Duggee: The Super Squirrel Badge - mae'r gyfres hon yn canolbwyntio ar anturiaethau Duggie a'i ffrindiau wrth iddynt ddysgu am y byd naturiol.

5. Hey Duggee: The Tinsel Badge - mae'r gyfres hon yn canolbwyntio ar Duggie a'i ffrindiau wrth iddynt ddathlu'r Nadolig.

Mae'r gyfresau hyn i gyd ar gael ar BBC iPlayer.
cym.Rep_En:
A number of series of Hey Duggie are available, including:
The first episode of the series is called "Doggy's World" and it follows Doge and his friends as they learn about the world around them.
The "Dog" and "Dog" series are about the development of skills through the use of a stick.
The "Dungeon" series is a series of adventures in space.
The Super Squirrel Badge - This series focuses on the adventures of Duggie and his friends as they learn about the natural world.
The Dirty Dozen: The Twilight Saga is a series of books about the life of Dirty Dozen and his friends as they celebrate Christmas.
All these series are available on BBC iPlayer.

eng.Qst: what was the first man made object on mars
eng.Rep: The first man-made object on Mars was the Soviet Union's Mars 2 lander, which arrived on the planet on November 27, 1971. However, it crashed on the surface and was not able to transmit any data. The first successful landing on Mars was achieved by NASA's Viking 1 lander on July 20, 1976.

afr.Qst: Wat was die eerste mensgemaakte voorwerp op Mars?
afr.Rep: De eerste mensgemaakte voorwerpen op Mars waren de Mars Viking-landers, die in 1976 door NASA werden gelanceerd. Deze landers waren uitgerust met verschillende wetenschappelijke instrumenten om de atmosfeer, het oppervlak en de geologie van Mars te bestuderen. Ze waren ook uitgerust met een robotarm om monsters van de bodem te verzamelen en te analyseren. De Viking-landers waren een belangrijke mijlpaal in de verkenning van Mars en hebben ons veel geleerd over de rode planeet.
afr.Rep_En: The first man-made objects on Mars were the Mars Viking landers, launched by NASA in 1976, equipped with various scientific instruments to study the atmosphere, surface and geology of Mars, and equipped with a robotic arm to collect and analyze samples from the bottom.

arb.Qst: ما هو أول جسم صنع الإنسان على المريخ؟
arb.Rep: لم يقم الإنسان بصنع أي جسم على المريخ حتى الآن. ولكن هناك بعض المهمات الفضائية التي تم إرسالها إلى المريخ لدراسة الكوكب والتحقق من إمكانية وجود حياة عليه. ومن بين هذه المهمات هي مهمة "مارس 2020" التي تم إطلاقها في يوليو 2020 وتضم مسبارًا وروبوتًا لجمع العينات من سطح المريخ وإرسالها إلى الأرض لدراستها.
arb.Rep_En: No man-made object has ever been sent to Mars, but there have been several missions to study the planet and see if it could support life, including the Mars 2020 mission, launched in July 2020 and involving a probe and a robot to collect samples from the Martian surface and send them back to Earth for study.

ary.Qst: اشنو كان أول جسم صايب من قبل الإنسان على المريخ؟
ary.Rep: لم يتم العثور على أي دليل على وجود أي جسم صلب صادم على المريخ تم صدمه من قبل الإنسان. ومع ذلك ، تم العثور على بعض الصخور على الأرض يُعتقد أنها من المريخ ، والتي تم جلبها إلى الأرض عن طريق الصخور النيزكية التي ضربت المريخ وأرسلت شظايا منه إلى الفضاء. وقد تم جمع هذه الصخور من قبل المركبات الفضائية التي تم إرسالها إلى المريخ ، مثل مسبارات "فايكينغ" و "كوريوسيتي".
ary.Rep_En: No evidence of a solid object hitting Mars has been found, but some rocks on Earth have been found that are thought to be from Mars, brought to Earth by meteorites that hit Mars and sent fragments of it into space.

arz.Qst: ايه كان أول جسم صنعوه الإنسان على المريخ؟
arz.Rep: ليس هناك أي دليل على أن الإنسان قد صنع أي جسم على المريخ حتى الآن. ومن المعروف أن الإنسان لم يصل إلى المريخ بشكل مباشر بعد، ولكن هناك بعض المهمات الفضائية التي تم إرسالها إلى المريخ لدراسة الكوكب والتعرف على ما إذا كان يمكن العيش عليه في المستقبل.
arz.Rep_En: There is no evidence that humans have made any objects on Mars yet. It is known that humans have not directly reached Mars yet, but there are some space missions that have been sent to Mars to study the planet and find out if it is habitable in the future.

asm.Qst: মঙল গ্ৰহত প্ৰথম মানৱ নিৰ্মিত বস্তুটো কি আছিল?
asm.Rep: মঙ্গল গ্রহত প্রথম মানব নির্মিত বস্তু হল মঙ্গল বিহারী স্পেসক্রাফ্ট। এটি ১৯৬২ সালে মার্ক টুএন দ্বারা প্রথম বারে মঙ্গল গ্রহে পাঠানো হয়।
asm.Rep_En: The first man-made object on Mars was the Mars Vihari spacecraft, first sent to Mars by Mark Twain in 1962.

bel.Qst: што было першым чалавекам зроблены аб'ект на Марсе
bel.Rep: На жаль, на сьогоднішній день ніхто не зробив жодного об'єкту на Марсі. Люди відправляли різні місії на Марс, такі як ровери та орбітальні місії, але жоден об'єкт не був створений на поверхні планети.
bel.Rep_En: Unfortunately, to date, no one has made an object on Mars, and people have sent different missions to Mars, such as rovers and orbital missions, but no object has been created on the surface of the planet.

ben.Qst: মঙ্গল গ্রহে প্রথম মানুষ তৈরি বস্তু কি ছিল?
ben.Rep: এখন পর্যন্ত মঙ্গল গ্রহে কোনও মানুষ তৈরি হয়নি এবং এটি সম্ভবত সম্ভবত নয়। মঙ্গল একটি গ্রহ যা বেশিরভাগ সময় অতিক্রম করেছে এবং এখন একটি অস্থায়ী বাসস্থান হিসাবে বিবেচিত হয়। তবে, বিভিন্ন প্রাকৃতিক উপাদান এবং মৌলবৈজ্ঞানিক তথ্য প্রকাশ করে যে মঙ্গলে জীবন সম্ভব হতে পারে এবং একদিন মানুষ এই গ্রহে বসতে পারে।
ben.Rep_En: Mars has been a planet for a long time, and is now considered a temporary habitat, but various natural elements and fundamental scientific data suggest that life on Mars may be possible and that humans may one day inhabit it.

bos.Qst: Šta je bio prvi objekat koji je čovek napravio na Marsu?
bos.Rep: Čovek još uvek nije napravio objekat na Marsu. Međutim, prvi objekti koji su sleteli na Mars su bili američki Mariner 4 i sovjetski Mars 3, koji su sleteli na Mars 1965. godine.
bos.Rep_En: Man has yet to build an object on Mars, but the first objects to land on Mars were the American Mariner 4 and the Soviet Mars 3, which landed on Mars in 1965.

bul.Qst: Кой е първият обект, създаден от човека на Марс?
bul.Rep: Засега няма обект, създаден от човека на Марс. Досега на Марс са били изпратени само роботи и сонди, които изследват повърхността и атмосферата на планетата. Първата мисия на човек на Марс все още не е била изпълнена.
bul.Rep_En: No man-made object has ever been sent to Mars, and only robots and probes have been sent to explore the planet's surface and atmosphere.

cat.Qst: Quin va ser el primer objecte fet per l'home a Mart?
cat.Rep: Fins ara, no s'ha fet cap objecte a Mart per part de l'home. Tot i això, s'han enviat diverses missions robòtiques a Mart per explorar el planeta i recopilar informació. La primera missió exitosa a Mart va ser la Mariner 4, que va arribar al planeta el 1965 i va enviar les primeres imatges de la superfície marciana.
cat.Rep_En: No human-made object has ever landed on Mars, but several robotic missions have been sent to explore the planet and gather information.The first successful mission to Mars was Mariner 4, which arrived on the planet in 1965 and sent back the first images of the Martian surface.

ceb.Qst: unsa ang unang butang nga gihimo sa tawo diha sa Mars
ceb.Rep: Sa kasagaran, wala pa'y tawo nga nakapuyo sa Mars. Apan kung aduna na, ang unang butang nga mahimo niya mao ang pagtan-aw sa palibot ug pagtuon sa mga kondisyon sa planeta. Mahimo usab siya nga magtukod og temporaryong panimalay ug mga pasilidad aron makapuyo ug magtrabaho sa Mars.
ceb.Rep_En: No one has ever been to Mars, but if they did, the first thing they would do is look around and study the conditions on the planet, and they would usually build temporary homes and facilities to live and work on Mars.

ces.Qst: Co byl první objekt vytvořený člověkem na Marsu?
ces.Rep: Prvním objektem vytvořeným člověkem na Marsu byla sonda Viking 1, která přistála na povrchu Marsu v roce 1976.
ces.Rep_En: The first man-made object to land on Mars was the Viking 1 probe, which landed on the surface in 1976.

ckb.Qst: یەکەم تەن کە لە لایەن مرۆڤەوە دروست کرابوو لەسەر مەریخ چی بوو؟
ckb.Rep: تەنی کە لە لایەن مرۆڤەوە دروست کراوە لەسەر مەریخ، تەنی ئەوەیە کە لەسەر ئەو سەرچاوەیەی کە بە ناوی Olympus Mons دەنگدانەوە. ئەم سەرچاوەیە یەکەم بەرزترین کوێی ئەرینە و بەرزترین کوێی شمسەی مەنداڵەیە.
ckb.Rep_En: The man-made crater on Mars is the source of the Olympus Mons, the first of the four highest mountains in the solar system.

cmn.Qst: 火星上第一个由人制造的物体是什么?
cmn.Rep: 火星上第一个由人制造的物体是美国国家航空航天局（NASA）的“火星探路者1号”（Mars Pathfinder）探测器。它于1996年7月4日成功着陆在火星表面，是第一个在火星表面进行科学探测的人造物体。
cmn.Rep_En: The first man-made object on Mars was the NASA Mars Pathfinder 1 probe, which landed successfully on the surface of Mars on July 4, 1996, and was the first man-made object to conduct scientific exploration on the surface.

cmn_Hant.Qst: 火星上第一個由人類製造的物體是什么?
cmn_Hant.Rep: 火星上第一個由人類製造的物體是美國國家航空航天局（NASA）的火星探測車Sojourner。它於1996年7月4日由火星探測器火星路徑探測器（Pathfinder）運載到火星表面，成為第一個在火星表面運行的車輛。
cmn_Hant.Rep_En: The first man-made object on Mars was the NASA Mars rover Sojourner, which was launched on July 4, 1996 by the Mars rover Pathfinder, becoming the first vehicle to operate on the surface of Mars.

cym.Qst: Beth oedd y gwrthrych cyntaf a wnaed gan ddyn ar Mars?
cym.Rep: Y gwrthrych cyntaf a wnaed gan ddyn ar Mars oedd y robot Sputnik 1, a lansiwyd gan yr Uned Sofietaidd ar 4 Hydref 1957. Fodd bynnag, nid ar Mars y cafodd y robot hwn ei lansio, ond yn hytrach ar y Ddaear. Y robot cyntaf a lansiwyd ar Mars oedd Mariner 4, a lansiwyd gan yr Unol Daleithiau ar 28 Gorffennaf 1965.
cym.Rep_En: The first manned mission to Mars was the Sputnik 1 rocket launched by the Soviet Union on October 4, 1965, but the first human-powered rocket to land on Mars was the Mariner 4 rocket launched by the United States on July 28, 1965.

dan.Qst: Hvad var det første menneskeskabte objekt på Mars?
dan.Rep: Det første menneskeskabte objekt på Mars var Mars 2, en sovjetisk rumsonde, der blev lanceret den 19. maj 1971. Mars 2 var den første rumsonde, der forsøgte at lande på Mars, men landingen mislykkedes desværre.
dan.Rep_En: The first man-made object on Mars was the Soviet Mars 2 spacecraft, launched on May 19, 1971.Mars 2 was the first spacecraft to attempt to land on Mars, but the landing failed.

deu.Qst: was war das erste von Menschen hergestellte Objekt auf dem Mars
deu.Rep: Es gibt bisher kein von Menschen hergestelltes Objekt auf dem Mars. Es wurden jedoch mehrere Raumsonden und Rover auf den Mars geschickt, um ihn zu erforschen und Daten zu sammeln. Die erste erfolgreiche Marsmission war die Viking 1 Mission im Jahr 1976, bei der ein Lander und ein Orbiter auf dem Mars landeten.
deu.Rep_En: The first successful Mars mission was the Viking 1 mission in 1976, in which a lander and an orbiter landed on Mars.

ell.Qst: Ποιο ήταν το πρώτο αντικείμενο που έφτιαξε ο άνθρωπος στον Άρη;
ell.Rep: Δυστυχώς, ο άνθρωπος δεν έχει ακόμη φτιάξει αντικείμενα στον Άρη. Μέχρι στιγμής, έχουν σταλεί μόνο ρομπότ στον Άρη για να μελετηθεί η επιφάνειά του και να αναζητηθούν σημάδια ζωής.
ell.Rep_En: Unfortunately, man has yet to make objects on Mars, so far only robots have been sent to Mars to study its surface and look for signs of life.

est.Qst: mis oli esimene inimese poolt loodud objekt Marsil
est.Rep: Esimene inimese poolt loodud objekt Marsil oli NASA Mars Pathfinder missiooni maandumisalus Sojourner roveriga, mis maandus Marsil 4. juulil 1997. Sojourner rover oli väike robot, mis uuris Marsi pinda ja kogus andmeid selle kohta. See oli esimene kord, kui inimesed saatsid Marsile maandumisalus koos robotiga, et uurida planeedi pinda.
est.Rep_En: The first man-made object on Mars was the NASA Mars Pathfinder lander, which landed on Mars on July 4, 1997, and was the first time humans had sent a lander to Mars to explore the planet's surface.

fin.Qst: Mikä oli ensimmäinen ihmisen tekemä esine Marsissa?
fin.Rep: Ensimmäinen ihmisen tekemä esine Marsissa oli Marsin pinnalle laskeutunut Neuvostoliiton Mars 3 -luotain vuonna 1971. Se oli ensimmäinen onnistunut Marsin pinnalle laskeutunut luotain, ja sen mukana oli pieni robotti, joka lähetti takaisin tietoja Marsin pinnalta.
fin.Rep_En: The first man-made object to land on Mars was the Soviet Mars 3 probe in 1971, which was the first successful lander on Mars, and it carried a small robot that sent back data from the Martian surface.

fra.Qst: Quel a été le premier objet fabriqué par l'homme sur Mars?
fra.Rep: Il n'y a pas encore eu d'objet fabriqué par l'homme sur Mars. Les missions spatiales ont envoyé des rovers et des sondes pour explorer la planète, mais aucun objet n'a été fabriqué sur place par des humains. Les projets futurs pourraient inclure la fabrication d'objets sur Mars à partir des ressources locales, mais cela reste à voir.
fra.Rep_En: There have not yet been any man-made objects on Mars. Space missions have sent rovers and probes to explore the planet, but no objects have been manufactured on site by humans. Future projects may include manufacturing objects on Mars from local resources, but that remains to be seen.

glg.Qst: Cal foi o primeiro obxecto feito polo home en Marte?
glg.Rep: O primeiro objeto feito pelo homem em Marte foi a sonda espacial Viking 1, que pousou em Marte em 20 de julho de 1976. A sonda foi projetada para estudar a superfície e a atmosfera de Marte e foi equipada com uma série de instrumentos científicos para coletar dados e imagens. Desde então, várias outras missões foram enviadas a Marte, incluindo rovers como o Curiosity e o Perseverance, que estão explorando a superfície do planeta em busca de sinais de vida passada ou presente.
glg.Rep_En: The first man-made object on Mars was the Viking 1 spacecraft, which landed on Mars on July 20, 1976.The probe was designed to study the surface and atmosphere of Mars and was equipped with a series of scientific instruments to collect data and images.Since then, several other missions have been sent to Mars, including rovers such as Curiosity and Perseverance, which are exploring the planet's surface for signs of past or present life.

guj.Qst: મંગળ પર પ્રથમ માનવસર્જિત પદાર્થ શું હતું?
guj.Rep: મંગળ પર પ્રથમ માનવસર્જિત પદાર્થ હવા હતો. મંગળ પર હવાની પ્રતિબંધક શક્તિ ધરાવતી નથી, જેથી હવાની પવનો મંગળ પર ખૂબ ઝડપી ચાલે છે. આવા કારણે માનવસર્જિત પદાર્થો મંગળ પર હવાની પ્રતિબંધક શક્તિઓ પર આધારિત નથી.
guj.Rep_En: The first man-made object on Mars was air, which does not have air resistance, so winds are very fast on Mars, so man-made objects do not rely on air resistance.

heb.Qst: מה היה האובייקט הראשון שנעשה על מאדים?
heb.Rep: האובייקט הראשון שנעשה על מאדים היה ה-Sputnik 1, שהושג על ידי הסובייטים ב-4 באוקטובר 1957. הוא היה מלאכת חלל ראשונה בהיסטוריה והושג באמצעות טיל בליסטי שהושג לגובה של כ-600 קילומטרים והשאיר את המלאכה במסלול כדור הארץ. ה-Sputnik 1 היה מכשיר פשוט המכיל סוללות, משדר ומקלט רדיו, והוא נמצא במסלול כ-3 חודשים לפני שנשרף בכניסה לאטמוספירה.
heb.Rep_En: The first object to be launched on Mars was Sputnik 1, launched by the Soviets on October 4, 1957. It was the first spacecraft in history to be launched by a ballistic missile. It was launched at an altitude of about 600 kilometers and left the craft in Earth orbit.

hin.Qst: मंगल ग्रह पर पहला मानव निर्मित वस्तु क्या थी
hin.Rep: अभी तक मंगल ग्रह पर कोई मानव निर्मित वस्तु नहीं है। अब तक केवल अंतरिक्ष अभियानों द्वारा भेजे गए रोबोट और उपकरणों का उपयोग किया जाता है।
hin.Rep_En: There are no man-made objects on Mars yet, only robots and instruments sent by space missions.

hrv.Qst: Koji je bio prvi objekt koji je čovjek napravio na Marsu?
hrv.Rep: Čovjek još uvijek nije napravio prvi objekt na Marsu. Međutim, prvi objekt koji je sletio na Mars bio je američki Viking 1 lander 20. srpnja 1976. godine.
hrv.Rep_En: The first man-made object to land on Mars was the Viking 1 lander on July 20, 1976.

hun.Qst: Mi volt az első ember által készített tárgy a Marson?
hun.Rep: Mivel az ember még sosem készített tárgyat a Marson, így nincs válasz erre a kérdésre. Az első ember által készített tárgy a Marson valószínűleg a jövőben fog létrejönni, amikor az emberiség elkezdi felfedezni és kolonizálni a bolygót.
hun.Rep_En: Since man has never made an object on Mars, there is no answer to this question. The first man-made object on Mars will probably be created in the future, when humanity begins to explore and colonize the planet.

hye.Qst: Ի՞նչն էր առաջին մարդկային օբյեկտը Մարսում:
hye.Rep: Առաջին մարդկային օբյեկտը Մարսում էր մոլեքուլարները: Մոլեքուլարները են առաջին կենդանիները, որոնք առաջարկվել են մարդկային կենդանիների մեջ: Մոլեքուլարները կազմված են մոլեկուլներից, որոնք կապված են միմյանց միջոցով: Մոլեքուլարները կարող են լինել բազմաթիվ, բայց առաջին մարդկային օբյեկտը միայն մեկ մոլեկուլից էր կազմված:
hye.Rep_En: The first human being on Mars was a mammal, and the first mammal to be named after a human being was a mammal, a mammal made up of molecules that are connected to each other by a chain of proteins.

ind.Qst: apa benda buatan manusia pertama di Mars
ind.Rep: Sejauh ini, manusia belum membuat benda apa pun di Mars. Namun, beberapa misi eksplorasi telah dikirim ke Mars untuk mempelajari planet tersebut dan mencari tanda-tanda kehidupan. Beberapa benda buatan manusia yang telah dikirim ke Mars termasuk wahana antariksa, rover, dan lander. Salah satu misi terbaru adalah misi Mars 2020 yang mengirimkan rover Perseverance ke Mars pada Februari 2021 untuk mencari tanda-tanda kehidupan masa lalu dan mengumpulkan sampel batuan untuk dibawa kembali ke Bumi.
ind.Rep_En: So far, humans have not made any objects on Mars, but several exploratory missions have been sent to the planet to study it and look for signs of life, including spacecraft, rovers and landers, and one of the latest missions is the Mars 2020 mission, which sent the Perseverance rover to Mars in February 2021 to look for signs of past life and collect rock samples to bring back to Earth.

isl.Qst: Hvað var fyrsta mann gerður hlutur á Mars?
isl.Rep: Fyrsta mann gerður hlutur á Mars hefur enn ekki verið framleiddur, þar sem enginn maður hefur enn ferðast til Mars. En NASA og aðrir rýnámsstofnanir eru að vinna að því að senda menn á Mars á næstu árum og þá verður líklega framleiddur fyrsti mann gerður hlutur á Mars.
isl.Rep_En: The first man-made object on Mars has not yet been produced, as no man has yet traveled to Mars, but NASA and other space agencies are working to send humans to Mars in the next few years, and then probably the first man-made object on Mars will be produced.

ita.Qst: Qual è stato il primo oggetto creato dall'uomo su Marte?
ita.Rep: Attualmente non esiste alcun oggetto creato dall'uomo su Marte. Tuttavia, la prima missione su Marte è stata la Viking 1, lanciata nel 1975, che ha inviato un lander e un orbiter sul pianeta rosso. Il lander ha trasmesso immagini e dati sulla superficie di Marte, mentre l'orbiter ha mappato il pianeta e studiato la sua atmosfera. Da allora, ci sono state numerose missioni su Marte, tra cui i rover della NASA come il Curiosity e il Perseverance, che hanno esplorato la superficie del pianeta e cercato segni di vita passata o presente.
ita.Rep_En: The first Mars mission was Viking 1, launched in 1975, which sent a lander and an orbiter to the red planet, transmitting images and data on the surface of Mars, while the orbiter mapped the planet and studied its atmosphere.

jav.Qst: Apa sing digawe manungsa pisanan ing Mars?
jav.Rep: Saiki, ora ana manungsa sing nggarapake Mars. Ana misi robotik sing dioperasikan saka Bumi sing ngirim data lan gambar saka Mars. Ana misi sing dioperasikan saka NASA, ESA, lan agensi-agensi antariksa liya sing nggarapake Mars. Misi-misi iki nggarapake Mars kanggo ngumpulake data lan informasi sing bisa ngasilake pemahaman sing luwih apik babagan Mars lan sejarah lan kondisi planet iki.
jav.Rep_En: Currently, there are no humans on Mars. There are robotic missions operated from Earth that send data and images from Mars. There are missions operated by NASA, ESA, and other space agencies that work on Mars. These missions work on Mars to collect data and information that can produce a better understanding of Mars and its history and conditions.

jpn.Qst: 火星で初めて作られた物体は何でしたか?
jpn.Rep: 火星で初めて作られた物体は、人工衛星や探査機などの宇宙機器でしょう。火星に人工物を送り込んだ最初の国は、アメリカ合衆国であり、1965年にマリナー4号が火星に到達しました。その後、多くの国が火星探査を行っており、現在でも火星には多数の探査機が存在しています。
jpn.Rep_En: The first object created on Mars was an artificial satellite, a spacecraft, and the first country to send an artificial object to Mars was the United States. In 1965, Mariner 4 reached Mars. Since then, many countries have explored Mars.

kan.Qst: ಮಂಗಳ ಗ್ರಹದ ಮೇಲೆ ಮನುಷ್ಯನು ಮಾಡಿದ ಮೊದಲ ವಸ್ತು ಯಾವುದು?
kan.Rep: ಮಂಗಳ ಗ್ರಹದ ಮೇಲೆ ಮನುಷ್ಯನು ಮಾಡಿದ ಮೊದಲ ವಸ್ತು ಯಾವುದು ಎಂದರೆ ಅದು ಹೊಸದಾಗಿ ಸ್ಥಾಪಿತವಾದ ಯಾವುದೋ ಒಂದು ಸ್ಥಾಪನೆ ಅಥವಾ ಸಂಶೋಧನೆಯಾಗಿರಬಹುದು. ಆದರೆ ವಾಸ್ತವವಾಗಿ ಮಂಗಳ ಗ್ರಹದ ಮೇಲೆ ಮನುಷ್ಯನು ಯಾವುದೇ ಸ್ಥಾಪನೆ ಅಥವಾ ಸಂಶೋಧನೆ ಮಾಡಿಲ್ಲ. ಏಕೆಂದರೆ ಮಂಗಳ ಗ್ರಹದ ವಾತಾವರಣ ಮನುಷ್ಯರ ಜೀವನಕ್ಕೆ ಅನುಕೂಲವಾಗಿಲ್ಲ.
kan.Rep_En: The first man to set foot on Mars was a man who had never been to Mars, and the first man to set foot on Mars was a man who had never been to Mars, and the first man to set foot on Mars was a man who had never been to Mars.

kat.Qst: რა იყო პირველი ადამიანის მიერ შექმნილი ობიექტი მარსზე?
kat.Rep: პირველი ადამიანის მიერ შექმნილი ობიექტი მარსზე იყო არქეოლოგიური აღდგენილი კარავი, რომელიც ნაპოვნია როგორც მარსის პლანეტაზე ყველაზე ძველი არქეოლოგიური აღდგენა. ეს კარავი ნაპოვნია მარსის ჩარტების არქივებში და იქნება შესაძლებელი, რომ ის არსებობდეს მარსზე მდებარე ცივი მდგომარეობის შემდეგ.
kat.Rep_En: The first man-made object on Mars was an archaeological tent, which is the oldest archaeological tent on Mars, and it is believed to have been built during the Martian cold war.

khm.Qst: អ្វីដែលជាវត្ថុដំបូងដែលមនុស្សបានធ្វើនៅលើភពអង្គារ?
khm.Rep: វត្ថុដំបូងដែលមនុស្សបានធ្វើនៅលើភពអង្គារគឺជា ស្វែងរកប្រភេទថ្នាំដែលអាចជួយការពារជំងឺបាន។ វាមានប្រភេទច្រើនដូចជា ស្ពានដីដែលមានគ្រឿងបញ្ចូលដំណាំនិងស្ពានទឹកដែលមានគ្រឿងបញ្ចូលទឹក។ វាអាចជួយការពារជំងឺដែលមានទឹកច្រើនដូចជា ជំងឺក្បាលដែលមានទឹកច្រើនដូចជា ជំងឺក្រពើរដែលមានទឹកច្រើនដូចជា ជំងឺក្បាលដែលមានទឹកច្រើនដូចជា ជំងឺក្រពើងដែលមានទឹកច្រើនដូចជា។ វាមានប្រសិទ្ធភាពក្នុងការពារជំងឺនិងជាមួយការប្រើប្រាស់ប្រព័ន្ធផ្សេងៗដែលអាចជួយការពារជំងឺបាន។
khm.Rep_En: The first thing humans did on Mars was to find a vaccine that could help prevent disease. There are many types, such as soil bridges with crop inserts and water bridges with water inserts. It can help prevent water-borne diseases such as water-borne headaches, water-borne epilepsy, and water-borne diseases with the use of various systems.

kir.Qst: Марстагы биринчи адам жараткан объект эмне болгон?
kir.Rep: Марстагы биринчи адам жараткан объект Марс планетасында болгон. Бул объект Марс планетасында жашаган адамдардын жаратууларынан биринчи болуп саналат. Бул объекттин аталышы "Марс-3" болуп, ушул объект 1971-жылы Марс планетасына жаратылган.
kir.Rep_En: The first man-made object on Mars was the Mars Cluster, the first man-made object on Mars, named Mars-3 and launched on Mars in 1971.

kor.Qst: 화성에서 최초로 만들어진 물체는 무엇이었습니까?
kor.Rep: 화성에서 최초로 만들어진 물체는 정확히 알려진 바가 없습니다. 화성의 지표는 화산 활동, 운동, 낙석 등으로 인해 지속적으로 변화하고 있기 때문에, 과거에 만들어졌던 물체들이 현재까지 남아있을 가능성은 매우 적습니다. 하지만 화성 탐사 미션을 통해 화성의 지표와 지질학적 특성을 연구하고 있으며, 이를 통해 화성의 역사와 진화를 이해하는 데 도움이 되고 있습니다.
kor.Rep_En: The first known objects on Mars were not found in the early 20th century, but the evolution of the planet's geology has led to the discovery of a new type of rock, known as the "Mars Crater," which is a study of the geology of Mars and its evolution.

lao.Qst: ສິ່ງໃດເປັນວັດຖຸ ທໍາ ອິດທີ່ມະນຸດສ້າງຢູ່ເທິງດາວອັງຄານ?
lao.Rep: ວັດຖຸນີ້ແມ່ນວັດຖຸທີ່ມະນຸດສ້າງຢູ່ເທິງດາວອັງຄານນັ້ນສຳລັບການເຮັດວຽກຂອງຜູ້ຊາຍທີ່ມີຄວາມສຳພາດຂອງການສຶກສາຕໍ່ການປະຕິບັດສັນຍາລັກສາທາລະນະທີ່ມີຄວາມສຳພາດຂອງການສື່ສານຕໍ່ການປະຕິບັດສັນຍາລັກສາທາລະນະ. ວັດຖຸນີ້ມີຄວາມສຳພາດຂອງການສື່ສານຕໍ່ການປະຕິບັດສັນຍາລັກສາທາລະນະທີ່ມີຄວາມສຳພາດຂອງການສຶກສາຕໍ່ການປະຕິບັດສັນຍາລັກສາທາລະນະທີ່ມີຄວາມສຳພາດຂອງການສື່ສານຕໍ່ການປະຕິບັດສັນຍາລັກສາທາລະນະ. ວັດຖຸນີ້ມີຄວາມສຳພາດຂອງການສື່ສານຕໍ່ການປະຕິບັດສັນຍາລັກສາທາລະນະທີ່ມີຄວາມສຳພາດຂອງການສຶກສາຕໍ່ການປະຕິບັດສັນຍາລັກສາທາລະນະ.
lao.Rep_En: This is a man-made object on Mars for the work of a man with an interview of a public symbolism study with an interview of a public symbolism communication study with an interview of a public symbolism study with an interview of a public symbolism study.

lit.Qst: Koks buvo pirmasis žmogaus sukurtas objektas Marse?
lit.Rep: Pirmasis žmogaus sukurtas objektas Marse buvo NASA Marso Viking 1 kosminis aparatas, kuris nusileido ant Marso paviršiaus 1976 metais.
lit.Rep_En: The first man-made object on Mars was NASA's Viking 1 spacecraft, which landed on the surface in 1976.

lvs.Qst: kas bija pirmais cilvēka radītais objekts uz Marsa
lvs.Rep: Pirmais cilvēka radītais objekts uz Marsa bija Mariner 4, kas tika nosūtīts uz Marsu 1964. gadā. Tas bija ASV kosmosa pētniecības aģentūras NASA izstrādāts kosmiskais aparāts, kas veica pirmo veiksmīgo Marss pētniecības misiju. Mariner 4 uzņēma un nosūtīja uz Zemi pirmos attēlus no Marsa virsmas.
lvs.Rep_En: The first man-made object to land on Mars was Mariner 4, launched in 1964 by the U.S. space agency NASA, which successfully conducted the first Mars exploration mission, taking and sending back to Earth the first images of the Martian surface.

mai.Qst: मंगल ग्रह पर मानव निर्मित पहिल वस्तु की छल?
mai.Rep: मंगल ग्रह पर मानव ने अभी तक कोई पहली वस्तु नहीं छोड़ी है। मंगल ग्रह पर अभी तक कुछ अनुसंधान और अवकाशीय उपकरण भेजे गए हैं, जैसे कि NASA के Mars Rover Curiosity और Mars 2020 Perseverance। इन उपकरणों के माध्यम से मंगल ग्रह की विभिन्न विशेषताओं का अध्ययन किया जा रहा है।
mai.Rep_En: Humans have not yet left a first object on Mars. Some research and spacecraft have been sent to Mars, such as NASA's Mars Rover Curiosity and Mars 2020 Perseverance. These instruments are being used to study various features of Mars.

mal.Qst: ചൊവ്വയിലെ ആദ്യത്തെ മനുഷ്യനിർമിത വസ്തു എന്താണ്?
mal.Rep: ചൊവ്വയിലെ ആദ്യത്തെ മനുഷ്യനിർമിത വസ്തു എന്ന് പറയാൻ പലതവണ സാധ്യതകൾ ഉണ്ട്. പക്ഷേ, അനുഭവപ്പെട്ട കാര്യങ്ങൾ പറയാൻ പറ്റിയാണ് പലരും പറയുന്നത്. പലതവണ പറയുന്നവയിൽ ഒന്ന് ആഫ്രിക്കയിലെ ഒരു കാരണാന്തരമായ കല്ലുകൾ ആണ്. ഇത് ഒരു പാകിസ്താനി പരിശീലനത്തിൽ പറഞ്ഞതിനാൽ, അവൻ കാരണാന്തരമായി കല്ലുകൾ കണ്ടെത്തിയതാണ്. ഇത് പിന്നീട് പല സ്ഥലങ്ങളിൽ കണ്ടുവരുന്ന കല്ലുകളുടെ പിന്തുണക്കമായിരുന്നു.
mal.Rep_En: The first man-made object on Mars was a rock, and the first man-made object on Mars was a rock from Africa, which was discovered by a Pakistani scientist in the early 1900s.

mar.Qst: मंगळ ग्रहावर प्रथम मानवनिर्मित वस्तू काय होती?
mar.Rep: मंगळ ग्रहावर प्रथम मानवनिर्मित वस्तू होण्याची खात्री नाही आहे कारण अद्याप तक कोणतीही मानवनिर्मित वस्तू मंगळ ग्रहावर नाही जाणारी आहेत. हालचाली वर्षांमध्ये अनेक अंतरिक्ष अभ्यासांच्या माध्यमातून मंगळ ग्रहावर असलेल्या वातावरणाची अध्ययने केल्या गेल्या आहेत, पण अद्याप तक कोणतीही मानवनिर्मित वस्तू मंगळ ग्रहावर नाही जाणारी आहेत.
mar.Rep_En: It's not certain that it will be the first man-made object on Mars, because no man-made object has ever been to Mars, and in recent years, many space explorations have studied the atmosphere on Mars, but no man-made object has ever been to Mars.

mkd.Qst: Кој беше првиот објект направен од човекот на Марс?
mkd.Rep: Засега, нема докази за тоа дека човекот направил објект на Марс. Првите мисии на Марс беа безпилотни и не носеа со нив објекти направени од човекот. Првата успешна мисија на Марс беше Американската мисија Viking 1 во 1976 година, која испратила сонда на површината на Марс. Оттогаш, многу мисии на Марс беа испратени, но сите беа безпилотни и не носеа со нив објекти направени од човекот.
mkd.Rep_En: The first successful mission to Mars was the American Viking 1 mission in 1976, which sent a probe to the surface of Mars.

mlt.Qst: X'kien l-ewwel oġġett magħmul mill-bniedem fuq Mars?
mlt.Rep: L-ewwel oġġett magħmul mill-bniedem fuq Mars kien il-missjoni Viking 1 li ġiet imdawra fl-1976. Din il-missjoni kienet tipprovdi informazzjoni dettaljata dwar l-ambjent ta' Mars, inkluż l-atmosfera, il-ħalq, u l-ġeoloġija.
mlt.Rep_En: The first man-made object to land on Mars was the Viking 1 mission in 1976, which provided detailed information about the Martian environment, including atmosphere, soil, and geology.

nld.Qst: Wat was het eerste door de mens gemaakte object op Mars?
nld.Rep: Het eerste door de mens gemaakte object op Mars was de Mars 2-sonde, die op 27 november 1971 door de Sovjet-Unie werd gelanceerd. De sonde bereikte Mars op 27 november 1971 en was de eerste menselijke missie die een zachte landing op de planeet uitvoerde. Helaas werkte de lander niet goed en stopte de communicatie na slechts 20 seconden.
