nld.Rep_En: The first man-made object on Mars was the Mars 2 probe, launched by the Soviet Union on November 27, 1971, which reached Mars on November 27, 1971, and was the first human mission to perform a soft landing on the planet.

nno.Qst: kva var det første menneskeskapte objektet på Mars
nno.Rep: Det første menneskeskapte objektet på Mars var Mars 2, en sovjetisk romsonde som landet på planeten i november 1971.
nno.Rep_En: The first man-made object on Mars was Mars 2, a Soviet spacecraft that landed on the planet in November 1971.

nob.Qst: hva var den første mennesket laget gjenstand på Mars
nob.Rep: Per nå har ingen mennesker laget gjenstander på Mars. Mars-roverne som er sendt til planeten har imidlertid samlet inn data og prøver, og har utført en rekke vitenskapelige eksperimenter. De har også tatt bilder og sendt informasjon tilbake til jorden. Men det har ikke blitt laget noen gjenstander på Mars av mennesker ennå.
nob.Rep_En: So far, no humans have made objects on Mars, but the Mars rovers that have been sent to the planet have collected data and samples, and have conducted a number of scientific experiments, and they've also taken pictures and sent information back to Earth, but no objects have been made on Mars by humans yet.

npi.Qst: मंगल ग्रहमा पहिलो मानव निर्मित वस्तु के थियो?
npi.Rep: मंगल ग्रहमा पहिलो मानव निर्मित वस्तु अमेरिकी अंतरिक्ष एजेंसी (NASA) द्वारा भेजिएको मंगल वाइकिंग 1 र मंगल वाइकिंग 2 थिए। यी दुवै अवकाश यानहरूले 1976 ईसा पछि मंगल ग्रहमा ल्याएका थिए।
npi.Rep_En: The first man-made objects on Mars were the Mars Viking 1 and 2 spacecraft sent by the US Space Agency (NASA). Both spacecraft were brought to Mars after 1976 AD.

pbt.Qst: په مریخ کې د انسان له خوا جوړ شوی لومړنی شی څه و؟
pbt.Rep: د مریخ ته د انسانونو د خوا جوړولو د مقصد دا دی چې د مریخ په سر کې د انسانونو د ژوند د پرمختللو مشکلاتو په حل کولو لپاره د خوا جوړولو او د مریخ په سر کې د انسانونو د ژوند د پرمختللو مشکلاتو په حل کولو لپاره د خوا جوړولو د مقصد دی. دا د مریخ په سر کې د انسانونو د ژوند د پرمختللو مشکلاتو په حل کولو لپاره د خوا جوړولو د مقصد دی.
pbt.Rep_En: The purpose of building a human side to Mars is to solve the evolving problems of human life on Mars and the purpose of building a human side to solve the evolving problems of human life on Mars.

pes.Qst: اولین شی که انسان در مریخ ساخت چه بود؟
pes.Rep: تاکنون هیچ انسانی به مریخ سفر نکرده است، بنابراین هیچ شیءی توسط انسان در مریخ ساخته نشده است. با این حال، مأموریت‌های فضایی مختلفی برای بررسی مریخ انجام شده است و از جمله این مأموریت‌ها، روبات‌هایی مانند روبات کوریوسیتی و اپرتیونیتی برای بررسی سطح مریخ به کار گرفته شده‌اند.
pes.Rep_En: No human has ever been to Mars, so no man-made object has ever been built on Mars.However, there have been various space missions to explore Mars, including those involving robots such as Curiosity and Opportunity.

pol.Qst: Co było pierwszym stworzonym przez człowieka obiektem na Marsie?
pol.Rep: Pierwszym stworzonym przez człowieka obiektem na Marsie był amerykański łazik Mars Pathfinder, który wylądował na Marsie 4 lipca 1997 roku.
pol.Rep_En: The first man-made object on Mars was the Mars Pathfinder, which landed on July 4, 1997.

por.Qst: Qual foi o primeiro objeto feito pelo homem em Marte?
por.Rep: Até o momento, nenhum objeto foi feito pelo homem em Marte. A NASA e outras agências espaciais têm enviado sondas e rovers para explorar o planeta, mas ainda não há presença humana em Marte.
por.Rep_En: No man-made object has ever been to Mars, and NASA and other space agencies have sent probes and rovers to explore the planet, but there is still no human presence on Mars.

ron.Qst: Care a fost primul obiect făcut de om pe Marte?
ron.Rep: Din păcate, niciun obiect nu a fost încă făcut de om pe Marte. Până în prezent, doar roboții și sondele spațiale au fost trimise pe Marte pentru a colecta date și a efectua cercetări științifice.
ron.Rep_En: Unfortunately, no man-made object has yet been sent to Mars, and so far only robots and spacecraft have been sent to collect data and conduct scientific research.

rus.Qst: Что было первым человеком, созданным на Марсе?
rus.Rep: На данный момент не было создано ни одного человека на Марсе. Планируется, что первый человек на Марсе будет отправлен в ближайшие десятилетия, но это пока остается в сфере планирования и разработки.
rus.Rep_En: No human being has been created on Mars yet, and the first human being is expected to be sent to Mars in the next decade, but that remains in the planning and development stages.

slk.Qst: Čo bol prvý predmet vytvorený človekom na Marse?
slk.Rep: Zatiaľ čo na Marse boli vyslané rôzne sondy a robotické vozidlá, ktoré tam umiestnili rôzne nástroje a prístroje, prvý fyzický predmet vytvorený človekom na Marse ešte nebol. Zatiaľ sa na Marse nachádzajú iba robotické misie a ľudské výpravy sú plánované na budúcnosť.
slk.Rep_En: While Mars has been visited by various probes and robotic vehicles that have placed various tools and instruments there, the first man-made physical object on Mars has not yet been found.

slv.Qst: kaj je bil prvi predmet, ki ga je človek naredil na Marsu
slv.Rep: Na Marsu še ni bilo narejenega nobenega predmeta s strani človeka. Do sedaj so na Marsu pristale samo robotske misije, ki so raziskovale planet.
slv.Rep_En: No human object has ever landed on Mars, and so far, only robotic missions have landed on Mars to explore the planet.

spa.Qst: ¿Cuál fue el primer objeto hecho por el hombre en Marte?
spa.Rep: Hasta el momento, no se ha enviado ningún objeto hecho por el hombre a Marte. Sin embargo, se han enviado varias misiones robóticas a Marte, como el rover Curiosity de la NASA, que ha estado explorando el planeta desde 2012. El primer objeto hecho por el hombre en Marte probablemente será una misión tripulada en el futuro.
spa.Rep_En: So far, no man-made object has been sent to Mars, but several robotic missions have been sent to Mars, such as NASA's Curiosity rover, which has been exploring the planet since 2012.

srp.Qst: Који је био први објекат који је човек направио на Марсу?
srp.Rep: Први објекат који је човек направио на Марсу је био модул за спуштање Марс 3, који је совјетски космички брод, спуштен на Марс 2. децембра 1971. године. Модул за спуштање је садржао опрему за мерење температуре, притиска и влажности ваздуха, као и за праћење марсијанских сезона.
srp.Rep_En: The first man-made object on Mars was the Mars 3 lander, a Soviet spacecraft launched on December 2, 1971, which contained equipment for measuring temperature, pressure, and humidity, as well as tracking the Martian seasons.

swe.Qst: Vad var det första mangjorda föremålet på Mars?
swe.Rep: Det första föremålet som människan gjorde på Mars var Mars Pathfinder-landaren, som landade på planeten den 4 juli 1997.
swe.Rep_En: The first man-made object on Mars was the Mars Pathfinder lander, which landed on the planet on July 4, 1997.

swh.Qst: Ni nini kilichokuwa kitu cha kwanza kilichotengenezwa na mwanadamu kwenye sayari ya Mars?
swh.Rep: Hadi sasa, hakuna kitu chochote kilichotengenezwa na mwanadamu kwenye sayari ya Mars. Hakuna binadamu au chombo cha kibinadamu kilichofika kwenye sayari hiyo na kuanza kujenga kitu chochote. Hata hivyo, kuna mipango ya baadaye ya kutuma binadamu na vifaa vya ujenzi kwenye sayari ya Mars ili kuanza kujenga makazi ya binadamu na miundombinu mingine.
swh.Rep_En: So far, no human-made objects have been found on Mars, and no human or spacecraft has ever arrived on the planet to begin building anything, but there are plans to send humans and construction materials to Mars to begin building human habitations and other infrastructure.

tel.Qst: మార్స్ మీద మొట్టమొదటి మానవ నిర్మిత వస్తువు ఏమిటి?
tel.Rep: మార్స్ మీద మొదటి మానవ నిర్మిత వస్తువు కార్యకలాపం మార్స్ 3 మిషన్ ద్వారా ప్రారంభించబడింది. ఇది మార్స్ మీద ప్రయాణం చేసే మానవుల కోసం నిర్మించబడిన వాహనం మరియు సాధనం. ఇది మార్స్ మీద ప్రయాణం చేసే మానవుల కోసం నిర్మించబడిన వాహనం మరియు సాధనం. ఇది మార్స్ మీద ప్రయాణం చేసే మానవుల కోసం నిర్మించబడిన వాహనం మరియు సాధనం. ఇది మార్స్ మీద ప్రయాణం చేసే మానవుల కోసం నిర్మించబడిన వాహనం మరియు సాధనం.
tel.Rep_En: The first manned mission to Mars was launched on March 3, and it was a mission to Mars, a mission to Mars, a mission to Mars, a mission to Mars.

tgk.Qst: Аввалин ашёи сохтаи инсон дар Марс чӣ буд?
tgk.Rep: Дар حال حاضر, маълум нест ки аввалин ашёи сохтаи инсон дар Марс чӣ буд. Марс барои зиндагии мاهиёнаи муштарӣ бисёр мушаххас намудааст ва барои мутахассисони астрономӣ ва ҳمчунин бرای миссияҳои фалакӣ муштарӣ аст.
tgk.Rep_En: Currently, it is unknown what the first man-made object on Mars was. Mars has become very specific for the life of the client population and is a client for astronomers as well as for space missions.

tgl.Qst: Ano ang unang bagay na ginawa ng tao sa Mars?
tgl.Rep: Sa kasalukuyan, wala pang tao ang nakapagpunta sa Mars. Ang mga pagpapadala ng spacecraft sa Mars ay ginagawa ng mga bansa upang mas mapag-aralan ang planeta at malaman kung mayroong buhay o hindi. Ang mga spacecraft na ito ay nagpapadala ng mga robot at mga instrumento upang magcollect ng data at mag-experiment sa Mars.
tgl.Rep_En: The Mars mission is the first of its kind, with the first manned mission to the planet in the last decade, and the first to send a team of astronauts and a team of scientists to collect data and conduct experiments on Mars.

tha.Qst: สิ่งที่มนุษย์สร้างขึ้นครั้งแรกบนดาวอังคารคืออะไร?
tha.Rep: ไม่มีหลักฐานที่ชัดเจนว่ามนุษย์ได้สร้างสิ่งใดบนดาวอังคารเลย แต่มีการวิจัยและการสำรวจดาวอังคารที่พบว่ามีเครื่องมือหรืออุปกรณ์ที่เป็นไปได้ว่าเป็นของมนุษย์ อย่างไรก็ตาม ยังไม่มีการยืนยันว่าเครื่องมือหรืออุปกรณ์ดังกล่าวเป็นของมนุษย์จริงๆ หรือเป็นสิ่งที่เกิดขึ้นธรรมชาติในดาวอังคารเอง ดังนั้น ยังไม่สามารถตอบได้ว่ามนุษย์สร้างสิ่งใดบนดาวอังคารครั้งแรกได้จริงหรือไม่
tha.Rep_En: There is no evidence that humans ever built anything on Mars, but there have been studies and explorations that have found tools and equipment that could possibly have been human-made, but it is not yet known whether these tools and equipment were actually human-made or were created naturally on Mars.

tur.Qst: Mars'ta ilk insan yapımı nesne neydi?
tur.Rep: Mars'ta ilk insan yapımı nesne, 1971 yılında Mars'a gönderilen Sovyet uzay aracı Mars 3'ün iniş modülüdür. Bu, Mars yüzeyine başarılı bir şekilde inen ilk insan yapımı nesnedir. Ancak, Mars yüzeyindeki ilk insan yapımı nesne, 1976 yılında NASA'nın Viking 1 uzay aracının iniş modülüdür.
tur.Rep_En: The first man-made object on Mars was the landing module of the Soviet spacecraft Mars-3 in 1971, which successfully landed on the Martian surface, and the first man-made object on Mars was the landing module of NASA's Viking 1 spacecraft in 1976.

ukr.Qst: Який був перший створений людиною об'єкт на Марсі?
ukr.Rep: Перший створений людиною об'єкт на Марсі був марсохід "Вікінг-1", який був запущений у серпні 1975 року. Він був призначений для дослідження поверхні Марсу та пошуку ознак життя на планеті.
ukr.Rep_En: The first man-made object on Mars was the Viking-1 rover, launched in August 1975 to explore the surface of Mars and find signs of life.

urd.Qst: مریخ پر پہلا انسان ساختہ جسم کیا تھا؟
urd.Rep: مریخ پر پہلا انسان ساختہ جسم ابھی تک نہیں بنایا گیا ہے۔ ابھی تک صرف روبوٹی مشینیں مریخ پر بھیجی گئی ہیں جو اس کی سطح کا جائزہ لینے کے لئے استعمال کی جاتی ہیں۔
urd.Rep_En: The first man-made object on Mars has not yet been built, so far only robotic machines have been sent to Mars to survey its surface.

vie.Qst: vật thể đầu tiên được tạo ra bởi con người trên sao Hỏa là gì
vie.Rep: Hiện tại, chưa có bằng chứng nào cho thấy con người đã tạo ra bất kỳ vật thể nào trên sao Hỏa. Tuy nhiên, các nghiên cứu và thử nghiệm đang được tiến hành để khảo sát khả năng định cư và sản xuất trên sao Hỏa trong tương lai.
vie.Rep_En: There is no evidence that humans have ever created anything on Mars, but research and experiments are underway to explore the possibility of future colonization and production on Mars.

yue.Qst: 火星上第一個由人類製造嘅物體係咩?
yue.Rep: 火星上第一個由人類製造的物體是美國國家航空暨太空總署（NASA）於1971年發射的火星2號探測器。它是第一個成功進入火星軌道的人造衛星，並且成功地傳回了火星的照片和科學數據。
yue.Rep_En: The first object made by humans on Mars was the Mars 2 probe launched by NASA in 1971, the first successful manned satellite to enter the orbit of Mars, and the first to successfully transmit photos and scientific data back to Mars.

zlm.Qst: apa objek buatan manusia pertama di Mars
zlm.Rep: Sejauh ini, belum ada objek buatan manusia yang berhasil diangkut dan didirikan di Mars. Namun, beberapa misi eksplorasi Mars telah dilakukan oleh NASA dan badan-badan antariksa lainnya untuk mempelajari planet tersebut dan mempersiapkan kemungkinan kolonisasi manusia di masa depan. Beberapa objek buatan manusia yang telah dikirim ke Mars antara lain rover, lander, dan satelit.
zlm.Rep_En: So far, no man-made objects have been successfully transported and installed on Mars, but several Mars exploration missions have been conducted by NASA and other space agencies to study the planet and prepare for possible future human colonization.Some of the man-made objects that have been sent to Mars include rovers, landers, and satellites.

eng.Qst: who holds more records peyton manning or tom brady
eng.Rep: As of 2021, Tom Brady holds more records than Peyton Manning. Brady has the most career touchdown passes in NFL history, the most career passing yards in NFL history, the most career completions in NFL history, and the most career wins by a quarterback in NFL history. However, Manning still holds several impressive records, including the most touchdown passes in a single season (55) and the most career MVP awards (5).

afr.Qst: Wie het meer rekords, Peyton Manning of Tom Brady?
afr.Rep: Tom Brady heeft meer records dan Peyton Manning. Brady heeft bijvoorbeeld het record voor de meeste touchdown passes in een seizoen (50) en het record voor de meeste Super Bowl-overwinningen door een quarterback (7). Manning heeft echter het record voor de meeste touchdown passes in een carrière (539) en het record voor de meeste passing yards in een carrière (71,940).
afr.Rep_En: Tom Brady holds more records than Peyton Manning. Brady, for example, holds the record for most touchdown passes in a season (50) and holds the record for most Super Bowl wins by a single quarterback (7). Manning, on the other hand, holds the record for most touchdown passes in a single career (539) and holds the record for most passing yards in a single career (71,940).

arb.Qst: من يحمل أكثر سجلات؟ بيتون مانينغ أم توم برادي؟
arb.Rep: بيتون مانينغ يحمل أكثر سجلات من توم برادي. مانينغ يحتل المركز الثاني في تاريخ الدوري الأمريكي لكرة القدم (NFL) في عدد الأهداف التي سجلها، وعدد المرات التي تم اختياره كأفضل لاعب في المباراة النهائية (Super Bowl MVP)، بينما يحتل برادي المركز الثالث في كلتا الفئتين. ومع ذلك، يحتل برادي المركز الأول في عدد الألقاب التي حققها كلاعب في الدوري الأمريكي لكرة القدم، حيث فاز بالبطولة سبع مرات، بينما فاز مانينغ بالبطولة مرتين فقط.
arb.Rep_En: Manning is the second-highest scorer in the history of the NFL in goals scored and Super Bowl MVPs, while Brady is third in both categories, but Brady is the first-highest scorer in the history of the NFL, winning the MVP seven times and winning the MVP only twice.

ary.Qst: شكون عندو اكتر من سجلات؟ بيتون مانينغ أو توم برادي؟
ary.Rep: بيتون مانينغ لديه العديد من الأرقام القياسية في كرة القدم الأمريكية، بما في ذلك الأرقام القياسية لأكبر عدد من الأهداف المسجلة في موسم واحد وأكبر عدد من الأهداف المسجلة في مسيرته الرياضية. توم برادي لديه أيضًا العديد من الأرقام القياسية، بما في ذلك الأرقام القياسية لأكبر عدد من الانتصارات في السوبر بول وأكبر عدد من الأهداف المسجلة في السوبر بول. لذلك، يمكن القول إن كل منهما لديه سجلات مميزة في مجاله.
ary.Rep_En: Manning holds several records in American football, including the record for most goals scored in a season and the most goals scored in a career.Tom Brady also holds several records, including the record for most Super Bowl wins and the most Super Bowl goals scored.

arz.Qst: مين بيحمل سجلات أكتر بيتون مانينج أو توم برادي
arz.Rep: بيتون مانينج يحمل سجلات أكثر من توم برادي. بيتون مانينج لديه 539 تمريرًا لمسافة تزيد عن 20 ياردة في موسم واحد، بينما لدى توم برادي 447 تمريرًا فقط في موسم واحد. كما أن بيتون مانينج لديه 5,477 تمريرًا لمسافة تزيد عن 20 ياردة في مسيرته الاحترافية، بينما لدى توم برادي 5,285 تمريرًا فقط.
arz.Rep_En: Peyton Manning holds more records than Tom Brady. Peyton Manning has 539 passes for over 20 yards in one season, while Tom Brady has only 447 passes in one season. Peyton Manning has 5,477 passes for over 20 yards in his professional career, while Tom Brady has only 5,285 passes.

asm.Qst: কোনটো অধিক ৰেকৰ্ড আছে, পেইটন মেনিং নে টম ব্ৰেডি?
asm.Rep: এই প্রশ্নের উত্তর দেওয়া সম্ভব নয়। কারণ এটি পেইটন মেনিং এবং টম ব্রেডি সম্পর্কে কোনও বিশদ তথ্য উল্লেখ নেই। আপনি যদি কোনও বিশেষ প্রশ্ন থাকেন তবে আমি সাহায্য করতে পারি।
asm.Rep_En: It's not possible to answer this question because it doesn't mention any details about Peyton Manning and Tom Brady. We can help if you have any specific questions.

bel.Qst: Хто трымае больш рэкордаў Пэйтан Мэнінг або Том Брэдзі
bel.Rep: Том Брэдзі трымае больш рэкордаў, у тым ліку найбольшую колькасць перемог у рэгулярным сезоне і паслясезонным турнірах у гісторыі Нацыянальнай футбольнай лігі (NFL). У гэтым жа часе, Пэйтан Мэнінг мае некалькі рэкордаў у сваім асабістым выкананні, у тым ліку найбольшую колькасць перадач у кар'еры. Але ў агульным, Том Брэдзі мае больш рэкордаў і ён лічыцца адным з самых паспяховых гульцоў у гісторыі NFL.
bel.Rep_En: Tom Brady holds the record for most wins in a season and postseason in the history of the National Football League, and he holds the record for most assists in a season, and he holds the record for most assists in a season.

ben.Qst: কে বেশি রেকর্ড ধরে রেখেছে, পেইটন ম্যানিং বা টম ব্র্যাডি?
ben.Rep: পেইটন ম্যানিং বেশি রেকর্ড ধরে রেখেছে। তিনি একটি অত্যন্ত সফল ক্যারিয়ার অবসর নেওয়া পর্যন্ত একটি অসাধারণ রেকর্ড ধরে রেখেছেন। তিনি একটি সুপারবোল জিতে এবং একটি এনএফএল চ্যাম্পিয়নশিপ জিতে সম্মানিত হন। তিনি একটি প্রতিষ্ঠানবিশিষ্ট ক্যারিয়ার সম্পন্ন করেছেন এবং তাঁর রেকর্ডগুলি অনেক দশক ধরে রেখেছেন। টম ব্র্যাডি একটি অসাধারণ খেলোয়াড় হিসাবে পরিচিত, তবে তাঁর রেকর্ড পেইটন ম্যানিং এর সামনে সম্পর্কে কম জানা হয়।
ben.Rep_En: The legendary Tom Brady has a long and distinguished career, winning a Super Bowl and an NFL championship, and his record is known for decades, but few people know about his record.

bos.Qst: Ko je više rekorda, Peyton Manning ili Tom Brady?
bos.Rep: Tom Brady ima više rekorda od Peytina Manninga. Brady drži rekord za najviše pobjeda u karijeri kao quarterback u regularnoj sezoni i doigravanju, najviše touchdowna u doigravanju, najviše pobjeda u Super Bowlu kao quarterback, najviše prolaznih yardi u Super Bowlu i najviše uzastopnih pobjeda u regularnoj sezoni. Manning drži rekord za najviše prolaznih yardi u karijeri i najviše touchdowna u karijeri.
bos.Rep_En: Tom Brady holds more records than Peyton Manning. Brady holds the record for most career wins as a quarterback in the regular season and playoffs, most touchdowns in the playoffs, most Super Bowl wins as a quarterback, most passing yards in the Super Bowl, and most consecutive wins in the regular season. Manning holds the record for most passing yards in a career and most touchdowns in a career.

bul.Qst: Кой държи повече рекорди, Пейтън Манинг или Том Брейди?
bul.Rep: Том Брейди държи повече рекорди от Пейтън Манинг. Брейди има най-много Супербоул победи от всеки квартебек в историята на НФЛ (шест), както и най-много пасове за Touchdown в регулярния сезон и плейофите (581). Манинг има най-много пасове за Touchdown в кариерата си (539), но Брейди е на второ място с 541.
bul.Rep_En: Tom Brady holds more Super Bowl records than Peyton Manning, with the most Super Bowl wins by any quarterback in NFL history (six) and the most touchdown passes in the regular season and playoffs (581), while Manning has the most career touchdown passes (539), but Brady is second with 541.

cat.Qst: Qui té més rècords: Peyton Manning o Tom Brady?
cat.Rep: Tom Brady té més rècords que Peyton Manning. Brady té el rècord de més victòries en temporada regular i playoffs combinats per un quarterback, més touchdowns en playoffs, més aparicions en el Super Bowl i més victòries en el Super Bowl per un quarterback. També té el rècord de més passes completades en un sol Super Bowl i més passes intentades en un sol Super Bowl. Manning té el rècord de més touchdowns en temporada regular i més yards en temporada regular, però Brady té més rècords en general.
cat.Rep_En: Brady holds the record for most wins in a regular season and playoff combined by a quarterback, most Super Bowl appearances, most playoff touchdowns, and most Super Bowl wins by a quarterback, and holds the record for most passes completed in a single Super Bowl and most attempted passes in a single Super Bowl.

ceb.Qst: Kinsa ang nagbaton og mas daghang rekord, si Peyton Manning o si Tom Brady?
ceb.Rep: Si Peyton Manning ang nagbaton og mas daghang rekord kaysa kay Tom Brady. Si Manning nagtigum og nagtukod sa daghang rekord sa NFL sama sa pinakadaghan nga touchdown passes sa usa ka season ug sa usa ka career, pinakadaghan nga yards sa usa ka season ug sa usa ka career, ug uban pa. Apan, si Tom Brady nagtigum og daghang Super Bowl championships ug gipakita usab ang kahibalo sa pagdumala sa iyang team ngadto sa mga panagang sa playoffs.
ceb.Rep_En: The team's all-time leading scorer is Tom Brady, who holds the record for most touchdown passes in a season and career, and the most total yards in a season and career, but also holds the record for most Super Bowl victories and has shown great leadership skills in the playoffs.

ces.Qst: Kdo drží víc rekordů, Peyton Manningová nebo Tom Brady?
ces.Rep: Tom Brady drží více rekordů než Peyton Manningová. Brady drží rekordy v počtu vítězství v základní části, vítězství v play-off, počtu touchdownů v základní části a play-off, počtu yardů v základní části a play-off a dalších kategoriích. Manningová drží několik rekordů v kategorii quarterbacků, ale celkově jich má méně než Brady.
ces.Rep_En: Brady holds the record for most wins in a season, most wins in a playoff game, most touchdowns in a playoff game, most yards in a playoff game, and more.Manning holds several records in the quarterback category, but fewer overall than Brady.

ckb.Qst: کێ خاوەنی ڕیکۆردی زیاترە؟ پەیتۆن مانینگ یان تۆم برادى؟
ckb.Rep: ئەگەر دەتەوێت زیاتر لەسەر ڕیکۆرد بکەیت، پێشنیارم ئەوەی تۆم برادی بەکارببەیت. تۆم برادی پێشنیاری خۆکاری زیاتری دەدات و پاکترین کۆدەکانی پایتۆن بۆ ئەوەی کۆدەکانیت بەشێوەیەکی تایبەت بۆ ڕیکۆردکردنی زیاتری بنووسیت. بەرنامەی تۆم برادی لەسەر پایتۆن بەردەستە و بەسەرکەوتویی دەتوانیت بەکارببەیت.
ckb.Rep_En: If you want to record more, I suggest you use Tom Brady. Tom Brady recommends more automation and cleaner Python codes to write your code specifically for recording more. Tom Brady software is available on Python and you can use it.

cmn.Qst: 谁拥有更多的纪录?佩顿·曼宁还是<unk>姆·布雷迪?
cmn.Rep: 佩顿·曼宁和汤姆·布雷迪都是NFL历史上最成功的四分卫之一，他们都拥有许多纪录。目前，汤姆·布雷迪拥有更多的纪录，包括最多的超级碗冠军（7次），最多的季后赛胜利（34次），最多的通常赛季胜利（230次）和最多的通常赛季通行码数（超过8万码）。佩顿·曼宁则拥有最多的通常赛季通行码数（超过7.5万码）和最多的通常赛季通行Touchdown（539次）。
cmn.Rep_En: Both Patton Manning and Tom Brady are among the most successful quarterbacks in NFL history, and both hold numerous records. Currently, Tom Brady holds more records, including most Super Bowl wins (7), most playoff wins (34), most regular season wins (230) and most regular season passing yards (over 80,000), while Patton Manning holds the most regular season passing yards (over 75,000) and most regular season passing touchdowns (539).

cmn_Hant.Qst: 谁拥有更多的纪录?佩顿·曼宁还是<unk>姆·布雷迪
cmn_Hant.Rep: 佩顿·曼宁和汤姆·布雷迪都是NFL历史上最伟大的四分卫之一，他们都拥有许多纪录。目前，汤姆·布雷迪拥有更多的纪录，包括最多的超级碗冠军（7次）、最多的季后赛胜利（34次）、最多的季后赛通行证（45次）和最多的常规赛胜利（230次）。佩顿·曼宁则拥有最多的常规赛通行证（539次）和最多的常规赛传球码数（71940码）。
cmn_Hant.Rep_En: Both Peyton Manning and Tom Brady are among the greatest quarterbacks in NFL history, and they both hold many records. Currently, Tom Brady holds more records, including most Super Bowl titles (7), most playoff wins (34), most playoff passes (45), and most regular-season wins (230).

cym.Qst: Pwy sydd â mwy o gofnodion, Peyton Manning neu Tom Brady?
cym.Rep: Mae Tom Brady yn cael mwy o gofnodion nag Peyton Manning. Mae Brady wedi ennill 7 troffi Super Bowl, sy'n record byd-eang, ac mae wedi chwarae mewn 10 gêm Super Bowl. Mae Manning wedi ennill 2 troffi Super Bowl ac wedi chwarae mewn 4 gêm Super Bowl. Mae Brady hefyd yn dal y record am y mwyaf o fuddugoliaethau Super Bowl gan unrhyw chwaraewr unigol.
cym.Rep_En: The team has a record of seven Super Bowl titles, a world record, and has played in ten Super Bowl games.Manning has won two Super Bowl titles and played in four Super Bowl games.Brady also holds the record for the most Super Bowl wins by any individual player.

dan.Qst: Hvem har flere rekorder? Peyton Manning eller Tom Brady?
dan.Rep: Tom Brady har flere rekorder enn Peyton Manning. Brady har rekorden for flest touchdownpasninger i en enkelt sesong (50), flest touchdownpasninger i en Super Bowl-kamp (4), flest seiere i en karriere som quarterback (229) og flest seiere i en enkelt sesong (18). Manning har imidlertid rekorden for flest touchdownpasninger i en karriere (539).
dan.Rep_En: Brady holds the record for most touchdown passes in a single season (50), most touchdown passes in a Super Bowl game (4), most career wins as a quarterback (229) and most wins in a single season (18), while Manning holds the record for most touchdown passes in a career (539).

deu.Qst: Wer hält mehr Rekorde, Peyton Manning oder Tom Brady?
deu.Rep: Tom Brady hält mehr Rekorde als Peyton Manning. Brady hält unter anderem den Rekord für die meisten Super Bowl-Siege eines Spielers (7), die meisten Playoff-Siege eines Spielers (34) und die meisten Touchdown-Pässe in einer Saison (50). Manning hält jedoch auch viele Rekorde, darunter die meisten Passing Yards in einer Saison (5.477) und die meisten Touchdown-Pässe in einer Saison (55).
deu.Rep_En: Brady holds the record for most Super Bowl wins by a player (7), most playoff wins by a player (34) and most touchdown passes in a season (50), but Manning also holds many records, including most passing yards in a season (547) and most touchdown passes in a season (55).

ell.Qst: Ποιος έχει περισσότερα ρεκόρ; Η Πέιτον Μάνινγκ ή ο Τομ Μπρέιντι;
ell.Rep: Ο Πέιτον Μάνινγκ έχει περισσότερα ρεκόρ από τον Τομ Μπρέιντι. Πιο συγκεκριμένα, ο Μάνινγκ έχει πετύχει περισσότερα περάσματα, περισσότερους πόντους και περισσότερες νίκες στην καριέρα του στο NFL. Ωστόσο, ο Μπρέιντι έχει κατακτήσει περισσότερα Super Bowl από τον Μάνινγκ.
ell.Rep_En: Peyton Manning has more records than Tom Brady, more specifically, Manning has scored more passes, more points and more wins in his NFL career, but Brady has won more Super Bowls than Manning.

est.Qst: Kellel on rohkem rekordeid, Peyton Manningil või Tom Bradyl?
est.Rep: Tom Bradyl on rohkem rekordeid kui Peyton Manningil. Brady on püstitanud rohkem NFL-i rekordeid, sealhulgas kõige rohkem võite Super Bowl'is, kõige rohkem touchdown'e ühe hooaja jooksul ja kõige rohkem touchdown'e karjääri jooksul. Manningil on siiski endiselt mõned olulised NFL-i rekordid, sealhulgas kõige rohkem touchdown'e ühe hooaja jooksul ja kõige rohkem touchdown'e karjääri jooksul enne Bradyt.
est.Rep_En: Brady holds the record for most Super Bowl wins, most touchdowns in a season, and most career touchdowns, but he also holds the record for most touchdowns in a season and most career touchdowns.

fin.Qst: Kuka pitää enemmän ennätyksiä, Peyton Manning vai Tom Brady?
fin.Rep: Tom Brady pitää enemmän ennätyksiä kuin Peyton Manning. Bradylla on useita ennätyksiä, kuten eniten voittoja quarterbackina, eniten touchdowneja kaudella ja uralla, eniten playoff-voittoja ja Super Bowl-voittoja. Manningilla on myös useita ennätyksiä, mutta Brady on yleisesti pidetty yhtenä kaikkien aikojen parhaista pelaajista ja hänellä on enemmän ennätyksiä kuin Manningilla.
fin.Rep_En: Brady holds several records, including most wins as a quarterback, most touchdowns in a season and career, most playoff wins and most Super Bowl wins.Manning also holds several records, but Brady is widely considered one of the greatest players of all time and holds more records than Manning.

fra.Qst: Qui détient plus de records? Peyton Manning ou Tom Brady?
fra.Rep: Tom Brady détient plus de records que Peyton Manning. Brady détient plusieurs records de la NFL, notamment le plus grand nombre de passes de touché en carrière, le plus grand nombre de victoires en carrière pour un quart-arrière et le plus grand nombre de victoires au Super Bowl pour un joueur. Manning détient également plusieurs records de la NFL, mais Brady en a plus.
fra.Rep_En: Tom Brady holds more records than Peyton Manning. Brady holds several NFL records, including the most career touchdown passes, the most career victories by a quarterback, and the most Super Bowl wins by a player. Manning also holds several NFL records, but Brady has more.

glg.Qst: Quen ten máis récords, Peyton Manning ou Tom Brady?
glg.Rep: Tom Brady ten máis récords que Peyton Manning. Brady ten 581 pases de touchdown na súa carreira, mentres que Manning ten 539. Brady tamén ten máis victorias en playoffs, con 30, en comparación coas 14 de Manning. Ademais, Brady ten máis aparicións no Super Bowl, con 10, en comparación coas 4 de Manning.
glg.Rep_En: Brady has more career touchdown passes than Peyton Manning, with 581, while Manning has 539, and Brady has more playoff wins with 30, compared to Manning's 14, and Brady has more Super Bowl appearances with 10, compared to Manning's 4.

guj.Qst: કોણ વધુ રેકોર્ડ ધરાવે છે પેયટોન મેનિંગ અથવા ટોમ બ્રેડી
guj.Rep: ટોમ બ્રેડી વધુ રેકોર્ડ ધરાવે છે કારણ કે તે એક પ્રસિદ્ધ પ્રોગ્રામર છે જે પાયથોનની વિવિધ પરિયોજનાઓ પર કામ કરે છે. તેની પ્રસિદ્ધિ પાયથોન સમુદાયમાં પણ છે કારણ કે તે પાયથોનની વિવિધ પરિયોજનાઓ પર કામ કરી છે જે પાયથોનની સામાન્ય ઉપયોગિતા વિસ્તારે વધે છે.
guj.Rep_En: Tom Brady is a well-known programmer who has worked on various Python projects, and his fame is also in the Python community because he has worked on various Python projects that expand the general utility of Python.

heb.Qst: מי מחזיק יותר שיאים פייטון מאנינג או טום בריידי
heb.Rep: פייטון מאנינג מחזיק יותר שיאים מטום בריידי בפער קטן. פייטון מחזיק 539 מסירות לTouchdowns בעוד שטום בריידי מחזיק 541 מסירות לTouchdowns. אך טום בריידי מחזיק יותר שיאים בתחום הזכיות בסופרבול עם 7 זכיות, בעוד שפייטון מאנינג זכה ב-2 פעמים בלבד.
heb.Rep_En: Peyton Manning holds more records than Tom Brady by a small margin. Peyton holds 539 passes for touchdowns while Tom Brady holds 541 passes for touchdowns. But Tom Brady holds more records in Super Bowl wins with 7 wins, while Peyton Manning has won only 2 times.

hin.Qst: कौन अधिक रिकॉर्ड रखता है पेटन मैनिंग या टॉम ब्रैडी
hin.Rep: टॉम ब्रैडी अधिक रिकॉर्ड रखते हैं। वे एक अमेरिकी फुटबॉल खिलाड़ी हैं जो नेशनल फुटबॉल लीग (NFL) में खेलते हैं। उन्होंने कई रिकॉर्ड बनाए हैं, जिसमें सबसे अधिक पासिंग यार्ड, सबसे अधिक टचडाउन पास, सबसे अधिक जीत वाले क्वार्टरबैक आदि शामिल हैं।
hin.Rep_En: Tom Brady holds the record for most passing yards, most touchdown passes, and most wins by a quarterback.

hrv.Qst: Tko ima više rekorda, Peyton Manning ili Tom Brady?
hrv.Rep: Tom Brady ima više rekorda od Peytoma Manninga. Brady drži rekord za najviše pobjeda u karijeri kao quarterback u regularnoj sezoni i doigravanju, najviše touchdowna u karijeri u regularnoj sezoni i doigravanju, najviše pobjeda u Super Bowlu kao quarterback te najviše prolaznih yardi u jednoj sezoni. Manning drži rekord za najviše touchdowna u jednoj sezoni i najviše prolaznih yardi u karijeri.
hrv.Rep_En: Tom Brady holds more records than Peyton Manning. Brady holds the record for most career wins as a quarterback in the regular season and playoffs, most career touchdowns in the regular season and playoffs, most Super Bowl wins as a quarterback and most passing yards in a season. Manning holds the record for most touchdowns in a season and most passing yards in a career.

hun.Qst: Ki tart több rekordot, Peyton Manning vagy Tom Brady?
hun.Rep: Tom Brady tart több rekordot, mint Peyton Manning. Brady tartja az összes idők legtöbb touchdown passz rekordját, valamint az összes idők legtöbb nyertes játékosának rekordját is. Manningnek azonban több egyéni rekordja van, például az egy szezon alatt dobott touchdown passzok rekordja.
hun.Rep_En: Tom Brady holds the record for most touchdown passes by a player, and holds the record for most touchdown passes by a player, but Manning also holds the record for most touchdown passes by a player in a season.

hye.Qst: Ո՞վ է ավելի շատ ռեկորդներ պահում. Փեյթոն Մենինգը կամ Թոմ Բրեդին
hye.Rep: Պարզապես, այս հարցումը կարող է լինել տեղեկատվական, քանի որ այն կապված է ռեկորդների թե ով է ավելի շատ պահում: Միայն այս հարցումը հարկավոր է ավելի մանրամասն լինելու համար: Եթե ​​դուք ուզում եք իմանալ, թե ով է ավելի շատ պահում ռեկորդներ, ապա կարող եք որոշել այն ըստ տեղադրման, թե որտեղ են պահվում նրանց մեջ: Մի քանի տեղադրություններ կան, որոնք կարող են պահել ռեկորդներ, ինչպես օրինակ ՝ համակարգչային սերվերներ, բանկեր, համակարգչային խանութներ, համակարգչային խոհարարներ, համակարգչային խորհրդակցություններ, համակարգչային խորհրդանշանակություններ և այլն:
hye.Rep_En: The question is, how do you know if you have a record of the data you have stored, and if so, how do you know if you have a record of the data you have stored? - Computer servers, computers, computers, computers, computers, computers, computers, computers, computers.

ind.Qst: Siapa yang memegang lebih banyak rekor Peyton Manning atau Tom Brady
ind.Rep: Tom Brady memegang lebih banyak rekor daripada Peyton Manning. Brady memiliki rekor untuk jumlah kemenangan terbanyak oleh seorang quarterback dalam sejarah NFL, jumlah touchdown terbanyak dalam sejarah playoff NFL, dan jumlah touchdown terbanyak dalam sejarah Super Bowl. Manning memiliki rekor untuk jumlah touchdown terbanyak dalam sejarah NFL dan jumlah yard lemparan terbanyak dalam sejarah NFL.
ind.Rep_En: Brady holds the record for most wins by a quarterback in NFL history, the most touchdowns in NFL playoff history, and the most touchdowns in Super Bowl history, while Manning holds the record for most touchdowns in NFL history and the most yards in NFL history.

isl.Qst: Hver heldur fleiri metum, Peyton Manning eða Tom Brady?
isl.Rep: Tom Brady heldur fleiri metum en Peyton Manning. Hann hefur unnið 7 Super Bowl titla, sem er meira en nokkur annar leikmaður í sögu NFL. Manning hefur unnið 2 Super Bowl titla. Brady hefur einnig fleiri sigra í leikjum en Manning, með 230 sigra í grunnspilinu og 34 sigra í sláttum, samanborið við Manning sem hefur 186 sigra í grunnspilinu og 14 sigra í sláttum.
isl.Rep_En: Tom Brady holds more records than Peyton Manning. He has won 7 Super Bowl titles, which is more than any other player in NFL history. Manning has won 2 Super Bowl titles. Brady also has more wins in games than Manning, with 230 wins in the regular season and 34 wins in the playoffs, compared to Manning who has 186 wins in the regular season and 14 wins in the playoffs.

ita.Qst: Chi detiene piu' record, Peyton Manning o Tom Brady?
ita.Rep: Tom Brady detiene più record rispetto a Peyton Manning. Brady ha stabilito il record per il maggior numero di vittorie come quarterback nella storia della NFL, il maggior numero di touchdown passati in una singola stagione, il maggior numero di vittorie nei playoff e il maggior numero di vittorie nel Super Bowl da un singolo giocatore. Manning detiene comunque molti record importanti, tra cui il maggior numero di touchdown passati in carriera e il maggior numero di yard passate in carriera.
ita.Rep_En: Brady holds the record for most career touchdown passes, most touchdown passes in a single season, most playoff wins, and most Super Bowl wins by a single player, and holds several other major records, including most career touchdown passes and most career yards.

jav.Qst: Apa sing paling apik kanggo Peyton Manning utawa Tom Brady?
jav.Rep: Kedua pemain sepak bola Amerika Peyton Manning dan Tom Brady adalah dua dari quarterback terbaik dalam sejarah NFL. Keduanya memiliki rekor yang luar biasa dan telah memenangkan banyak penghargaan dan gelar. Namun, sulit untuk mengatakan siapa yang lebih baik karena keduanya memiliki kekuatan dan kelemahan yang berbeda. Beberapa orang mungkin lebih suka Manning karena kemampuannya dalam membaca pertahanan dan mengatur serangan, sementara yang lain mungkin lebih suka Brady karena kemampuannya dalam situasi kritis dan kemampuan untuk memimpin timnya ke kemenangan. Pilihan terbaik tergantung pada preferensi pribadi.
jav.Rep_En: Both players, Peyton Manning and Tom Brady, are two of the best quarterbacks in NFL history, both with outstanding records and winning numerous awards and titles, but it's hard to say which is better because both have different strengths and weaknesses.Some people may prefer Manning for his ability to read defense and manage offense, while others may prefer Brady for his ability in critical situations and his ability to lead his team to victory.

jpn.Qst: 記録を保持しているのはペイトン・マニング (Peyton Manning) トム・ブレイディ (Tom Brady)
jpn.Rep: そうですね。ペイトン・マニングとトム・ブレイディは、NFLの歴史で最も成功したクォーターバックの一人であり、多くの記録を保持しています。ペイトン・マニングは通算71,940ヤードのパスを投げ、トム・ブレイディは通算79,204ヤードのパスを投げています。また、両方の選手は通算500回以上のタッチダウンパスを投げており、NFL史上最高の記録を保持しています。
jpn.Rep_En: It's a little bit of a stretch, but it's a little bit of a stretch.

kan.Qst: ಯಾರು ಹೆಚ್ಚು ದಾಖಲೆಗಳನ್ನು ಹೊಂದಿದ್ದಾರೆಃ ಪೇಟನ್ ಮ್ಯಾನಿಂಗ್ ಅಥವಾ ಟಾಮ್ ಬ್ರಾಡಿ
kan.Rep: ನನಗೆ ಈ ವಿಷಯದಲ್ಲಿ ತಿಳಿದಿಲ್ಲ. ಆದರೆ ನಾನು ಈ ವಿಷಯದ ಬಗ್ಗೆ ಹುಡುಗರಿಗೆ ಸಹಾಯ ಮಾಡಲು ಸಿದ್ಧವಿದ್ದೇನೆ.
kan.Rep_En: I don't know about this. But I'm willing to help the guys with this.

kat.Qst: ვინ უფრო მეტ რეკორდს ფლობს: პეიტონ მენინგი თუ ტომ ბრეიდი?
kat.Rep: პეიტონ მენინგი უფრო მეტ რეკორდს ფლობს, რადგან ის არის ერთ-ერთი საუკეთესო ფუტბოლის მოთამაშე და მას აქვს მრავალი რეკორდი, შესაბამისად მას უნდა იქნას უპირატესობა.
kat.Rep_En: Peyton Manning holds more records because he's one of the best football players and he has many records, so he should be preferred.

khm.Qst: អ្នកដែលកាន់កំណត់ត្រាច្រើនជាង Peyton Manning ឬ Tom Brady
khm.Rep: ខ្ញុំមិនអាចកំណត់បានទេពីតម្លៃរបស់ពួកគេទេ។ ពួកគេទាំងពីរគឺជាអ្នកប៉ាន់ប្រហែលជាមួយគ្នានៅក្នុងការប៉ាន់ស្មាននូវការប្រើប្រាស់ប្រព័ន្ធប្រតិបត្តិការបញ្ជាក់ក្នុងកិច្ចការប៉ារ៉ាប់រង់។ ប៉ុន្តែពួកគេទាំងពីរគឺជាអ្នកប៉ាន់ប្រហែលដែលបានប្រើប្រាស់ជាមួយគ្នាក្នុងការបង្កើតប្រព័ន្ធប្រតិបត្តិការបញ្ជាក់ក្នុងកិច្ចការប៉ារ៉ាប់រង់។
khm.Rep_En: I can't put a price on them. They're both speculators in estimating the use of proof-of-work software, but they're both speculators in estimating the use of proof-of-work software.

kir.Qst: Кимге көбүрөөк рекорд коюлган: Пейтон Мэннингби же Том Брейдиби?
kir.Rep: Пейтон Мэннингби жана Том Брейдиби арасындагы көбүрөөк рекорду болушу мүмкүн. Алардын ичинде кимге коюлганына караганда, бир нече рекорддору бар. Мисалы, Пейтон Мэннингби 2013-жылы 55 топтууга жеткен жана 2014-жылы Супербоодогу учурдагы 34 топтууга жеткен рекорддору бар. Том Брейдиби эки сезондагы 50 топтууга жеткен рекорддору бар. Булардын ичинде кимге коюлганына караганда, адамдардын көбүнөкү Пейтон Мэннингбиби коюгу мүмкүн.
kir.Rep_En: The record is held by Tom Brady, who holds the record for most strikeouts in a season, and by Peyton Manning, who holds the record for most strikeouts in a season, with 55 strikeouts in 2013 and 34 strikeouts in 2014 (the current Super Bowl record is 34 strikeouts in two seasons).

kor.Qst: 누가 더 많은 기록을 가지고 있습니까? 페이튼 매닝이나  브레이디
kor.Rep: 현재로서는 브레이디가 더 많은 기록을 가지고 있습니다. 톰 브레이디는 NFL 역사상 가장 많은 패스 야드와 타임 아웃, 슈퍼볼 우승 등의 기록을 보유하고 있습니다. 반면, 페이튼 매닝은 NFL 역사상 가장 많은 패스 시도와 완료, 패스 야드, 타우치다운 등의 기록을 보유하고 있습니다.
kor.Rep_En: In the past, Brady has held the record for most passing yards, most strikeouts, and most Super Bowl wins, while Patton Manning has held the record for most passing attempts, most completions, most passing yards, and most touchdowns.

lao.Qst: ຜູ້ໃດຖືສະຖິຕິຫຼາຍ Peyton Manning ຫຼື Tom Brady
lao.Rep: ຜູ້ທີ່ສະຖິຕິຫຼາຍຄວນດຳເນີນການຫຼາຍເປັນ Tom Brady ເທົ່ານັ້ນສູງສຸດກັບ Peyton Manning ເທົ່ານັ້ນສູງສຸດກັບຜູ້ທີ່ຖືສະຖິຕິຫຼາຍນັ້ນ. ສະຖິຕິນີ້ສາມາດຕັ້ງຄ່າໃນການດຳເນີນການຕົວເລືອກຂອງທ່ານ.
lao.Rep_En: The most likely to run the most is Tom Brady, the highest is Peyton Manning, the highest is the record holder. This statistic can be set in the running of your choice.

lit.Qst: Kas turi daugiau rekordų? Peyton Manning ar Tom Brady?
lit.Rep: Tom Brady turi daugiau rekordų nei Peyton Manning. Brady yra laikomas vienu geriausių visų laikų NFL žaidėjų ir jis turi daugiausiai pergalės playoff'ų metu, daugiausiai pergalės Super Bowl metu, daugiausiai pergalės reguliariajame sezone, daugiausiai metimų į touchdown'us ir daugiausiai metimų į jardus. Tačiau Manning taip pat yra vienas geriausių visų laikų ir turi daugiausiai metimų į touchdown'us reguliariajame sezone.
lit.Rep_En: Brady holds the record for most wins by a player in a season, including the most wins by a Super Bowl player, the most wins by a regular season player, the most touchdowns by a rookie, and the most total yards by a rookie.

lvs.Qst: kam ir vairāk rekordu - Peitona Maninga vai Toma Bredija
lvs.Rep: Pēc statistikas, Peyton Manning ir uzvarējis vairāk NFL spēļu nekā Tom Brady. Līdz 2021. gada janvārim Manningam ir 186 uzvaras, savukārt Brady ir uzvarējis 230 spēles. Tomēr Manningam ir vairāk iemūžinātu rekordu, piemēram, viņš ir uzvarējis vairāk NFL MVP balvu nekā Brady un ir iemūžinājis rekordu par visvairāk izcīnītajiem touchdowniem vienā sezonā. Tātad, atkarībā no tā, kādus rekordus jūs skatāties, atbilde var atšķirties.
lvs.Rep_En: As of January 2021, Manning has won 186 games, while Brady has won games, but Manning has more records, such as winning 230 more NFL MVPs than Brady and scoring the most touchdowns in a season.

mai.Qst: के बेसी रेकर्ड रखैत अछि पेटन मैनिंग वा टॉम ब्रैडी
mai.Rep: माफ गर्नुहोस्, मलाई तपाईंलाई समझन सक्नुहुन्न् कि तपाईंले के बोल्न चाहनुहुन्छ। कृपया अधिक विवरण दिनुहोस्।
mai.Rep_En: I'm sorry, I didn't understand what you were trying to say. Please elaborate.

mal.Qst: ആരുടെ കൈവശം കൂടുതൽ റെക്കോർഡുകൾ ഉണ്ട്, പെയ്റ്റൺ മാനിംഗോ ടോം ബ്രേഡിയോ?
mal.Rep: പെയ്റ്റൺ മാനേജ്മെന്റ് കൂടുതൽ റെക്കോർഡുകൾ ഉണ്ട് എന്നു പറയാൻ കഴിയും, എങ്കിലും ടോം ബ്രേഡിയോയുടെ കൈവശം പെയ്റ്റൺ മാനേജ്മെന്റിനു കടിമയാണ്. പെയ്റ്റൺ മാനേജ്മെന്റ് ഒരു പ്രബല കമ്പനിയാണ് എന്നു പറയാൻ കഴിയും, അതിനാൽ അവൻ കൂടുതൽ റെക്കോർഡുകൾ ഉണ്ടാക്കാൻ കഴിയും.
mal.Rep_En: Payton Management has more records, but Tom Brady is the one who has the most records. Payton Management is a strong company, so he can make more records.

mar.Qst: यापैकी सर्वाधिक रेकॉर्ड्स पीटन मॅनिंग आणि टॉम ब्रॅडी यांच्यात आहेत.
mar.Rep: मॅनिंग आणि ब्रॅडी हे दोन अमेरिकन फुटबॉल खेळाडू आहेत ज्यांनी एनएफएल च्या इतिहासातील सर्वाधिक रेकॉर्ड्स तोडले आहेत. पीटन मॅनिंग एक उत्कृष्ट क्वार्टरबॅक आहेत ज्याने एनएफएल च्या इतिहासातील सर्वाधिक पाच सुपर बॉल जिंकले आहेत आणि त्याने सर्वाधिक पाच लीग एमव्हीपी अवॉल्स जिंकले आहेत. टॉम ब्रॅडी हे दोन टीम्स, न्यू इंग्लंड पेट्रिऑट्स आणि टाम्पा बे बुकेनियर्स, च्या साथी खेळतात आणि त्याने सर्वाधिक सुपर बॉल जिंकले आहेत आणि त्याने सर्वाधिक लीग एमव्हीपी अवॉल्स जिंकले आहेत.
mar.Rep_En: The two most decorated players in NFL history are Pete Manning, who won five Super Bowls and five MVPs, and Tom Brady, who played for the New England Patriots and the Tampa Bay Buccaneers.

mkd.Qst: Кој има повеќе рекорди, Пејтон Манинг или Том Брејди?
mkd.Rep: Том Брејди има повеќе рекорди од Пејтон Манинг. Брејди е рекордер во најмногу категории, вклучувајќи ги најмногу победи во регуларната сезона и најмногу победи во плејофите. Тој исто така е рекордер во најмногу Супер Боул првенства освоени од еден играч.
mkd.Rep_En: Tom Brady holds more records than Peyton Manning. Brady holds the record for most categories, including most wins in the regular season and most wins in the playoffs. He also holds the record for most Super Bowl championships won by a single player.

mlt.Qst: Min għandu aktar rekords Peyton Manning jew Tom Brady
mlt.Rep:
Tom Brady għandu aktar rekords milli Peyton Manning. Hawnhekk huma xi rekords ta' Tom Brady:

- Aktar Super Bowl Championships milli kull l-oħra quarterback (7)
- Aktar Super Bowl MVP Awards milli kull l-oħra player (5)
- Aktar regular season wins milli kull l-oħra quarterback (230)
- Aktar playoff wins milli kull l-oħra quarterback (34)
- Aktar touchdown passes fil-regular season milli kull l-oħra quarterback (581)
- Aktar touchdown passes fil-playoffs milli kull l-oħra quarterback (83)

nld.Qst: Wie heeft meer records, Peyton Manning of Tom Brady?
nld.Rep: Tom Brady heeft meer records dan Peyton Manning. Brady heeft onder andere het record voor de meeste touchdown passes in een seizoen (50), de meeste touchdown passes in een Super Bowl (13), de meeste overwinningen als quarterback in een carrière (230) en de meeste overwinningen in de Super Bowl door een quarterback (7). Manning heeft echter ook indrukwekkende records, waaronder het record voor de meeste touchdown passes in een carrière (539) en de meeste passing yards in een carrière (71,940).
nld.Rep_En: Brady holds the record for most touchdown passes in a season (50), most touchdown passes in a Super Bowl (13), most career wins as a quarterback (230) and most Super Bowl wins by a quarterback (7), but Manning also holds impressive records, including most touchdown passes in a career (539) and most passing yards in a career (71,940).

nno.Qst: kven har fleire rekorder Peyton Manning eller Tom Brady
nno.Rep: Tom Brady har flere rekorder enn Peyton Manning. Brady har rekorden for flest touchdownpasninger i en sesong (50), flest touchdownpasninger i en Super Bowl-kamp (4), flest seiere som quarterback i en karriere (229), flest seiere som quarterback i en sesong (18), og flest pasningsyards i en enkelt Super Bowl-kamp (505). Manning har imidlertid rekorden for flest touchdownpasninger i en karriere (539).
nno.Rep_En: Tom Brady holds more records than Peyton Manning. Brady holds the record for most touchdown passes in a season (50), most touchdown passes in a Super Bowl game (4), most wins as a quarterback in a career (229), most wins as a quarterback in a season (50), and most passing yards in a single Super Bowl game (50). Manning, however, holds the record for most touchdown passes in a career (539).

nob.Qst: Hvem har flere rekorder? Peyton Manning eller Tom Brady?
nob.Rep: Tom Brady har flere rekorder enn Peyton Manning. Brady har rekorden for flest touchdownpasninger i en enkelt sesong (50), flest touchdownpasninger i en Super Bowl-kamp (4), flest seiere i en karriere som quarterback (229) og flest seiere i en enkelt sesong (18). Manning har imidlertid rekorden for flest touchdownpasninger i en karriere (539).
nob.Rep_En: Tom Brady holds more records than Peyton Manning. Brady holds the record for most touchdown passes in a single season (50), most touchdown passes in a Super Bowl game (4), most career victories as a quarterback (229) and most wins in a single season (18). Manning, however, holds the record for most touchdown passes in a career (539).

npi.Qst: कोसँग बढी रेकर्ड छ, पेटन म्यानिङ वा टम ब्राडी?
npi.Rep: मलाई लाग्छ कि टम ब्राडीले बढी रेकर्ड छन्। उनी एक अत्यन्त अनुभवी खेलाडी हुन् र उनीले विभिन्न अन्तर्राष्ट्रिय खेलमा अनेक रेकर्डहरू स्थापित गरेका छन्।
npi.Rep_En: I think Tom Brady has more records. He is a very experienced player and he has set many records in various international matches.

pbt.Qst: د نړۍ تر ټولو زیات ریکارډونه د پیټون منینګ او ټام بریډي ترمنځ دي.
pbt.Rep:
دا د پیټون کود دی:

```python
records = [
    {"name": "John", "age": 25, "city": "New York"},
    {"name": "Emily", "age": 30, "city": "Los Angeles"},
    {"name": "David", "age": 20, "city": "Chicago"},
    {"name": "Sarah", "age": 27, "city": "San Francisco"}
]

# ترتیب برابر کول
records.sort(key=lambda x: x["name"])

# د ټولو ریکارډونو لیست چاپول
for record in records:
    print(record)
```

دا هم یوازې کار کوونکی دی:

```python
records = [
    {"name": "John", "age": 25, "city": "New York"},
    {"name": "Emily", "age": 30, "city": "Los Angeles"},
    {"name": "David", "age": 20, "city": "Chicago"},
    {"name": "Sarah", "age": 27, "city": "San Francisco"}
]

# د ټولو ریکارډونو لیست چاپول
for record in sorted(records, key=lambda x: x["name"]):
    print(record)
```

pes.Qst: چه کسی رکورد بیشتری دارد؟ پیتون منینگ یا تام بریدی؟
pes.Rep: بله، پیتون منینگ رکورد بیشتری در مقابل تام بریدی دارد. او با 72 گل در فصل 2012-2013 لیگ برتر انگلیس، رکورد بیشترین تعداد گل در یک فصل را به دست آورده است. در مقابل، تام بریدی با 47 گل در فصل 2017-2018 لیگ برتر انگلیس، رکورد خود را بهبود کرده است.
pes.Rep_En: Yes, Peyton Manning has more records than Tom Brady. He has scored the most goals in a season with 72 goals in the 2012 Premier League season. On the other hand, Tom Brady has improved his record with 47 goals in the 2017-2018 Premier League season.

pol.Qst: Kto ma więcej rekordów Peyton Manning czy Tom Brady
pol.Rep: Tom Brady ma więcej rekordów niż Peyton Manning. Brady ma wiele rekordów w NFL, w tym najwięcej zwycięstw w sezonie regularnym i w play-offach, najwięcej touchdownów w sezonie regularnym i w play-offach, najwięcej yardów rzutów w sezonie regularnym i w play-offach, najwięcej zwycięstw w Super Bowl i wiele innych. Manning również ma wiele rekordów, ale jest ich mniej niż u Brady'ego.
pol.Rep_En: Brady holds the record for most wins in a season, most strikeouts in a season, most strikeouts in a season, most Super Bowl wins, and more.

por.Qst: Quem tem mais recordes, a Peyton Manning ou o Tom Brady?
por.Rep: Tom Brady tem mais recordes do que Peyton Manning. Brady detém vários recordes da NFL, incluindo o maior número de passes para touchdown em uma única temporada, o maior número de passes para touchdown em uma carreira, o maior número de passes completados em um Super Bowl e o maior número de vitórias em um Super Bowl como quarterback. Manning também detém vários recordes, mas Brady tem mais recordes importantes.
por.Rep_En: Brady holds several NFL records, including the most touchdown passes in a single season, the most touchdown passes in a career, the most Super Bowl passes completed, and the most Super Bowl victories as a quarterback.

ron.Qst: Cine deţine mai multe recorduri Peyton Manning sau Tom Brady
ron.Rep: Tom Brady deține mai multe recorduri decât Peyton Manning. Brady are cele mai multe victorii în post-sezon din istoria NFL, cele mai multe apariții în Super Bowl și cele mai multe victorii în Super Bowl. De asemenea, el deține recordul pentru cele mai multe touchdown-uri într-un singur sezon și cele mai multe touchdown-uri într-un singur Super Bowl. În schimb, Manning deține recordul pentru cele mai multe touchdown-uri într-un sezon și cele mai multe yarduri trecute într-un sezon.
ron.Rep_En: Brady holds the record for most postseason wins, most Super Bowl appearances, and most Super Bowl wins, and holds the record for most touchdowns in a season and most passing yards in a season.

rus.Qst: Кто держит больше рекордов Пейтон Мэннинг или Том Брейди
rus.Rep: Оба игрока держат множество рекордов в НФЛ, но в целом, Том Брэйди держит больше рекордов, чем Пейтон Мэннинг. Некоторые из наиболее впечатляющих рекордов Брэйди включают в себя наибольшее количество побед в карьере для квотербека, наибольшее количество побед в сезоне, наибольшее количество побед в плей-офф, наибольшее количество передач на территории защиты и наибольшее количество передач в сезоне. Однако, Мэннинг также держит множество впечатляющих рекордов, включая наибольшее количество передач на территории атаки и наибольшее количество передач в карьере.
rus.Rep_En: Both players hold multiple NFL records, but overall, Tom Brady holds more records than Peyton Manning, some of Brady's most impressive records include career wins for a quarterback, most wins in a season, most playoff wins, most defensive rebounds, and most assists in a season.

slk.Qst: Kto má viac rekordov, Peyton Manningová alebo Tom Brady?
slk.Rep: Tom Brady má viac rekordov ako Peyton Manningová. Brady drží rekordy v počte víťazstiev v základnej časti, počte víťazstiev v play-off, počte touchdownov v základnej časti a play-off, počte prehraných zápasov v základnej časti a play-off a ďalších kategóriách. Manningová má tiež mnoho rekordov, ale Brady je v tejto oblasti úspešnejší.
slk.Rep_En: Brady holds the record for most home runs, most playoff wins, most touchdown runs, most strikeouts, and more.Manning also holds many records, but Brady is more successful in this area.

slv.Qst: Kdo ima več rekordov, Peyton Manning ali Tom Brady?
slv.Rep: Tom Brady ima več rekordov kot Peyton Manning. Brady ima več zmag v rednem delu sezone in v končnicah, več zmag v Super Bowlu, več touchdownov in več yardov. Manning ima sicer več poskusov in completions, vendar je Brady bolj uspešen pri doseganju točk in zmag.
slv.Rep_En: Brady has more regular-season wins and playoff wins, more Super Bowl wins, more touchdowns and more yards, and Manning has more tries and completions, but Brady is more successful in scoring and winning.

spa.Qst: ¿Quién tiene más récords Peyton Manning o Tom Brady?
spa.Rep: Tom Brady tiene más récords que Peyton Manning en la mayoría de las categorías estadísticas importantes de la NFL, incluyendo el número de victorias en playoffs, el número de touchdowns en playoffs, el número de pases completados en playoffs, el número de yardas en playoffs, el número de victorias en temporada regular, el número de touchdowns en temporada regular, el número de yardas en temporada regular, entre otros. Sin embargo, ambos son considerados como dos de los mejores quarterbacks de todos los tiempos y han dejado un legado impresionante en la NFL.
spa.Rep_En: Brady holds more records than Peyton Manning in most major NFL statistical categories, including playoff wins, playoff touchdowns, playoff passes completed, playoff yards, regular season wins, regular season touchdowns, and more, but both are considered two of the greatest quarterbacks of all time and have left an impressive legacy in the NFL.

srp.Qst: Ко држи више рекорда Пејтон Манинг или Том Бреди
srp.Rep: Tom Brady drži više rekorda od Peyton Manninga. Brady je držao rekord za najviše dodavanja za touchdown u jednoj sezoni (50) i najviše pobjeda u karijeri kao quarterback u regularnoj sezoni i doigravanju (219), dok je Manning držao rekord za najviše dodavanja za touchdown u karijeri (539) i najviše dodavanja za više od 4.000 jardi u jednoj sezoni (14). Međutim, Brady je nedavno pretekao Manninga i postao rekorder za najviše dodavanja za touchdown u karijeri (581).
srp.Rep_En: Tom Brady holds more records than Peyton Manning. Brady holds the record for most touchdown passes in a single season (50) and most career wins as a quarterback in a regular season and playoff (219), while Manning holds the record for most touchdown passes in a career (539) and most touchdown passes in a single season (14).

swe.Qst: Vem har fler rekord, Peyton Manning eller Tom Brady?
swe.Rep: Tom Brady har fler rekord än Peyton Manning. Brady har bland annat flest touchdown-passningar i en säsong, flest touchdown-passningar i en karriär, flest vinster som quarterback i en karriär och flest vinster som quarterback i en säsong. Manning har dock flest touchdown-passningar totalt i en karriär.
swe.Rep_En: Tom Brady has more records than Peyton Manning. Brady has, among other things, the most touchdown passes in a season, the most touchdown passes in a career, the most wins as a quarterback in a career and the most wins as a quarterback in a season. Manning, however, has the most touchdown passes total in a career.

swh.Qst: Nani ana rekodi zaidi Peyton Manning au Tom Brady
swh.Rep: Tom Brady ana rekodi nyingi zaidi kuliko Peyton Manning. Brady ana rekodi ya Super Bowl nyingi zaidi (7) kuliko Manning (2), na pia ana rekodi ya kushinda mechi nyingi zaidi ya Super Bowl kama quarterback. Brady pia ana rekodi ya kushinda mechi nyingi zaidi ya NFL kama quarterback (264) kuliko Manning (186). Hata hivyo, Manning ana rekodi ya kushinda tuzo ya MVP ya NFL mara nyingi zaidi kuliko Brady (5 kwa 3).
swh.Rep_En: Brady holds the record for most Super Bowl wins by a quarterback, with seven, and holds the record for most Super Bowl wins by a quarterback, with six, but he has won the MVP award more times than Brady.

tel.Qst: ఎవరు ఎక్కువ రికార్డులను కలిగి ఉన్నారుః పీటన్ మానింగ్ లేదా టామ్ బ్రాడీ
tel.Rep: టామ్ బ్రాడీ ఎక్కువ రికార్డులను కలిగి ఉన్నారు. అవను న్యూయార్క్ యాంకీస్ లో ప్లే చేసిన సమయంలో అనేక రికార్డులు సృష్టించారు. అక్కడ అనేక రికార్డులు ఉన్నాయి అందువల్ల అవను ఎక్కువ రికార్డులను కలిగి ఉన్నారు. పీటన్ మానింగ్ కూడా ఒక ప్రఖ్యాపనకు వచ్చిన సమయంలో ఎక్కువ రికార్డులను కలిగి ఉన్నాడు. కానీ టామ్ బ్రాడీ ప్రసిద్ధ కార్యక్రమాలు మరియు అవను సాధించిన ప్రతిష్ఠానాలు అనేక రికార్డులను కలిగి ఉన్నాయి.
tel.Rep_En: Tom Brady has a record of more than 100 home runs, and he holds the record for most home runs by a player, and he holds the record for most home runs by a player, and he holds the record for most home runs by a player.

tgk.Qst: Кӣ рекорди бештар дорад Пейтон Маннинг ё Том Брейди
tgk.Rep: Том Брейди дар NFL рекорди бештарро дорад. У барои бештарин танҳо NFL Super Bowl-ҳои бештарро дорад (7 Super Bowl). Дар баробари рекорди бештарин touchdown-ҳо, Брейди 581 touchdown дорад, ва дар баробари рекорди бештарин yard-ҳо, Брейди 79,204 yard дорад. Пейтон Маннинг дар NFL 5 MVP (Most Valuable Player) гирифтааст ва дар баробари рекорди бештарин touchdown-ҳо, Маннинг 539 touchdown дорад, ва дар баробари рекорди бештарин yard-ҳо, Маннинг 71,940 yard дорад.
tgk.Rep_En: Tom Brady holds the record for most Super Bowls, second only to the NFL's record for most touchdowns, with 581, and Brady holds the record for most yards, with 79,204.

tgl.Qst: Sino ang may higit na mga rekord, Peyton Manning o Tom Brady?
tgl.Rep: Sa kasalukuyan, si Tom Brady ang may higit na mga rekord kaysa kay Peyton Manning. Si Brady ay mayroong pinakamaraming panalo sa Super Bowl ng isang quarterback, mayroong pinakamaraming touchdown passes sa Super Bowl, at mayroong pinakamaraming panalo sa regular season at playoff games. Gayunpaman, si Manning ay mayroong pinakamaraming touchdown passes sa isang season at pinakamaraming panalo sa regular season.
tgl.Rep_En: The current record is held by Tom Brady, who has the most Super Bowl wins by a quarterback, the most Super Bowl touchdown passes, and the most wins in a regular season and playoff game, while Manning has the most touchdown passes in a season and the most wins in a regular season.

tha.Qst: ใครถือสถิติมากกว่า Peyton Manning หรือ Tom Brady?
tha.Rep: Tom Brady ถือสถิติมากกว่า Peyton Manning ในหลายด้าน เช่น จำนวนแชมป์สุดยอดของซูเปอร์โบว์ล่าสุด และจำนวนชนะเลิศของ NFL ทั้งหมด แต่ Peyton Manning ก็ยังถือสถิติที่ดีในหลายด้านเช่น จำนวนการโยกลูกฟุตบอล และจำนวนการโยงลูกฟุตบอลในช่วงเวลาที่เป็นสมาชิกของ NFL ด้วย
tha.Rep_En: Brady has the record for most Super Bowl victories and the most total NFL wins, but he also has the record for most strikeouts and total strikeouts in his NFL career.

tur.Qst: Kim daha fazla rekoru elinde tutuyor Peyton Manning mi Tom Brady mi
tur.Rep: Tom Brady daha fazla rekor elinde tutuyor. Brady, NFL tarihinde en çok touchdown pası atan oyuncu, en çok kazanan oyuncu, en çok Super Bowl kazanan oyuncu ve en çok playoff galibiyeti olan oyuncu gibi birçok rekorun sahibidir. Peyton Manning ise en çok touchdown pası atan oyuncu, en çok pas yardımları yapan oyuncu ve en çok sezon MVP ödülü kazanan oyuncu gibi birçok önemli rekorun sahibidir.
tur.Rep_En: Brady holds the record for most touchdown passes, most wins, most Super Bowl wins, and most playoff wins in NFL history, while Peyton Manning holds the record for most touchdown passes, most assists, and most MVPs.

ukr.Qst: Хто має більше рекордів - Пейтон Меннінг чи Том Брейді?
ukr.Rep: Том Брейді має більше рекордів, включаючи найбільшу кількість перемог у регулярному сезоні та плей-офф, найбільшу кількість перемог у Супербоулі, найбільшу кількість передач на території суперника та найбільшу кількість передач на території суперника в одному сезоні. Однак, Пейтон Меннінг також має вражаючі досягнення, включаючи найбільшу кількість передач на території суперника в кар'єрі та найбільшу кількість передач на території суперника в одному матчі.
ukr.Rep_En: Tom Brady holds the record for most wins in a season, most playoff games, most Super Bowl wins, most home runs, and most home runs in a single season, but Manning also holds the record for most home runs in a career and most home runs in a single game.

urd.Qst: کون زیادہ ریکارڈ رکھتا ہے؟ پیٹن میننگ یا ٹام بریڈی
urd.Rep: ٹام بریڈی زیادہ ریکارڈ رکھتا ہے۔ وہ چھ سالوں سے دنیا کے سب سے تیز دوڑنے والے آدمی کے طور پر مشہور ہیں اور انہوں نے بہت سے ریکارڈ بنائے ہیں جن میں شامل ہیں دوڑنے کی دنیا کے سب سے تیز ریکارڈ، ایک گھنٹے میں سو مائل کی ریکارڈ، ایک سال میں ۱۰۰۰۰ مائل کی ریکارڈ اور دوڑنے کی دنیا کے سب سے زیادہ پیمائش کی ریکارڈ شامل ہیں۔
urd.Rep_En: Tom Brady holds the record for the fastest man in the world, having been the fastest man in the world for six years, and has set many records, including the world record for the fastest runner, the world record for 100 miles in an hour, the world record for 100 miles in a year, and the world record for the fastest runner.

vie.Qst: Ai giữ nhiều kỷ lục hơn Peyton Manning hay Tom Brady?
vie.Rep:
The answer to this question depends on what specific records you are referring to. Peyton Manning and Tom Brady both hold numerous records in the NFL, and they have been in competition with each other for many years. 

As of 2021, Tom Brady holds the record for the most Super Bowl wins by a player (7), while Peyton Manning holds the record for the most career passing yards (71,940) and the most career touchdown passes (539). 

Overall, it is difficult to say definitively who holds more records, as it depends on which specific records you are looking at.

yue.Qst: 邊個有更多嘅紀錄? Peyton Manning 抑或 Tom Brady
yue.Rep:
Tom Brady 擁有更多的紀錄，包括：

- 最多的超級盃冠軍（7次）
- 最多的超級盃MVP獎（5次）
- 最多的季後賽勝利（34次）
- 最多的季後賽通過碼（12,449碼）
- 最多的季後賽傳球Touchdown（80次）
- 最多的常規賽勝利（230次）

Peyton Manning 也擁有許多紀錄，但在這些方面都不及 Tom Brady。
yue.Rep_En:
Tom Brady has more records, including:
- Most Super Bowl championships (7 times)
- Most Super Bowl MVP awards (5 times)
- Most postseason wins (34)
- The most seasonal matches passed by 12,449 yards.
- Most postseason passes by a touchdown (80).
- Most regular season wins (230).
Peyton Manning also has a lot of records, but in these respects, she's not as good as Tom Brady.

zlm.Qst: siapa yang memegang rekod lebih Peyton Manning atau Tom Brady
zlm.Rep: Tom Brady memegang lebih banyak rekod daripada Peyton Manning. Brady memegang rekod NFL untuk kemenangan paling banyak oleh seorang pemain, kemenangan paling banyak oleh seorang quarterback, touchdown paling banyak dalam satu musim, touchdown paling banyak dalam satu karier, dan banyak lagi. Manning memegang beberapa rekod NFL penting, termasuk touchdown paling banyak dalam satu musim sebelum Brady memecahkan rekod itu. Namun, secara keseluruhan, Brady memegang lebih banyak rekod NFL daripada Manning.
zlm.Rep_En: Brady holds the NFL record for most wins by a player, most wins by a quarterback, most touchdowns in a season, most touchdowns in a career, and more.Manning holds several important NFL records, including most touchdowns in a season before Brady broke that record.

eng.Qst: who will be playing in the world series this year
eng.Rep: I'm sorry, I cannot predict the future. The teams that will play in the World Series are determined by the results of the regular season and playoffs, which have not yet taken place.

afr.Qst: Wie sal hierdie jaar in die wêreldreeks speel?
afr.Rep: Ek is jammer, maar ek kan nie voorspel wie hierdie jaar in die Wêreldreeks sal speel nie. Dit hang af van die prestasies van die spanne gedurende die seisoen en die uitkoms van die playoffs.
afr.Rep_En: I'm sorry, but I can't predict who will play in the World Series this year. It depends on the teams' performances throughout the season and the outcome of the playoffs.

arb.Qst: من سيلعب في البطولة العالمية هذا العام
arb.Rep: لا يمكنني الإجابة على هذا السؤال بدقة لأنه يعتمد على الرياضة التي تتحدث عنها. ومع ذلك، يمكنك البحث عن البطولات الرياضية المختلفة والفرق المشاركة فيها لمعرفة من سيلعب في البطولة العالمية هذا العام.

pol.Qst: Kto będzie grał w tegorocznej serii światowej?
pol.Rep: Nie jestem w stanie przewidzieć, kto będzie grał w tegorocznej serii światowej, ponieważ zależy to od wyników sezonu zasadniczego i play-offów w lidze baseballowej. Jednakże, w sezonie 2021, serię światową wygrała drużyna Atlanta Braves, pokonując Houston Astros.
pol.Rep_En: I can't predict who will play in this year's World Series because it depends on the results of the regular season and the playoffs, but in the 2021 season, the Atlanta Braves won the World Series by beating the Houston Astros.

por.Qst: Quem vai jogar na série mundial este ano?
por.Rep: Ainda não é possível prever com certeza quais equipes jogarão na Série Mundial deste ano, pois a temporada de beisebol ainda está em andamento e muitas coisas podem mudar. No entanto, algumas equipes que estão se destacando até agora incluem o Los Angeles Dodgers, o San Francisco Giants, o Houston Astros e o Tampa Bay Rays.
por.Rep_En: It's not yet possible to predict with certainty which teams will play in this year's World Series, as the baseball season is still in full swing and many things could change, but some teams that are standing out so far include the Los Angeles Dodgers, San Francisco Giants, Houston Astros and Tampa Bay Rays.

ron.Qst: Cine va juca în World Series anul acesta?
ron.Rep: Nu pot să prezic cu exactitate cine va juca în World Series anul acesta, deoarece acest lucru depinde de performanțele echipelor în sezonul regulat și în playoff-uri. Cu toate acestea, în funcție de performanțele lor din sezoanele anterioare și de achizițiile făcute în această perioadă de transferuri, unele echipe care ar putea ajunge în World Series sunt Los Angeles Dodgers, New York Yankees, Houston Astros, Atlanta Braves sau Tampa Bay Rays.
ron.Rep_En: It's hard to predict who will play in the World Series this year, as it depends on the teams' regular season and playoff performances, but based on their performance in previous seasons and the acquisitions made during this transfer window, some teams that could make it to the World Series are the Los Angeles Dodgers, New York Yankees, Houston Astros, Atlanta Braves, and Tampa Bay Rays.

rus.Qst: кто будет играть в мировой серии в этом году
rus.Rep: Я не могу точно ответить на этот вопрос, так как мировая серия в разных спортах проходит каждый год и участники могут меняться. Если вы уточните, о каком спорте и годе идет речь, я смогу дать более конкретный ответ.

eng.Qst: where is the ground tissue located in plants
eng.Rep: The ground tissue is located in the interior of the plant, between the vascular tissue and the epidermis. It makes up the majority of the plant's body and is responsible for functions such as photosynthesis, storage, and support. The ground tissue is composed of three types of cells: parenchyma, collenchyma, and sclerenchyma.
