ckb.Qst: لە کوێدا شانەی زەوی لە ڕووەکەکاندا هەیە؟
ckb.Rep: بەڵام ناتوانم بەشێوەیەکی دەقی بەکارببێم بۆ وەرگرتنی شانەی زەوی لە ڕووەکەکان. لە هەرچەندی کە دەستتان بە شانەی زەوی هەیە، دەتوانین بە بەکارهێنانی وێبسایتەکانی شانەی زەوی، وەک https://www.zawyaso.org/، بەردەوام بە کاریگەری شانەی زەوی بکەین.
ckb.Rep_En: But I can't use text formatting to get the ground shoots from the plants. Even if you have a ground shoot, we can use the ground shoot websites, like https: www.zawyaso.org, to keep the ground shoot effect going.

cmn.Qst: 植物中的地面组织位于哪里
cmn.Rep: 植物中的地面组织位于根、茎和叶的表面以下，负责植物的支撑、传输水分和养分，以及进行光合作用和呼吸作用。地面组织包括表皮组织、根皮层、根质层、茎皮层、韧皮层、木质部、髓部和叶肉组织等。
cmn.Rep_En: Ground tissue in plants is located below the surface of the roots, stems, and leaves, and is responsible for supporting the plants, transporting moisture and nutrients, and for photosynthesis and respiration. Ground tissue includes epidermal tissue, root bark, root layer, stem bark, tendon bark, wood bark, myelin, and leaf tissue.

cmn_Hant.Qst: 植物中的地面组织位于哪里
cmn_Hant.Rep: 植物中的地面组织位于根、茎和叶的表面以下，负责植物的支撑、传输水分和养分，以及进行光合作用和呼吸作用。地面组织包括表皮组织、根皮层、根质层、茎皮层、韧皮层、木质部、髓部和叶肉组织等。
cmn_Hant.Rep_En: Ground tissue in plants is located below the surface of the roots, stems, and leaves, and is responsible for supporting the plant, transporting moisture and nutrients, and for photosynthesis and respiration. Ground tissue includes epidermal tissue, root bark, root layer, stem bark, tendon bark, wood bark, marrow, and leaf tissue.

cym.Qst: Lle mae'r meinweau daear yn y planhigion
cym.Rep: Mae'r meinweau daear yn y planhigion yn y ddaear, yn cynnwys'r rhizosphere, y mesosphere, y stratosphere, a'r lithosphere. Mae'r rhizosphere yn ymwneud â'r rhyngweithio rhwng planhigion a'r microbau sy'n byw yn y ddaear. Mae'r mesosphere yn ymwneud â'r haen o'r ddaear sy'n cynnwys ymwneud â'r microbau sy'n byw yn y ddaear. Mae'r stratosphere yn ymwneud â'r haen o'r ddaear sy'n cynnwys yr awyr a'r niwl. Mae'r lithosphere yn ymwneud â'r haen o'r ddaear sy'n cynnwys y creigiau a'r gwres y tu mewn i'r ddaear. Mae'r meinweau daear yn bwysig iawn i fywyd y planhigion, gan eu bod yn darparu'r cyflwr daearol a'r maeth y maent eu hangen i fyw.
cym.Rep_En: The Earth's crust is made up of the layers of the atmosphere (rhysosphere, stratosphere, mesosphere, and lithosphere), which are the layers of the earth's crust that are responsible for the life of plants and the environment in which they live.

dan.Qst: hvor er jordvæv placeret i planter
dan.Rep: Jordvæv eller rødder er normalt placeret under jorden i planter. De er ansvarlige for at absorbere vand og næringsstoffer fra jorden og transportere dem til resten af planten. Rødderne kan variere i størrelse og form afhængigt af plantens art og miljømæssige faktorer.
dan.Rep_En: The roots are located under the soil and are responsible for absorbing water and nutrients from the soil and transporting them to the rest of the plant.The roots can vary in size and shape depending on the plant's species and environmental factors.

deu.Qst: wo sich das Bodengewebe in Pflanzen befindet
deu.Rep: Das Bodengewebe in Pflanzen befindet sich in der Wurzel. Die Wurzel besteht aus verschiedenen Gewebeschichten, darunter das Wurzelgewebe, das sich direkt an der Wurzelspitze befindet und für die Aufnahme von Wasser und Nährstoffen aus dem Boden verantwortlich ist. Das Wurzelgewebe besteht aus verschiedenen Zelltypen, darunter Epidermiszellen, Rindenparenchymzellen und Endodermiszellen. Zusammen bilden sie das Bodengewebe der Pflanze.
deu.Rep_En: The soil tissue in plants is located in the root. The root consists of various tissue layers, including the root tissue, which is located directly at the root tip and is responsible for the absorption of water and nutrients from the soil. The root tissue consists of different cell types, including epidermal cells, cortical parenchyma cells and endodermal cells.

ell.Qst: όπου βρίσκεται ο ιστός της γης στα φυτά
ell.Rep: Ο ιστός της γης στα φυτά αναφέρεται στο υπέδαφος στο οποίο αναπτύσσονται οι ρίζες των φυτών. Ο ιστός αυτός περιλαμβάνει διάφορα στρώματα όπως τοπικό υπέδαφος, υπόστρωμα και βαθύ υπέδαφος, και επηρεάζει την ανάπτυξη και την υγεία των φυτών. Επίσης, ο ιστός της γης περιέχει σημαντικά στοιχεία όπως νερό, θρεπτικά συστατικά και μικροοργανισμούς που επηρεάζουν την ανάπτυξη των φυτών.
ell.Rep_En: The soil tissue in plants refers to the subsoil in which the roots of plants grow. This soil tissue includes various layers such as local soil, subsoil and deep soil, and affects the growth and health of plants.

est.Qst: kus on põrandakoe asukoht taimedes
est.Rep: Põrandakoe asukoht taimedes on tavaliselt juurte lähedal, kuna see on koht, kus toitained ja vesi imenduvad taimede juurte kaudu. Põrandakoe võib olla erineva sügavusega sõltuvalt taime tüübist ja kasvutingimustest. Mõned taimed vajavad sügavamat põrandakoe asukohta, samas kui teised saavad hakkama madalama asukohaga. Oluline on tagada, et taimedel oleks piisavalt põrandakoe sügavust, et nad saaksid kasvada ja areneda tervislikult.
est.Rep_En: The root system of a plant is usually located near the roots, as this is where nutrients and water are absorbed by the roots of the plant.The root system can vary in depth depending on the type of plant and the growing conditions.Some plants need a deeper root system, while others can cope with a shallower one.It is important to ensure that the plants have enough root system depth to grow and develop healthily.

fin.Rep: Maaperän kudos sijaitsee kasvien juurissa. Juuret imevät vettä ja ravinteita maaperästä, ja maaperän kudos auttaa säilyttämään kosteutta ja ravinteita juurten ympärillä. Tämä auttaa kasveja kasvamaan terveiksi ja vahvoiksi.
fin.Rep_En: The soil tissue is located in the roots of plants, the roots absorb water and nutrients from the soil, and the soil tissue helps to retain moisture and nutrients around the roots, which helps plants to grow healthy and strong.

fra.Qst: où se trouve le tissu du sol dans les plantes
fra.Rep: Le tissu du sol dans les plantes se trouve dans les racines. Les racines sont responsables de l'absorption de l'eau et des nutriments du sol, ainsi que de la fixation de la plante dans le sol. Le tissu du sol est également appelé rhizoderme ou épiderme racinaire, et il est constitué de cellules spécialisées qui facilitent l'absorption des nutriments et de l'eau.
fra.Rep_En: The soil tissue in plants is found in the roots. The roots are responsible for absorbing water and nutrients from the soil, as well as fixing the plant in the soil. The soil tissue is also called rhizoderm or root epidermis, and it is made up of specialized cells that facilitate the absorption of nutrients and water.

glg.Qst: O tecido da terra está localizado nas plantas.
glg.Rep: Na verdade, o tecido da terra é uma camada do solo que é composta por matéria orgânica em decomposição, microrganismos e nutrientes. Esse tecido é fundamental para a fertilidade do solo e para o crescimento saudável das plantas. Embora as plantas sejam importantes para a formação do solo, elas não são o tecido da terra em si.
glg.Rep_En: In fact, the soil tissue is a layer of soil that is composed of decomposing organic matter, microorganisms and nutrients. This tissue is fundamental to soil fertility and healthy plant growth. Although plants are important for soil formation, they are not the soil tissue itself.

guj.Qst: જ્યાં જમીન પેશીઓ છોડમાં સ્થિત છે
guj.Rep: જ્યાં જમીન પેશીઓ છોડમાં સ્થિત છે, તેમાં કૃષિ કરવાની સાધનો અને સંસાધનો ઉપલબ્ધ હોય છે. જેમાં જમીનની ફેરફાર કરવા માટે ખેતીના સાધનો જેવા ટ્રેક્ટર, કાર્યાળય, ખેતીના ઉપકરણો વગેરે ઉપલબ્ધ હોય છે. તેમાં પાણીની સાધનો જેવા કુંડા, ટ્યુબવેલ, પંપ વગેરે પણ ઉપલબ્ધ હોય છે. તેથી જો તમે ખેતી કરવા માંગતા હોઈતા હોવ તો તમારી જમીનની પેશીઓ પર નજર રાખવી જોઈએ અને તેમને ઉપયોગી સાધનો અને સંસાધનોને ધ્યાનમાં લેવાની જરૂર છે.
guj.Rep_En: The soil is a mixture of organic and inorganic materials, such as soil, soil, and soil, and the soil is used for agriculture, agriculture, and agriculture.The soil is also a mixture of organic and inorganic materials, such as soil, soil, and soil.

heb.Qst: היכן נמצא הרקמה הקרקעית בצמחים?
heb.Rep: הרקמה הקרקעית בצמחים נמצאת בין הקרקע לבין השורשים. היא מהווה את השכבה העליונה של הקרקע ומכילה מקורות מים ומינרלים הנחוצים לצמח. הרקמה הקרקעית משמשת גם כמקור לחומרים אורגניים ומסייעת לצמח להתחבר לקרקע ולקבל את המזון והמים שהוא צריך כדי לגדול ולהתפתח.
heb.Rep_En: The ground tissue in plants is located between the soil and the roots. It is the top layer of the soil and contains the water and minerals needed by the plant. The ground tissue also serves as a source of organic matter and helps the plant to connect to the ground and receive the food and water it needs to grow and develop.

hin.Qst: जहां जमीनी ऊतक पौधों में स्थित है
hin.Rep: जमीनी ऊतक पौधों में स्थित होते हैं। ये ऊतक पौधों के रोटोटों, जड़ों, डंठलों, पत्तों और फलों में पाए जाते हैं। ये ऊतक पौधों के विभिन्न अंगों की संरचना और कार्यों के लिए जिम्मेदार होते हैं। जमीनी ऊतक पौधों को पोषण, विकास और संवर्धन में मदद करते हैं।
hin.Rep_En: The plant tissues are located in the root system, stems, leaves, and fruits of plants, and are responsible for the structure and function of various plant organs.The plant tissues help the plant to grow, grow, and reproduce.

hrv.Qst: gdje se nalazi zemaljsko tkivo u biljkama
hrv.Rep: Zemaljsko tkivo u biljkama nalazi se u korijenu. To je složeni sustav korijena koji se sastoji od različitih vrsta tkiva, uključujući epidermalno tkivo, kortikalno tkivo, endodermalno tkivo i ksilemno i floemno tkivo. Ova tkiva omogućuju biljci da apsorbira vodu i hranjive tvari iz tla, te da ih prenosi kroz biljno tijelo.
hrv.Rep_En: The root system of a plant is a complex system of roots that consists of different types of tissues, including epidermal tissue, cortical tissue, endodermal tissue, and xylem and phloem tissue.

hun.Qst: ahol a talajszövet található a növényekben
hun.Rep: A talajszövet a növények gyökerein található. A gyökerek a talajba nőnek, és a talajszövet segítségével veszik fel a víz és a tápanyagokat a növény számára. A talajszövet a gyökerek külső rétege, amely vékony sejtfalakkal borított sejtekből áll. Ez a réteg védi a gyökereket a károsodástól és segíti a víz és a tápanyagok felszívódását.
hun.Rep_En: Soil tissue is found in the roots of plants. The roots grow into the soil, and with the help of the soil tissue, they absorb water and nutrients for the plant. The soil tissue is the outer layer of the roots, which consists of cells covered with thin cell walls. This layer protects the roots from damage and helps the absorption of water and nutrients.

hye.Qst: Որտեղ է գտնվում հողի հյուսվածքը բույսերում:
hye.Rep: Հողի հյուսվածքը գտնվում է բույսերում այնպես, որ այն մեծ մասնակից կազմված է բույսերի այլ մասերից: Հողի հյուսվածքը կարող է գտնվել բույսերի ամբողջ բաղադրիչներում, ինչպես նաև բույսերի այլ մասերում, ինչպես դարձնում է բույսերի կենսաբանական մասը:
hye.Rep_En: Soil tissue is found in plants in such a way that it is largely composed of other parts of plants. Soil tissue can be found in all components of plants as well as in other parts of plants, as it makes up the biological part of plants.

ind.Qst: di mana jaringan tanah terletak di tanaman
ind.Rep: Jaringan tanah terletak di bawah tanah, di antara akar tanaman. Jaringan tanah terdiri dari berbagai jenis organisme seperti bakteri, jamur, cacing tanah, dan serangga yang hidup di dalam tanah dan berperan penting dalam menjaga kesehatan tanah dan pertumbuhan tanaman. Jaringan tanah juga mengandung nutrisi penting seperti nitrogen, fosfor, dan kalium yang diserap oleh akar tanaman untuk tumbuh dan berkembang dengan baik.
ind.Rep_En: The soil tissue is located underground, between the roots of plants, and is composed of a variety of organisms such as bacteria, fungi, earthworms, and insects that live in the soil and play an important role in maintaining soil health and plant growth.

isl.Qst: hvar er jarðvef í plöntum
isl.Rep: Jarðvef er algengur í plöntum og er staðsettur í rótum þeirra. Jarðvef er gerður úr lífrænum efnum eins og mold, humus og lífrænum leifum, sem eru brotin niður af bakteríum og öðrum lífverum sem búa í jörðinni. Jarðvef er mikilvægur fyrir plöntur til að fá næringu og vatn, og einnig til að styðja við rætur þeirra og vernda þær gegn skemmdum.
isl.Rep_En: Soil tissue is common in plants and is located in their roots. Soil tissue is made up of organic matter such as mold, humus, and organic residues, which are broken down by bacteria and other organisms that live in the soil. Soil tissue is important for plants to get nutrients and water, as well as to support their roots and protect them from damage.

ita.Qst: dove si trova il tessuto di base nelle piante
ita.Rep: Il tessuto di base, anche chiamato tessuto parenchimatico, si trova nelle piante principalmente nella zona centrale del fusto e delle radici. Questo tessuto è costituito da cellule vivaci e poco specializzate, che svolgono funzioni di sostegno, di accumulo di sostanze di riserva e di trasporto di acqua e nutrienti. Il tessuto di base è presente anche nelle foglie, dove svolge principalmente funzioni di fotosintesi e di accumulo di sostanze di riserva.
ita.Rep_En: The parenchyma is found in plants mainly in the central area of the stem and roots, and is composed of vivid, little specialized cells that perform support functions, such as the accumulation of reserve substances and the transport of water and nutrients.

jav.Qst: Ing ngendi jaringan lemah dumunung ing tanduran
jav.Rep: Bahasa yang Anda gunakan mungkin bahasa Jawa. Namun, saya tidak dapat memahami artinya. Bisakah Anda memberikan terjemahan atau menjelaskan lebih lanjut tentang apa yang ingin Anda tanyakan? Saya akan berusaha membantu sebaik mungkin.
jav.Rep_En: The language you use may be Javanese, but I can't understand its meaning. Can you give me a translation or a more detailed explanation of what you want to ask? I will try to help as much as possible.

jpn.Qst: 植物の地面組織はどこにあるのか
jpn.Rep: 植物の地面組織は、根と茎の間にある部分で、根毛や根の先端、茎の表面、葉の裏面などに存在します。この地面組織は、植物の栄養吸収や水分吸収、物質の輸送、支持、保護などの重要な役割を果たしています。
jpn.Rep_En: The ground tissue of a plant is found between the roots and the stem, in the root hairs, at the ends of the roots, on the surface of the stem, in the leaves, etc. This ground tissue plays an important role in the absorption of nutrients and moisture, the transport, support and protection of substances in the plant.

kan.Qst: ನೆಲದ ಅಂಗಾಂಶವು ಸಸ್ಯಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ಎಲ್ಲಿ ಇದೆ?
kan.Rep: ನೆಲದ ಅಂಗಾಂಶವು ಸಸ್ಯಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ರೆಂದರೆ ರೆಂಡು ಭಾಗಗಳಿವೆ - ಮೂಲಭಾಗ ಮತ್ತು ಮೂಲಭಾಗದ ಕೆಳಗಿನ ಭಾಗ (ರೂಟ್ ಸಿಸ್ಟಮ್) ಮತ್ತು ಮೂಲಭಾಗದ ಮೇಲಿನ ಭಾಗ (ಶಾಖಾ ಸಿಸ್ಟಮ್). ಮೂಲಭಾಗವು ಸಸ್ಯದ ಕೆಳಗೆ ಇರುವ ಭಾಗವಾಗಿದೆ ಮತ್ತು ನೆಲದಿಂದ ನೀರು ಮತ್ತು ಪೋಷಕಾಂಶಗಳನ್ನು ಹೀರುತ್ತದೆ. ಶಾಖಾ ಸಿಸ್ಟಮ್ ಸಸ್ಯದ ಮೇಲಿನ ಭಾಗವಾಗಿದೆ ಮತ್ತು ಹವಾಮಾನದ ಪೋಷಕಾಂಶಗಳನ್ನು ಹೀರುತ್ತದೆ.
kan.Rep_En: The root system is the part of the plant that is below the root and the upper part of the root system. The root system is the part of the plant that is below the root and absorbs water and nutrients from the ground. The branch system is the upper part of the plant and absorbs nutrients from the weather.

kat.Qst: სად არის მიწის ქსოვილი მცენარეებში?
kat.Rep: მიწის ქსოვილი მცენარეებში არ არის, რადგან მიწა არის პლანეტა, ხოლო მცენარეები არიან მიწის მიერ დამკვიდრებული ასევე სხვა პლანეტების მიერ.
kat.Rep_En: There is no soil tissue in plants, because the soil is a planet, and plants are deposited by the soil and by other planets.

khm.Qst: តើ សាច់ដុំ ដី នៅ ក្នុង រុក្ខជាតិ មាន នៅ កន្លែង ណា?
khm.Rep: សាច់ដុំដីមាននៅក្នុងរុក្ខជាតិប្រទេសចិន។ វាមានទីតាំងនៅក្នុងតំបន់បាល់ទាត់កណ្ដាល នៅក្នុងស្រុកសំរោងសាន់ដែលមានឈ្មោះថា សាច់ដុំ។
khm.Rep_En: The earthworm is found in Chinese flora. It is located in the central plains in the province of Shanxi, called the earthworm.

kir.Qst: Жер ткандарынын өсүмдүктөрдө жайгашкан жери
kir.Rep: Көптөгөн жер ткандарынын өсүмдүктөрү жайгашкан жерлерди жайгаштыруу үчүн жеткиликтүү жер топтому жана жер түрүнүн түрлөрүнө караганда, жер топтому жайгашкан жерлерди тандап, жер түрүнүн өзүнөн кийинкилерге караганда жер топтому жайгашкан жерлерди түзөтүү мүмкүн. kor.Qst: 식물에서 지상 조직이 어디에 위치하고 있는지
kor.Rep: 식물에서 지상 조직은 뿌리와 대조적으로 지상에 위치한 조직입니다. 이 조직은 줄기, 잎, 꽃, 열매 등을 형성하며, 광합성과 호흡 등의 대사 활동을 수행합니다. 지상 조직은 뿌리와 함께 식물의 생장과 생존에 매우 중요한 역할을 합니다.
kor.Rep_En: In plants, the ground tissue is the tissue that lies on the ground in contrast to the roots, forming stems, leaves, flowers, fruits, etc., and performing metabolic activities such as photosynthesis and respiration.The ground tissue, along with the roots, plays a very important role in the growth and survival of the plant.

lao.Qst: ວິທີການທີ່ເນື້ອເຍື່ອພື້ນດິນຢູ່ໃນພືດ
lao.Rep:
ພື້ນດິນແມ່ນສະຫຼຸບຜູ້ທີ່ຈະສະແດງຄວາມສຳພັນຫຼາຍກວ່າພື້ນດິນທີ່ມີຢູ່ໃນພືດທີ່ສຸດທ້າຍ. ພື້ນດິນສາມາດເປີດໃນການສະແດງຄວາມສຳພັນຂອງຜູ້ທີ່ສະແດງຄວາມນີ້ໄດ້ທີ່ສຸດທ້າຍຫຼືການສະແດງຄວາມສຳພັນຂອງຜູ້ທີ່ສະແດງຄວາມນີ້ສາມາດສະແດງກັບຜູ້ອື່ນໆທີ່ມີການສະແດງຄວາມສຳພັນຫຼາຍກວ່າພື້ນດິນທີ່ມີຢູ່ໃນພືດທີ່ສຸດທ້າຍ.

lit.Qst: kur yra žemės audiniai augaluose
lit.Rep: Žemės audiniai augaluose yra šaknys, stiebai, lapai, gėlės ir vaisiai. Šaknys yra požeminiai augalo organai, kurie sugeria vandenį ir mineralus iš dirvožemio. Stiebai yra virš žemės augalo dalys, kurios palaiko lapus ir gėles bei perduoda vandenį ir maistines medžiagas iš šaknų į lapus ir gėles. Lapai yra augalo organai, kurie atlieka fotosintezę ir gamina maistines medžiagas augalui. Gėlės yra augalo reprodukciniai organai, kurie gamina sėklas. Vaisiai yra augalo reprodukciniai organai, kurie apsaugo sėklas ir padeda joms išsiskirti.
lit.Rep_En: The roots, stems, leaves, flowers, and fruits of plants are the underground organs of the plant that absorb water and minerals from the soil. The stems are the above-ground parts of the plant that support the leaves and flowers and transmit water and nutrients from the roots to the leaves and flowers. The flowers are the organs of the plant that perform photosynthesis and produce nutrients.

lvs.Qst: kur augos atrodas zemzemes audums
lvs.Rep: Zemzemes audums auga zemē, kur augalų saknes var sasniegt augšējos augsnes slāņus, kas satur mitrumu, barības vielas un skābekli. Zemzemes audums var augti gan dabiski, gan arī audzētāju veidotās augsnēs, piemēram, podos vai dārza gultnēs.
lvs.Rep_En: Ground tissue grows in soils where the roots of plants can reach the upper layers of soil containing moisture, nutrients, and fats. Ground tissue can grow both naturally and in soils created by growers, such as pots or garden beds.

mai.Qst: जमीनी ऊतक कहाँ स्थित है
mai.Rep: मैं इस सवाल का जवाब देने में सक्षम नहीं हूँ क्योंकि आपने यह नहीं बताया है कि आप किस जमीन की ऊतक के बारे में जानना चाहते हैं। कृपया अपना सवाल स्पष्ट करें ताकि मैं आपकी मदद कर सकूं।

mar.Qst: जमिनीवर असलेल्या ऊती वनस्पतींमध्ये आढळतात.
mar.Rep: मला तुमच्या संदेशात दिलेली माहिती असं वाटतंय की जमिनीवर असलेल्या ऊती वनस्पतींमध्ये काही आढळलं आहे. तुम्ही या विषयात अधिक माहिती देण्यासाठी विस्तृत तपशील द्या तो मला उत्तर देण्यास मदत करेल.

mkd.Qst: каде се наоѓа ткивото на земјата во растенијата
mkd.Rep: Ткивото на земјата во растенијата се наоѓа во коренот и во деловите на стеблото кои го пренесуваат хранливите материи од коренот до листовите и другите делови на растението. Ова ткиво се нарекува ксилем и флоем. Ксилемот е одговорен за преносот на вода и минерали, додека флоемот ги пренесува хранливите материи.
mkd.Rep_En: The soil tissue in plants is found in the root and in the parts of the stem that carry nutrients from the root to the leaves and other parts of the plant. This tissue is called the xylem and the phloem. The phloem is responsible for the transport of water and minerals, while the phloem carries the nutrients.

mlt.Qst: fejn jinsab it-tessut tal-art fil-pjanti
mlt.Rep: Il-ħajja fil-pjanti tibda fil-ġermija, fejn il-bijiet jibdew jinbnew u jibdew jikbru. Wara dan, il-pjanti jibdew jinbnew it-tessut tal-art permezz taċ-ċelluli tal-ġisem tal-pjanta. Dan ifisser li it-tessut tal-art jinsab fil-pjanti taħt il-ħaxix u l-fjuri. Il-pjanti jibdew jinżlu l-ilma u l-nutrimenti mill-art permezz tal-ġisem tal-pjanta, li jgħin biex jinżlu l-enerġija mill-fotoni tal-ħaxix permezz tal-fotosintiżi.
mlt.Rep_En: The plant life begins in the germ, where the tissues begin to build and grow, and then the plant tissue begins to build through the cells of the plant body, meaning that the tissue of the plant body is underneath the plants and flowers, and the plants begin to absorb water and nutrients from the plant body through photosynthesis.

nld.Qst: waar bevindt het grondweefsel zich in planten
nld.Rep: Het grondweefsel bevindt zich in de wortels, stengels en bladeren van planten. Het is het weefsel dat verantwoordelijk is voor het opslaan van voedingsstoffen en water, en het transporteren van deze stoffen door de plant. Het grondweefsel bestaat uit verschillende soorten cellen, waaronder parenchymcellen, collenchymcellen en sclerenchymcellen.
nld.Rep_En: The ground tissue is found in the roots, stems, and leaves of plants. It is the tissue responsible for storing nutrients and water, and transporting these substances through the plant. The ground tissue consists of several types of cells, including parenchymal cells, collenchymal cells, and sclerenchymal cells.

nno.Qst: der er grunnvevet plassert i planter
nno.Rep: Ja, grunnvevet er en av de tre hovedtypene av vev som finnes i planter. Det er det mest vanlige vevet og utgjør størstedelen av plantens kropp. Grunnvevet består av celler som har ulike funksjoner, som for eksempel å lagre næringsstoffer, utføre fotosyntese eller støtte planten. Grunnvevet er også ansvarlig for å transportere vann og næringsstoffer gjennom planten.
nno.Rep_En: The basal tissue is one of the three main types of tissue found in plants. It is the most common tissue and makes up the majority of a plant's body. The basal tissue consists of cells that have different functions, such as storing nutrients, carrying out photosynthesis or supporting the plant. The basal tissue is also responsible for transporting water and nutrients through the plant.

nob.Qst: hvor er bunnvevet plassert i planter
nob.Rep: Bunnvevet i planter er plassert i roten. Roten er en del av planten som vokser ned i jorden og fungerer som en støtte for planten, samt tar opp vann og næringsstoffer fra jorden. Bunnvevet i roten består av celler som er spesialisert for å utføre disse funksjonene.
nob.Rep_En: The root is a part of the plant that grows down into the soil and acts as a support for the plant, as well as absorbing water and nutrients from the soil.

npi.Qst: जहाँ जमिनको ऊतक बिरुवाहरूमा अवस्थित छ
npi.Rep: मैले आफ्नो समझमा यो वाक्य अर्थात् "जहाँ जमीनको ऊतक बिरुवाहरूमा अवस्थित छ" यो नेपाली भाषामा अर्थात् "जहाँ जमीन के उत्तक बिरुवाहरु में स्थित हैं" हो। यो वाक्य अर्थात् जहाँ जमीनको ऊतक बिरुवाहरूमा स्थित छन् त्यहाँ विभिन्न प्रकारको वनस्पति, जनावर र अन्य जीव जन्तुहरु पाइन्छन्।
npi.Rep_En: As I understand it, this sentence means "where the tissue of the soil is located in the plants". It means in Nepali language "where the soil is located in the plants". This sentence means that where the tissue of the soil is located in the plants, there are different types of plants, animals and other living things.

pbt.Qst: د ځمکې نسجونه په نباتاتو کې ځای په ځای شوي
pbt.Rep: ممکنه د نسجونو په نباتاتو کې ځای په ځای شوي وي، دا به د نباتاتو د چمتو کوونکو په ځایونو او د ځمکې د توپیر کوونکو په ځایونو سم وړاندیز وي. دا هم وړاندیز شوي چې د نسجونو د چمتو کوونکو په ځایونو او د توپیر کوونکو په ځایونو داخلي وړاندیزونه په کارولو کې موثر او دقیق وي.
pbt.Rep_En: It is also suggested that internal recommendations at tissue provider locations and differentiator locations be efficient and accurate in use.

pes.Qst: کجا بافت زمین در گیاهان قرار دارد
pes.Rep: بافت زمین در گیاهان در قسمت ریشه قرار دارد. این بافت شامل سلول‌هایی است که به عنوان بافت اصلی ریشه شناخته می‌شوند و وظیفه جذب آب و مواد مغذی را دارند. بافت زمین شامل سلول‌هایی با دیواره‌های نازک و بدون کلروپلاست است که برای جذب آب و مواد مغذی به سطح بیرونی ریشه نزدیک می‌شوند.
pes.Rep_En: The ground tissue in plants is located in the root section. This tissue includes cells that are known as the main tissue of the root and are responsible for absorbing water and nutrients. The ground tissue includes cells with thin walls and no chloroplast that approach the outer surface of the root to absorb water and nutrients.

pol.Qst: gdzie znajduje się tkanka gruntowa w roślinach
pol.Rep: Tkanka gruntowa (zwana także tkanką podstawową) znajduje się wewnątrz rośliny, między innymi między warstwą epidermy a warstwą kory pierwotnej. Tkanka ta wypełnia przestrzenie między innymi tkankami i organami rośliny, pełniąc funkcję podpory i magazynowania substancji zapasowych.
pol.Rep_En: The basal tissue (also called the basal tissue) is located inside the plant, between the epidermis and the primary cortex, and fills the space between the other tissues and organs of the plant, acting as a support and storage of reserve substances.

por.Qst: onde está localizado o tecido da terra nas plantas
por.Rep: O tecido da terra, também conhecido como tecido radicular, está localizado nas raízes das plantas. Esse tecido é responsável pela absorção de água e nutrientes do solo, além de fixar a planta no solo.
por.Rep_En: The soil tissue, also known as the root tissue, is located in the roots of plants and is responsible for absorbing water and nutrients from the soil, as well as fixing the plant in the soil.

ron.Qst: unde se află țesutul de bază în plante
ron.Rep: Țesutul de bază în plante se află în interiorul organelor vegetative, cum ar fi tulpina, frunzele și rădăcinile. Acesta este format din celule vii, care sunt responsabile pentru susținerea și întreținerea plantelor. În plus, țesutul de bază este implicat în transportul substanțelor nutritive și apei în întreaga plantă.
ron.Rep_En: The base tissue in plants is located inside the vegetative organs, such as the stem, leaves, and roots, and is made up of living cells that are responsible for sustaining and maintaining plants.

rus.Qst: где находится грунтовая ткань в растениях
rus.Rep: Грунтовая ткань (корневая ткань) находится в корнях растений. Она состоит из различных типов клеток, таких как эпидермис, корневая капсула, корневая кортикальная ткань, центральный цилиндр и ксилема. Грунтовая ткань играет важную роль в поглощении воды и питательных веществ из почвы, а также в удержании растения в почве.
rus.Rep_En: The root tissue is found in the roots of plants and consists of various types of cells, such as the epidermis, root capsule, root cortical tissue, central cylinder, and xylem.The root tissue plays an important role in absorbing water and nutrients from the soil, as well as in retaining the plant in the soil.

slk.Qst: kde sa nachádza zemné tkanivo v rastlinách
slk.Rep: Zemné tkanivo sa nachádza v koreňoch rastlín. Toto tkanivo tvorí väčšinu koreňového systému a slúži na absorpciu vody a minerálnych látok z pôdy. Okrem toho zemné tkanivo tiež udržuje rastlinu stabilnú v pôde a umožňuje jej rásť a rozvíjať sa.
slk.Rep_En: The plant's roots are the most important part of the root system, absorbing water and minerals from the soil, and keeping the plant stable and growing.

slv.Qst: kje se na rastlinah nahaja zemeljsko tkivo
slv.Rep: Zemeljsko tkivo se nahaja v koreninah rastlin. To je plast celic, ki obdaja notranjost korenine in je odgovoren za absorpcijo vode in hranil iz tal. Zemeljsko tkivo je pomemben del rastline, saj omogoča rast in razvoj korenin ter zagotavlja potrebne hranilne snovi za rast in razvoj celotne rastline.
slv.Rep_En: The plant's root system is made up of a layer of cells that surround the root system and are responsible for absorbing water and nutrients from the soil.The plant's root system is an important part of the plant, as it allows the growth and development of the roots and provides the necessary nutrients for the growth and development of the entire plant.

spa.Qst: donde se encuentra el tejido de la tierra en las plantas
spa.Rep: El tejido de la tierra en las plantas se encuentra en las raíces. Las raíces son las estructuras de las plantas que se encargan de absorber agua y nutrientes del suelo para que la planta pueda crecer y desarrollarse adecuadamente. El tejido de la tierra en las raíces está compuesto por células especializadas llamadas células del suelo o células radiculares, que tienen la capacidad de absorber los nutrientes y el agua del suelo y transportarlos hacia el resto de la planta.
spa.Rep_En: The soil tissue in plants is found in the roots. The roots are the structures of plants that are responsible for absorbing water and nutrients from the soil so that the plant can grow and develop properly. The soil tissue in the roots is composed of specialized cells called soil cells or radicular cells, which have the ability to absorb nutrients and water from the soil and transport them to the rest of the plant.

srp.Qst: где се ткиво на земљи налази у биљкама
srp.Rep: Целокупна површина земље покривена је биљкама, а њихово семе и споре се налазе у земљи. У биљкама, семе је најчешће смештено у плодовима или капсулама, које падају на земљу када се отворе. Споре се налазе у спорангијама, које се налазе на донјој страни листова или на другим деловима биљке. Када споре отпадну, оне падају на земљу и тамо се налазе док не настане одговарајући услов за њихов раст и развој.
srp.Rep_En: The entire surface of the earth is covered with plants, and their seeds and spores are found in the soil. In plants, seeds are most commonly located in fruits or capsules, which fall to the ground when opened. Spores are found in sporangia, which are located on the underside of leaves or other parts of the plant. When the spores are lost, they fall to the ground and remain there until the right conditions for their growth and development arise.

swe.Qst: var är grundvävnad i växter
swe.Rep: Grundvävnad i växter är den primära vävnaden som bildar växtens kropp. Den består av tre huvudtyper av celler: parenkymceller, kollenchymceller och sklerenkymceller. Parenkymceller är den vanligaste typen av celler i grundvävnaden och är involverade i fotosyntes, lagring av näringsämnen och gasutbyte. Kollenchymceller ger stöd och flexibilitet åt växten, medan sklerenkymceller ger hårdhet och skydd. Grundvävnaden finns i alla delar av växten, inklusive stammen, bladen, rötterna och frukten.
swe.Rep_En: The plant's primary tissue is the parenchyma, which is made up of three main types of cells: parenchyma, collenchyma, and sclerchyma.Parenchyma cells are the most common type of cell in the plant's tissue and are involved in photosynthesis, nutrient storage, and gas exchange.Collenchyma cells provide support and flexibility to the plant, while sclerchyma cells provide hardness and protection.

swh.Qst: ambapo ni tishu ya ardhi iko katika mimea
swh.Rep:
Tishu ya ardhi inayopatikana katika mimea ni pamoja na:

1. Mizizi - hii ni tishu inayopatikana chini ya ardhi ambayo hufanya kazi ya kusaidia mimea kushikamana na ardhi na kupata virutubisho.

2. Shina - hii ni tishu inayopatikana juu ya ardhi ambayo hufanya kazi ya kusaidia mimea kusimama imara na kusafirisha maji na virutubisho kutoka kwenye mizizi kwenda kwenye majani.

3. Majani - hii ni tishu inayopatikana juu ya ardhi ambayo hufanya kazi ya kusaidia mimea kupata nishati kutoka kwa jua na kufanya photosynthesis.

4. Matunda - hii ni tishu inayopatikana kwenye mimea ambayo hufanya kazi ya kusaidia mimea kueneza mbegu zao.

5. Mbegu - hii ni tishu inayopatikana kwenye mimea ambayo hufanya kazi ya kusaidia mimea kueneza mbegu zao na kuzalisha mimea mipya.
swh.Rep_En:
The soil tissue found in plants includes:
1. Roots - these are underground tissues that help plants to attach to the soil and obtain nutrients.
2. Shina - this is the tissue found on the ground that helps the plants to stand firm and transport water and nutrients from the roots to the leaves.
3. Leaves - this is a tissue found on the ground that helps plants get energy from the sun and do photosynthesis.
4. Fruit - this is the tissue found in plants that helps the plants to spread their seeds.
5. Seeds - this is the tissue found in plants that helps plants to propagate their seeds and produce new plants.

tel.Qst: మొక్కలలో నేల కణజాలం ఎక్కడ ఉంది
tel.Rep: మొక్కలలో నేల కణజాలం ప్రాముఖ్యంగా ప్రదేశాల్లో ఉంటాయి. ప్రతి ప్రదేశంలో వేరు వేరు కణజాలాలు ఉంటాయి. మీరు ఎక్కడ ఉందన్నారో తెలుసుకోవడానికి మీ ప్రదేశంలో ఉన్న సర్వే డిపార్ట్‌మెంట్ లో సమాచారం అడ్డగించండి.

tgk.Rep: Ман наметавонам точики бисёрӣ берам, лекин агар шумо мехоҳед дар бораи бофтаҳои заминӣ дар рستаҳо маълумот гиред, ман метавонам шумораи маводро барои шумо таъмин кунам.

tgl.Qst: Kung saan matatagpuan ang ground tissue sa mga halaman
tgl.Rep: Ang ground tissue ay matatagpuan sa loob ng mga halaman, kasama ng vascular tissue at dermal tissue. Ito ay nasa gitna ng mga halaman at nagbibigay ng suporta, naglalaman ng mga selula para sa photosynthesis, at nagtataglay ng mga selula para sa storage ng nutrients. Ang mga halimbawa ng mga selula sa ground tissue ay parenchyma, collenchyma, at sclerenchyma.
tgl.Rep_En: The cell membrane is the outer layer of the cell membrane, which is the part of the cell membrane that is responsible for photosynthesis, cell division, and cell division.The cell membrane is made up of the parenchyma, collenchyma, and sclerenchyma.

tha.Qst: ที่ไหนเป็นเนื้อเยื่อพื้นที่อยู่ในพืช
tha.Rep: เนื้อเยื่อพื้นที่ในพืชอยู่ในส่วนของต้นและใบ โดยเฉพาะอย่างยิ่งในเซลล์ที่เรียกว่าเซลล์พื้นฐาน (parenchyma cells) ซึ่งเป็นเซลล์ที่มีหน้าที่เก็บและสร้างอาหาร และเซลล์ที่เรียกว่าเซลล์เลื่อน (collenchyma cells) ซึ่งมีหน้าที่รองรับและยืดหยุ่นให้กับพืชในขณะที่พืชเติบโต นอกจากนี้ยังมีเนื้อเยื่อพื้นที่อื่นๆ เช่น เนื้อเยื่อส่วนกลาง (pith) ในต้นข้าวโพด และเนื้อเยื่อเส้นใย (fibers) ในใบพืชบางชนิด เป็นต้น
tha.Rep_En: The plant tissue is composed of the parenchyma cells, which are responsible for storing and producing nutrients, and the collagen cells, which are responsible for supporting and supporting the plant as it grows.

tur.Qst: yer dokusu bitkilerde nerede bulunur
tur.Rep: Bitkilerin yapısında yer alan dokuların çeşitleri vardır. Yer dokusu, bitkilerin kök, gövde ve yapraklarında bulunur. Yer dokusu, bitkinin toprakla olan ilişkisini sağlar ve bitkinin su ve mineralleri almasına yardımcı olur. Ayrıca bitkinin mekanik desteğini de sağlar.
tur.Rep_En: The plant's tissues are found in the roots, stems, and leaves of plants, and they provide the plant with water and minerals.

ukr.Qst: де знаходиться грунтова тканина в рослинах
ukr.Rep: Грунтова тканина (також відома як коренева тканина) знаходиться в коренях рослин. Вона складається з трьох типів тканин: епідермісу, коркової тканини та центральної циліндричної тканини. Епідерміс знаходиться на зовнішній поверхні кореня і захищає його від зовнішніх факторів. Коркова тканина знаходиться під епідермісом і забезпечує зберігання води та поживних речовин. Центральна циліндрична тканина знаходиться в середині кореня і містить провідні тканини, які переносять воду та поживні речовини вгору до стебла та листя.
ukr.Rep_En: The root of a plant is the central cylindrical tissue, which is made up of three types of tissues: the epidermis, the cortical tissue, and the central cylindrical tissue.The epidermis is located on the outer surface of the root and protects it from external factors.The cortical tissue is located under the epidermis and provides water and nutrients.

vie.Qst: nơi mô mặt đất nằm trong thực vật
vie.Rep: Mô mặt đất là một phần của hệ thống thực vật trên trái đất. Nó bao gồm các loại đất, đá, đá vôi, cát, đất sét và các loại vật liệu khác trên bề mặt trái đất. Mô mặt đất cũng chứa các loại thực vật như cây cối, cỏ, hoa và các loại thực vật khác. Các loại thực vật này phát triển trên mô mặt đất và cung cấp năng lượng cho các sinh vật khác trên trái đất.

yue.Qst: 植物嘅地面組織係邊度?
yue.Rep: 植物的地面组织是指植物体的根、茎和叶等器官的组织，它们分别位于植物的地下、地上和空气中。根是植物的地下器官，主要负责吸收水分和养分；茎是植物的地上器官，主要负责支撑和输送水分和养分；叶是植物的空气器官，主要负责光合作用和气体交换。因此，植物的地面组织分布在整个植物体内。
yue.Rep_En: The root system of a plant refers to the organs of the plant, such as the roots, stems, and leaves, which are located underground in the plant and in the air. The root system is the plant's underground organ, which is mainly responsible for absorbing moisture and nutrients; the stem system is the plant's ground organ, which is mainly responsible for photosynthesis and gas exchange.

zlm.Qst: di mana tisu tanah terletak dalam tumbuhan
zlm.Rep: Tisu tanah atau akar terletak di bawah tanah pada tumbuhan. Akar berfungsi untuk menyerap air dan nutrisi dari tanah, serta menopang tumbuhan agar tetap tegak.
zlm.Rep_En: The soil tissue or roots are located underground on the plant. The roots serve to absorb water and nutrients from the soil, as well as support the plant to remain upright.

afr.Qst: Die enigste soort gewas wat meer gewild is as sojabone in die Verenigde State is

ary.Qst: بس اشنو النوع من المحاصيل الأكثر شعبية من فول الصويا في الولايات المتحدة
ary.Rep:
يعتبر فول الصويا من المحاصيل الأكثر شعبية في الولايات المتحدة، ويستخدم على نطاق واسع في الصناعات الغذائية والزراعية. ومن بين الأصناف الأكثر شعبية من فول الصويا في الولايات المتحدة:

1- فول الصويا العضوي
2- فول الصويا المعالج بالحرارة
3- فول الصويا المعالج بالضغط
4- فول الصويا المعالج بالمذيبات
5- فول الصويا المعالج بالميكروويف

وتستخدم هذه الأصناف في صناعة الأغذية المختلفة مثل الحليب الصويا، واللحوم الصويا، والصلصات، والعصائر، والحبوب المحمصة، والمكسرات المحمصة، والعديد من المنتجات الأخرى.
ary.Rep_En:

bel.Qst: толькі які тып культуры больш папулярны, чым соевыя бабы ў Злучаных Штатах
bel.Rep: Я не маю права на выказванне асобістага меркавання, але магу сказаць, што ў Злучаных Штатах існуюць розныя тыпы культуры, якія маюць сваю папулярнасць. Напрыклад, музыкальныя жанры, такія як поп, рок, хіп-хоп і кантры, з'яўляюцца даволі папулярнымі. Таксама ў ЗША ёсць шмат кіно- і тэлесерыяльных студый, якія ствараюць фільмы і шоу, якія маюць вялікую папулярнасць у свеце. Аднак, як і ў любой краіне, ёсць розныя культурныя традыцыі і групы, якія маюць сваю адмысловасць і папулярнасць.
bel.Rep_En: I'm not going to go into the details, but I do know that there are different kinds of culture in the United States, and there are different kinds of cultures that are popular, and there are different kinds of music genres, like pop, rock, hip-hop, and country music, that are quite popular, and there are a lot of movie and TV studios that make movies and shows that are very popular in the world.

ben.Qst: কোন ধরনের ফসল মার্কিন যুক্তরাষ্ট্রে সয়াবিনের চেয়ে বেশি জনপ্রিয়?
ben.Rep: মার্কিন যুক্তরাষ্ট্রে বেশি জনপ্রিয় ফসলগুলি হল গম, জুট, সরগম, মেজবান ফসল (যেমন মাংস, ডেয়রি পণ্য এবং অন্যান্য খাদ্য পণ্য) এবং সবুজ শাকসবজি। এই ফসলগুলি মার্কিন যুক্তরাষ্ট্রে বিভিন্ন উপকারিতা এবং বাজার মূল্য প্রদর্শন করে।
ben.Rep_En: The most popular crops in the United States are wheat, barley, rye, maize, and other food crops, as well as green vegetables, which have different benefits and market values in the United States.

bos.Qst: Samo koja vrsta usjeva je popularnija od soje u Sjedinjenim Državama?
bos.Rep: U Sjedinjenim Državama, kukuruz je najpopularniji usjev, slijede ga pšenica, soja, pamuk i druge kulture. Međutim, soja je vrlo važna kultura u SAD-u, jer se koristi za proizvodnju hrane za životinje, ulja, mlijeka od soje, tofu-a i drugih proizvoda. Također se koristi kao zeleno gnojivo za poboljšanje kvalitete tla.
bos.Rep_En: In the United States, corn is the most popular crop, followed by wheat, soybeans, cotton, and other crops.However, soybeans are a very important crop in the United States because they are used to produce animal feed, oil, soy milk, tofu, and other products.

bul.Qst: само кой вид култура е по-популярен от соята в Съединените щати
bul.Rep: В Съединените щати, културата на говеждото месо е по-популярна от соята. Говеждото месо е често използвано в американската кухня и е съставна част от много традиционни ястия като бургери, стейкове и гриловани ястия. Въпреки това, соята също е популярна в Съединените щати и се използва в много вегетариански и вегански ястия.
bul.Rep_En: In the United States, beef culture is more popular than soybeans, and beef is commonly used in American cuisine and is a staple of many traditional dishes such as burgers, steaks, and grilled meals.

cat.Qst: Quin tipus de cultiu és més popular que la soja als Estats Units?
cat.Rep: El cultiu més popular als Estats Units és el blat de moro (maís). És un cultiu important per a la producció d'aliments per a animals, biocombustibles i també per a la producció d'aliments per a consum humà. Altres cultius populars als Estats Units inclouen el blat, la poma de terra, el cotoner i el blat de moro dolç.
cat.Rep_En: The most popular crop in the United States is corn, an important crop for animal feed, biofuels, and food production for human consumption.Other popular crops in the United States include wheat, potatoes, cotton, and sweet corn.

ceb.Qst: Ang mga tanom nga adunay daghang mga produkto nga mas popular kaysa sa mga soybean sa Estados Unidos
ceb.Rep:
Sa Estados Unidos, mayroong maraming mga tanim na mas popular kaysa sa soybean. Narito ang ilan sa mga ito:

1. Corn (Mais) - Ang mais ay isa sa pinakamalaking tanim sa Estados Unidos at ginagamit ito sa paggawa ng maraming produkto tulad ng mais na tinapay, mais na tortilla, at mais na tsips.

2. Wheat (Trigo) - Ang trigo ay ginagamit sa paggawa ng tinapay, pasta, at iba pang mga produktong pagkain.

3. Potatoes (Patatas) - Ang patatas ay ginagamit sa paggawa ng french fries, mashed potatoes, at iba pang mga produktong pagkain.

4. Tomatoes (Kamatis) - Ang kamatis ay ginagamit sa paggawa ng ketchup, salsa, at iba pang mga produktong pagkain.

5. Apples (Mga mansanas) - Ang mga mansanas ay ginagamit sa paggawa ng apple juice, apple sauce, at iba pang mga produktong pagkain.

6. Grapes (Ubas) - Ang mga ubas ay ginagamit sa paggawa ng wine, raisins, at iba pang mga produktong pagkain.

7. Soybeans (Soybean) - Bagaman hindi ito ang pinakapopular na tanim sa Estados Unidos, ang soybean ay ginagamit sa paggawa ng tofu, soy milk, at iba pang mga produktong pagkain.
ceb.Rep_En:
In the United States, there are many plants that are more popular than soybeans. Here are some of them:
1. Corn - Corn is one of the largest crops in the United States and is used to make many products such as cornbread, corn tortillas, and corn chips.
2. Wheat - Wheat is used in the manufacture of bread, pasta, and other food products.
3. Potatoes - Potatoes are used in the production of French fries, mashed potatoes, and other food products.
4. Tomatoes - Tomatoes are used in the production of ketchup, sauces, and other food products.
5. Apples - Apples are used in the production of apple juice, apple sauce, and other food products.
6. Grapes - Grapes are used to make wine, raisins, and other food products.
7. Soybeans - Although not the most popular crop in the United States, soybeans are used to make tofu, soy milk, and other food products.

ces.Qst: jen který typ plodiny je populárnější než sója ve Spojených státech
ces.Rep: V USA jsou populárnější než sója například kukuřice, pšenice, bavlna a tabák.
ces.Rep_En: In the United States, corn, wheat, cotton, and tobacco are more popular than soybeans.

ckb.Qst: ئەو جۆرە کشتوکاڵە کە لە ئەمریکا زۆرتر لە سۆیای بەناوبانگە
ckb.Rep: بەشێوەیەکی گشتی، کشتوکاڵەکانی ئەمریکا لە سۆیای بەناوبانگە زۆرترن لە کشتوکاڵەکانی باشووری ئەوروپا هەیە. ئەمەش بەهۆی زانیارییەکانی باشووری ئەوروپا و ئەو کۆمپانیاکانی کە لەوانەیە کار دەکات لەوانەیە کە لە ئەمریکا هەبوون. بەشێوەیەکی تایبەت، کشتوکاڵەکانی ئەمریکا لە سۆیای بەناوبانگە زۆرترن لە کشتوکاڵەکانی بەرزترین دۆزیەکانی دنیا هەیە، و ئەوەیە کە زۆرترین کۆمپانیاکانی کشتوکاڵی ئەمریکا لەوانەیە کار دەکات.
ckb.Rep_En: In general, American soybean farms are larger than those in southern Europe, due to the knowledge of southern Europeans and the companies that may be operating in the United States. In particular, American soybean farms are larger than the world's largest soybean farms, and are probably the largest U.S. agricultural companies.

cmn.Qst: 哪种作物在美国比大豆更受欢迎?
cmn.Rep: 在美国，玉米是比大豆更受欢迎的作物之一。玉米是美国最重要的农作物之一，用于生产食品、饲料、工业原料和生物燃料等。此外，小麦、棉花、甜菜和马铃薯等作物也在美国广泛种植。
cmn.Rep_En: In the United States, corn is one of the most popular crops, compared to soybeans. Corn is one of the most important crops in the United States, used to produce food, feed, industrial raw materials and biofuels. In addition, crops such as wheat, cotton, cabbage and horseradish are also widely grown in the United States.

cmn_Hant.Qst: 哪些种子比大豆更受欢迎? - 豆类
cmn_Hant.Rep:
除了大豆，其他受欢迎的豆类种子包括：

1. 黄豆：与大豆相似，黄豆也是一种高蛋白、低脂肪的豆类，含有丰富的营养物质，如维生素、矿物质和纤维素。

2. 绿豆：绿豆是一种低热量、高纤维的豆类，含有丰富的蛋白质、维生素和矿物质，常用于制作甜品和汤。

3. 赤豆：赤豆也是一种高蛋白、低脂肪的豆类，含有丰富的营养物质，如维生素、矿物质和纤维素，常用于制作甜品和汤。

4. 黑豆：黑豆是一种富含蛋白质、纤维素和抗氧化物质的豆类，有助于降低胆固醇和血糖，常用于制作汤和炒菜。

5. 红豆：红豆是一种富含蛋白质、纤维素和矿物质的豆类，有助于降低胆固醇和血糖，常用于制作甜品和汤。

这些豆类种子都是营养丰富、易于消化和吸收的食物，可以作为健康饮食的重要组成部分。
cmn_Hant.Rep_En:
In addition to soybeans, other popular bean seeds include:
1. Beans: Similar to soybeans, beans are high in protein and low in fat, and are rich in nutrients such as vitamins, minerals, and fiber.
Green beans: Green beans are low-calorie, high-fiber beans rich in protein, vitamins, and minerals, commonly used in desserts and soups.
Red beans: Red beans are also a high-protein, low-fat bean that is rich in nutrients such as vitamins, minerals and fiber, and is commonly used to make desserts and soups.
4. Black beans: Black beans are rich in protein, fiber, and antioxidants that help lower cholesterol and blood sugar, and are commonly used in soups and stews.
5. Red beans: Red beans are a type of bean rich in protein, fiber, and minerals that help lower cholesterol and blood sugar, and are commonly used in desserts and soups.
These beans are nutritious, easily digestible and absorbed foods that can be an important part of a healthy diet.

cym.Qst: Mae'r math hwn o gynnyrch yn fwy poblogaidd na'r math o ffrwythau soya yn yr Unol Daleithiau.
cym.Rep: Mae'n wir bod y math hwn o gynnyrch, sef ffrwythau a blodau Acai, yn fwy poblogaidd nag yw ffrwythau soya yn yr Unol Daleithiau. Mae'r ffrwythau Acai yn cael eu hysbrydoli gan y diwydiant bwyd naturiol a'r diwydiant fitnes, ac maent yn cael eu hysbrydoli fel bwyd iachusol a chynnyrch bwydol. Mae'r ffrwythau Acai yn cynnwys nifer o fathau o fitaminau, mwynau, asidau amino, a seleriwm, ac maent yn cael eu hysbrydoli fel bwyd iachusol a chynnyrch bwydol. Mae'r ffrwythau soya hefyd yn cynnwys nifer o fathau o fitaminau, mwynau, asidau amino, a seleriwm, ond maent yn cael eu defnyddio'n bennaf fel cynnyrch bwydol a chynnyrch llaeth.
cym.Rep_En: The fruit is a hybrid of a variety of fruits and vegetables, including the sweet potato, the sweet potato, the sweet potato, the sweet potato, the sweet potato, the sweet potato, the sweet potato, the sweet potato, the sweet potato, the sweet potato, the sweet potato, the sweet potato, the sweet potato, the sweet potato.

dan.Qst: kun hvilken type afgrøde er mere populær end sojabønner i USA
dan.Rep: I USA er majs den mest populære afgrøde, efterfulgt af sojabønner og hvede. Andre populære afgrøder inkluderer bomuld, ris, kartofler og grøntsager som tomater og salat.
dan.Rep_En: In the United States, corn is the most popular crop, followed by soybeans and wheat.Other popular crops include cotton, rice, potatoes, and vegetables such as tomatoes and lettuce.

deu.Qst: nur welche Art von Ernte ist beliebter als Sojabohnen in den Vereinigten Staaten
deu.Rep: Mais (engl. corn) ist die beliebteste Ernte in den Vereinigten Staaten. Es wird auf mehr als 90 Millionen Acres angebaut und ist ein wichtiger Bestandteil der amerikanischen Landwirtschaft. Mais wird für eine Vielzahl von Produkten verwendet, einschließlich Tierfutter, Ethanol, Lebensmittel und Industrieprodukte.
deu.Rep_En: Corn is the most popular crop in the United States, grown on more than 90 million acres and is an important part of American agriculture.Corn is used for a variety of products, including food, ethanol, animal products, and industry.

ell.Qst: μόνο ποιο είδος καλλιέργειας είναι πιο δημοφιλές από τη σόγια στις Ηνωμένες Πολιτείες
ell.Rep: Η καλλιέργεια που είναι πιο δημοφιλής από τη σόγια στις Ηνωμένες Πολιτείες είναι το καλαμπόκι (corn). Το καλαμπόκι είναι η πιο καλλιεργούμενη καλλιέργεια στις Ηνωμένες Πολιτείες και χρησιμοποιείται για πολλούς σκοπούς, όπως για την παραγωγή τροφίμων, καυσίμων και ζωοτροφών.
ell.Rep_En: The most popular crop in the United States is corn, which is the most widely grown crop in the United States and is used for many purposes, such as food, fuel, and feed.

est.Qst: mis on Ameerika Ühendriikides populaarsem põllukultuur kui sojaubad
est.Rep: Ameerika Ühendriikides on mais kõige populaarsem põllukultuur. Maisi kasvatatakse laialdaselt kogu riigis ning seda kasutatakse toiduks, loomasöödaks, biokütuseks ja paljudes muudes tööstusharudes. Kuigi sojaoad on ka oluline põllukultuur, on mais siiski populaarsem.
est.Rep_En: In the United States, corn is the most popular crop, widely grown throughout the country and used for food, animal feed, biofuels, and many other industries.

fin.Qst: Mikä viljelykasvi on suositumpi kuin soijapavut Yhdysvalloissa?
fin.Rep: Maissi on suositumpi viljelykasvi kuin soijapavut Yhdysvalloissa. Maissi on yksi Yhdysvaltojen tärkeimmistä viljelykasveista, jota käytetään monissa eri tuotteissa, kuten elintarvikkeissa, rehuissa ja biopolttoaineissa. Soijapavut ovat myös tärkeitä viljelykasveja Yhdysvalloissa, mutta niiden viljelyala on pienempi kuin maissin.
fin.Rep_En: Maize is one of the most important crops in the United States, used in many products, such as food, feed, and biofuels.Maize is also an important crop in the United States, but its cultivation area is smaller than that of maize.

fra.Qst: seul quel type de culture est plus populaire que le soja aux États-Unis
fra.Rep: Le maïs est plus populaire que le soja aux États-Unis. Le maïs est l'une des cultures les plus importantes aux États-Unis, avec une production annuelle de plus de 350 millions de tonnes. Il est utilisé pour l'alimentation humaine et animale, ainsi que pour la production de biocarburants et d'autres produits industriels. Le soja est également une culture importante aux États-Unis, mais sa production annuelle est inférieure à celle du maïs.
fra.Rep_En: Corn is one of the most important crops in the United States, with an annual production of more than 350 million tons. It is used for human and animal food, as well as for the production of biofuels and other industrial products. Soybean is also an important crop in the United States, but its annual production is lower than that of corn.

glg.Qst: O que é o cultivo máis popular do que a soia nos Estados Unidos?
glg.Rep: O cultivo mais popular nos Estados Unidos é o milho. Ele é cultivado em grande escala em todo o país e é usado para uma variedade de fins, incluindo alimentação animal, produção de etanol e fabricação de produtos alimentícios. Embora a soja seja um importante cultivo nos Estados Unidos, o milho é cultivado em uma quantidade muito maior.
glg.Rep_En: The most popular crop in the United States is corn, which is grown on a large scale throughout the country and is used for a variety of purposes, including animal feed, ethanol production, and food manufacturing.

guj.Qst: યુનાઇટેડ સ્ટેટ્સમાં સોયાબીન કરતાં વધુ લોકપ્રિય પાક કયા પ્રકારનો છે?
guj.Rep: સોયાબીન એક પ્રકારનો પ્રોટીન છે જે સોયાબીન પાકને મુખ્ય કારણે બનાવે છે. સોયાબીન માંથી બનાવેલા પાક વધુ લોકપ્રિય છે કારણ કે તેમાં પ્રોટીન અને ફાઇબર હોય છે જે સ્વસ્થ ખાદ્ય પસંદ કરનાર લોકો માટે મહત્વપૂર્ણ છે. સોયાબીન પાક વેજિટેરિયન અને વેગન લોકો માટે પસંદગીનો પણ એક કારણ હોવાનું શક્ય છે.
guj.Rep_En: Soybeans are a major source of protein for the soybean crop.Crops made from soybeans are more popular because they contain protein and fiber, which are important for people who prefer healthy foods. Soybeans may also be a source of choice for vegetarians and vegans.

heb.Qst: רק איזה סוג של יבול הוא פופולרי יותר מאשר סויה בארצות הברית
heb.Rep: בארצות הברית, יבול הפופולרי ביותר הוא תירס. תירס הוא יבול חשוב לייצור בירה וספיריטים, וגם משמש כמזון לבעלי חיים. סויה גם נחשבת לייבול חשוב בארצות הברית, אך היא לא כה פופולרית כמו תירס.
heb.Rep_En: In the United States, the most popular crop is corn. Corn is an important crop for producing beer and spirits, and is also used as animal food. Soybeans are also considered an important crop in the United States, but they are not as popular as corn.

hin.Qst: केवल संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिका में सोयाबीन की तुलना में किस प्रकार की फसल अधिक लोकप्रिय है
hin.Rep: केवल संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिका में, कॉर्न और गेहूं सोयाबीन की तुलना में अधिक लोकप्रिय हैं। इन दो फसलों को अमेरिकी कृषि उत्पादन का एक बड़ा हिस्सा माना जाता है।
hin.Rep_En: In the United States alone, corn and wheat are more popular than soybeans, and these two crops account for a large portion of U.S. agricultural production.

hrv.Qst: Samo koja vrsta usjeva je popularnija od soje u Sjedinjenim Državama?
hrv.Rep: U Sjedinjenim Državama, kukuruz je najpopularniji usjev, slijede ga pšenica, soja, pamuk i druge kulture. Međutim, soja je vrlo važna kultura u SAD-u, jer se koristi za proizvodnju hrane za životinje, ulja, mlijeka od soje, tofu-a i drugih proizvoda. Također se koristi kao zeleno gnojivo za poboljšanje kvalitete tla.
hrv.Rep_En: In the United States, corn is the most popular crop, followed by wheat, soybeans, cotton, and other crops.However, soybeans are a very important crop in the United States, as they are used to produce animal feed, oil, soy milk, tofu, and other products.

hun.Qst: Csak melyik növényfaj népszerűbb, mint a szójabab az Egyesült Államokban?
hun.Rep: Az Egyesült Államokban a kukorica a legnépszerűbb növényfaj, amelyet széles körben termesztenek és felhasználnak az élelmiszeriparban, az állattenyésztésben és az iparban is.
hun.Rep_En: In the United States, corn is the most popular crop, widely grown and used in the food industry, animal husbandry, and industry.

hye.Qst: Ո՞ր մշակաբույսն է ավելի տարածված, քան սոյան ԱՄՆ-ում
hye.Rep: ԱՄՆ-ում ավելի տարածված մշակաբույսներից մեկն է հեռանկարների մշակումը: Հեռանկարները ավելի տարածված են, քան այլ մշակաբույսներ, քանի որ դրանք համակարգչային սարքերի հետ կապված են: Այդպիսի մշակաբույսները ավելի տարածված են ամենաշատ օգտագործվող սարքերից մեկն է:
hye.Rep_En: In the United States, one of the more common crops is the cultivation of prospects. Prospects are more common than other crops because they are associated with computer devices. Such crops are more common than other devices.

ind.Qst: hanya jenis tanaman mana yang lebih populer daripada kedelai di Amerika Serikat
ind.Rep: Beberapa jenis tanaman yang lebih populer daripada kedelai di Amerika Serikat antara lain jagung, gandum, kentang, tomat, kacang polong, kacang merah, kacang hijau, bawang putih, bawang bombay, dan sayuran hijau seperti bayam dan selada. Namun, kedelai masih menjadi tanaman penting di Amerika Serikat karena digunakan sebagai bahan baku untuk berbagai produk makanan dan minuman seperti susu kedelai, tahu, tempe, dan saus kedelai.
ind.Rep_En: Some of the more popular crops in the United States include corn, wheat, potatoes, tomatoes, beans, red beans, green beans, garlic, onions, and green vegetables such as spinach and lettuce, but soybeans are still important in the United States because they are used as raw materials for various food and beverage products such as soy milk, tofu, tempeh, and soy sauce.

isl.Qst: Hver tegund af ræktun er vinsælli en sojabönur í Bandaríkjunum?
isl.Rep: Úrvalsþáttur af ræktun sem er vinsæll í Bandaríkjunum er ræktun á kálfrænum (microgreens). Þessi ræktun er mjög vinsæl í matreiðslu og er oft notað sem garnýr í réttum. Kálfræn eru lítil græn blöð sem eru ræktað úr fræjum af mismunandi grænmeti eins og t.d. brokkoli, rófum, rauðrófum og tómötum. Þessi ræktun er vinsæl vegna þess að hún er mjög næringarrík og hefur góðan bragð.
isl.Rep_En: The most popular variety of cabbage grown in the United States is the microgreen cabbage, which is very popular in cooking and is often used as a garnish in dishes.

ita.Qst: solo quale tipo di coltura è più popolare della soia negli Stati Uniti
ita.Rep: La coltura più popolare negli Stati Uniti dopo la soia è il mais (o mais dolce). Il mais è una coltura molto importante negli Stati Uniti, utilizzato per alimentazione animale, produzione di biocarburanti e come ingrediente in molti prodotti alimentari.
ita.Rep_En: The most popular crop in the United States after soy is corn (or sweet corn), which is a very important crop in the United States, used for animal feed, biofuel production, and as an ingredient in many food products.

jav.Qst: Apa jinis panen sing luwih populer tinimbang kedelai ing Amerika Serikat?
jav.Rep: Di Amerika Serikat, beberapa jenis panen yang lebih populer daripada kedelai antara lain jagung, gandum, kacang-kacangan, kentang, tomat, apel, stroberi, dan anggur. Namun, kedelai masih menjadi salah satu tanaman penting di Amerika Serikat karena digunakan sebagai bahan baku untuk berbagai produk makanan dan minuman seperti susu kedelai, tahu, tempe, dan saus kedelai.
jav.Rep_En: In the United States, some crops are more popular than soybeans, including corn, wheat, beans, potatoes, tomatoes, apples, strawberries, and grapes.However, soybeans are still an important crop in the United States because they are used as ingredients for various food and beverage products such as soy milk, tofu, tempeh, and soy sauce.

jpn.Qst: どの種がアメリカで大豆より人気があるのか? - ライブドアニュース
jpn.Rep:
アメリカで大豆より人気がある種は、主に以下のものが挙げられます。

1. コーン（トウモロコシ）
2. 小麦
3. ジャガイモ
4. トマト
5. キャベツ
6. レタス
7. オート麦
8. 大麦
9. ライ麦
10. ピーナッツ

これらの作物は、アメリカの食文化に欠かせないものであり、多くの食品や飲料の原料としても利用されています。ただし、大豆もアメリカでは重要な作物の一つであり、多くの食品や飲料に利用されています。
jpn.Rep_En:
The most popular varieties in the United States are mainly the following:
1. Corn (maize)
Two, wheat.

Eight, wheat.

It's a little bit of a stretch, but it's a little bit of a stretch.

kan.Qst: ಅಮೆರಿಕಾ ಸಂಯುಕ್ತ ಸಂಸ್ಥಾನದಲ್ಲಿ ಸೋಯಾಬೀನ್ಗಳಿಗಿಂತ ಹೆಚ್ಚು ಜನಪ್ರಿಯವಾದ ಬೆಳೆಗಳ ಪೈಕಿ ಒಂದು.

kir.Qst: Соядан башка кайсы өсүмдүк кеңири таралган?
kir.Rep:
Кеңири таралган өсүмдүктөрдүн бир нече себеби болушу мүмкүн. Бул себептердин биринчиси, өсүмдүктөрдүн жеткиликтүү жерде жашыруу керек. Кеңири таралган өсүмдүктөр жашыруу үчүн жер топтомунун тузулушу жана жердеги суунун жеткиликтүү болушу керек. 

Башка себептер арасында, өсүмдүктөрдүн жеткиликтүү жерде жашыруу үчүн жеткиликтүү жер топтомунун тузулушу жана жердеги суунун жеткиликтүү болушу керек. Кеңири таралган өсүмдүктөрдүн башка себептери арасында жердин кереметтигине караб, жердеги кеңирилердин жайлымдары мен жердеги башка жандардын жайлымдары да кеңири таралуунун себеби болушу мүмкүн. 

Өсүмдүктөрүң кеңири таралуу көзөмөлүнөн кыймылдатуу үчүн, жер топтомунун тузулушу мен жердеги суунун жеткиликтүү болушу керек. Жердин кереметтиги мен жердеги кеңирилердин жайлымдары мен жердеги башка жандардын жайлымдары да кеңири таралуунун себеби болушу мүмкүн.

nld.Qst: Alleen welk soort gewas is populairder dan sojabonen in de Verenigde Staten
nld.Rep: Maïs is het meest populaire gewas in de Verenigde Staten, gevolgd door sojabonen op de tweede plaats. Maïs wordt verbouwd voor verschillende doeleinden, waaronder voedselproductie, veevoer en biobrandstoffen. Het is een belangrijk gewas voor de Amerikaanse economie en wordt op grote schaal geteeld in verschillende regio's van het land.
nld.Rep_En: Corn is the most popular crop in the United States, followed by soybeans in second place.Corn is grown for various purposes, including food production, animal feed, and biofuels.It is an important crop for the American economy and is widely grown in various regions of the country.

nno.Qst: berre hvilken type avling er mer populær enn sojabønner i USA
nno.Rep: Mais er en avling som er mer populær enn sojabønner i USA. Mais er en av de mest dyrkede avlingene i USA og brukes til alt fra dyrefôr til bioetanolproduksjon. Andre avlinger som er mer populære enn sojabønner i USA inkluderer hvete, bomull og poteter.
nno.Rep_En: Corn is a crop that is more popular than soybeans in the United States. Corn is one of the most widely cultivated crops in the United States and is used for everything from animal feed to bioethanol production. Other crops that are more popular than soybeans in the United States include wheat, cotton, and potatoes.

nob.Qst: bare hvilken type avling er mer populær enn sojabønner i USA
nob.Rep: Mais er den mest populære avlingen i USA, etterfulgt av soyabønner og hvete.
nob.Rep_En: Corn is the most popular crop in the United States, followed by soybeans and wheat.

npi.Qst: यो एक मात्र फसल हो जुन संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिकामा सोयाबीन भन्दा बढी लोकप्रिय छ।
npi.Rep: मलाई थाहा छ कि तपाईंले ठीक भन्नुभएको छ। तपाईंले ठीक भन्नुभएको फसल हो जुन संयुक्त राज्य अमेरिकामा सोयाबीन भन्दा बढी लोकप्रिय छ। तपाईंले यो फसल माथि अधिक जानकारी प्राप्त गर्न चाहनु हुन्छ भने, तपाईंले अमेरिकी कृषि विभागको वेबसाइटमा जान सक्नुहुन्छ। त्यहाँ तपाईंले यो फसलको विवरण, उत्पादन तथा बिक्री सम्बन्धी जानकारीहरू प्राप्त गर्न सक्नुहुन्छ।
npi.Rep_En: I know you're right. You're right. It's a crop that's more popular in the United States than soybeans. If you want more information about this crop, you can go to the U.S. Department of Agriculture website, where you can find information about this crop, production and sales.

pbt.Qst: د دې محصولاتو څخه یو چې په متحده ایالاتو کې د سویا لوبیا څخه ډیر مشهور دی.
pbt.Rep: د سویا لوبیا د متحده ایالاتو کې په ډېرې محصولاتو کې یکی دی. دا لوبیا د ډله، کابلی، مونتانا، نبراسکا، نیوجرسی، نیومکزیکو، نارتھ کارولینا، نارتھ ډاکوتا، او وایومنګ په وخت کې کاشت کیږي. دا لوبیا د سالانہ محصولاتو لړونی کې د ډېرې مهمې څرګندويې په حصار کې دی، او دا هم د ډېرې غذاوي محصولاتو کې په کارول کې به کار می‌آید. د سویا لوبیا د ډېرې طریقونو ته به کار می‌آید، دغه لوبیا په خوراکو، سالادو، پکوانو، او دیگر ډګرې کې به کار می‌آید.
pbt.Rep_En: Soybeans are one of the most important crops in the United States. They are grown in the states of Kentucky, Kentucky, Montana, Nebraska, New Jersey, New Mexico, North Carolina, North Dakota, and Wyoming. They are among the most important crops in the annual crop list, and they will be used in many food products.

pes.Qst: تنها کدام نوع محصول در ایالات متحده محبوب تر از سویا است؟
pes.Rep: به طور کلی، گوشت قرمز (گاو و گوسفند) در ایالات متحده بیشتر مصرف می شود. اما سویا نیز به عنوان یک منبع پروتئین گیاهی محبوب است و در بسیاری از محصولات غذایی مانند شیرینی، نان، تنقلات و غیره استفاده می شود. همچنین، محصولات سویا مانند توفو، سویا میلک و سویا سس نیز در بازار آمریکا محبوبیت دارند.
pes.Rep_En: Red meat (beef and sheep) is the most widely consumed meat in the United States, but soybeans are also popular as a source of plant protein and are used in many food products such as sweets, breads, snacks, etc. Also, soy products such as tofu, soy milk, and soy sauce are also popular in the US market.

pol.Qst: Tylko który rodzaj uprawy jest bardziej popularny niż soja w Stanach Zjednoczonych
pol.Rep: W Stanach Zjednoczonych najbardziej popularnym rodzajem uprawy jest kukurydza (corn). Jest to jedna z najważniejszych roślin uprawnych w USA, która jest wykorzystywana do produkcji m.in. pasz dla zwierząt, biopaliw oraz produktów spożywczych.
pol.Rep_En: The most popular crop in the United States is corn, one of the most important crops in the United States, which is used to produce animal feed, biofuels and food products.

por.Qst: apenas qual tipo de colheita é mais popular do que a soja nos Estados Unidos
por.Rep: O milho é a colheita mais popular nos Estados Unidos, superando a soja em termos de área plantada e produção. O milho é usado para uma variedade de fins, incluindo alimentação animal, produção de etanol e fabricação de produtos alimentícios.
por.Rep_En: Corn is the most popular crop in the United States, surpassing soybeans in terms of planted area and production, and is used for a variety of purposes, including animal feed, ethanol production, and food manufacturing.

ron.Qst: Doar ce tip de recoltă este mai populară decât soia în Statele Unite
ron.Rep: Porumbul este cea mai populară recoltă în Statele Unite, fiind cultivat pe o suprafață mai mare decât orice altă cultură. În 2019, s-au cultivat aproximativ 96 de milioane de acri de porumb în Statele Unite, comparativ cu aproximativ 76 de milioane de acri de soia.
ron.Rep_En: Corn is the most popular crop in the United States, being grown on a larger area than any other crop.In 2019, about 96 million acres of corn were grown in the United States, compared to about 76 million acres of soybeans.

rus.Qst: только какой тип урожая более популярен, чем соевые бобы в Соединенных Штатах
rus.Rep: В Соединенных Штатах самым популярным типом урожая являются зерновые культуры, такие как кукуруза, пшеница и ячмень. Они выращиваются на больших площадях и используются для производства многих продуктов, включая корм для животных, пищевые продукты и топливо. Кроме того, такие культуры, как хлопок, картофель и томаты, также являются популярными в США.
rus.Rep_En: In the United States, the most popular crop type is cereal crops such as corn, wheat, and barley, which are grown on large plots and used to produce many products, including animal feed, food, and fuel, as well as crops such as cotton, potatoes, and tomatoes.

slk.Qst: len ktorý typ plodiny je populárnejší ako sója v Spojených štátoch
slk.Rep: V Spojených štátoch je populárnejšou plodinou ako sója kukurica. Kukurica je najväčšou plodinou v USA a používa sa na mnoho účelov, vrátane krmiva pre zvieratá, výroby biopalív a potravín pre ľudí. Sója je druhou najväčšou plodinou v USA a používa sa najmä na výrobu krmív pre zvieratá a potravín pre ľudí.
slk.Rep_En: In the United States, soybeans are the most popular crop after corn, and are used for many purposes, including animal feed, biofuels, and food for humans.

slv.Qst: samo katera vrsta pridelka je bolj priljubljena kot sojine fižol v Združenih državah
slv.Rep: Sojini fižol veljajo za enega najbolj priljubljenih pridelkov v Združenih državah. Soja se uporablja za proizvodnjo številnih izdelkov, vključno z mlekom, tofuom, sojino omako, sojinimi kosmiči in drugimi prehranskimi izdelki. Poleg tega se sojini fižol uporabljajo tudi kot krma za živino in druge živali. Zato je soja pomemben pridelkov v Združenih državah.
slv.Rep_En: Soybeans are considered one of the most popular crops in the United States. Soybeans are used to produce a number of products, including milk, tofu, soy sauce, soybean meal and other food products. In addition, soybeans are also used as feed for livestock and other animals.

spa.Qst: sólo qué tipo de cultivo es más popular que la soja en los Estados Unidos
spa.Rep: El maíz es el cultivo más popular en los Estados Unidos, seguido por la soja. El maíz se cultiva en una gran cantidad de estados y se utiliza para una variedad de productos, desde alimentos para animales hasta biocombustibles y productos alimenticios para humanos.
spa.Rep_En: Corn is the most popular crop in the United States, followed by soybeans. Corn is grown in a large number of states and is used for a variety of products, from animal feed to biofuels and food products for humans.

srp.Qst: само која врста усева је популарнија од соје у Сједињеним Државама
srp.Rep: У Сједињеним Државама, кукуруз је најпопуларнија врста усева, док је соја на другом мјесту. Кукуруз се користи за производњу хране за људе и животиње, а такође се користи и за производњу биогорива. Соја се користи за производњу хране за људе, као и за производњу масла и хране за животиње.
srp.Rep_En: In the United States, corn is the most popular crop, followed by soybeans.Corn is used to produce food for humans and animals, and it is also used to produce biofuels.Soybeans are used to produce food for humans, as well as oil and animal feed.

swe.Qst: vilken typ av gröda som är mer populär än sojabönor i USA
swe.Rep: En gröda som är mer populär än sojabönor i USA är majs. Majs är en av de mest odlade grödorna i USA och används för allt från mat och djurfoder till biobränsle och industriella ändamål. Andra populära grödor i USA inkluderar vete, bomull, potatis och tobak.
swe.Rep_En: A crop that is more popular than soybeans in the United States is corn. Corn is one of the most widely grown crops in the United States and is used for everything from food and animal feed to biofuel and industrial purposes. Other popular crops in the United States include wheat, cotton, potatoes, and tobacco.

swh.Qst: Ni aina gani ya mazao ya kawaida zaidi kuliko soya nchini Marekani?
swh.Rep: Katika nchi ya Marekani, mazao ya kawaida zaidi ni pamoja na mahindi, ngano, soya, pamba, na tumbaku. Kati ya haya, soya ni moja ya mazao yanayolimwa sana nchini Marekani.
swh.Rep_En: In the United States, the most common crops are corn, wheat, soybeans, cotton, and tobacco. Of these, soybeans are one of the most widely grown crops in the United States.

tel.Qst: యునైటెడ్ స్టేట్స్లో సోయాబీన్స్ కంటే ఏ రకమైన పంట మరింత ప్రాచుర్యం పొందింది?
tel.Rep: సోయాబీన్స్ అమెరికాలో ప్రముఖ పంటిని ప్రతినిధించేందుకు అవసరం ఉంది. అమెరికాలో సోయాబీన్స్ ప్రాచుర్యం పొందిన ప్రధాన కారణం అది ప్రముఖ ప్రోటీన్ మరియు ప్రాణి ఆహారం గా ఉపయోగించబడుతుంది. అది సాధారణంగా వెనుకకు పోవడం లేదా ప్రాణి ఆహారం ఉపయోగించడం లేదా ప్రాణి పాలన కొరకు ఉపయోగించబడుతుంది. సోయాబీన్స్ కూడా సాధారణంగా ప్రాణి ఆహారం గా ఉపయోగించబడుతుంది మరియు అది ప్రాణి పాలన కొరకు ఉపయోగించబడుతుంది. సోయాబీన్స్ ప్రాచుర్యం పొందిన మరియు అమెరికాలో సాధారణంగా ఉపయోగించబడుతుంది.
tel.Rep_En: Soybeans are a staple food in the United States, and the main reason soybeans are so popular in the United States is because they are a popular protein and animal food. They are commonly used for backfeeding or animal feed or animal control.

tgk.Qst: Кадом намуди зироат дар Иёлоти Муттаҳида аз соя маъмултар аст?
tgk.Rep: Зироат дар Иёлоти Муттаҳида бо маъмулоти мушаххас амал мешавад. Баъзе маъмулотҳо мисолан футбол, баскетбол, теннис ва واليбال меъёрҳои зироатӣ дар Иёлоти Муттаҳида мебошанд. Дигар маъмулотҳо мисолан гоҳиҳои зироатӣ, бошқаларо ҳамроҳӣ кардан, пӯлӣ, шӯршӯрӣ ва ҳатто бӯзӣ метавонанд ба маъмулотҳои зироатӣ мушаххас бошанд.
tgk.Rep_En: In the United States, there are specific practices of harvesting. Some practices, such as football, basketball, tennis, and volleyball, are the norms of harvesting in the United States. Other practices, such as harvesting goats, accompanying the goat, fur, hunting, and even fishing, may be specific to the harvesting practices.

tgl.Qst: Ang mga uri ng mga pananim na mas popular kaysa sa soybean sa Estados Unidos
tgl.Rep:
Mayroong maraming mga uri ng pananim na mas popular kaysa sa soybean sa Estados Unidos. Narito ang ilan sa mga ito:

1. Corn (Mais) - Ito ang pinakamalaking pananim sa Estados Unidos at ginagamit ito sa maraming mga produkto tulad ng mais na mabenta, mais na inuming pandagat, at mais na tinapay.

2. Wheat (Trigo) - Ito ay ginagamit sa paggawa ng tinapay, pasta, at iba pang mga produktong gawa sa harina.

3. Rice (Bigas) - Ito ay isang pangunahing pagkain sa maraming mga kultura at ginagamit ito sa paggawa ng mga produktong tulad ng kanin, sushi, at iba pa.

4. Potatoes (Patatas) - Ito ay isang pangunahing gulay sa Estados Unidos at ginagamit ito sa paggawa ng mga produktong tulad ng french fries, mashed potatoes, at iba pa.

5. Soybean (Soybean) - Bagaman hindi ito kasing popular ng ibang mga pananim, ang soybean ay ginagamit sa paggawa ng mga produktong tulad ng tofu, soymilk, at iba pa.

6. Tomatoes (Kamatis) - Ito ay isang pangunahing gulay sa Estados Unidos at ginagamit ito sa paggawa ng mga produktong tulad ng ketchup, salsa, at iba pa.

7. Cotton (Koton) - Ito ay ginagamit sa paggawa ng mga damit, tela, at iba pang mga produktong gawa sa tela.

8. Peanuts (Mani) - Ito ay ginagamit sa paggawa ng peanut butter, at iba pang mga produktong gawa sa mani.

9. Apples (Mga mansanas) - Ito ay isang pangunahing prutas sa Estados Unidos at ginagamit ito sa paggawa ng mga produktong tulad ng apple pie, apple juice, at iba pa.

10. Grapes (Ubas) - Ito ay ginagamit sa paggawa ng mga produktong tulad ng alak, raisins, at iba pa.
tgl.Rep_En:
There are many crops more popular than soybeans in the United States. Here are some of them:
The corn is the largest crop in the United States and is used in many products such as corn for sale, corn for beverage, and corn bread.
2. Wheat - It is used in the making of bread, pasta, and other flour products.
Rice (Bigas) - It is a staple food in many cultures and is used in the making of products such as food, sushi, and others.
Potatoes are a staple vegetable in the United States and are used to make products such as French fries, mashed potatoes, and more.
Soybeans (Soybean) - Although not as popular as other crops, soybeans are used in the manufacture of products such as tofu, soymilk, and others.
Tomatoes are a staple vegetable in the United States and are used in the manufacture of products such as ketchup, salsa, and more.
Cotton - It is used in the manufacture of clothing, fabrics, and other textile products.
Peanuts (Mani) - It is used in the manufacture of peanut butter, and other peanut products.
Apples are a staple fruit in the United States and are used in the manufacture of products such as apple pie, apple juice, and more.
10. Grapes - It is used in the manufacture of products such as wine, raisins, and others.

tha.Qst: แต่พืชชนิดไหนที่ได้รับความนิยมมากกว่าถั่วโซย่าในสหรัฐอเมริกา
tha.Rep:
พืชที่ได้รับความนิยมมากกว่าถั่วโซย่าในสหรัฐอเมริกาอาจจะมีหลายชนิด อย่างเช่น:

1. ถั่วเขียว (Green beans)
2. มันฝรั่ง (Potatoes)
3. มะเขือเทศ (Tomatoes)
4. ผักบุ้ง (Spinach)
5. ผักกาดขาว (Cabbage)
6. แตงกวา (Watermelon)
7. แตงโม (Cantaloupe)
8. มะละกอ (Pumpkin)
9. หอมหัวใหญ่ (Onions)
10. ผักกาดแก้ว (Kale)

แต่ถ้าพูดถึงพืชที่ใช้ในอาหารแบบเจ (Vegetarian) และอาหารแบบเจน้ำผึ้ง (Vegan) อาจจะมีพืชอื่นที่ได้รับความนิยมมากกว่าถั่วโซย่า เช่น ถั่วเหลือง (Lentils) และถั่วลิสง (Chickpeas) ซึ่งเป็นส่วนประกอบหลักของอาหารแบบเจและเจน้ำผึ้งในสหรัฐอเมริกา.
tha.Rep_En:
The most popular soybeans in the United States may be of several varieties, such as:
1. green beans
Potatoes and potatoes.
3. Tomatoes (also known as tomatoes)
4. Spinach (spinach)
5. Cabbage
6. Watermelon (also known as watermelon)
7. The cantaloupe
8. Pumpkin (Pumpkin) What is the name of the fruit?
9. The Great Onion
10. Cinnamon and cinnamon
But when it comes to vegetarian and vegan foods, there may be other foods that are more popular than soybeans, such as lentils and chickpeas, which are the staple ingredients of American vegetarian and vegan foods.

tur.Qst: Amerika Birleşik Devletlerinde hangi ürün türü soya fasulyesinden daha popülerdir?
tur.Rep: Amerika Birleşik Devletleri'nde, soya fasulyesi gibi bitkisel ürünlerin yanı sıra, et, süt ürünleri, tahıllar, meyve ve sebzeler gibi birçok ürün türü popülerdir. Ancak, et ürünleri (özellikle tavuk ve sığır eti), süt ürünleri (özellikle süt, peynir ve yoğurt), mısır, buğday, patates ve elma gibi ürünler, Amerikan tüketicileri arasında daha yaygın olarak tüketilmektedir.
tur.Rep_En: In the United States, many types of products are popular, such as meat, dairy products, cereals, fruits, and vegetables, but meat products (especially chicken and beef), dairy products (especially milk, cheese, and yogurt), and products such as corn, wheat, potatoes, and apples are more widely consumed among American consumers.

ukr.Qst: який вид врожаю є більш популярним, ніж соєві боби в Сполучених Штатах?
ukr.Rep: Найбільш популярним видом врожаю в Сполучених Штатах є кукурудза (майже 90 мільйонів акрів вирощують кукурудзу в США). Іншими популярними видами врожаю є соя, пшениця, бавовна та ячмінь.
ukr.Rep_En: The most popular crop in the United States is corn (about 90 million acres are grown in the United States), and other popular crops are soybeans, wheat, cotton, and barley.

urd.Qst: کیا آپ جانتے ہیں کہ امریکہ میں سویا بین سے زیادہ مقبول فصل کون سی ہے؟
urd.Rep: جی ہاں، امریکہ میں سویا بین سے زیادہ مقبول فصل کی سویا کے دانے ہیں۔ سویا کے دانے مختلف طریقوں سے استعمال کئے جاتے ہیں جیسے کہ دودھ، پنیر، ٹوفو، سویا سوس، سویا فلور، سویا بیکن، سویا چکن، اور بہت کچھ۔
urd.Rep_En: In the United States, soybeans are the most popular crop, with soybeans used in a variety of ways, such as milk, cheese, tofu, soy sauce, soy flour, soy bacon, soy chicken, and more.

vie.Qst: chỉ có loại cây trồng nào phổ biến hơn đậu nành ở Hoa Kỳ
vie.Rep:
Có nhiều loại cây trồng phổ biến hơn đậu nành ở Hoa Kỳ, bao gồm:

1. Ngô: Là loại cây trồng quan trọng nhất ở Hoa Kỳ, được trồng trên diện tích rộng khắp đất nước.

2. Lúa mì: Là loại cây trồng quan trọng thứ hai ở Hoa Kỳ, được trồng chủ yếu ở các bang miền Tây và Trung Tây.

3. Khoai tây: Là loại cây trồng quan trọng thứ ba ở Hoa Kỳ, được trồng chủ yếu ở các bang miền Bắc và miền Tây.

4. Cà chua: Là loại cây trồng quan trọng trong ngành nông nghiệp và thực phẩm ở Hoa Kỳ, được trồng chủ yếu ở các bang miền Nam và miền Tây.

5. Bông: Là loại cây trồng quan trọng trong ngành dệt may ở Hoa Kỳ, được trồng chủ yếu ở các bang miền Nam và miền Tây.

6. Cây ăn trái: Bao gồm nhiều loại cây trồng như táo, cam, nho, dâu tây, đào, quả lê, được trồng trên diện tích rộng khắp đất nước.
vie.Rep_En:
There are many crops more common than soybeans in the United States, including:
1.Corn: The most important crop in the United States, grown over a wide area of the country.
Wheat: The second most important crop in the United States, grown mainly in the Western and Midwest states.
Potatoes: The third most important crop in the United States, grown mainly in the Northern and Western states.
Cucumbers are an important crop in agriculture and food in the United States, grown mainly in the southern and western states.
Cotton: An important crop in the textile industry in the United States, grown mainly in the southern and western states.
6. Fruit trees: Including many types of crops such as apples, oranges, grapes, strawberries, peaches, pears, grown over a wide area throughout the country.

yue.Qst: 美國哪種作物比大豆更受歡迎?
yue.Rep: 在美國，玉米是比大豆更受歡迎的作物之一。玉米是美國最重要的糧食作物之一，被廣泛用於食品、飼料、工業和能源生產。此外，小麥、棉花、煙草、馬鈴薯和番茄等作物也很受歡迎。
yue.Rep_En: In the United States, corn is one of the most popular crops compared to soybeans, corn is one of the most important food crops in the United States, widely used for food, feed, industrial and energy production, and crops such as maize, cotton, tobacco, potatoes, and tomatoes are also popular.

zlm.Qst: hanya jenis tanaman mana yang lebih popular daripada kacang soya di Amerika Syarikat
zlm.Rep: Beberapa jenis tanaman yang lebih populer daripada kacang soya di Amerika Syarikat antara lain jagung, gandum, kentang, tomat, kubis, dan kacang tanah. Namun, kacang soya masih menjadi salah satu tanaman penting di Amerika Syarikat karena digunakan sebagai bahan baku untuk berbagai produk makanan dan minuman seperti susu kedelai, tahu, tempe, dan saus.
zlm.Rep_En: Some of the most popular crops in the United States are corn, wheat, potatoes, tomatoes, cabbage, and peanuts, but soybeans are still an important crop in the United States because they are used as raw materials for a variety of food and beverage products such as soy milk, tofu, tempeh, and sauce.

eng.Qst: who sings i'm in the mood for dancing
eng.Rep: The song "I'm in the Mood for Dancing" was originally performed by the Irish pop group The Nolan Sisters in 1979.

afr.Qst: Wie sing ek is in die bui om te dans
afr.Rep: Ek is jammer, maar ek is 'n taalassistent en ek kan nie sing nie. Ek kan egter help om die betekenis van die uitdrukking "Ek is in die bui om te dans" te verduidelik. Dit beteken dat iemand in 'n goeie stemming is en gereed is om te geniet en te dans.
afr.Rep_En: I'm sorry, but I'm a language assistant and I can't sing, but I can help explain the meaning of the expression "I'm in the mood to dance". It means that someone is in a good mood and ready to enjoy and dance.
