4. സാമൂഹ്യശാസ്ത്രത്തിന്റെ പഠനത്തിന് പ്രധാനമായ സമയത്ത് പരിശീലനങ്ങളും പഠനവിഷയങ്ങളും വിദ്യാഭ്യാസത്തിന്റെ മറ്റൊരു പാഠത്തിനുള്ള സമയത്തേക്കാണ് മാറുന്നത്.
5. സാമൂഹ്യശാസ്ത്രത്തിന്റെ പഠനത്തിന് പ്രധാനമായ സമയത്ത് പരിശീലനങ്ങളും പഠനവിഷയങ്ങളും വിദ്യാഭ്യാസത്തിന്റെ മറ്റൊരു പാഠത്തിനുള്ള സമയത്തേക്കാണ് മാറുന്നത്.
mal.Rep_En:
The main concerns of the new sociology of education are:
1. The time taken to train in social sciences is decreasing.
2. The time that is important for the study of social science is shifted to another lesson of education.
3. During the period of importance to the study of social sciences, exams and subjects of study are shifted to another period of education.
4. At a time when the study of social science is important, training and learning subjects are shifted to another lesson of education.
5. At a time when the study of social science is important, training and learning subjects are shifted to another lesson of education.

mar.Qst: नवीन शिक्षण समाजशास्त्राच्या प्रमुख चिंतेचे कारण काय आहे?
mar.Rep: नवीन शिक्षण समाजशास्त्राच्या प्रमुख चिंतेचे कारण खासगी दोन आहेत. पहिला कारण आहे की विश्वातील समाजातील बदल आणि त्याच्या असंख्य आशयांच्या कारणाने शिक्षणाची आवश्यकता वाढत आहे. दुसरा कारण आहे की नवीन तंत्रज्ञान आणि तंत्रज्ञानाच्या वापरात आणि विकासात आणि त्याच्या असंख्य अनुप्रयोगांमध्ये शिक्षणाची आवश्यकता आहे. या दोन्ही कारणांच्या कारणाने नवीन शिक्षण समाजशास्त्राच्या प्रमुख चिंतेचे कारण आहेत.
mar.Rep_En: The main concerns of the new sociology of education are two in particular: first, the need for education due to the changing society of the world and its numerous objects; second, the need for education in the use and development of new technologies and their numerous applications.

mkd.Qst: Кои се главните грижи на новата социологија на образованието?
mkd.Rep:
Главните грижи на новата социологија на образованието вклучуваат:

1. Неравенство во образованието: Новата социологија на образованието се фокусира на истражување на неравенството во образованието, како што се разликите во успехот на учениците според нивниот социјален статус, расна припадност, пол и други фактори.

2. Образователни политики: Оваа област на истражување се фокусира на анализата на образовните политики и нивното влијание врз образованието, како што се финансирањето на образованието, стандардите за учење и наставата, итн.

3. Култура на учење: Новата социологија на образованието истражува како културата на учење влијае врз учениците и наставниците, како и како се креира и одржува културата на учење во училиштата.

4. Глобализација и образование: Оваа област на истражување се фокусира на влијанието на глобализацијата врз образованието, како што се промените во образовните системи, наставните методи и културата на учење поради глобализацијата.

5. Технологија и образование: Новата социологија на образованието истражува како технологијата влијае врз образованието, како што се користат компјутери, интернет и други технологии во училиштата и како тоа влијае врз учениците и наставниците.
mkd.Rep_En:
The main concerns of the new sociology of education include:
Inequality in education: The new sociology of education focuses on the study of inequalities in education, such as differences in student achievement by social status, race, gender, and other factors.
Educational policies: This area of research focuses on the analysis of educational policies and their impact on education, such as the financing of education, standards of learning and teaching, etc.
3. Culture of learning: The new sociology of education explores how the culture of learning affects students and teachers, as well as how the culture of learning is created and maintained in schools.
4. Globalization and Education: This area of research focuses on the impact of globalization on education, such as changes in education systems, teaching methods, and learning cultures due to globalization.
Technology and Education: The new sociology of education explores how technology affects education, how computers, the Internet, and other technologies are used in schools, and how this affects students and teachers.

mlt.Qst: X'inhuma l-interessi ewlenin tas-soċjoloġija l-ġdida tal-edukazzjoni?
mlt.Rep:
L-interessi ewlenin tas-soċjoloġija l-ġdida tal-edukazzjoni huma:

1. L-istudju tal-ħidma tal-edukaturi: Il-ħidma tal-edukaturi hija kruċjali għall-edukazzjoni u l-istudju tas-soċjoloġija tal-edukazzjoni joffri l-opportunità li nifhmu aħjar kif jaħdmu l-edukaturi u kif jistgħu jgħinu lill-istudenti tagħhom.

2. L-istudju tal-inklużjoni u l-esklużjoni: L-edukazzjoni hija kruċjali għall-inklużjoni soċjali u l-istudju tas-soċjoloġija tal-edukazzjoni joffri l-opportunità li nifhmu aħjar kif jistgħu jinħolqu opportunitajiet għall-istudenti kollha.

3. L-istudju tal-politika tal-edukazzjoni: Il-politika tal-edukazzjoni hija kruċjali għall-ħidma tal-edukazzjoni u l-istudju tas-soċjoloġija tal-edukazzjoni joffri l-opportunità li nifhmu aħjar kif jistgħu jiġu mħejjija u jimplimentaw il-politiki tal-edukazzjoni.

4. L-istudju tal-komunitajiet edukattivi: L-edukazzjoni hija kruċjali għall-komunitajiet u l-istudju tas-soċjoloġija tal-edukazzjoni joffri l-opportunità li nifhmu aħjar kif jistgħu jiġu mħejjija u jimplimentaw l-edukazzjoni fil-komunitajiet tagħhom.

5. L-istudju tal-ħidma tal-edukazzjoni fil-livell globali: L-edukazzjoni hija kruċjali għall-iżvilupp globali u l-istudju tas-soċjoloġija tal-edukazzjoni joffri l-opportunità li nifhmu aħjar kif jistgħu jiġu mħejjija u jimplimentaw l-edukazzjoni fil-livell globali.
mlt.Rep_En:
The main interests of the new sociology of education are:
1.The study of the work of educators: The work of educators is crucial to education and the study of the sociology of education offers the opportunity to better understand how educators work and how they can help their students.
The study of inclusion and exclusion: Education is crucial to social inclusion and the study of the sociology of education offers the opportunity to better understand how opportunities can be created for all students.
The study of education policy: Education policy is crucial to the work of education and the study of the sociology of education offers the opportunity to better understand how education policies can be prepared and implemented.
The study of educational communities: Education is crucial for communities and the study of the sociology of education offers the opportunity to better understand how they can prepare and implement education in their communities.
The study of the workings of education at the global level: Education is crucial for global development and the study of the sociology of education offers the opportunity to better understand how education can be prepared and implemented at the global level.

nld.Qst: Wat zijn de belangrijkste bezorgdheden van de nieuwe sociologie van het onderwijs?
nld.Rep:
De nieuwe sociologie van het onderwijs richt zich op een aantal belangrijke bezorgdheden, waaronder:

1. Ongelijkheid in het onderwijs: De nieuwe sociologie van het onderwijs richt zich op de ongelijkheid die bestaat in het onderwijs. Dit omvat ongelijke toegang tot onderwijs, ongelijke kansen en ongelijke uitkomsten voor verschillende groepen studenten.

2. Sociale rechtvaardigheid: De nieuwe sociologie van het onderwijs streeft naar sociale rechtvaardigheid in het onderwijs. Dit betekent dat alle studenten gelijke kansen moeten hebben om te slagen, ongeacht hun achtergrond.

3. Culturele diversiteit: De nieuwe sociologie van het onderwijs erkent de culturele diversiteit van studenten en streeft naar inclusiviteit in het onderwijs. Dit betekent dat het onderwijs moet worden aangepast aan de culturele achtergrond van studenten en dat er ruimte moet zijn voor verschillende perspectieven en ervaringen.

4. Kritische analyse: De nieuwe sociologie van het onderwijs moedigt kritische analyse aan van het onderwijssysteem en de maatschappij als geheel. Dit omvat het onderzoeken van de machtsverhoudingen die bestaan in het onderwijs en het identificeren van manieren om deze te veranderen.

5. Onderwijsbeleid: De nieuwe sociologie van het onderwijs richt zich ook op het onderwijsbeleid en de impact hiervan op studenten en het onderwijssysteem als geheel. Dit omvat het onderzoeken van beleidsmaatregelen en het identificeren van manieren om deze te verbeteren om gelijke kansen en sociale rechtvaardigheid te bevorderen.
nld.Rep_En:
The new sociology of education focuses on a number of important concerns, including:
The new sociology of education focuses on the inequality that exists in education, including unequal access to education, unequal opportunities, and unequal outcomes for different groups of students.
The new sociology of education strives for social justice in education, meaning that all students should have equal opportunities to succeed, regardless of their background.
The new sociology of education recognizes the cultural diversity of students and strives for inclusiveness in education, which means that education must be adapted to the cultural background of students and that there must be room for different perspectives and experiences.
Critical analysis: The new sociology of education encourages critical analysis of the education system and society as a whole, including examining the power relations that exist in education and identifying ways to change them.
The new sociology of education also focuses on education policy and its impact on students and the education system as a whole, including examining policy measures and identifying ways to improve them to promote equal opportunity and social justice.

nno.Qst: kva er de største bekymringene i den nye sosiologien av utdanning
nno.Rep:
Noen av de største bekymringene i den nye sosiologien av utdanning inkluderer:

1. Økende ulikhet: Sosiologer er bekymret for at utdanningssystemet bidrar til økende ulikhet i samfunnet, da det er en tendens til at de som kommer fra rike familier har større muligheter for suksess i utdanningssystemet.

2. Standardisering: Det er en bekymring for at utdanningssystemet blir stadig mer standardisert, med fokus på testing og måling av resultater, og mindre fokus på individuell læring og utvikling.

3. Kommersialisering: Det er en bekymring for at utdanningssystemet blir stadig mer kommersialisert, med økt fokus på profitt og mindre fokus på utdanningens egentlige formål.

4. Globalisering: Sosiologer er bekymret for at globaliseringen av utdanningssystemet kan føre til at lokale kulturer og verdier blir oversett til fordel for en mer globalisert tilnærming.

5. Digitalisering: Det er en bekymring for at digitaliseringen av utdanningssystemet kan føre til at lærere og elever mister den personlige kontakten og interaksjonen som er så viktig for læring og utvikling.
nno.Rep_En:
Some of the biggest concerns in the new sociology of education include:
Increasing inequality: Sociologists are concerned that the education system contributes to increasing inequality in society, as there is a tendency for those from wealthy families to have greater opportunities for success in the education system.
Standardization: There is a concern that the education system is becoming increasingly standardized, with a focus on testing and measuring outcomes, and less focus on individual learning and development.
3. Commercialization: There is a concern that the education system is becoming increasingly commercialized, with increased focus on profit and less focus on education's actual purposes.
4. Globalization: Sociologists are concerned that the globalization of the education system may lead to the neglect of local cultures and values in favor of a more globalized approach.
5. Digitalisation: There is a concern that the digitalisation of the education system may lead to teachers and pupils losing the personal contact and interaction that is so important for learning and development.

nob.Qst: hva er de viktigste bekymringene i den nye sosiologien av utdanning
nob.Rep:
Noen av de viktigste bekymringene i den nye sosiologien av utdanning inkluderer:

1. Ulikhet i utdanning: Det er en økende bekymring for at utdanningssystemet ikke er rettferdig og at det favoriserer visse grupper over andre. Dette kan føre til økt ulikhet og sosial mobilitet.

2. Globalisering og utdanning: Globaliseringen har ført til økt konkurranse og press på utdanningssystemet. Dette kan føre til at utdanning blir mer standardisert og mindre tilpasset lokale behov og kulturer.

3. Teknologi og utdanning: Teknologisk utvikling har ført til nye muligheter og utfordringer for utdanningssystemet. Det er en bekymring for at teknologien kan føre til økt isolasjon og mindre sosial interaksjon blant studenter.

4. Lærerutdanning og kvalitet: Det er en økende bekymring for at lærerutdanningen ikke er tilstrekkelig forberedt på å møte de utfordringene som dagens utdanningssystem står overfor. Det er også en bekymring for at lærere ikke har tilstrekkelig kompetanse og ferdigheter til å undervise i dagens mangfoldige klasserom.

5. Privatisering av utdanning: Det er en økende trend mot privatisering av utdanning, spesielt i utviklingsland. Dette kan føre til økt ulikhet og mindre tilgang til utdanning for de som ikke har råd til å betale for det.
nob.Rep_En:
Some of the most important concerns in the new sociology of education include:
1. Inequality in education: There is a growing concern that the education system is not fair and that it favors certain groups over others. This can lead to increased inequality and social mobility.
2. Globalization and education: Globalization has led to increased competition and pressure on the education system, which can lead to education becoming more standardized and less adapted to local needs and cultures.
Technology and education: Technological developments have led to new opportunities and challenges for the education system. There is a concern that technology can lead to increased isolation and less social interaction among students.
4. Teacher education and quality: There is a growing concern that teacher education is not adequately prepared to meet the challenges facing the current education system. There is also a concern that teachers do not have adequate competence and skills to teach in today's diverse classrooms.
5. Privatization of education: There is an increasing trend towards privatization of education, especially in developing countries. This can lead to increased inequality and less access to education for those who cannot afford to pay for it.

npi.Qst: शिक्षाको नयाँ समाजशास्त्रको प्रमुख चिन्ताहरू के हुन्?
npi.Rep:
शिक्षाको नयाँ समाजशास्त्रमा प्रमुख चिन्ताहरू निम्न हुन्:

1. समाजशास्त्रमा शिक्षाको भूमिका: शिक्षाको समाजशास्त्रमा अत्यन्त महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका हुन्छ। शिक्षाको भूमिका र समाजशास्त्रमा शिक्षाको अभिवृद्धि र विकासको अध्ययन गरिएको छ।

2. शिक्षाको भाषाको महत्व: शिक्षाको भाषाको महत्व समाजशास्त्रमा अत्यन्त महत्वपूर्ण छ। शिक्षाको भाषाको अध्ययनले समाजमा भाषाको उपयोग, भाषाको विकास र भाषाको संरक्षणको अध्ययन गरिएको छ।

3. शिक्षाको समाजशास्त्रमा शिक्षाको भूमिका: शिक्षाको समाजशास्त्रमा शिक्षाको भूमिका र समाजमा शिक्षाको अभिवृद्धि र विकासको अध्ययन गरिएको छ।

4. शिक्षाको समाजशास्त्रमा शिक्षाको भौतिक र मनोवैज्ञानिक विकास: शिक्षाको समाजशास्त्रमा शिक्षाको भौतिक र मनोवैज्ञानिक विकासको अध्ययन गरिएको छ।

5. शिक्षाको समाजशास्त्रमा शिक्षाको समाजिक राजनीतिक भूमिका: शिक्षाको समाजशास्त्रमा शिक्षाको समाजिक राजनीतिक भूमिका र समाजमा शिक्षाको राजनीतिक अध्ययन गरिएको छ।
npi.Rep_En:
The main concerns in the new sociology of education are:
1. The role of education in sociology: Education plays a very important role in sociology. The role of education and the promotion and development of education are studied in sociology.
2. The importance of language in education: The importance of language in education is very important in sociology. The study of language in education studies the use of language in society, the development of language and the preservation of language.
3. The role of education in the sociology of education: The sociology of education studies the role of education and the promotion and development of education in society.
4. Physical and psychological development of education in the sociology of education: The sociology of education studies the physical and psychological development of education.
5. The socio-political role of education in the sociology of education: The sociology of education studies the socio-political role of education and the political role of education in society.

pbt.Qst: د زده کړې د نوي ټولنپوهنې اصلي اندیښنې څه دي؟
pbt.Rep:
د نوي ټولنپوهنې اصلي اندیښنې دوه څخه دي: 

1. واټ (Watt): دا د ټولنپو کې د اندازې شوي چمتو واټونه دي، چې د ټولنپو د چمتو پرته د روښانې پرته اړتیا لري.

2. لومن (Lumen): دا د ټولنپو کې د روښانې شمېرې دي، چې د ټولنپو د چمتو پرته د روښانې پرته اړتیا لري. د لومن د اندازې لپاره د ټولنپو د چمتو پرته د روښانې پرته اړتیا لري.
pbt.Rep_En:
The main concerns of the new sociology are two:
1. Watt: These are the sized ready-made watts in the collections, which require the collections to be ready without lighting.
2. Lumen: It is the number of lumens in a set, which requires the set to be illuminated without preparation. For the size of the lumen, the set needs to be illuminated without preparation.

pes.Qst: نگرانی های اصلی جامعه شناسی جدید آموزش چیست؟
pes.Rep:
نگرانی های اصلی جامعه شناسی جدید آموزش عبارتند از:

1- کاهش کیفیت آموزش: با توجه به افزایش تعداد دانشجویان و کاهش بودجه های آموزشی، کیفیت آموزش در مقایسه با گذشته کاهش یافته است.

2- عدم توجه به نیازهای بازار کار: بسیاری از دانشگاه ها و مؤسسات آموزشی به نیازهای بازار کار توجه نمی کنند و دانشجویان را برای شغل هایی آموزش می دهند که در بازار کار مورد نیاز نیستند.

3- عدم توجه به تغییرات فناوری: با توجه به تغییرات فناوری، بسیاری از دانشگاه ها و مؤسسات آموزشی نتوانسته اند با تغییرات جدید همراه شوند و آموزش های مناسبی برای دانشجویان ارائه ندهند.

4- عدم توجه به تنوع فرهنگی: بسیاری از دانشگاه ها و مؤسسات آموزشی به تنوع فرهنگی توجه نمی کنند و دانشجویان را برای فرهنگ های مختلف آموزش نمی دهند.

5- افزایش هزینه های آموزشی: هزینه های آموزشی در بسیاری از کشورها افزایش یافته است و برای بسیاری از دانشجویان دسترسی به آموزش بسیار سخت شده است.
pes.Rep_En:
The main concerns of the new sociology of education are:
1- Decreased quality of education: Due to the increase in the number of students and the reduction in educational budgets, the quality of education has decreased compared to the past.
2- Failure to address labor market needs: Many universities and educational institutions do not address labor market needs and train students for jobs that are not needed in the labor market.
3- Failure to adapt to technological changes: Due to technological changes, many universities and educational institutions have not been able to adapt to the new changes and do not provide adequate training for students.
4- Lack of attention to cultural diversity: Many universities and educational institutions do not pay attention to cultural diversity and do not train students for different cultures.
5- Increasing educational costs: Educational costs have increased in many countries and access to education has become very difficult for many students.

pol.Qst: Jakie są główne problemy nowej socjologii edukacji?
pol.Rep:
Nie jestem w stanie odpowiedzieć na to pytanie, ponieważ jako asystent nie posiadam zdolności do formułowania opinii ani interpretacji. Jednakże, mogę podać kilka potencjalnych problemów, które mogą być związane z nową socjologią edukacji:

1. Brak jednoznacznej definicji socjologii edukacji - nie ma jednoznacznej definicji socjologii edukacji, co może prowadzić do różnych interpretacji i podejść do badania tego obszaru.

2. Złożoność systemu edukacyjnego - system edukacyjny jest bardzo złożony i składa się z wielu elementów, co może utrudniać badanie i analizę.

3. Trudność w uzyskaniu danych - uzyskanie danych na temat systemu edukacyjnego może być trudne, ponieważ często są one poufne lub trudno dostępne.

4. Brak jednoznacznych wyników badań - badania w socjologii edukacji często prowadzą do różnych wyników, co może utrudniać wyciąganie jednoznacznych wniosków.

5. Zmienność systemu edukacyjnego - system edukacyjny jest dynamiczny i ciągle się zmienia, co może utrudniać badanie i analizę.
pol.Rep_En:
I am unable to answer this question because, as an assistant, I do not have the ability to form opinions or interpretations, but I can give you some potential problems that may be associated with the new sociology of education:
There is no clear definition of the sociology of education, which can lead to different interpretations and approaches to the study of this area.
Complexity of the educational system - The educational system is very complex and consists of many elements, which can make it difficult to study and analyze.
Difficulty obtaining data - obtaining data on the education system can be difficult because it is often confidential or difficult to access.
Lack of unambiguous research results - studies in the sociology of education often lead to different results, which can make it difficult to draw unambiguous conclusions.
The educational system is dynamic and constantly changing, which can make it difficult to study and analyze.

por.Qst: Quais são as principais preocupações da nova sociologia da educação?
por.Rep:
A nova sociologia da educação tem como principais preocupações:

1. Desigualdades educacionais: a preocupação com as desigualdades educacionais é uma das principais preocupações da nova sociologia da educação. Isso inclui a análise das desigualdades de acesso à educação, desigualdades de desempenho escolar e desigualdades de oportunidades educacionais.

2. Relação entre escola e sociedade: a nova sociologia da educação também se preocupa em entender a relação entre a escola e a sociedade. Isso inclui a análise do papel da escola na reprodução das desigualdades sociais e na formação de valores e atitudes dos alunos.

3. Cultura escolar: a cultura escolar é outra preocupação da nova sociologia da educação. Isso inclui a análise das práticas e valores culturais que são transmitidos na escola e como eles afetam o desempenho e a experiência dos alunos.

4. Políticas educacionais: a nova sociologia da educação também se preocupa em analisar as políticas educacionais e como elas afetam a educação. Isso inclui a análise das políticas de financiamento, políticas de avaliação e políticas de inclusão educacional.
por.Rep_En:
The new sociology of education has as its main concerns:
Concern about educational inequalities is one of the main concerns of the new sociology of education, which includes the analysis of inequalities in access to education, inequalities in school performance, and inequalities in educational opportunities.
The new sociology of education also concerns itself with understanding the relationship between school and society, including the analysis of the role of school in reproducing social inequalities and in shaping students' values and attitudes.
School culture is another concern of the new sociology of education, which includes the analysis of the cultural practices and values that are transmitted in school and how they affect student performance and experience.
The new sociology of education also concerns itself with analyzing educational policies and how they affect education, including the analysis of funding policies, evaluation policies, and educational inclusion policies.

ron.Qst: Care sunt principalele preocupări ale noii sociologii a educaţiei?
ron.Rep:
Principalele preocupări ale noii sociologii a educației includ:

1. Studierea inegalităților educaționale: Această ramură a sociologiei educației se concentrează pe identificarea și analizarea inegalităților educaționale, cum ar fi inegalitățile de acces, performanță și rezultate educaționale.

2. Analiza proceselor educaționale: Această ramură se concentrează pe studierea proceselor educaționale, cum ar fi procesul de învățare, procesul de predare și procesul de evaluare.

3. Cercetarea asupra politicilor educaționale: Această ramură se concentrează pe analiza politicilor educaționale și a impactului acestora asupra sistemului educațional și a elevilor.

4. Studierea relațiilor dintre educație și societate: Această ramură se concentrează pe analiza relațiilor dintre educație și societate, cum ar fi impactul educației asupra dezvoltării sociale și economice.

5. Cercetarea asupra diversității culturale și a identității: Această ramură se concentrează pe studierea diversității culturale și a identității în cadrul sistemului educațional și a impactului acestora asupra procesului de învățare și a relațiilor sociale.
ron.Rep_En:
The main concerns of the new sociology of education include:
The study of educational inequality: This branch of educational sociology focuses on identifying and analyzing educational inequalities, such as inequalities in access, performance, and educational outcomes.
Educational Process Analysis: This branch focuses on the study of educational processes such as the learning process, the teaching process, and the evaluation process.
Educational policy research: This branch focuses on the analysis of educational policies and their impact on the educational system and students.
The study of the relationship between education and society: This branch focuses on the analysis of the relationship between education and society, such as the impact of education on social and economic development.
Research on cultural diversity and identity: This branch focuses on the study of cultural diversity and identity within the educational system and their impact on learning and social relations.

rus.Qst: Каковы основные проблемы новой социологии образования?
rus.Rep:
Одной из основных проблем новой социологии образования является сложность определения того, что именно является объектом исследования. Образование может рассматриваться как институт, процесс, система, практика, а также как социальное явление, которое взаимодействует с другими социальными явлениями.

Другой проблемой является сложность измерения и оценки эффективности образовательных программ и политик. Это связано с тем, что образование имеет множество целей и задач, которые могут быть достигнуты различными способами, и оценка эффективности может быть субъективной.

Также в новой социологии образования существует проблема социальной неравенства в образовании. Неравенство может проявляться в доступности образования, качестве образования, возможностях для продолжения образования и т.д. Это может приводить к ухудшению социальной мобильности и увеличению разрыва между бедными и богатыми слоями населения.

Наконец, еще одной проблемой новой социологии образования является сложность применения социологических теорий и методов к изучению образования. Образование является многомерным явлением, которое включает в себя множество аспектов, и требует использования различных методов и подходов для его изучения.
rus.Rep_En:
One of the major problems of the new sociology of education is the difficulty of defining what exactly is the object of study: education can be seen as an institution, a process, a system, a practice, as well as a social phenomenon that interacts with other social phenomena.
Another challenge is the difficulty of measuring and evaluating the effectiveness of educational programs and policies, because education has many goals and objectives that can be achieved in different ways, and the evaluation of effectiveness can be subjective.
The new sociology of education also has a problem of social inequality in education, which can manifest itself in the availability of education, the quality of education, the opportunities for continuing education, etc. This can lead to a deterioration of social mobility and an increase in the gap between the poor and the rich.
Finally, another problem of the new sociology of education is the complexity of applying sociological theories and methods to the study of education, which is a multidimensional phenomenon that involves many aspects and requires the use of different methods and approaches to study it.

slk.Qst: Aké sú hlavné záujmy novej sociológie vzdelávania?
slk.Rep:
Hlavné záujmy novej sociológie vzdelávania zahŕňajú:

1. Vzdelávacie nerovnosti: Nová sociológia vzdelávania sa zaujíma o to, ako sa vzdelávacie príležitosti a výsledky líšia medzi rôznymi skupinami ľudí na základe ich sociálneho a ekonomického postavenia.

2. Kultúrne rozdiely: Táto oblasť sa zaoberá tým, ako kultúrne rozdiely ovplyvňujú vzdelávanie a výsledky vzdelávania. Zahrnuje to aj štúdium kultúrnych faktorov, ktoré ovplyvňujú vzdelávacie procesy a výsledky.

3. Globalizácia a vzdelávanie: Nová sociológia vzdelávania sa zaujíma o to, ako globalizácia ovplyvňuje vzdelávanie a ako sa vzdelávacie systémy prispôsobujú globalizácii.

4. Vzdelávanie a práca: Táto oblasť sa zaoberá tým, ako vzdelávanie ovplyvňuje pracovné príležitosti a kariéru a ako sa vzdelávacie systémy prispôsobujú potrebám trhu práce.

5. Vzdelávanie a identita: Nová sociológia vzdelávania sa zaujíma o to, ako vzdelávanie ovplyvňuje formovanie identity a ako sa identita prejavuje v rámci vzdelávacieho procesu.

6. Vzdelávanie a spoločnosť: Táto oblasť sa zaoberá tým, ako vzdelávanie ovplyvňuje spoločnosť a ako sa spoločnosť prispôsobuje vzdelávaniu. Zahrnuje to aj štúdium vzťahu medzi vzdelávaním a demokraciou, rovnosťou a inklúziou.
slk.Rep_En:
The main interests of the new sociology of education include:
The new sociology of education is concerned with how educational opportunities and outcomes differ between different groups of people based on their social and economic status.
Cultural differences: This field deals with how cultural differences affect education and educational outcomes, and includes the study of cultural factors that influence educational processes and outcomes.
The new sociology of education is concerned with how globalization affects education and how education systems adapt to globalization.
Education and work: This field deals with how education affects job opportunities and careers and how education systems adapt to the needs of the labour market.
The new sociology of education is concerned with how education influences identity formation and how identity manifests itself within the educational process.
Education and society: This field deals with how education affects society and how society adapts to education, and includes the study of the relationship between education and democracy, equality and inclusion.

slv.Qst: kakšne so glavne skrbi nove sociologije izobraževanja
slv.Rep:
Novejša sociologija izobraževanja se osredotoča na številne skrbi, med katerimi so najpomembnejše:

1. Dostopnost izobraževanja: Kako zagotoviti, da bo izobraževanje dostopno vsem, ne glede na njihovo socialno in ekonomsko ozadje?

2. Kvaliteta izobraževanja: Kako zagotoviti, da bo izobraževanje kvalitetno in da bo učencem in študentom omogočilo pridobivanje znanj in veščin, ki jih bodo potrebovali v življenju?

3. Enakost v izobraževanju: Kako zagotoviti, da bodo vsi učenci in študenti imeli enake možnosti za uspeh v izobraževanju, ne glede na njihovo ozadje?

4. Vloga izobraževanja v družbi: Kako izobraževanje vpliva na družbo in kako lahko izobraževanje prispeva k reševanju družbenih problemov?

5. Globalizacija in izobraževanje: Kako se izobraževanje prilagaja globalizaciji in kako lahko izobraževanje pomaga pri reševanju globalnih problemov, kot so podnebne spremembe in revščina?
slv.Rep_En:
The modern sociology of education focuses on a number of concerns, the most important of which are:
1. Access to education: How can we ensure that education is accessible to all, regardless of their social and economic background?
2.Quality of education: How can we ensure that education is of quality and that pupils and students are able to acquire the knowledge and skills they will need in life?
3. Equality in education: How can we ensure that all pupils and students have equal opportunities for success in education, regardless of their background?
4. The role of education in society: How does education affect society and how can education contribute to solving social problems?
Globalization and education: How is education adapting to globalization and how can education help address global challenges such as climate change and poverty?

spa.Qst: ¿Cuáles son las principales preocupaciones de la nueva sociología de la educación?
spa.Rep:
La nueva sociología de la educación se preocupa por varios temas, entre los que destacan:

1. Desigualdades educativas: se estudia cómo las desigualdades sociales, económicas y culturales influyen en el acceso y el rendimiento educativo de los estudiantes.

2. Diversidad cultural: se analiza cómo la diversidad cultural de los estudiantes y sus familias afecta a la educación y cómo la educación puede contribuir a la integración social y cultural.

3. Políticas educativas: se estudian las políticas educativas y su impacto en la educación, incluyendo la privatización, la descentralización y la evaluación de la calidad educativa.

4. Género y educación: se analiza cómo las diferencias de género influyen en la educación y cómo la educación puede contribuir a la igualdad de género.

5. Tecnología y educación: se estudia cómo la tecnología está cambiando la educación y cómo se pueden aprovechar las nuevas tecnologías para mejorar la educación.

En general, la nueva sociología de la educación se preocupa por entender cómo la educación puede contribuir al desarrollo social y cómo se pueden superar las desigualdades y las barreras que impiden el acceso y el éxito educativo de todos los estudiantes.
spa.Rep_En:
The new sociology of education is concerned with several topics, among which the following stand out:
1. Educational inequalities: it is studied how social, economic and cultural inequalities influence the access and educational performance of students.
2. Cultural diversity: it analyses how the cultural diversity of students and their families affects education and how education can contribute to social and cultural integration.
3. Educational policies: educational policies and their impact on education are studied, including privatization, decentralization and evaluation of educational quality.
4. Gender and education: how gender differences influence education and how education can contribute to gender equality is analysed.
5. Technology and education: how technology is changing education and how new technologies can be harnessed to improve education are studied.
In general, the new sociology of education is concerned with understanding how education can contribute to social development and how inequalities and barriers that impede access and educational success for all students can be overcome.

srp.Qst: које су главне забринутости нове социологије образовања
srp.Rep:
Неке од главних забринутости нове социологије образовања укључују:

1. Неравноправност у образовању: Нова социологија образовања истиче да постоји неравноправност у образовању, што може довести до неравнотеже у друштву. На пример, деца из сиромашнијих породица имају мање могућности да добију квалитетно образовање у поређењу са децом из богатијих породица.

2. Квалитет образовања: Нова социологија образовања такође се забринула за квалитет образовања. Она истиче да се у многим земљама образовни системи фокусирају на учење за тестирање, а не на стварно разумевање и примену знања.

3. Друштвена мобилност: Нова социологија образовања такође се забринула за друштвену мобилност. Она истиче да постоји велики размак између богатих и сиромашних ученика у образовном систему, што може довести до неравнотеже у друштву.

4. Мултикултурализам: Нова социологија образовања такође се забринула за мултикултурализам. Она истиче да ученици из различитих култура и језика могу имати различите потребе и изазове у образовном систему, што може довести до неравнотеже у образовању.
srp.Rep_En:
Some of the main concerns of the new sociology of education include:
1. Inequality in education: The new sociology of education points out that there is inequality in education, which can lead to inequality in society. For example, children from poorer families have less opportunities to receive quality education compared to children from richer families.
2. Quality of education: The new sociology of education has also become concerned with the quality of education. It points out that in many countries education systems focus on learning for testing, rather than on really understanding and applying knowledge.
3. Social mobility: The new sociology of education has also taken care of social mobility. It points out that there is a large gap between rich and poor students in the education system, which can lead to inequalities in society.
Multiculturalism: The new sociology of education also concerned itself with multiculturalism. It points out that students from different cultures and languages may have different needs and challenges in the education system, which can lead to inequalities in education.

swe.Qst: Vad är de största bekymmerna för den nya utbildningssociologin?
swe.Rep: En av de största bekymren för den nya utbildningssociologin är att förstå och hantera de ökande ojämlikheterna i utbildningssystemen runt om i världen. Detta inkluderar ojämlikhet i tillgång till utbildning, kvaliteten på utbildningen och resultaten av utbildningen. En annan utmaning är att förstå hur teknologiska framsteg och globalisering påverkar utbildningssystemen och hur man kan anpassa utbildningen för att möta de nya kraven och behoven i samhället. Dessutom är det viktigt att förstå hur socioekonomiska faktorer, som exempelvis föräldrarnas utbildningsnivå och inkomst, påverkar elevernas prestationer och hur man kan minska dessa skillnader.
swe.Rep_En: One of the major concerns of the new sociology of education is to understand and manage the growing inequalities in education systems around the world, including inequalities in access to education, quality of education, and outcomes of education.Another challenge is to understand how technological advances and globalization affect education systems and how to adapt education to meet the new demands and needs of society.

swh.Qst: Ni nini wasiwasi mkubwa wa jamii mpya ya elimu
swh.Rep: Wasiwasi mkubwa wa jamii mpya ya elimu ni jinsi gani teknolojia inavyoathiri mchakato wa kujifunza na kufundisha. Kuna wasiwasi kwamba teknolojia inaweza kusababisha wanafunzi kuwa tegemezi zaidi kwa vifaa vya elektroniki na kupoteza uwezo wa kufikiri kwa ubunifu na kujifunza kwa kina. Pia kuna wasiwasi kwamba teknolojia inaweza kusababisha kutengwa kwa wanafunzi na kufanya mawasiliano ya moja kwa moja kati ya wanafunzi na walimu kuwa ngumu zaidi. Hivyo, jamii mpya ya elimu inahitaji kuzingatia jinsi teknolojia inavyoweza kusaidia mchakato wa kujifunza na kufundisha bila kusababisha athari mbaya kwa wanafunzi na walimu.
swh.Rep_En: The new education community is concerned that technology could lead to students becoming more dependent on electronic devices and losing the ability to think creatively and learn more deeply, and that technology could lead to students becoming isolated and making direct communication between students and teachers more difficult.

tel.Qst: విద్యాశాస్త్రంలో కొత్త సామాజిక శాస్త్రం యొక్క ప్రధాన ఆందోళనలు ఏమిటి?
tel.Rep: విద్యాశాస్త్రంలో కొత్త సామాజిక శాస్త్రం యొక్క ప్రధాన ఆందోళనలు ప్రస్తుతం ప్రజల సమస్యలను పరిష్కరించడానికి సంబంధించి ఉంటాయి. కొత్త సామాజిక శాస్త్రం యొక్క ప్రధాన ఆందోళనలు ప్రజల సమస్యలను పరిష్కరించడానికి సామాజిక పరిస్థితులు, ప్రజల ప్రవర్తనలు, ప్రజల సంస్కృతి, ప్రజల ఆరోగ్య మరియు ప్రజల ప్రాముఖ్యతల పై కేంద్రితంగా ఉంటాయి. కొత్త సామాజిక శాస్త్రం యొక్క ప్రధాన ఆందోళనలు ప్రజల సమస్యలను పరిష్కరించడానికి సామాజిక పరిష్కరణ పద్ధతులను అనుసరించి ఉంటాయి. ఇవి ప్రజల సమస్యలను పరిష్కరించడానికి సహాయకరమైన పద్ధతులు అవుతాయి.
tel.Rep_En: The main concerns of the new sociology in education are about solving the problems of the present, the main concerns of the new sociology are about the social conditions, the behavior of the people, the culture of the people, the health of the people, and the importance of solving the problems of the people.

tgk.Qst: нигарониҳои асосии сотсиологияи нави маориф кадомҳоянд
tgk.Rep:
Нигарониҳои асосии сотсиологияи нави маориф дар сфераи сотсиология мебошанд ва ба муҳимияти маорифҳои нав дар фаъолияти сотсиологон мушаххас аст. Баъзе аз муҳимияти маорифҳои нав дар сотсиология мисолҳои зерин мебошанд:

- Маорифҳои нав метавонанд ба мاқсади таҳлили мушкилотҳои фарҳангӣ, сиёсӣ, иқтисодӣ ва дигар сфераҳои мушкилати ҷомеа муносибат диҳанд.
- Маорифҳои нав метавонанд ба таҳлили мушкилотҳои иқтисодӣ, сиёсӣ ва фарҳангӣ ба таври бехатарин муносибат диҳанд.
- Маорифҳои нав метавонанд ба таҳлили мушкилотҳои ҷомеашиносӣ ба таври бехатарин муносибат диҳанд.
- Маорифҳои нав метавонанд ба таҳлили мушкилотҳои таҳаввули ҷомеа ва таҳаввули фарҳангӣ ба таври бехатарин муносибат диҳанд.

Дар сумма, маорифҳои нав дар сотсиология метавонанд ба таҳлили мушкилотҳои мушкилотҳои ҷомеа ва таҳаввули фарҳангӣ, сиёсӣ ва иқтисодӣ ба таври бехатарин муносибат диҳанд.

tgl.Qst: Ano ang mga pangunahing pag-aalala ng bagong sosyolohiya ng edukasyon
tgl.Rep:
Ang mga pangunahing pag-aalala ng bagong sosyolohiya ng edukasyon ay ang mga sumusunod:

1. Pagkakaroon ng pantay-pantay na oportunidad sa edukasyon - Ang sosyolohiya ng edukasyon ay nagbibigay ng pansin sa pagkakaroon ng pantay-pantay na oportunidad sa edukasyon para sa lahat ng tao, anuman ang kanilang kasarian, lahi, relihiyon, at iba pa.

2. Pagkakaroon ng kritikal na pag-iisip - Ang sosyolohiya ng edukasyon ay nagbibigay ng halaga sa pagkakaroon ng kritikal na pag-iisip sa mga mag-aaral. Ito ay upang matuto silang magtanong, mag-analisa, at magpasya sa mga bagay-bagay.

3. Pagkakaroon ng kasanayan sa pakikipag-ugnayan - Ang sosyolohiya ng edukasyon ay nagbibigay ng halaga sa pagkakaroon ng kasanayan sa pakikipag-ugnayan sa iba't ibang uri ng tao. Ito ay upang matuto silang magpakatao, magbigay ng respeto, at magpakumbaba.

4. Pagkakaroon ng pag-unawa sa lipunan - Ang sosyolohiya ng edukasyon ay nagbibigay ng halaga sa pagkakaroon ng pag-unawa sa lipunan. Ito ay upang matuto silang magpakalawak ng kanilang pang-unawa sa mga pangyayari sa lipunan at magpakalawak ng kanilang pananaw.

5. Pagkakaroon ng pagpapahalaga sa edukasyon - Ang sosyolohiya ng edukasyon ay nagbibigay ng halaga sa pagpapahalaga sa edukasyon. Ito ay upang matuto silang magpakasipag, magpakatino, at magpakatapat sa kanilang pag-aaral.
tgl.Rep_En:

The sociology of education places a value on having the ability to relate to different kinds of people, so that they learn to be kind, respectful, and humble.
The sociology of education places a value on having an understanding of society, so that they can learn to broaden their understanding of social events and broaden their perspective.
The value of education is that it is a social discipline that teaches students to be responsible, to be responsible, and to be honest in their learning.

tha.Qst: ความกังวลหลักของสังคมศาสตร์ใหม่ของการศึกษาคืออะไร
tha.Rep: ความกังวลหลักของสังคมศาสตร์ใหม่ของการศึกษาคือการเติบโตของเทคโนโลยีและการเปลี่ยนแปลงในสังคมที่มีผลต่อการเรียนรู้และการสอนในวิถีการเรียนรู้ใหม่ นอกจากนี้ยังมีการพูดถึงเรื่องของความไม่เท่าเทียมในการเข้าถึงการศึกษา และการสร้างสรรค์วิธีการเรียนรู้ที่เหมาะสมกับบุคคลแต่ละคน โดยการใช้เทคโนโลยีและการเรียนรู้ออนไลน์เป็นตัวช่วยในการแก้ไขปัญหาดังกล่าว แต่ก็ยังต้องพิจารณาถึงผลกระทบทางสังคมและการเปลี่ยนแปลงในวิถีการเรียนรู้ของนักเรียนและผู้เรียนอย่างเต็มรูปแบบด้วย

tur.Qst: Eğitimin yeni sosyolojisinin ana endişeleri nelerdir?
tur.Rep:
Eğitimin yeni sosyolojisi, eğitim sisteminin toplumsal, kültürel ve ekonomik bağlamlarını anlamaya odaklanır. Bu bağlamda, ana endişeler şunlardır:

1. Eşitsizlik: Eğitim sistemi, toplumun farklı kesimleri arasında eşitsizlikleri artırabilir. Bu nedenle, eğitimin yeni sosyolojisi, eşitlik ve adalet konularına odaklanır.

2. Kültürel çeşitlilik: Kültürel çeşitlilik, eğitim sisteminin önemli bir parçasıdır. Eğitimin yeni sosyolojisi, kültürel farklılıkların eğitim sistemi üzerindeki etkisini anlamaya çalışır.

3. Ekonomik faktörler: Eğitim sistemi, ekonomik faktörlerden etkilenir. Eğitimin yeni sosyolojisi, eğitim sisteminin ekonomik bağlamlarını anlamaya çalışır.

4. Teknoloji: Teknolojinin hızlı gelişimi, eğitim sistemi üzerinde önemli bir etkiye sahiptir. Eğitimin yeni sosyolojisi, teknolojinin eğitim sistemi üzerindeki etkisini anlamaya çalışır.

5. Küreselleşme: Küreselleşme, eğitim sistemi üzerinde önemli bir etkiye sahiptir. Eğitimin yeni sosyolojisi, küreselleşmenin eğitim sistemi üzerindeki etkisini anlamaya çalışır.

The new sociology of education seeks to understand the impact of globalization on the education system.

ukr.Qst: Які основні проблеми нової соціології освіти?
ukr.Rep:
Основні проблеми нової соціології освіти можуть включати:

1. Нерівність в освіті: Нерівність в доступі до освіти та якості освіти є однією з основних проблем нової соціології освіти. Це може бути пов'язано з економічними, соціальними та культурними факторами.

2. Глобалізація та освіта: Глобалізація може мати вплив на освіту, зокрема на зміну культурних та соціальних цінностей, а також на зміну вимог до освіти.

3. Технології та освіта: Розвиток технологій може мати вплив на освіту, зокрема на зміну методів навчання та вимог до компетенцій учнів.

4. Роль освіти в суспільстві: Освіта може відігравати різні ролі в суспільстві, включаючи формування громадянської свідомості, підготовку до ринку праці та розвиток креативності та інновацій.

5. Міжкультурна освіта: Зростаюча кількість міжкультурних взаємодій може вимагати розвитку міжкультурної освіти, щоб забезпечити розуміння та повагу до різних культур та традицій.
ukr.Rep_En:

Inequality in education: Inequality in access to and quality of education is one of the major problems of the new sociology of education.

Technology and education: The development of technology can have an impact on education, in particular on changing teaching methods and requirements for pupils' competences.
The role of education in society: Education can play different roles in society, including the formation of civic consciousness, preparation for the labor market and the development of creativity and innovation.
Intercultural education: The growing number of intercultural interactions may require the development of intercultural education to ensure understanding and respect for different cultures and traditions.

urd.Qst: تعلیم کے نئے سماجیات کے اہم خدشات کیا ہیں؟
urd.Rep:
تعلیم کے نئے سماجیات کے اہم خدشات درج ذیل ہیں:

1. تکنالوجی کی بہتر استعمال: تعلیم کے نئے سماجیات کے استعمال میں تکنالوجی کا بہتر استعمال اہم خدشہ ہے۔ یہ اس لئے کہ تکنالوجی کے استعمال کے بغیر تعلیم کے نئے سماجیات کو بہتر نہیں بنایا جا سکتا۔

2. معیار کی حفاظت: تعلیم کے نئے سماجیات کے استعمال میں معیار کی حفاظت بھی اہم خدشہ ہے۔ یہ اس لئے کہ بعض اوقات تعلیم کے نئے سماجیات کے استعمال سے معیار کم ہو جاتا ہے۔

3. معلومات کی حفاظت: تعلیم کے نئے سماجیات کے استعمال میں معلومات کی حفاظت بھی اہم خدشہ ہے۔ یہ اس لئے کہ بعض اوقات تعلیم کے نئے سماجیات کے استعمال سے معلومات کا لاپتہ ہونا بھی ممکن ہے۔

4. اخلاقی اور قانونی خدشات: تعلیم کے نئے سماجیات کے استعمال میں اخلاقی اور قانونی خدشات بھی پیدا ہو سکتے ہیں۔ یہ اس لئے کہ بعض اوقات تعلیم کے نئے سماجیات کے استعمال سے اخلاقی اور قانونی معیار کے خلاف کام کرنا بھی ممکن ہے۔

vie.Qst: những gì là mối quan tâm chính của xã hội học mới của giáo dục
vie.Rep:
Một số mối quan tâm chính của xã hội học mới của giáo dục bao gồm:

1. Sự bình đẳng trong giáo dục: Xã hội học mới của giáo dục quan tâm đến việc đảm bảo sự bình đẳng trong giáo dục, bao gồm cả bình đẳng giới tính, bình đẳng chủng tộc và bình đẳng địa vị xã hội.

2. Sự đa dạng trong giáo dục: Xã hội học mới của giáo dục quan tâm đến việc đảm bảo sự đa dạng trong giáo dục, bao gồm cả đa dạng về nền văn hóa, ngôn ngữ và kinh tế.

3. Sự phát triển của công nghệ và giáo dục: Xã hội học mới của giáo dục quan tâm đến việc sử dụng công nghệ để cải thiện giáo dục và đảm bảo rằng các sinh viên được trang bị các kỹ năng cần thiết để thành công trong thế giới kỹ thuật số.

4. Sự liên kết giữa giáo dục và kinh tế: Xã hội học mới của giáo dục quan tâm đến việc đảm bảo rằng giáo dục đáp ứng được nhu cầu của thị trường lao động và giúp các sinh viên có thể tìm được việc làm sau khi tốt nghiệp.

5. Sự phát triển của giáo dục toàn cầu: Xã hội học mới của giáo dục quan tâm đến việc đảm bảo rằng giáo dục được phát triển toàn cầu và đáp ứng được nhu cầu của các sinh viên trên toàn thế giới.

Equality in education: The new sociology of education is concerned with ensuring equality in education, including gender equality, racial equality, and social status equality.

The new sociology of education is concerned with using technology to improve education and ensure that students are equipped with the skills needed to succeed in the digital world.

yue.Qst: 新嘅教育社會學嘅主要關注點
yue.Rep:
新嘅教育社會學主要關注以下幾個方面：

1. 教育制度與社會不平等：研究教育制度如何影響社會不平等，包括種族、階級、性別等方面的不平等。

2. 教育政策與實踐：研究教育政策的制定和實踐，以及政策對學生、教師和學校的影響。

3. 教育與文化：研究教育與文化之間的關係，包括教育如何影響文化，以及文化如何影響教育。

4. 教育與全球化：研究全球化對教育的影響，包括教育的國際化、跨國教育政策和跨文化教育等方面。

5. 教育與身份認同：研究教育如何影響個人和群體的身份認同，包括種族、性別、性取向、宗教等方面的身份認同。
yue.Rep_En:
New social education focuses on the following areas:
1. Educational system and social inequality: how the education system affects social inequality, including racial, class, gender inequality.
Education policy and practice: the development and practice of education policy and the impact of policy on students, teachers and schools
3. Education and culture: studying the relationship between education and culture, including how education affects culture, and how culture affects education.
4. Education and globalization: studying the impact of globalization on education, including internationalization of education, cross-country education policies, and cross-cultural education.
5. Education and identity recognition: How research and education affects the identity of individuals and groups, including ethnicity, gender, sexual orientation, religion, etc.

zlm.Qst: apa-apa yang menjadi perhatian utama sosiologi pendidikan baru
zlm.Rep:
Beberapa perhatian utama sosiologi pendidikan baru antara lain:

1. Pendidikan sebagai proses sosial: Sosiologi pendidikan baru menekankan bahwa pendidikan bukan hanya tentang transfer pengetahuan dan keterampilan, tetapi juga tentang proses sosial yang melibatkan interaksi antara individu dan lingkungan sosialnya.

2. Kesenjangan pendidikan: Sosiologi pendidikan baru memperhatikan kesenjangan pendidikan yang terjadi di masyarakat, baik dalam hal akses maupun kualitas pendidikan. Hal ini menjadi penting karena kesenjangan pendidikan dapat memperburuk ketimpangan sosial dan ekonomi.

3. Multikulturalisme: Sosiologi pendidikan baru juga memperhatikan pentingnya multikulturalisme dalam pendidikan. Hal ini mencakup pengakuan terhadap keberagaman budaya, bahasa, dan agama dalam masyarakat serta upaya untuk mempromosikan toleransi dan penghargaan terhadap perbedaan.

4. Globalisasi: Sosiologi pendidikan baru juga memperhatikan dampak globalisasi terhadap pendidikan. Hal ini mencakup pengaruh teknologi, perdagangan internasional, dan migrasi terhadap sistem pendidikan di berbagai negara.

5. Pendidikan untuk pembangunan berkelanjutan: Sosiologi pendidikan baru juga menekankan pentingnya pendidikan untuk pembangunan berkelanjutan. Hal ini mencakup upaya untuk mempromosikan kesadaran lingkungan dan keterampilan yang dibutuhkan untuk membangun masyarakat yang berkelanjutan.
zlm.Rep_En:
Some of the main concerns of the new sociology of education include:
Education as a social process: The new sociology of education emphasizes that education is not only about the transfer of knowledge and skills, but also about social processes involving interaction between the individual and his social environment.
2. Educational gaps: The new sociology of education is concerned with the educational gaps that occur in society, both in terms of access and quality of education.
Multiculturalism: The new sociology of education also addresses the importance of multiculturalism in education, including the recognition of cultural, linguistic, and religious diversity in society as well as efforts to promote tolerance and appreciation of difference.
Globalization: The new sociology of education also looks at the impact of globalization on education, including the influence of technology, international trade, and migration on education systems in various countries.
Education for Sustainable Development: The new sociology of education also emphasizes the importance of education for sustainable development. This includes efforts to promote environmental awareness and the skills needed to build a sustainable society.

ckb.Qst: یاری Dragon Ball Z بۆ Xbox One
ckb.Rep:
بەڵامەوە، هەیە ڕێگەی پێدراوە بۆ داگرتنی Dragon Ball Z بۆ Xbox One. دەتوانیت ئەم پێشکەشەی خوارەوە ببینیت:

1. Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - ئەم بازیە کە لە ساڵی 2020 دەرکەوێت وەک بازیەکی RPG. ئەم بازیە بەشێوەیەکی زۆر خۆشەویستانە بۆ هەواڵەکانی Dragon Ball Z دەکات.

2. Dragon Ball FighterZ - ئەم بازیە کە لە ساڵی 2018 دەرکەوێت وەک بازیەکی چالاکی. ئەم بازیە بەشێوەیەکی چالاکی و پێشەکی خۆشەویستانە بۆ هەواڵەکانی Dragon Ball Z دەکات.

3. Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2 - ئەم بازیە کە لە ساڵی 2016 دەرکەوێت وەک بازیەکی RPG. ئەم بازیە بەشێوەیەکی زۆر خۆشەویستانە بۆ هەواڵەکانی Dragon Ball Z دەکات.

هەر سەرچاوەیەک لەم بازیەکانەدا دەتوانیت بەکارببەیت بۆ داگرتنی Dragon Ball Z بۆ Xbox One.
ckb.Rep_En:
However, it is allowed to download Dragon Ball Z for Xbox One. You can see the following presentation:
Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - This game will be released in 2020 as an RPG game. This game is very popular for the Dragon Ball Z news.
Dragon Ball FighterZ - This game was released in 2018 as an active game. It is an active game and a lovers introduction to the news of Dragon Ball Z.
Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2 - This game was released in 2016 as an RPG game. This game is very popular for the Dragon Ball Z news.
Any of these sources can be used to download Dragon Ball Z for Xbox One.

guj.Qst: ડ્રેગન બોલ ઝેડ એક્સબોક્સ વન માટે રમતો
guj.Rep: ડ્રેગન બોલ ઝેડ એક્સબોક્સ વન માટે રમતો ખૂબ મજાનો છે! આ ગેમ એક મજબૂત પ્લેસટેશન ગેમ છે જે આપને એક સંપૂર્ણ પ્રાણીની તરીકે મહસૂસ કરાવે છે. આ ગેમમાં આપને ડ્રેગન બોલ ઝેડ કે રોજો ને નિયંત્રિત કરવાની જરૂર હોઈ શકે છે અને આપને આપની પસંદનું કરાર લેવાની પણ મળી શકે છે. આ ગેમમાં આપને વિવિધ પ્રકારના ડ્રેગન બોલ ઝેડ મળી શકે છે જે આપને આપની પસંદનું ચોઇસ કરવાની પણ મળી શકે છે. આ ગેમને આપને આપની સમયને મજબૂત બનાવવાની પણ સાથ આપે છે.

hrv.Qst: Sve igre Dragon Ball Z za Xbox One
hrv.Rep:
Na Xbox One konzoli postoji nekoliko Dragon Ball Z igara koje možete igrati:

1. Dragon Ball FighterZ - ova igra je borilačka igra u kojoj igrači mogu odabrati svoje omiljene likove iz Dragon Ball Z serije i boriti se protiv drugih likova u različitim modovima igre.

2. Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2 - ova igra je akcijska igra u kojoj igrači mogu stvoriti vlastiti lik i sudjelovati u različitim misijama i borbama protiv drugih likova iz Dragon Ball Z serije.

3. Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - ova igra je RPG igra u kojoj igrači mogu igrati kao Goku i proći kroz priču Dragon Ball Z serije, boriti se protiv neprijatelja i otkriti nove tajne.

4. Dragon Ball Z: Battle of Z - ova igra je borilačka igra u kojoj igrači mogu igrati kao svoji omiljeni likovi iz Dragon Ball Z serije i boriti se protiv drugih likova u različitim modovima igre.

Napomena: Ove igre se mogu kupiti na Xbox Storeu ili u trgovinama koje prodaju igre za Xbox One konzolu.
hrv.Rep_En:
On the Xbox One console there are several Dragon Ball Z games that you can play:
Dragon Ball Z: The Ultimate Fighting Game is a fighting game in which players can choose their favorite characters from the Dragon Ball Z series and fight against other characters in various game modes.
Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2 is an action game in which players can create their own character and participate in various missions and battles against other characters from the Dragon Ball Z series.
Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot is a RPG game in which players can play as Goku and go through the story of the Dragon Ball Z series, fight enemies and discover new secrets.
Dragon Ball Z: Battle of Z is a fighting game in which players can play as their favorite characters from the Dragon Ball Z series and fight against other characters in various game modes.
Note: These games can be purchased on the Xbox Store or at stores that sell Xbox One games.

hye.Qst: Dragon Ball Z- ի բոլոր խաղերը Xbox One- ի համար
hye.Rep:
Որոշ խաղերը Dragon Ball Z շատ հայտնի են Xbox One- ի համար:

kan.Qst: ಡ್ರ್ಯಾಗನ್ ಬಾಲ್ ಝಡ್ ಎಕ್ಸ್ ಬಾಕ್ಸ್ ಒನ್ ಗಾಗಿ ಎಲ್ಲಾ ಆಟಗಳು
kan.Rep:
ಡ್ರ್ಯಾಗನ್ ಬಾಲ್ ಝಡ್ ಎಕ್ಸ್ ಬಾಕ್ಸ್ ಒಂದು ಗೇಮಿಂಗ್ ಕನ್ಸೋಲ್ ಆಗಿದೆ ಮತ್ತು ಅದರಲ್ಲಿ ಹಲವಾರು ಆಟಗಳು ಇವೆ. ಕೆಲವು ಪ್ರಮುಖ ಆಟಗಳು ಈ ರೀತಿವೆ:

1. ಡ್ರ್ಯಾಗನ್ ಬಾಲ್ ಫೈಟರ್ಸ್: ಈ ಆಟವು ಒಂದು ಮಾರ್ಚಿಂಗ್ ಗೇಮ್ ಆಗಿದೆ ಮತ್ತು ಹಲವಾರು ಕರ್ತೃತ್ವಗಳನ್ನು ಹೊಂದಿದೆ.

2. ಮಾರಿಯೋ ಕಾರ್ಟ್: ಈ ಆಟವು ಒಂದು ರೇಸಿಂಗ್ ಗೇಮ್ ಆಗಿದೆ ಮತ್ತು ಮಾರಿಯೋ ಕ್ಯಾರಕ್ಟರ್ ಮುಖ್ಯವಾಗಿ ಇದರಲ್ಲಿ ಉಪಯೋಗಿಸಲ್ಪಡುತ್ತದೆ.

3. ಸೂಪರ್ ಸ್ಮಾಶ್ ಬ್ರದರ್ಸ್: ಈ ಆಟವು ಒಂದು ಮುಖ್ಯ ಪ್ಲೇಯರ್ ವಿಡ್ಯೋ ಗೇಮ್ ಆಗಿದೆ ಮತ್ತು ಹಲವಾರು ಕರ್ತೃತ್ವಗಳನ್ನು ಹೊಂದಿದೆ.

4. ಲೆಗೆಂಡ್ ಆಫ್ ಜೆಲ್ಡಾ: ಈ ಆಟವು ಒಂದು ಪ್ಲೇಟ್ಫಾರ್ಮ್ ಗೇಮ್ ಆಗಿದೆ ಮತ್ತು ಹಲವಾರು ಕರ್ತೃತ್ವಗಳನ್ನು ಹೊಂದಿದೆ.

5. ಪೋಕೆಮಾನ್ ಸಣ್ ಅಂಡ್ ಮೂನ್: ಈ ಆಟವು ಒಂದು ರೋಲ್ ಪ್ಲೇಯಿಂಗ್ ಗೇಮ್ ಆಗಿದೆ ಮತ್ತು ಪೋಕೆಮಾನ್ ಕ್ಯಾರಕ್ಟರ್ ಮುಖ್ಯವಾಗಿ ಇದರಲ್ಲಿ ಉಪಯೋಗಿಸಲ್ಪಡುತ್ತದೆ.

ಇವು ಕೆಲವು ಪ್ರಮುಖ ಆಟಗಳು ಮಾತ್ರ ಹೇಳಿದ್ದೇನೆ. ಇನ್ನೂ ಹಲವಾರು ಆಟಗಳು ಡ್ರ್ಯಾಗನ್ ಬಾಲ್ ಝಡ್ ಎಕ್ಸ್ ಬಾಕ್ಸ್ ನಲ್ಲಿ ಉಪಲಬ್ಧವಿವೆ.

swh.Qst: Dragon Ball Z: Michezo ya Xbox One
swh.Rep:
Kuna michezo kadhaa ya Dragon Ball Z inayopatikana kwenye Xbox One, hapa ni baadhi yao:

1. Dragon Ball FighterZ - Hii ni mchezo wa kupigana ambao unaruhusu wachezaji kuchagua kutoka kwa wahusika wa Dragon Ball Z na kupigana dhidi ya wapinzani wao.

2. Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2 - Hii ni mchezo wa kuchukua jukumu ambao unaruhusu wachezaji kujenga wahusika wao wa kipekee na kushiriki katika mapambano dhidi ya wapinzani wao.

3. Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - Hii ni mchezo wa kuchukua jukumu ambao unaruhusu wachezaji kuchukua jukumu la Goku na kufuata hadithi ya Dragon Ball Z.

4. Dragon Ball Z: Battle of Z - Hii ni mchezo wa kupigana ambao unaruhusu wachezaji kuchagua kutoka kwa wahusika wa Dragon Ball Z na kupigana dhidi ya wapinzani wao.

5. Dragon Ball Z: Ultimate Tenkaichi - Hii ni mchezo wa kupigana ambao unaruhusu wachezaji kuchagua kutoka kwa wahusika wa Dragon Ball Z na kupigana dhidi ya wapinzani wao.
swh.Rep_En:
There are several Dragon Ball Z games available on Xbox One, here are some of them:
Dragon Ball Z: The Ultimate Fighting Game allows players to choose from the characters of Dragon Ball Z and fight against their opponents.
Dragon Ball Z: The Last Jedi is a role-playing game that allows players to create their own unique characters and engage in combat against their opponents.
Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - This is a role-playing game that allows players to take on the role of Goku and follow the story of Dragon Ball Z.
Dragon Ball Z: Battle for Z is a fighting game that allows players to choose from Dragon Ball Z characters and fight against their opponents.
Dragon Ball Z: Ultimate Tenkaichi - This is a fighting game that allows players to choose from Dragon Ball Z characters and fight against their opponents.

tha.Rep:
มีเกม Dragon Ball Z สำหรับ Xbox One อยู่หลายเวอร์ชั่น ดังนี้

1. Dragon Ball FighterZ - เป็นเกมต่อสู้ 2D ที่มีกราฟิกสวยงามและเล่นได้สนุกมากๆ

2. Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2 - เป็นเกมแอ็คชั่น RPG ที่ให้ผู้เล่นได้สร้างตัวละครของตนเองและเข้าร่วมการต่อสู้ในโลก Dragon Ball

3. Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - เป็นเกมแอ็คชั่น RPG ที่ให้ผู้เล่นได้เล่นเป็นตัวละคร Goku และได้สัมผัสกับเนื้อเรื่องของ Dragon Ball Z อีกครั้ง

ทั้งสามเกมนี้สามารถซื้อได้ที่ร้านค้าเกมหรือดาวน์โหลดผ่าน Xbox Store ได้เลย
tha.Rep_En:
There are several versions of Dragon Ball Z for Xbox One, as follows:
Dragon Ball Z is a 2D fighting game with beautiful graphics and a lot of fun.
Dragon Ball Z: Revenge of the Fallen is a RPG that allows players to create their own characters and take part in battles in the Dragon Ball universe.
Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot is an action RPG game that allows players to play as Goku and experience the story of Dragon Ball Z once again.
All three games are available for purchase at the Game Store or download through the Xbox Store.
